Psalm 17:3You have proved my heart. You have visited me in the night. You have tried me, and found nothing. I have resolved that my mouth shall not disobey.
Psalm 17:37  בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ לִבִּ֨י ׀ פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ לַּ֗יְלָה צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי בַל־תִּמְצָ֑א זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י בַּל־יַעֲבָר־פִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 17:3
Psalm 17:4As for the works of men, by the word of your lips, I have kept myself from the ways of the violent.
Psalm 17:47  לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת אָ֭דָם בִּדְבַ֣ר שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ אֲנִ֥י שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי אָרְח֥וֹת פָּרִֽיץ׃ ‬
Psalm 17:4
Psalm 17:5My steps have held fast to your paths. My feet have not slipped.
Psalm 17:57  תָּמֹ֣ךְ אֲ֭שֻׁרַי בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ בַּל־נָמ֥וֹטּוּ פְעָמָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 17:5
Psalm 17:6I have called on you, for you will answer me, God. Turn your ear to me. Hear my speech.
Psalm 17:67  אֲנִֽי־קְרָאתִ֣יךָ כִֽי־תַעֲנֵ֣נִי אֵ֑ל הַֽט־אָזְנְךָ֥ לִ֝֗י שְׁמַ֣ע אִמְרָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 17:6
Psalm 17:7Show your marvelous loving kindness, you who save those who take refuge by your right hand from their enemies.
Psalm 17:77  הַפְלֵ֣ה חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ חוֹסִ֑ים מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 17:7
Psalm 17:8Keep me as the apple of your eye. Hide me under the shadow of your wings,
Psalm 17:87  שָׁ֭מְרֵנִי כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן בַּת־עָ֑יִן בְּצֵ֥ל כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 17:8
Psalm 17:9from the wicked who oppress me, my deadly enemies, who surround me.
Psalm 17:97  מִפְּנֵ֣י רְ֭שָׁעִים ז֣וּ שַׁדּ֑וּנִי אֹיְבַ֥י בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ יַקִּ֥יפוּ עָלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 17:9
Psalm 17:10They close up their callous hearts. With their mouth they speak proudly.
Psalm 17:107  חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ סָּגְר֑וּ פִּ֝֗ימוֹ דִּבְּר֥וּ בְגֵאֽוּת׃ ‬
Psalm 17:10
Psalm 17:11They have now surrounded us in our steps. They set their eyes to cast us down to the earth.
Psalm 17:117  אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ עַתָּ֣ה *סבבוני **סְבָב֑וּנוּ עֵינֵיהֶ֥ם יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ לִנְט֥וֹת בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 17:11
Psalm 17:12He is like a lion that is greedy of his prey, as it were a young lion lurking in secret places.
Psalm 17:127  דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ כְּ֭אַרְיֵה יִכְס֣וֹף לִטְר֑וֹף וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר יֹשֵׁ֥ב בְּמִסְתָּרֽ͏ִים׃ ‬
Psalm 17:12
Psalm 17:13Arise, Yahweh, confront him. Cast him down. Deliver my soul from the wicked by your sword;
Psalm 17:137  קוּמָ֤ה יְהוָ֗ה קַדְּמָ֣ה פָ֭נָיו הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ פַּלְּטָ֥ה נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י מֵרָשָׁ֥ע חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 17:13
Psalm 17:14from men by your hand, Yahweh, from men of the world, whose portion is in this life. You fill the belly of your cherished ones. Your sons have plenty, and they store up wealth for their children.
Psalm 17:147  מִֽמְתִ֥ים יָדְךָ֨ ׀ יְהוָ֡ה מִֽמְתִ֬ים מֵחֶ֗לֶד חֶלְקָ֥ם בַּֽחַיִּים֮ *וצפינך **וּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮ תְּמַלֵּ֢א בִ֫טְנָ֥ם יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ בָנִ֑ים וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ יִ֝תְרָ֗ם לְעוֹלְלֵיהֽ͏ֶם׃ ‬
Psalm 17:14
Psalm 17:15As for me, I shall see your face in righteousness. I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with seeing your form. For the Chief Musician. By David the servant of Yahweh, who spoke to Yahweh the words of this song in the day that Yahweh delivered him from the hand of all his enemies, and from the hand of Saul. He said,
Psalm 17:157  אֲנִ֗י בְּ֭צֶדֶק אֶחֱזֶ֣ה פָנֶ֑יךָ אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 17:15
Psalm 18:1I love you, Yahweh, my strength.
Psalm 18:18  לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ לְעֶ֥בֶד יְהוָ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אֲשֶׁ֤ר דִּבֶּ֨ר ׀ לַיהוָ֗ה אֶת־דִּ֭בְרֵי הַשִּׁירָ֣ה הַזֹּ֑את בְּי֤וֹם הִֽצִּיל־יְהוָ֘ה אוֹת֥וֹ מִכַּ֥ף כָּל־אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו וּמִיַּ֥ד שָׁאֽוּל׃ ‬
Psalm 18:1
Psalm 18:2Yahweh is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my rock, in whom I take refuge; my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower.
Psalm 18:28  וַיֹּאמַ֡ר אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה חִזְקִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:2
Psalm 18:3I call on Yahweh, who is worthy to be praised; and I am saved from my enemies.
Psalm 18:38  יְהוָ֤ה ׀ סַֽלְעִ֥י וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י אֵלִ֣י צ֭וּרִי אֶֽחֱסֶה־בּ֑וֹ מָֽגִנִּ֥י וְקֶֽרֶן־יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:3
Psalm 18:4The cords of death surrounded me. The floods of ungodliness made me afraid.
Psalm 18:48  מְ֭הֻלָּל אֶקְרָ֣א יְהוָ֑ה וּמִן־אֹ֝יְבַ֗י אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:4
Psalm 18:5The cords of Sheol were around me. The snares of death came on me.
Psalm 18:58  אֲפָפ֥וּנִי חֶבְלֵי־מָ֑וֶת וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י בְלִיַּ֣עַל יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:5
Psalm 18:6In my distress I called on Yahweh, and cried to my God. He heard my voice out of his temple. My cry before him came into his ears.
Psalm 18:68  חֶבְלֵ֣י שְׁא֣וֹל סְבָב֑וּנִי קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי מָֽוֶת׃ ‬
Psalm 18:6
Psalm 18:7Then the earth shook and trembled. The foundations also of the mountains quaked and were shaken, because he was angry.
Psalm 18:78  בַּצַּר־לִ֤י ׀ אֶֽקְרָ֣א יְהוָה֮ וְאֶל־אֱלֹהַ֢י אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ יִשְׁמַ֣ע מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ קוֹלִ֑י וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י לְפָנָ֤יו ׀ תָּב֬וֹא בְאָזְנָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 18:7
Psalm 18:8Smoke went out of his nostrils. Consuming fire came out of his mouth. Coals were kindled by it.
Psalm 18:88  וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ ׀ הָאָ֗רֶץ וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י הָרִ֣ים יִרְגָּ֑זוּ וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ כִּי־חָ֥רָה לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:8
Psalm 18:9He bowed the heavens also, and came down. Thick darkness was under his feet.
Psalm 18:98  עָ֘לָ֤ה עָשָׁ֨ן ׀ בְּאַפּ֗וֹ וְאֵשׁ־מִפִּ֥יו תֹּאכֵ֑ל גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים בָּעֲר֥וּ מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:9
Psalm 18:10He rode on a cherub, and flew. Yes, he soared on the wings of the wind.
Psalm 18:108  וַיֵּ֣ט שָׁ֭מַיִם וַיֵּרַ֑ד וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל תַּ֣חַת רַגְלֽ͏ָיו׃ ‬
Psalm 18:10
Psalm 18:11He made darkness his hiding place, his pavilion around him, darkness of waters, thick clouds of the skies.
Psalm 18:118  וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב עַל־כְּ֭רוּב וַיָּעֹ֑ף וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא עַל־כַּנְפֵי־רֽוּחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:11
Psalm 18:12At the brightness before him his thick clouds passed, hailstones and coals of fire.
Psalm 18:128  יָ֤שֶׁת חֹ֨שֶׁךְ ׀ סִתְר֗וֹ סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו סֻכָּת֑וֹ חֶשְׁכַת־מַ֝֗יִם עָבֵ֥י שְׁחָקִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 18:12
Psalm 18:13Yahweh also thundered in the sky. The Most High uttered his voice: hailstones and coals of fire.
Psalm 18:138  מִנֹּ֗גַהּ נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ עָבָ֥יו עָבְר֑וּ בָּ֝רָ֗ד וְגַֽחֲלֵי־אֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:13
Psalm 18:14He sent out his arrows, and scattered them; Yes, great lightning bolts, and routed them.
Psalm 18:148  וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ יְֽהוָ֗ה וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן יִתֵּ֣ן קֹל֑וֹ בָּ֝רָ֗ד וְגַֽחֲלֵי־אֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:14
Psalm 18:15Then the channels of waters appeared. The foundations of the world were laid bare at your rebuke, Yahweh, at the blast of the breath of your nostrils.
Psalm 18:158  וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח חִ֭צָּיו וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם וּבְרָקִ֥ים רָ֝ב וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:15
Psalm 18:16He sent from on high. He took me. He drew me out of many waters.
Psalm 18:168  וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ ׀ אֲפִ֥יקֵי מַ֗יִם וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ מוֹסְד֢וֹת תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ יְהוָ֑ה מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת ר֣וּחַ אַפֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:16
Psalm 18:17He delivered me from my strong enemy, from those who hated me; for they were too mighty for me.
Psalm 18:178  יִשְׁלַ֣ח מִ֭מָּרוֹם יִקָּחֵ֑נִי יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי מִמַּ֥יִם רַבִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 18:17
Psalm 18:18They came on me in the day of my calamity, but Yahweh was my support.
Psalm 18:188  יַצִּילֵ֗נִי מֵאֹיְבִ֥י עָ֑ז וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י כִּֽי־אָמְצ֥וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:18
Psalm 18:19He brought me forth also into a large place. He delivered me, because he delighted in me.
Psalm 18:198  יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי בְיוֹם־אֵידִ֑י וַֽיְהִי־יְהוָ֖ה לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:19
Psalm 18:20Yahweh has rewarded me according to my righteousness. According to the cleanness of my hands has he recompensed me.
Psalm 18:208  וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי כִּ֘י חָ֥פֵֽץ בִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:20
Psalm 18:21For I have kept the ways of Yahweh, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
Psalm 18:218  יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי יְהוָ֣ה כְּצִדְקִ֑י כְּבֹ֥ר יָ֝דַ֗י יָשִׁ֥יב לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:21
Psalm 18:22For all his ordinances were before me. I didn't put away his statutes from me.
Psalm 18:228  כִּֽי־שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי דַּרְכֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה וְלֹֽא־רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:22
Psalm 18:23I was also blameless with him. I kept myself from my iniquity.
Psalm 18:238  כִּ֣י כָל־מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו לְנֶגְדִּ֑י וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו לֹא־אָסִ֥יר מֶֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:23
Psalm 18:24Therefore Yahweh has rewarded me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
Psalm 18:248  וָאֱהִ֣י תָמִ֣ים עִמּ֑וֹ וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר מֵעֲוֺנִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:24
Psalm 18:25With the merciful you will show yourself merciful. With the perfect man, you will show yourself perfect.
Psalm 18:258  וַיָּֽשֶׁב־יְהוָ֣ה לִ֣י כְצִדְקִ֑י כְּבֹ֥ר יָ֝דַ֗י לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 18:25
Psalm 18:26With the pure, you will show yourself pure. With the crooked you will show yourself shrewd.
Psalm 18:268  עִם־חָסִ֥יד תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד עִם־גְּבַ֥ר תָּ֝מִ֗ים תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:26
Psalm 18:27For you will save the afflicted people, but the haughty eyes you will bring down.
Psalm 18:278  עִם־נָבָ֥ר תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר וְעִם־עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 18:27
Psalm 18:28For you will light my lamp, Yahweh. My God will light up my darkness.
Psalm 18:288  כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה עַם־עָנִ֣י תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ וְעֵינַ֖יִם רָמ֣וֹת תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ ‬
Psalm 18:28
Psalm 18:29For by you, I advance through a troop. By my God, I leap over a wall.
Psalm 18:298  כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה תָּאִ֣יר נֵרִ֑י יְהוָ֥ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י יַגִּ֥יהַּ חָשְׁכִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:29
Psalm 18:30As for God, his way is perfect. The word of Yahweh is tried. He is a shield to all those who take refuge in him.
Psalm 18:308  כִּֽי־בְ֭ךָ אָרֻ֣ץ גְּד֑וּד וּ֝בֵֽאלֹהַ֗י אֲדַלֶּג־שֽׁוּר׃ ‬
Psalm 18:30
Psalm 18:31For who is God, except Yahweh? Who is a rock, besides our God,
Psalm 18:318  הָאֵל֮ תָּמִ֢ים דַּ֫רְכּ֥וֹ אִמְרַֽת־יְהוָ֥ה צְרוּפָ֑ה מָגֵ֥ן ה֝֗וּא לְכֹ֤ל ׀ הַחֹסִ֬ים בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:31
Psalm 18:32the God who arms me with strength, and makes my way perfect?
Psalm 18:328  כִּ֤י מִ֣י אֱ֭לוֹהַּ מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה וּמִ֥י צ֝֗וּר זוּלָתִ֥י אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 18:32
Psalm 18:33He makes my feet like deer's feet, and sets me on my high places.
Psalm 18:338  הָ֭אֵל הַמְאַזְּרֵ֣נִי חָ֑יִל וַיִּתֵּ֖ן תָּמִ֣ים דַּרְכִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:33
Psalm 18:34He teaches my hands to war, so that my arms bend a bow of bronze.
Psalm 18:348  מְשַׁוֶּ֣ה רַ֭גְלַי כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת וְעַ֥ל בָּ֝מֹתַ֗י יַעֲמִידֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:34
Psalm 18:35You have also given me the shield of your salvation. Your right hand sustains me. Your gentleness has made me great.
Psalm 18:358  מְלַמֵּ֣ד יָ֭דַי לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה קֶֽשֶׁת־נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:35
Psalm 18:36You have enlarged my steps under me, My feet have not slipped.
Psalm 18:368  וַתִּתֶּן־לִי֮ מָגֵ֢ן יִ֫שְׁעֶ֥ךָ וִֽימִינְךָ֥ תִסְעָדֵ֑נִי וְֽעַנְוַתְךָ֥ תַרְבֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:36
Psalm 18:37I will pursue my enemies, and overtake them. Neither will I turn again until they are consumed.
Psalm 18:378  תַּרְחִ֣יב צַעֲדִ֣י תַחְתָּ֑י וְלֹ֥א מָ֝עֲד֗וּ קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:37
Psalm 18:38I will strike them through, so that they will not be able to rise. They shall fall under my feet.
Psalm 18:388  אֶרְדּ֣וֹף א֭וֹיְבַי וְאַשִּׂיגֵ֑ם וְלֹֽא־אָ֝שׁוּב עַד־כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:38
Psalm 18:39For you have armed me with strength to the battle. You have subdued under me those who rose up against me.
Psalm 18:398  אֶ֭מְחָצֵם וְלֹא־יֻ֣כְלוּ ק֑וּם יִ֝פְּל֗וּ תַּ֣חַת רַגְלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:39
Psalm 18:40You have also made my enemies turn their backs to me, that I might cut off those who hate me.
Psalm 18:408  וַתְּאַזְּרֵ֣נִי חַ֭יִל לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה תַּכְרִ֖יעַ קָמַ֣י תַּחְתָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:40
Psalm 18:41They cried, but there was none to save; even to Yahweh, but he didn't answer them.
Psalm 18:418  וְֽאֹיְבַ֗י נָתַ֣תָּה לִּ֣י עֹ֑רֶף וּ֝מְשַׂנְאַ֗י אַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:41
Psalm 18:42Then I beat them small as the dust before the wind. I cast them out as the mire of the streets.
Psalm 18:428  יְשַׁוְּע֥וּ וְאֵין־מוֹשִׁ֑יעַ עַל־יְ֝הוָ֗ה וְלֹ֣א עָנָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:42
Psalm 18:43You have delivered me from the strivings of the people. You have made me the head of the nations. A people whom I have not known shall serve me.
Psalm 18:438  וְֽאֶשְׁחָקֵ֗ם כְּעָפָ֥ר עַל־פְּנֵי־ר֑וּחַ כְּטִ֖יט חוּצ֣וֹת אֲרִיקֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:43
Psalm 18:44As soon as they hear of me they shall obey me. The foreigners shall submit themselves to me.
Psalm 18:448  תְּפַלְּטֵנִי֮ מֵרִ֢יבֵ֫י עָ֥ם תְּ֭שִׂימֵנִי לְרֹ֣אשׁ גּוֹיִ֑ם עַ֖ם לֹא־יָדַ֣עְתִּי יַֽעַבְדֽוּנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:44
Psalm 18:45The foreigners shall fade away, and shall come trembling out of their close places.
Psalm 18:458  לְשֵׁ֣מַֽע אֹ֭זֶן יִשָּׁ֣מְעוּ לִ֑י בְּנֵֽי־נֵ֝כָ֗ר יְכַחֲשׁוּ־לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:45
Psalm 18:46Yahweh lives; and blessed be my rock. Exalted be the God of my salvation,
Psalm 18:468  בְּנֵי־נֵכָ֥ר יִבֹּ֑לוּ וְ֝יַחְרְג֗וּ מִֽמִּסְגְּרֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:46
Psalm 18:47even the God who executes vengeance for me, and subdues peoples under me.
Psalm 18:478  חַי־יְ֭הוָה וּבָר֣וּךְ צוּרִ֑י וְ֝יָר֗וּם אֱלוֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:47
Psalm 18:48He rescues me from my enemies. Yes, you lift me up above those who rise up against me. You deliver me from the violent man.
Psalm 18:488  הָאֵ֗ל הַנּוֹתֵ֣ן נְקָמ֣וֹת לִ֑י וַיַּדְבֵּ֖ר עַמִּ֣ים תַּחְתָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:48
Psalm 18:49Therefore I will give thanks to you, Yahweh, among the nations, and will sing praises to your name.
Psalm 18:498  מְפַלְּטִ֗י מֵאֹ֫יְבָ֥י אַ֣ף מִן־קָ֭מַי תְּרוֹמְמֵ֑נִי מֵאִ֥ישׁ חָ֝מָ֗ס תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 18:49
Psalm 18:50He gives great deliverance to his king, and shows loving kindness to his anointed, to David and to his seed, forevermore. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 18:508  עַל־כֵּ֤ן ׀ אוֹדְךָ֖ בַגּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ יְהוָ֑ה וּלְשִׁמְךָ֥ אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ ‬
Psalm 18:50
Psalm 18:51(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 18:518  *מגדל **מַגְדִּיל֮ יְשׁוּע֢וֹת מַ֫לְכּ֥וֹ וְעֹ֤שֶׂה חֶ֨סֶד ׀ לִמְשִׁיח֗וֹ לְדָוִ֥ד וּלְזַרְע֗וֹ עַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 18:51
Psalm 19:1The heavens declare the glory of God. The expanse shows his handiwork.
Psalm 19:19  לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 19:1
Psalm 19:2Day after day they pour forth speech, and night after night they display knowledge.
Psalm 19:29  הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם מְֽסַפְּרִ֥ים כְּבֽוֹד־אֵ֑ל וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה יָ֝דָ֗יו מַגִּ֥יד הָרָקִֽיעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 19:2
Psalm 19:3There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
Psalm 19:39  י֣וֹם לְ֭יוֹם יַבִּ֣יעַֽ אֹ֑מֶר וְלַ֥יְלָה לְּ֝לַ֗יְלָה יְחַוֶּה־דָּֽעַת׃ ‬
Psalm 19:3
Psalm 19:4Their voice has gone out through all the earth, their words to the end of the world. In them he has set a tent for the sun,
Psalm 19:49  אֵֽין־אֹ֭מֶר וְאֵ֣ין דְּבָרִ֑ים בְּ֝לִ֗י נִשְׁמָ֥ע קוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 19:4
Psalm 19:5which is as a bridegroom coming out of his room, like a strong man rejoicing to run his course.
Psalm 19:59  בְּכָל־הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ יָ֘צָ֤א קַוָּ֗ם וּבִקְצֵ֣ה תֵ֭בֵל מִלֵּיהֶ֑ם לַ֝שֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ שָֽׂם־אֹ֥הֶל בָּהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 19:5
Psalm 19:6His going forth is from the end of the heavens, his circuit to its ends; There is nothing hidden from its heat.
Psalm 19:69  וְה֗וּא כְּ֭חָתָן יֹצֵ֣א מֵחֻפָּת֑וֹ יָשִׂ֥ישׂ כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר לָר֥וּץ אֹֽרַח׃ ‬
Psalm 19:6
Psalm 19:7Yahweh's law is perfect, restoring the soul. Yahweh's testimony is sure, making wise the simple.
Psalm 19:79  מִקְצֵ֤ה הַשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ מֽוֹצָא֗וֹ וּתְקוּפָת֥וֹ עַל־קְצוֹתָ֑ם וְאֵ֥ין נִ֝סְתָּ֗ר מֵֽחַמָּתוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 19:7
Psalm 19:8Yahweh's precepts are right, rejoicing the heart. Yahweh's commandment is pure, enlightening the eyes.
Psalm 19:89  תּ֘וֹרַ֤ת יְהוָ֣ה תְּ֭מִימָה מְשִׁ֣יבַת נָ֑פֶשׁ עֵד֥וּת יְהוָ֥ה נֶ֝אֱמָנָ֗ה מַחְכִּ֥ימַת פֶּֽתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 19:8
Psalm 19:9The fear of Yahweh is clean, enduring forever. Yahweh's ordinances are true, and righteous altogether.
Psalm 19:99  פִּקּ֘וּדֵ֤י יְהוָ֣ה יְ֭שָׁרִים מְשַׂמְּחֵי־לֵ֑ב מִצְוַ֥ת יְהוָ֥ה בָּ֝רָ֗ה מְאִירַ֥ת עֵינָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 19:9
Psalm 19:10More to be desired are they than gold, yes, than much fine gold; sweeter also than honey and the extract of the honeycomb.
Psalm 19:109  יִרְאַ֤ת יְהוָ֨ה ׀ טְהוֹרָה֮ עוֹמֶ֢דֶת לָ֫עַ֥ד מִֽשְׁפְּטֵי־יְהוָ֥ה אֱמֶ֑ת צָֽדְק֥וּ יַחְדָּֽו׃ ‬
Psalm 19:10
Psalm 19:11Moreover by them is your servant warned. In keeping them there is great reward.
Psalm 19:119  הַֽנֶּחֱמָדִ֗ים מִ֭זָּהָב וּמִפַּ֣ז רָ֑ב וּמְתוּקִ֥ים מִ֝דְּבַ֗שׁ וְנֹ֣פֶת צוּפִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 19:11
Psalm 19:12Who can discern his errors? Forgive me from hidden errors.
Psalm 19:129  גַּֽם־עַ֭בְדְּךָ נִזְהָ֣ר בָּהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שָׁמְרָ֗ם עֵ֣קֶב רָֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 19:12
Psalm 19:13Keep back your servant also from presumptuous sins. Let them not have dominion over me. Then I will be upright. I will be blameless and innocent of great transgression.
Psalm 19:139  שְׁגִיא֥וֹת מִֽי־יָבִ֑ין מִֽנִּסְתָּר֥וֹת נַקֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 19:13
Psalm 19:14Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable in your sight, Yahweh, my rock, and my redeemer. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 19:149  גַּ֤ם מִזֵּדִ֨ים ׀ חֲשֹׂ֬ךְ עַבְדֶּ֗ךָ אַֽל־יִמְשְׁלוּ־בִ֣י אָ֣ז אֵיתָ֑ם וְ֝נִקֵּ֗יתִי מִפֶּ֥שַֽׁע רָֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 19:14
Psalm 19:15(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 19:159  יִֽהְי֥וּ לְרָצ֨וֹן ׀ אִמְרֵי־פִ֡י וְהֶגְי֣וֹן לִבִּ֣י לְפָנֶ֑יךָ יְ֝הוָ֗ה צוּרִ֥י וְגֹאֲלִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 19:15
Psalm 20:1May Yahweh answer you in the day of trouble. May the name of the God of Jacob set you up on high,
Psalm 20:10  לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 20:1
Psalm 20:2send you help from the sanctuary, grant you support from Zion,
Psalm 20:20  יַֽעַנְךָ֣ יְ֭הוָה בְּי֣וֹם צָרָ֑ה יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ שֵׁ֤ם ׀ אֱלֹהֵ֬י יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 20:2
Psalm 20:3remember all your offerings, and accept your burnt sacrifice. Selah.
Psalm 20:30  יִשְׁלַֽח־עֶזְרְךָ֥ מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 20:3
Psalm 20:4May He grant you your heart's desire, and fulfill all your counsel.
Psalm 20:40  יִזְכֹּ֥ר כָּל־מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 20:4
Psalm 20:5We will triumph in your salvation. In the name of our God, we will set up our banners. May Yahweh grant all your requests.
Psalm 20:50  יִֽתֶּן־לְךָ֥ כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ וְֽכָל־עֲצָתְךָ֥ יְמַלֵּֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 20:5
Psalm 20:6Now I know that Yahweh saves his anointed. He will answer him from his holy heaven, with the saving strength of his right hand.
Psalm 20:60  נְרַנְּנָ֤ה ׀ בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ וּבְשֵֽׁם־אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ נִדְגֹּ֑ל יְמַלֵּ֥א יְ֝הוָ֗ה כָּל־מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 20:6
Psalm 20:7Some trust in chariots, and some in horses, but we trust the name of Yahweh our God.
Psalm 20:70  עַתָּ֤ה יָדַ֗עְתִּי כִּ֤י הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ ׀ יְהוָ֗ה מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ מִשְּׁמֵ֣י קָדְשׁ֑וֹ בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת יֵ֣שַׁע יְמִינֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 20:7
Psalm 20:8They are bowed down and fallen, but we rise up, and stand upright.
Psalm 20:80  אֵ֣לֶּה בָ֭רֶכֶב וְאֵ֣לֶּה בַסּוּסִ֑ים וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ ׀ בְּשֵׁם־יְהוָ֖ה אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ נַזְכִּֽיר׃ ‬
Psalm 20:8
Psalm 20:9Save, Yahweh! Let the King answer us when we call! For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 20:90  הֵ֭מָּה כָּרְע֣וּ וְנָפָ֑לוּ וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ קַּ֝֗מְנוּ וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 20:9
Psalm 20:10(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 20:100  יְהוָ֥ה הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ בְיוֹם־קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 20:10
Psalm 21:1The king rejoices in your strength, Yahweh! How greatly he rejoices in your salvation!
Psalm 21:11  לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 21:1
Psalm 21:2You have given him his heart's desire, and have not withheld the request of his lips. Selah.
Psalm 21:21  יְֽהוָ֗ה בְּעָזְּךָ֥ יִשְׂמַח־מֶ֑לֶךְ וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ מַה־*יגיל **יָּ֥גֶל מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 21:2
Psalm 21:3For you meet him with the blessings of goodness. You set a crown of fine gold on his head.
Psalm 21:31  תַּאֲוַ֣ת לִ֭בּוֹ נָתַ֣תָּה לּ֑וֹ וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו בַּל־מָנַ֥עְתָּ סֶּֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 21:3
Psalm 21:4He asked life of you, you gave it to him, even length of days forever and ever.
Psalm 21:41  כִּֽי־תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ בִּרְכ֣וֹת ט֑וֹב תָּשִׁ֥ית לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ עֲטֶ֣רֶת פָּֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 21:4
Psalm 21:5His glory is great in your salvation. You lay honor and majesty on him.
Psalm 21:51  חַיִּ֤ים ׀ שָׁאַ֣ל מִ֭מְּךָ נָתַ֣תָּה לּ֑וֹ אֹ֥רֶךְ יָ֝מִ֗ים עוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 21:5
Psalm 21:6For you make him most blessed forever. You make him glad with joy in your presence.
Psalm 21:61  גָּד֣וֹל כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ ה֥וֹד וְ֝הָדָר תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה עָלָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 21:6
Psalm 21:7For the king trusts in Yahweh. Through the loving kindness of the Most High, he shall not be moved.
Psalm 21:71  כִּֽי־תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ בְרָכ֣וֹת לָעַ֑ד תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה אֶת־פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 21:7
Psalm 21:8Your hand will find out all of your enemies. Your right hand will find out those who hate you.
Psalm 21:81  כִּֽי־הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ בֹּטֵ֣חַ בַּיהוָ֑ה וּבְחֶ֥סֶד עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן בַּל־יִמּֽוֹט׃ ‬
Psalm 21:8
Psalm 21:9You will make them as a fiery furnace in the time of your anger. Yahweh will swallow them up in his wrath. The fire shall devour them.
Psalm 21:91  תִּמְצָ֣א יָ֭דְךָ לְכָל־אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ יְ֝מִֽינְךָ תִּמְצָ֥א שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 21:9
Psalm 21:10You will destroy their descendants from the earth, their posterity from among the children of men.
Psalm 21:101  תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ ׀ כְּתַנּ֥וּר אֵשׁ֮ לְעֵ֢ת פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ יְ֭הוָה בְּאַפּ֣וֹ יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם אֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 21:10
Psalm 21:11For they intended evil against you. They plotted evil against you which cannot succeed.
Psalm 21:111  פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ תְּאַבֵּ֑ד וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם מִבְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 21:11
Psalm 21:12For you will make them turn their back, when you aim drawn bows at their face.
Psalm 21:121  כִּי־נָט֣וּ עָלֶ֣יךָ רָעָ֑ה חָֽשְׁב֥וּ מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה בַּל־יוּכָֽלוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 21:12
Psalm 21:13Be exalted, Yahweh, in your strength, so we will sing and praise your power. For the Chief Musician; set to |The Doe of the Morning.| A Psalm by David.
Psalm 21:131  כִּ֭י תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ שֶׁ֑כֶם בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן עַל־פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 21:13
Psalm 21:14(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 21:141  ר֣וּמָה יְהוָ֣ה בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ נָשִׁ֥ירָה וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָה גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 21:14
Psalm 22:1My God, my God, why have you forsaken me? Why are you so far from helping me, and from the words of my groaning?
Psalm 22:12  לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ עַל־אַיֶּ֥לֶת הַשַּׁ֗חַר מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 22:1
Psalm 22:2My God, I cry in the daytime, but you don't answer; in the night season, and am not silent.
Psalm 22:22  אֵלִ֣י אֵ֭לִי לָמָ֣ה עֲזַבְתָּ֑נִי רָח֥וֹק מִֽ֝ישׁוּעָתִ֗י דִּבְרֵ֥י שַׁאֲגָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:2
Psalm 22:3But you are holy, you who inhabit the praises of Israel.
Psalm 22:32  אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י אֶקְרָ֣א י֭וֹמָם וְלֹ֣א תַעֲנֶ֑ה וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה וְֽלֹא־דֽוּמִיָּ֥ה לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:3
Psalm 22:4Our fathers trusted in you. They trusted, and you delivered them.
Psalm 22:42  וְאַתָּ֥ה קָד֑וֹשׁ י֝וֹשֵׁ֗ב תְּהִלּ֥וֹת יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 22:4
Psalm 22:5They cried to you, and were delivered. They trusted in you, and were not disappointed.
Psalm 22:52  בְּ֭ךָ בָּטְח֣וּ אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ בָּ֝טְח֗וּ וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵֽמוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:5
Psalm 22:6But I am a worm, and no man; a reproach of men, and despised by the people.
Psalm 22:62  אֵלֶ֣יךָ זָעֲק֣וּ וְנִמְלָ֑טוּ בְּךָ֖ בָטְח֣וּ וְלֹא־בֽוֹשׁוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:6
Psalm 22:7All those who see me mock me. They insult me with their lips. They shake their heads, saying,
Psalm 22:72  וְאָנֹכִ֣י תוֹלַ֣עַת וְלֹא־אִ֑ישׁ חֶרְפַּ֥ת אָ֝דָ֗ם וּבְז֥וּי עָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 22:7
Psalm 22:8|He trusts in Yahweh; let him deliver him. Let him rescue him, since he delights in him.|
Psalm 22:82  כָּל־רֹ֭אַי יַלְעִ֣גוּ לִ֑י יַפְטִ֥ירוּ בְ֝שָׂפָ֗ה יָנִ֥יעוּ רֹֽאשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:8
Psalm 22:9But you brought me out of the womb. You made me trust at my mother's breasts.
Psalm 22:92  גֹּ֣ל אֶל־יְהוָ֣ה יְפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ יַ֝צִּילֵ֗הוּ כִּ֘י חָ֥פֵֽץ בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:9
Psalm 22:10I was thrown on you from my mother's womb. You are my God since my mother bore me.
Psalm 22:102  כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה גֹחִ֣י מִבָּ֑טֶן מַ֝בְטִיחִ֗י עַל־שְׁדֵ֥י אִמִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:10
Psalm 22:11Don't be far from me, for trouble is near. For there is none to help.
Psalm 22:112  עָ֭לֶיךָ הָשְׁלַ֣כְתִּי מֵרָ֑חֶם מִבֶּ֥טֶן אִ֝מִּ֗י אֵ֣לִי אָֽתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 22:11
Psalm 22:12Many bulls have surrounded me. Strong bulls of Bashan have encircled me.
Psalm 22:122  אַל־תִּרְחַ֣ק מִ֭מֶּנִּי כִּי־צָרָ֣ה קְרוֹבָ֑ה כִּי־אֵ֥ין עוֹזֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 22:12
Psalm 22:13They open their mouths wide against me, lions tearing prey and roaring.
Psalm 22:132  סְ֭בָבוּנִי פָּרִ֣ים רַבִּ֑ים אַבִּירֵ֖י בָשָׁ֣ן כִּתְּרֽוּנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:13
Psalm 22:14I am poured out like water. All my bones are out of joint. My heart is like wax; it is melted within me.
Psalm 22:142  פָּצ֣וּ עָלַ֣י פִּיהֶ֑ם אַ֝רְיֵ֗ה טֹרֵ֥ף וְשֹׁאֵֽג׃ ‬
Psalm 22:14
Psalm 22:15My strength is dried up like a potsherd. My tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth. You have brought me into the dust of death.
Psalm 22:152  כַּמַּ֥יִם נִשְׁפַּכְתִּי֮ וְהִתְפָּֽרְד֗וּ כָּֽל־עַצְמ֫וֹתָ֥י הָיָ֣ה לִ֭בִּי כַּדּוֹנָ֑ג נָ֝מֵ֗ס בְּת֣וֹךְ מֵעָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:15
Psalm 22:16For dogs have surrounded me. A company of evildoers have enclosed me. They have pierced my hands and feet.
Psalm 22:162  יָ֘בֵ֤שׁ כַּחֶ֨רֶשׂ ׀ כֹּחִ֗י וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי מֻדְבָּ֣ק מַלְקוֹחָ֑י וְֽלַעֲפַר־מָ֥וֶת תִּשְׁפְּתֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:16
Psalm 22:17I can count all of my bones. They look and stare at me.
Psalm 22:172  כִּ֥י סְבָב֗וּנִי כְּלָ֫בִ֥ים עֲדַ֣ת מְ֭רֵעִים הִקִּיפ֑וּנִי כָּ֝אֲרִ֗י יָדַ֥י וְרַגְלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:17
Psalm 22:18They divide my garments among them. They cast lots for my clothing.
Psalm 22:182  אֲסַפֵּ֥ר כָּל־עַצְמוֹתָ֑י הֵ֥מָּה יַ֝בִּ֗יטוּ יִרְאוּ־בִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:18
Psalm 22:19But don't be far off, Yahweh. You are my help: hurry to help me.
Psalm 22:192  יְחַלְּק֣וּ בְגָדַ֣י לָהֶ֑ם וְעַל־לְ֝בוּשִׁ֗י יַפִּ֥ילוּ גוֹרָֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 22:19
Psalm 22:20Deliver my soul from the sword, my precious life from the power of the dog.
Psalm 22:202  וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הוָה אַל־תִּרְחָ֑ק אֱ֝יָלוּתִ֗י לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי חֽוּשָׁה׃ ‬
Psalm 22:20
Psalm 22:21Save me from the lion's mouth! Yes, from the horns of the wild oxen, you have answered me.
Psalm 22:212  הַצִּ֣ילָה מֵחֶ֣רֶב נַפְשִׁ֑י מִיַּד־כֶּ֝֗לֶב יְחִידָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:21
Psalm 22:22I will declare your name to my brothers. In the midst of the assembly, I will praise you.
Psalm 22:222  ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵנִי מִפִּ֣י אַרְיֵ֑ה וּמִקַּרְנֵ֖י רֵמִ֣ים עֲנִיתָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 22:22
Psalm 22:23You who fear Yahweh, praise him! All you descendants of Jacob, glorify him! Stand in awe of him, all you descendants of Israel!
Psalm 22:232  אֲסַפְּרָ֣ה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְאֶחָ֑י בְּת֖וֹךְ קָהָ֣ל אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:23
Psalm 22:24For he has not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted, Neither has he hidden his face from him; but when he cried to him, he heard.
Psalm 22:242  יִרְאֵ֤י יְהוָ֨ה ׀ הַֽלְל֗וּהוּ כָּל־זֶ֣רַע יַעֲקֹ֣ב כַּבְּד֑וּהוּ וְג֥וּרוּ מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ כָּל־זֶ֥רַע יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 22:24
Psalm 22:25Of you comes my praise in the great assembly. I will pay my vows before those who fear him.
Psalm 22:252  כִּ֤י לֹֽא־בָזָ֨ה וְלֹ֪א שִׁקַּ֡ץ עֱנ֬וּת עָנִ֗י וְלֹא־הִסְתִּ֣יר פָּנָ֣יו מִמֶּ֑נּוּ וּֽבְשַׁוְּע֖וֹ אֵלָ֣יו שָׁמֵֽעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 22:25
Psalm 22:26The humble shall eat and be satisfied. They shall praise Yahweh who seek after him. Let your hearts live forever.
Psalm 22:262  מֵ֥אִתְּךָ֗ תְֽהִלָּ֫תִ֥י בְּקָהָ֥ל רָ֑ב נְדָרַ֥י אֲ֝שַׁלֵּ֗ם נֶ֣גֶד יְרֵאָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 22:26
Psalm 22:27All the ends of the earth shall remember and turn to Yahweh. All the relatives of the nations shall worship before you.
Psalm 22:272  יֹאכְל֬וּ עֲנָוִ֨ים ׀ וְיִשְׂבָּ֗עוּ יְהַֽלְל֣וּ יְ֭הוָה דֹּ֣רְשָׁ֑יו יְחִ֖י לְבַבְכֶ֣ם לָעַֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 22:27
Psalm 22:28For the kingdom is Yahweh's. He is the ruler over the nations.
Psalm 22:282  יִזְכְּר֤וּ ׀ וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ אֶל־יְ֭הוָה כָּל־אַפְסֵי־אָ֑רֶץ וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לְ֝פָנֶ֗יךָ כָּֽל־מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת גּוֹיִֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 22:28
Psalm 22:29All the rich ones of the earth shall eat and worship. All those who go down to the dust shall bow before him, even he who can't keep his soul alive.
Psalm 22:292  כִּ֣י לַ֭יהוָה הַמְּלוּכָ֑ה וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 22:29
Psalm 22:30Posterity shall serve him. Future generations shall be told about the Lord.
Psalm 22:302  אָכְל֬וּ וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֨וּ ׀ כָּֽל־דִּשְׁנֵי־אֶ֗רֶץ לְפָנָ֣יו יִ֭כְרְעוּ כָּל־יוֹרְדֵ֣י עָפָ֑ר וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ לֹ֣א חִיָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 22:30
Psalm 22:31They shall come and shall declare his righteousness to a people that shall be born, for he has done it. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 22:312  זֶ֥רַע יַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ יְסֻפַּ֖ר לַֽאדֹנָ֣י לַדּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 22:31
Psalm 22:32(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 22:322  יָ֭בֹאוּ וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ צִדְקָת֑וֹ לְעַ֥ם נ֝וֹלָ֗ד כִּ֣י עָשָֽׂה׃ ‬
Psalm 22:32
Psalm 23:1Yahweh is my shepherd: I shall lack nothing.
Psalm 23:13  מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִ֑ד יְהוָ֥ה רֹ֝עִ֗י לֹ֣א אֶחְסָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 23:1
Psalm 23:2He makes me lie down in green pastures. He leads me beside still waters.
Psalm 23:23  בִּנְא֣וֹת דֶּ֭שֶׁא יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי עַל־מֵ֖י מְנֻח֣וֹת יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 23:2
Psalm 23:3He restores my soul. He guides me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
Psalm 23:33  נַפְשִׁ֥י יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי בְמַעְגְּלֵי־צֶ֝֗דֶק לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 23:3
Psalm 23:4Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me. Your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
Psalm 23:43  גַּ֤ם כִּֽי־אֵלֵ֨ךְ בְּגֵ֪יא צַלְמָ֡וֶת לֹא־אִ֘ירָ֤א רָ֗ע כִּי־אַתָּ֥ה עִמָּדִ֑י שִׁבְטְךָ֥ וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ הֵ֣מָּה יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 23:4
Psalm 23:5You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil. My cup runs over.
Psalm 23:53  תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ לְפָנַ֨י ׀ שֻׁלְחָ֗ן נֶ֥גֶד צֹרְרָ֑י דִּשַּׁ֖נְתָּ בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י כּוֹסִ֥י רְוָיָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 23:5
Psalm 23:6Surely goodness and loving kindness shall follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in Yahweh's house forever. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 23:63  אַ֤ךְ ׀ ט֤וֹב וָחֶ֣סֶד יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי כָּל־יְמֵ֣י חַיָּ֑י וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י בְּבֵית־יְ֝הוָ֗ה לְאֹ֣רֶךְ יָמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 23:6
Psalm 24:1The earth is Yahweh's, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
Psalm 24:14  לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר לַֽ֭יהוָה הָאָ֣רֶץ וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 24:1
Psalm 24:2For he has founded it on the seas, and established it on the floods.
Psalm 24:24  כִּי־ה֭וּא עַל־יַמִּ֣ים יְסָדָ֑הּ וְעַל־נְ֝הָר֗וֹת יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ ‬
Psalm 24:2
Psalm 24:3Who may ascend to Yahweh's hill? Who may stand in his holy place?
Psalm 24:34  מִֽי־יַעֲלֶ֥ה בְהַר־יְהוָ֑ה וּמִי־יָ֝קוּם בִּמְק֥וֹם קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 24:3
Psalm 24:4He who has clean hands and a pure heart; who has not lifted up his soul to falsehood, and has not sworn deceitfully.
Psalm 24:44  נְקִ֥י כַפַּ֗יִם וּֽבַר־לֵ֫בָ֥ב אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ לֹא־נָשָׂ֣א לַשָּׁ֣וְא נַפְשִׁ֑י וְלֹ֖א נִשְׁבַּ֣ע לְמִרְמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 24:4
Psalm 24:5He shall receive a blessing from Yahweh, righteousness from the God of his salvation.
Psalm 24:54  יִשָּׂ֣א בְ֭רָכָה מֵאֵ֣ת יְהוָ֑ה וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 24:5
Psalm 24:6This is the generation of those who seek Him, who seek your face—even Jacob. Selah.
Psalm 24:64  זֶ֭ה דּ֣וֹר *דרשו **דֹּרְשָׁ֑יו מְבַקְשֵׁ֨י פָנֶ֖יךָ יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 24:6
Psalm 24:7Lift up your heads, you gates! Be lifted up, you everlasting doors, and the King of glory will come in.
Psalm 24:74  שְׂא֤וּ שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ פִּתְחֵ֣י עוֹלָ֑ם וְ֝יָב֗וֹא מֶ֣לֶךְ הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ ‬
Psalm 24:7
Psalm 24:8Who is the King of glory? Yahweh strong and mighty, Yahweh mighty in battle.
Psalm 24:84  מִ֥י זֶה֮ מֶ֤לֶךְ הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד יְ֭הוָה עִזּ֣וּז וְגִבּ֑וֹר יְ֝הוָ֗ה גִּבּ֥וֹר מִלְחָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 24:8
Psalm 24:9Lift up your heads, you gates; yes, lift them up, you everlasting doors, and the King of glory will come in.
Psalm 24:94  שְׂא֤וּ שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם וּ֭שְׂאוּ פִּתְחֵ֣י עוֹלָ֑ם וְ֝יָבֹא מֶ֣לֶךְ הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ ‬
Psalm 24:9
Psalm 24:10Who is this King of glory? Yahweh of Armies is the King of glory! Selah. By David.
Psalm 24:104  מִ֤י ה֣וּא זֶה֮ מֶ֤לֶךְ הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד יְהוָ֥ה צְבָא֑וֹת ה֤וּא מֶ֖לֶךְ הַכָּב֣וֹד סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 24:10
Psalm 25:1To you, Yahweh, do I lift up my soul.
Psalm 25:15  לְדָוִ֡ד אֵלֶ֥יךָ יְ֝הוָ֗ה נַפְשִׁ֥י אֶשָּֽׂא׃ ‬
Psalm 25:1
Psalm 25:2My God, I have trusted in you. Don't let me be shamed. Don't let my enemies triumph over me.
Psalm 25:25  אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י בְּךָ֣ בָ֭טַחְתִּי אַל־אֵב֑וֹשָׁה אַל־יַֽעַלְצ֖וּ אֹיְבַ֣י לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:2
Psalm 25:3Yes, no one who waits for you shall be shamed. They shall be shamed who deal treacherously without cause.
Psalm 25:35  גַּ֣ם כָּל־קֹ֭וֶיךָ לֹ֣א יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים רֵיקָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 25:3
Psalm 25:4Show me your ways, Yahweh. Teach me your paths.
Psalm 25:45  דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ יְ֭הוָה הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:4
Psalm 25:5Guide me in your truth, and teach me, For you are the God of my salvation, I wait for you all day long.
Psalm 25:55  הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ ׀ וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעִ֑י אוֹתְךָ֥ קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי כָּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 25:5
Psalm 25:6Yahweh, remember your tender mercies and your loving kindness, for they are from old times.
Psalm 25:65  זְכֹר־רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ יְ֭הוָה וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י מֵעוֹלָ֣ם הֵֽמָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 25:6
Psalm 25:7Don't remember the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions. Remember me according to your loving kindness, for your goodness' sake, Yahweh.
Psalm 25:75  חַטֹּ֤אות נְעוּרַ֨י ׀ וּפְשָׁעַ֗י אַל־תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ זְכָר־לִי־אַ֑תָּה לְמַ֖עַן טוּבְךָ֣ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 25:7
Psalm 25:8Good and upright is Yahweh, therefore he will instruct sinners in the way.
Psalm 25:85  טוֹב־וְיָשָׁ֥ר יְהוָ֑ה עַל־כֵּ֤ן יוֹרֶ֖ה חַטָּאִ֣ים בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 25:8
Psalm 25:9He will guide the humble in justice. He will teach the humble his way.
Psalm 25:95  יַדְרֵ֣ךְ עֲ֭נָוִים בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט וִֽילַמֵּ֖ד עֲנָוִ֣ים דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 25:9
Psalm 25:10All the paths of Yahweh are loving kindness and truth to such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
Psalm 25:105  כָּל־אָרְח֣וֹת יְ֭הוָה חֶ֣סֶד וֶאֱמֶ֑ת לְנֹצְרֵ֥י בְ֝רִית֗וֹ וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 25:10
Psalm 25:11For your name's sake, Yahweh, pardon my iniquity, for it is great.
Psalm 25:115  לְמַֽעַן־שִׁמְךָ֥ יְהוָ֑ה וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ לַ֝עֲוֺנִ֗י כִּ֣י רַב־הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 25:11
Psalm 25:12What man is he who fears Yahweh? He shall instruct him in the way that he shall choose.
Psalm 25:125  מִי־זֶ֣ה הָ֭אִישׁ יְרֵ֣א יְהוָ֑ה י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ יִבְחָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 25:12
Psalm 25:13His soul shall dwell at ease. His seed shall inherit the land.
Psalm 25:135  נַ֭פְשׁוֹ בְּט֣וֹב תָּלִ֑ין וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ יִ֣ירַשׁ אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 25:13
Psalm 25:14The friendship of Yahweh is with those who fear him. He will show them his covenant.
Psalm 25:145  ס֣וֹד יְ֭הוָה לִירֵאָ֑יו וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 25:14
Psalm 25:15My eyes are ever on Yahweh, for he will pluck my feet out of the net.
Psalm 25:155  עֵינַ֣י תָּ֭מִיד אֶל־יְהוָ֑ה כִּ֤י הֽוּא־יוֹצִ֖יא מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת רַגְלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:15
Psalm 25:16Turn to me, and have mercy on me, for I am desolate and afflicted.
Psalm 25:165  פְּנֵה־אֵלַ֥י וְחָנֵּ֑נִי כִּֽי־יָחִ֖יד וְעָנִ֣י אָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:16
Psalm 25:17The troubles of my heart are enlarged. Oh bring me out of my distresses.
Psalm 25:175  צָר֣וֹת לְבָבִ֣י הִרְחִ֑יבוּ מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתַ֗י הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:17
Psalm 25:18Consider my affliction and my travail. Forgive all my sins.
Psalm 25:185  רְאֵ֣ה עָ֭נְיִי וַעֲמָלִ֑י וְ֝שָׂ֗א לְכָל־חַטֹּאותָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:18
Psalm 25:19Consider my enemies, for they are many. They hate me with cruel hatred.
Psalm 25:195  רְאֵֽה־אוֹיְבַ֥י כִּי־רָ֑בּוּ וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת חָמָ֣ס שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 25:19
Psalm 25:20Oh keep my soul, and deliver me. Let me not be disappointed, for I take refuge in you.
Psalm 25:205  שָׁמְרָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי אַל־אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ כִּֽי־חָסִ֥יתִי בָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 25:20
Psalm 25:21Let integrity and uprightness preserve me, for I wait for you.
Psalm 25:215  תֹּם־וָיֹ֥שֶׁר יִצְּר֑וּנִי כִּ֝֗י קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 25:21
Psalm 25:22Redeem Israel, God, out all of his troubles. By David.
Psalm 25:225  פְּדֵ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל מִ֝כֹּ֗ל צָֽרוֹתָיו׃ ‬
Psalm 25:22
Psalm 26:1Judge me, Yahweh, for I have walked in my integrity. I have trusted also in Yahweh without wavering.
Psalm 26:16  לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי יְהוָ֗ה כִּֽי־אֲ֭נִי בְּתֻמִּ֣י הָלַ֑כְתִּי וּבַיהוָ֥ה בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי לֹ֣א אֶמְעָֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 26:1
Psalm 26:2Examine me, Yahweh, and prove me. Try my heart and my mind.
Psalm 26:26  בְּחָנֵ֣נִי יְהוָ֣ה וְנַסֵּ֑נִי *צרופה **צָרְפָ֖ה כִלְיוֹתַ֣י וְלִבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 26:2
Psalm 26:3For your loving kindness is before my eyes. I have walked in your truth.
Psalm 26:36  כִּֽי־חַ֭סְדְּךָ לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָ֑י וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 26:3
Psalm 26:4I have not sat with deceitful men, neither will I go in with hypocrites.
Psalm 26:46  לֹא־יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי עִם־מְתֵי־שָׁ֑וְא וְעִ֥ם נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים לֹ֣א אָבֽוֹא׃ ‬
Psalm 26:4
Psalm 26:5I hate the assembly of evildoers, and will not sit with the wicked.
Psalm 26:56  שָׂ֭נֵאתִי קְהַ֣ל מְרֵעִ֑ים וְעִם־רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים לֹ֣א אֵשֵֽׁב׃ ‬
Psalm 26:5
Psalm 26:6I will wash my hands in innocence, so I will go about your altar, Yahweh;
Psalm 26:66  אֶרְחַ֣ץ בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן כַּפָּ֑י וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה אֶת־מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 26:6
Psalm 26:7that I may make the voice of thanksgiving to be heard, and tell of all your wondrous works.
Psalm 26:76  לַ֭שְׁמִעַ בְּק֣וֹל תּוֹדָ֑ה וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר כָּל־נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 26:7
Psalm 26:8Yahweh, I love the habitation of your house, the place where your glory dwells.
Psalm 26:86  יְֽהוָ֗ה אָ֭הַבְתִּי מְע֣וֹן בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מְק֗וֹם מִשְׁכַּ֥ן כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 26:8
Psalm 26:9Don't gather my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloodthirsty men;
Psalm 26:96  אַל־תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף עִם־חַטָּאִ֣ים נַפְשִׁ֑י וְעִם־אַנְשֵׁ֖י דָמִ֣ים חַיָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 26:9
Psalm 26:10in whose hands is wickedness, their right hand is full of bribes.
Psalm 26:106  אֲשֶׁר־בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם זִמָּ֑ה וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם מָ֣לְאָה שֹּֽׁחַד׃ ‬
Psalm 26:10
Psalm 26:11But as for me, I will walk in my integrity. Redeem me, and be merciful to me.
Psalm 26:116  וַ֭אֲנִי בְּתֻמִּ֥י אֵלֵ֗ךְ פְּדֵ֣נִי וְחָנֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 26:11
Psalm 26:12My foot stands in an even place. In the congregations I will bless Yahweh. By David.
Psalm 26:126  רַ֭גְלִי עָֽמְדָ֣ה בְמִישׁ֑וֹר בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 26:12
Psalm 27:1Yahweh is my light and my salvation. Whom shall I fear? Yahweh is the strength of my life. Of whom shall I be afraid?
Psalm 27:17  לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ יְהוָ֤ה ׀ אוֹרִ֣י וְ֭יִשְׁעִי מִמִּ֣י אִירָ֑א יְהוָ֥ה מָֽעוֹז־חַ֝יַּ֗י מִמִּ֥י אֶפְחָֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 27:1
Psalm 27:2When evildoers came at me to eat up my flesh, even my adversaries and my foes, they stumbled and fell.
Psalm 27:27  בִּקְרֹ֤ב עָלַ֨י ׀ מְרֵעִים֮ לֶאֱכֹ֢ל אֶת־בְּשָׂ֫רִ֥י צָרַ֣י וְאֹיְבַ֣י לִ֑י הֵ֖מָּה כָשְׁל֣וּ וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 27:2
Psalm 27:3Though an army should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear. Though war should rise against me, even then I will be confident.
Psalm 27:37  אִם־תַּחֲנֶ֬ה עָלַ֨י ׀ מַחֲנֶה֮ לֹֽא־יִירָ֢א לִ֫בִּ֥י אִם־תָּק֣וּם עָ֭לַי מִלְחָמָ֑ה בְּ֝זֹ֗את אֲנִ֣י בוֹטֵֽחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 27:3
Psalm 27:4One thing I have asked of Yahweh, that I will seek after, that I may dwell in the house of Yahweh all the days of my life, to see Yahweh's beauty, and to inquire in his temple.
Psalm 27:47  אַחַ֤ת ׀ שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי מֵֽאֵת־יְהוָה֮ אוֹתָ֢הּ אֲבַ֫קֵּ֥שׁ שִׁבְתִּ֣י בְּבֵית־יְ֭הוָה כָּל־יְמֵ֣י חַיַּ֑י לַחֲז֥וֹת בְּנֹֽעַם־יְ֝הוָ֗ה וּלְבַקֵּ֥ר בְּהֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 27:4
Psalm 27:5For in the day of trouble he will keep me secretly in his pavilion. In the covert of his tabernacle he will hide me. He will lift me up on a rock.
Psalm 27:57  כִּ֤י יִצְפְּנֵ֨נִי ׀ בְּסֻכֹּה֮ בְּי֢וֹם רָ֫עָ֥ה יַ֭סְתִּרֵנִי בְּסֵ֣תֶר אָהֳל֑וֹ בְּ֝צ֗וּר יְרוֹמְמֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 27:5
Psalm 27:6Now my head will be lifted up above my enemies around me. I will offer sacrifices of joy in his tent. I will sing, yes, I will sing praises to Yahweh.
Psalm 27:67  וְעַתָּ֨ה יָר֪וּם רֹאשִׁ֡י עַ֤ל אֹֽיְבַ֬י סְֽבִיבוֹתַ֗י וְאֶזְבְּחָ֣ה בְ֭אָהֳלוֹ זִבְחֵ֣י תְרוּעָ֑ה אָשִׁ֥ירָה וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה לַיהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 27:6
Psalm 27:7Hear, Yahweh, when I cry with my voice. Have mercy also on me, and answer me.
Psalm 27:77  שְׁמַע־יְהוָ֖ה קוֹלִ֥י אֶקְרָ֗א וְחָנֵּ֥נִי וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 27:7
Psalm 27:8When you said, |Seek my face,| my heart said to you, |I will seek your face, Yahweh.|
Psalm 27:87  לְךָ֤ ׀ אָמַ֣ר לִ֭בִּי בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ פָנָ֑י אֶת־פָּנֶ֖יךָ יְהוָ֣ה אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 27:8
Psalm 27:9Don't hide your face from me. Don't put your servant away in anger. You have been my help. Don't abandon me, neither forsake me, God of my salvation.
Psalm 27:97  אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֬ר פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ מִמֶּנִּי֮ אַֽל־תַּט־בְּאַ֗ף עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ עֶזְרָתִ֥י הָיִ֑יתָ אַֽל־תִּטְּשֵׁ֥נִי וְאַל־תַּֽ֝עַזְבֵ֗נִי אֱלֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 27:9
Psalm 27:10When my father and my mother forsake me, then Yahweh will take me up.
Psalm 27:107  כִּי־אָבִ֣י וְאִמִּ֣י עֲזָב֑וּנִי וַֽיהוָ֣ה יַֽאַסְפֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 27:10
Psalm 27:11Teach me your way, Yahweh. Lead me in a straight path, because of my enemies.
Psalm 27:117  ה֤וֹרֵ֥נִי יְהוָ֗ה דַּ֫רְכֶּ֥ךָ וּ֭נְחֵנִי בְּאֹ֣רַח מִישׁ֑וֹר לְ֝מַ֗עַן שׁוֹרְרָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 27:11
Psalm 27:12Don't deliver me over to the desire of my adversaries, for false witnesses have risen up against me, such as breathe out cruelty.
Psalm 27:127  אַֽל־תִּ֭תְּנֵנִי בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ צָרָ֑י כִּ֥י קָֽמוּ־בִ֥י עֵֽדֵי־שֶׁ֝֗קֶר וִיפֵ֥חַ חָמָֽס׃ ‬
Psalm 27:12
Psalm 27:13I am still confident of this: I will see the goodness of Yahweh in the land of the living.
Psalm 27:137  לׅׄוּלֵׅׄ֗אׅׄ‪[4]‬ הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי לִרְא֥וֹת בְּֽטוּב־יְהוָ֗ה בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חַיִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 27:13
Psalm 27:14Wait for Yahweh. Be strong, and let your heart take courage. Yes, wait for Yahweh. By David.
Psalm 27:147  קַוֵּ֗ה אֶל־יְה֫וָ֥ה חֲ֭זַק וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ לִבֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝קַוֵּ֗ה אֶל־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 27:14
Psalm 28:1To you, Yahweh, I call. My rock, don't be deaf to me; lest, if you are silent to me, I would become like those who go down into the pit.
Psalm 28:18  לְדָוִ֡ד אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ יְהוָ֨ה ׀ אֶקְרָ֗א צוּרִי֮ אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַ֢שׁ מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי פֶּן־תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי עִם־י֥וֹרְדֵי בֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 28:1
Psalm 28:2Hear the voice of my petitions, when I cry to you, when I lift up my hands toward your Most Holy Place.
Psalm 28:28  שְׁמַ֤ע ק֣וֹל תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י אֵלֶ֑יךָ בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י יָ֝דַ֗י אֶל־דְּבִ֥יר קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 28:2
Psalm 28:3Don't draw me away with the wicked, with the workers of iniquity who speak peace with their neighbors, but mischief is in their hearts.
Psalm 28:38  אַל־תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי עִם־רְשָׁעִים֮ וְעִם־פֹּ֢עֲלֵ֫י אָ֥וֶן דֹּבְרֵ֣י שָׁ֭לוֹם עִם־רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם וְ֝רָעָ֗ה בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 28:3
Psalm 28:4Give them according to their work, and according to the wickedness of their doings. Give them according to the operation of their hands. Bring back on them what they deserve.
Psalm 28:48  תֶּן־לָהֶ֣ם כְּפָעֳלָם֮ וּכְרֹ֢עַ מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יְ֭דֵיהֶם תֵּ֣ן לָהֶ֑ם הָשֵׁ֖ב גְּמוּלָ֣ם לָהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 28:4
Psalm 28:5Because they don't respect the works of Yahweh, nor the operation of his hands, he will break them down and not build them up.
Psalm 28:58  כִּ֤י לֹ֤א יָבִ֡ינוּ אֶל־פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת יְ֭הוָה וְאֶל־מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יָדָ֑יו יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִבְנֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 28:5
Psalm 28:6Blessed be Yahweh, because he has heard the voice of my petitions.
Psalm 28:68  בָּר֥וּךְ יְהוָ֑ה כִּי־שָׁ֝מַע ק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 28:6
Psalm 28:7Yahweh is my strength and my shield. My heart has trusted in him, and I am helped. Therefore my heart greatly rejoices. With my song I will thank him.
Psalm 28:78  יְהוָ֤ה ׀ עֻזִּ֥י וּמָגִנִּי֮ בּ֤וֹ בָטַ֥ח לִבִּ֗י וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז לִבִּ֑י וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 28:7
Psalm 28:8Yahweh is their strength. He is a stronghold of salvation to his anointed.
Psalm 28:88  יְהוָ֥ה עֹֽז־לָ֑מוֹ וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז יְשׁוּע֖וֹת מְשִׁיח֣וֹ הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 28:8
Psalm 28:9Save your people, and bless your inheritance. Be their shepherd also, and bear them up forever. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 28:98  הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה ׀ אֶת־עַמֶּ֗ךָ וּבָרֵ֥ךְ אֶת־נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ וּֽרְעֵ֥ם וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם עַד־הָעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 28:9
Psalm 29:1Ascribe to Yahweh, you sons of the mighty, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength.
Psalm 29:19  מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הָב֣וּ לֽ͏ַ֭יהוָה בְּנֵ֣י אֵלִ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 29:1
Psalm 29:2Ascribe to Yahweh the glory due to his name. Worship Yahweh in holy array.
Psalm 29:29  הָב֣וּ לַֽ֭יהוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לַ֝יהוָ֗ה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 29:2
Psalm 29:3Yahweh's voice is on the waters. The God of glory thunders, even Yahweh on many waters.
Psalm 29:39  ק֥וֹל יְהוָ֗ה עַל־הַ֫מָּ֥יִם אֵֽל־הַכָּב֥וֹד הִרְעִ֑ים יְ֝הוָ֗ה עַל־מַ֥יִם רַבִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 29:3
Psalm 29:4Yahweh's voice is powerful. Yahweh's voice is full of majesty.
Psalm 29:49  קוֹל־יְהוָ֥ה בַּכֹּ֑חַ ק֥וֹל יְ֝הוָ֗ה בֶּהָדָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 29:4
Psalm 29:5The voice of Yahweh breaks the cedars. Yes, Yahweh breaks in pieces the cedars of Lebanon.
Psalm 29:59  ק֣וֹל יְ֭הוָה שֹׁבֵ֣ר אֲרָזִ֑ים וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר יְ֝הוָ֗ה אֶת־אַרְזֵ֥י הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 29:5
Psalm 29:6He makes them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young, wild ox.
Psalm 29:69  וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם כְּמוֹ־עֵ֑גֶל לְבָנ֥וֹן וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן כְּמ֣וֹ בֶן־רְאֵמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 29:6
Psalm 29:7Yahweh's voice strikes with flashes of lightning.
Psalm 29:79  קוֹל־יְהוָ֥ה חֹצֵ֗ב לַהֲב֥וֹת אֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 29:7
Psalm 29:8Yahweh's voice shakes the wilderness. Yahweh shakes the wilderness of Kadesh.
Psalm 29:89  ק֣וֹל יְ֭הוָה יָחִ֣יל מִדְבָּ֑ר יָחִ֥יל יְ֝הוָ֗ה מִדְבַּ֥ר קָדֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 29:8
Psalm 29:9Yahweh's voice makes the deer calve, and strips the forests bare. In his temple everything says, |Glory!|
Psalm 29:99  ק֤וֹל יְהוָ֨ה ׀ יְחוֹלֵ֣ל אַיָּלוֹת֮ וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֢ף יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ אֹמֵ֥ר כָּבֽוֹד׃ ‬
Psalm 29:9
Psalm 29:10Yahweh sat enthroned at the Flood. Yes, Yahweh sits as King forever.
Psalm 29:109  יְ֭הוָה לַמַּבּ֣וּל יָשָׁ֑ב וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב יְ֝הוָ֗ה מֶ֣לֶךְ לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 29:10
Psalm 29:11Yahweh will give strength to his people. Yahweh will bless his people with peace. A Psalm. A Song for the Dedication of the Temple. By David.
Psalm 29:119  יְֽהוָ֗ה עֹ֭ז לְעַמּ֣וֹ יִתֵּ֑ן יְהוָ֓ה ׀ יְבָרֵ֖ךְ אֶת־עַמּ֣וֹ בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 29:11
Psalm 30:1I will extol you, Yahweh, for you have raised me up, and have not made my foes to rejoice over me.
Psalm 30:10  מִזְמ֡וֹר שִׁיר־חֲנֻכַּ֖ת הַבַּ֣יִת לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 30:1
Psalm 30:2Yahweh my God, I cried to you, and you have healed me.
Psalm 30:20  אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ יְ֭הוָה כִּ֣י דִלִּיתָ֑נִי וְלֹא־שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ אֹיְבַ֣י לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 30:2
Psalm 30:3Yahweh, you have brought up my soul from Sheol. You have kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.
Psalm 30:30  יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָ֑י שִׁוַּ֥עְתִּי אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ וַתִּרְפָּאֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 30:3
Psalm 30:4Sing praise to Yahweh, you saints of his. Give thanks to his holy name.
Psalm 30:40  יְֽהוָ֗ה הֶֽעֱלִ֣יתָ מִן־שְׁא֣וֹל נַפְשִׁ֑י חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי *מיורדי־**מִיָּֽרְדִי־בֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 30:4
Psalm 30:5For his anger is but for a moment. His favor is for a lifetime. Weeping may stay for the night, but joy comes in the morning.
Psalm 30:50  זַמְּר֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה חֲסִידָ֑יו וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ לְזֵ֣כֶר קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 30:5
Psalm 30:6As for me, I said in my prosperity, |I shall never be moved.|
Psalm 30:60  כִּ֤י רֶ֨גַע ׀ בְּאַפּוֹ֮ חַיִּ֢ים בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ בָּ֭עֶרֶב יָלִ֥ין בֶּ֗כִי וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר רִנָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 30:6
Psalm 30:7You, Yahweh, when you favored me, made my mountain stand strong; but when you hid your face, I was troubled.
Psalm 30:70  וַ֭אֲנִי אָמַ֣רְתִּי בְשַׁלְוִ֑י בַּל־אֶמּ֥וֹט לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 30:7
Psalm 30:8I cried to you, Yahweh. To Yahweh I made supplication:
Psalm 30:80  יְֽהוָ֗ה בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ הֶעֱמַ֢דְתָּה לְֽהַרְרִ֫י עֹ֥ז הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ פָנֶ֗יךָ הָיִ֥יתִי נִבְהָֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 30:8
Psalm 30:9|What profit is there in my destruction, if I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise you? Shall it declare your truth?
Psalm 30:90  אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְהוָ֣ה אֶקְרָ֑א וְאֶל־אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 30:9
Psalm 30:10Hear, Yahweh, and have mercy on me. Yahweh, be my helper.|
Psalm 30:100  מַה־בֶּ֥צַע בְּדָמִי֮ בְּרִדְתִּ֢י אֶ֫ל־שָׁ֥חַת הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ עָפָ֑ר הֲיַגִּ֥יד אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 30:10
Psalm 30:11You have turned my mourning into dancing for me. You have removed my sackcloth, and clothed me with gladness,
Psalm 30:110  שְׁמַע־יְהוָ֥ה וְחָנֵּ֑נִי יְ֝הוָה הֱ‍ֽיֵה־עֹזֵ֥ר לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 30:11
Psalm 30:12To the end that my heart may sing praise to you, and not be silent. Yahweh my God, I will give thanks to you forever! For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 30:120  הָפַ֣כְתָּ מִסְפְּדִי֮ לְמָח֢וֹל לִ֥י פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ שַׂקִּ֑י וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי שִׂמְחָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 30:12
Psalm 30:13(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 30:130  לְמַ֤עַן ׀ יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ כָ֭בוֹד וְלֹ֣א יִדֹּ֑ם יְהוָ֥ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י לְעוֹלָ֥ם אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 30:13
Psalm 31:1In you, Yahweh, I take refuge. Let me never be disappointed. Deliver me in your righteousness.
Psalm 31:11  לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 31:1
Psalm 31:2Bow down your ear to me. Deliver me speedily. Be to me a strong rock, a house of defense to save me.
Psalm 31:21  בְּךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה חָ֭סִיתִי אַל־אֵב֣וֹשָׁה לְעוֹלָ֑ם בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ פַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:2
Psalm 31:3For you are my rock and my fortress, therefore for your name's sake lead me and guide me.
Psalm 31:31  הַטֵּ֤ה אֵלַ֨י ׀ אָזְנְךָ֮ מְהֵרָ֢ה הַצִּ֫ילֵ֥נִי הֱיֵ֤ה לִ֨י ׀ לְֽצוּר־מָ֭עוֹז לְבֵ֥ית מְצוּד֗וֹת לְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:3
Psalm 31:4Pluck me out of the net that they have laid secretly for me, for you are my stronghold.
Psalm 31:41  כִּֽי־סַלְעִ֣י וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י אָ֑תָּה וּלְמַ֥עַן שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ תַּֽנְחֵ֥נִי וּֽתְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:4
Psalm 31:5Into your hand I commend my spirit. You redeem me, Yahweh, God of truth.
Psalm 31:51  תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נִי מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת ז֭וּ טָ֣מְנוּ לִ֑י כִּֽי־אַ֝תָּה מָֽעוּזִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:5
Psalm 31:6I hate those who regard lying vanities, but I trust in Yahweh.
Psalm 31:61  בְּיָדְךָ֮ אַפְקִ֢יד ר֫וּחִ֥י פָּדִ֖יתָה אוֹתִ֥י יְהוָ֗ה אֵ֣ל אֱמֶֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 31:6
Psalm 31:7I will be glad and rejoice in your loving kindness, for you have seen my affliction. You have known my soul in adversities.
Psalm 31:71  שָׂנֵ֗אתִי הַשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים הַבְלֵי־שָׁ֑וְא וַ֝אֲנִ֗י אֶל־יְהוָ֥ה בָּטָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:7
Psalm 31:8You have not shut me up into the hand of the enemy. You have set my feet in a large place.
Psalm 31:81  אָגִ֥ילָה וְאֶשְׂמְחָ֗ה בְּחַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ אֲשֶׁ֣ר רָ֭אִיתָ אֶת־עָנְיִ֑י יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ בְּצָר֥וֹת נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:8
Psalm 31:9Have mercy on me, Yahweh, for I am in distress. My eye, my soul, and my body waste away with grief.
Psalm 31:91  וְלֹ֣א הִ֭סְגַּרְתַּנִי בְּיַד־אוֹיֵ֑ב הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתָּ בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב רַגְלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:9
Psalm 31:10For my life is spent with sorrow, my years with sighing. My strength fails because of my iniquity. My bones are wasted away.
Psalm 31:101  חָנֵּ֥נִי יְהוָה֮ כִּ֤י צַ֫ר־לִ֥י עָשְׁשָׁ֖ה בְכַ֥עַס עֵינִ֗י נַפְשִׁ֥י וּבִטְנִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:10
Psalm 31:11Because of all my adversaries I have become utterly contemptible to my neighbors, A fear to my acquaintances. Those who saw me on the street fled from me.
Psalm 31:111  כִּ֤י כָל֪וּ בְיָג֡וֹן חַיַּי֮ וּשְׁנוֹתַ֢י בַּאֲנָ֫חָ֥ה כָּשַׁ֣ל בַּעֲוֺנִ֣י כֹחִ֑י וַעֲצָמַ֥י עָשֵֽׁשׁוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 31:11
Psalm 31:12I am forgotten from their hearts like a dead man. I am like broken pottery.
Psalm 31:121  מִכָּל־צֹרְרַ֨י הָיִ֪יתִי חֶרְפָּ֡ה וְלִשֲׁכֵנַ֨י ׀ מְאֹד֮ וּפַ֢חַד לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י רֹאַ֥י בַּח֑וּץ נָדְד֥וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:12
Psalm 31:13For I have heard the slander of many, terror on every side, while they conspire together against me, they plot to take away my life.
Psalm 31:131  נִ֭שְׁכַּחְתִּי כְּמֵ֣ת מִלֵּ֑ב הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כִּכְלִ֥י אֹבֵֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 31:13
Psalm 31:14But I trust in you, Yahweh. I said, |You are my God.|
Psalm 31:141  כִּ֤י שָׁמַ֨עְתִּי ׀ דִּבַּ֥ת רַבִּים֮ מָג֢וֹר מִסָּ֫בִ֥יב בְּהִוָּסְדָ֣ם יַ֣חַד עָלַ֑י לָקַ֖חַת נַפְשִׁ֣י זָמָֽמוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 31:14
Psalm 31:15My times are in your hand. Deliver me from the hand of my enemies, and from those who persecute me.
Psalm 31:151  וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ עָלֶ֣יךָ בָטַ֣חְתִּי יְהוָ֑ה אָ֝מַ֗רְתִּי אֱלֹהַ֥י אָֽתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 31:15
Psalm 31:16Make your face to shine on your servant. Save me in your loving kindness.
Psalm 31:161  בְּיָדְךָ֥ עִתֹּתָ֑י הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי מִיַּד־א֝וֹיְבַ֗י וּמֵרֹדְפָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 31:16
Psalm 31:17Let me not be disappointed, Yahweh, for I have called on you. Let the wicked be disappointed. Let them be silent in Sheol.
Psalm 31:171  הָאִ֣ירָה פָ֭נֶיךָ עַל־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי בְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 31:17
Psalm 31:18Let the lying lips be mute, which speak against the righteous insolently, with pride and contempt.
Psalm 31:181  יְֽהוָ֗ה אַל־אֵ֭בוֹשָׁה כִּ֣י קְרָאתִ֑יךָ יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יִדְּמ֥וּ לִשְׁאֽוֹל׃ ‬
Psalm 31:18
Psalm 31:19Oh how great is your goodness, which you have laid up for those who fear you, which you have worked for those who take refuge in you, before the sons of men!
Psalm 31:191  תֵּ֥אָלַ֗מְנָה שִׂפְתֵ֫י שָׁ֥קֶר הַדֹּבְר֖וֹת עַל־צַדִּ֥יק עָתָ֗ק בְּגַאֲוָ֥ה וָבֽוּז׃ ‬
Psalm 31:19
Psalm 31:20In the shelter of your presence you will hide them from the plotting of man. You will keep them secretly in a dwelling away from the strife of tongues.
Psalm 31:201  מָ֤ה רַֽב־טוּבְךָ֮ אֲשֶׁר־צָפַ֢נְתָּ לִּֽירֵ֫אֶ֥יךָ פָּ֭עַלְתָּ לַחֹסִ֣ים בָּ֑ךְ נֶ֝֗גֶד בְּנֵ֣י אָדָם׃ ‬
Psalm 31:20
Psalm 31:21Praise be to Yahweh, for he has shown me his marvelous loving kindness in a strong city.
Psalm 31:211  תַּסְתִּירֵ֤ם ׀ בְּסֵ֥תֶר פָּנֶיךָ֮ מֵֽרֻכְסֵ֫י אִ֥ישׁ תִּצְפְּנֵ֥ם בְּסֻכָּ֗ה מֵרִ֥יב לְשֹׁנֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 31:21
Psalm 31:22As for me, I said in my haste, |I am cut off from before your eyes.| Nevertheless you heard the voice of my petitions when I cried to you.
Psalm 31:221  בָּר֥וּךְ יְהוָ֑ה כִּ֥י הִפְלִ֘יא חַסְדּ֥וֹ לִ֝֗י בְּעִ֣יר מָצֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 31:22
Psalm 31:23Oh love Yahweh, all you his saints! Yahweh preserves the faithful, and fully recompenses him who behaves arrogantly.
Psalm 31:231  וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ אָ֘מַ֤רְתִּי בְחָפְזִ֗י נִגְרַזְתִּי֮ מִנֶּ֢גֶד עֵ֫ינֶ֥יךָ אָכֵ֗ן שָׁ֭מַעְתָּ ק֥וֹל תַּחֲנוּנַ֗י בְּשַׁוְּעִ֥י אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 31:23
Psalm 31:24Be strong, and let your heart take courage, all you who hope in Yahweh. By David. A contemplative psalm.
Psalm 31:241  אֽ͏ֶהֱב֥וּ אֶת־יְהוָ֗ה כָּֽל־חֲסִ֫ידָ֥יו אֱ֭מוּנִים נֹצֵ֣ר יְהוָ֑ה וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥ם עַל־יֶ֝֗תֶר עֹשֵׂ֥ה גַאֲוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 31:24
Psalm 31:25(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 31:251  חִ֭זְקוּ וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ לְבַבְכֶ֑ם כָּל־הַ֝מְיַחֲלִ֗ים לַיהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 31:25
Psalm 32:1Blessed is he whose disobedience is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
Psalm 32:12  לְדָוִ֗ד מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל אַשְׁרֵ֥י נְֽשׂוּי־פֶּ֗שַׁע כְּס֣וּי חֲטָאָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 32:1
Psalm 32:2Blessed is the man to whom Yahweh doesn't impute iniquity, in whose spirit there is no deceit.
Psalm 32:22  אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי אָדָ֗ם לֹ֤א יַחְשֹׁ֬ב יְהוָ֣ה ל֣וֹ עָוֺ֑ן וְאֵ֖ין בְּרוּח֣וֹ רְמִיָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 32:2
Psalm 32:3When I kept silence, my bones wasted away through my groaning all day long.
Psalm 32:32  כִּֽי־הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי בָּל֣וּ עֲצָמָ֑י בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י כָּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 32:3
Psalm 32:4For day and night your hand was heavy on me. My strength was sapped in the heat of summer. Selah.
Psalm 32:42  כִּ֤י ׀ יוֹמָ֣ם וָלַיְלָה֮ תִּכְבַּ֥ד עָלַ֗י יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ לְשַׁדִּ֑י בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי קַ֣יִץ סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 32:4
Psalm 32:5I acknowledged my sin to you. I didn't hide my iniquity. I said, I will confess my transgressions to Yahweh, and you forgave the iniquity of my sin. Selah.
Psalm 32:52  חַטָּאתִ֨י אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ וַעֲוֺ֘נִ֤י לֹֽא־כִסִּ֗יתִי אָמַ֗רְתִּי אוֹדֶ֤ה עֲלֵ֣י פְ֭שָׁעַי לַיהוָ֑ה וְאַתָּ֨ה נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ עֲוֺ֖ן חַטָּאתִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 32:5
Psalm 32:6For this, let everyone who is godly pray to you in a time when you may be found. Surely when the great waters overflow, they shall not reach to him.
Psalm 32:62  עַל־זֹ֡את יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל כָּל־חָסִ֨יד ׀ אֵלֶיךָ֮ לְעֵ֢ת מְ֫צֹ֥א רַ֗ק לְ֭שֵׁטֶף מַ֣יִם רַבִּ֑ים אֵ֝לָ֗יו לֹ֣א יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 32:6
Psalm 32:7You are my hiding place. You will preserve me from trouble. You will surround me with songs of deliverance. Selah.
Psalm 32:72  אַתָּ֤ה ׀ סֵ֥תֶר לִי֮ מִצַּ֢ר תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי רָנֵּ֥י פַלֵּ֑ט תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 32:7
Psalm 32:8I will instruct you and teach you in the way which you shall go. I will counsel you with my eye on you.
Psalm 32:82  אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨ ׀ וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ז֥וּ תֵלֵ֑ךְ אִֽיעֲצָ֖ה עָלֶ֣יךָ עֵינִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 32:8
Psalm 32:9Don't be like the horse, or like the mule, which have no understanding, who are controlled by bit and bridle, or else they will not come near to you.
Psalm 32:92  אַל־תִּֽהְי֤וּ ׀ כְּס֥וּס כְּפֶרֶד֮ אֵ֤ין הָ֫בִ֥ין בְּמֶֽתֶג־וָרֶ֣סֶן עֶדְי֣וֹ לִבְל֑וֹם בַּ֝֗ל קְרֹ֣ב אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 32:9
Psalm 32:10Many sorrows come to the wicked, but loving kindness shall surround him who trusts in Yahweh.
Psalm 32:102  רַבִּ֥ים מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים לָרָ֫שָׁ֥ע וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ בַּיהוָ֑ה חֶ֝֗סֶד יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 32:10
Psalm 32:11Be glad in Yahweh, and rejoice, you righteous! Shout for joy, all you who are upright in heart!
Psalm 32:112  שִׂמְח֬וּ בַֽיהוָ֣ה וְ֭גִילוּ צַדִּיקִ֑ים וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ כָּל־יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 32:11
Psalm 33:1Rejoice in Yahweh, you righteous! Praise is fitting for the upright.
Psalm 33:13  רַנְּנ֣וּ צַ֭דִּיקִים בַּֽיהוָ֑ה לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים נָאוָ֥ה תְהִלָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 33:1
Psalm 33:2Give thanks to Yahweh with the lyre. Sing praises to him with the harp of ten strings.
Psalm 33:23  הוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה בְּכִנּ֑וֹר בְּנֵ֥בֶל עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר זַמְּרוּ־לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:2
Psalm 33:3Sing to him a new song. Play skillfully with a shout of joy!
Psalm 33:33  שִֽׁירוּ־ל֭וֹ שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ הֵיטִ֥יבוּ נַ֝גֵּ֗ן בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 33:3
Psalm 33:4For the word of Yahweh is right. All his work is done in faithfulness.
Psalm 33:43  כִּֽי־יָשָׁ֥ר דְּבַר־יְהוָ֑ה וְכָל־מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 33:4
Psalm 33:5He loves righteousness and justice. The earth is full of the loving kindness of Yahweh.
Psalm 33:53  אֹ֭הֵב צְדָקָ֣ה וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט חֶ֥סֶד יְ֝הוָ֗ה מָלְאָ֥ה הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:5
Psalm 33:6By Yahweh's word, the heavens were made; all their army by the breath of his mouth.
Psalm 33:63  בִּדְבַ֣ר יְ֭הוָה שָׁמַ֣יִם נַעֲשׂ֑וּ וּבְר֥וּחַ פִּ֝֗יו כָּל־צְבָאָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 33:6
Psalm 33:7He gathers the waters of the sea together as a heap. He lays up the deeps in storehouses.
Psalm 33:73  כֹּנֵ֣ס כַּ֭נֵּד מֵ֣י הַיָּ֑ם נֹתֵ֖ן בְּאֹצָר֣וֹת תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 33:7
Psalm 33:8Let all the earth fear Yahweh. Let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
Psalm 33:83  יִֽירְא֣וּ מֵ֭יְהוָה כָּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ מִמֶּ֥נּוּ יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ כָּל־יֹשְׁבֵ֥י תֵבֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 33:8
Psalm 33:9For he spoke, and it was done. He commanded, and it stood firm.
Psalm 33:93  כִּ֤י ה֣וּא אָמַ֣ר וַיֶּ֑הִי הֽוּא־צִ֝וָּ֗ה וֽ͏ַיַּעֲמֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 33:9
Psalm 33:10Yahweh brings the counsel of the nations to nothing. He makes the thoughts of the peoples to be of no effect.
Psalm 33:103  יְֽהוָ֗ה הֵפִ֥יר עֲצַת־גּוֹיִ֑ם הֵ֝נִ֗יא מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת עַמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 33:10
Psalm 33:11The counsel of Yahweh stands fast forever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
Psalm 33:113  עֲצַ֣ת יְ֭הוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם תַּעֲמֹ֑ד מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת לִ֝בּ֗וֹ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 33:11
Psalm 33:12Blessed is the nation whose God is Yahweh, the people whom he has chosen for his own inheritance.
Psalm 33:123  אַשְׁרֵ֣י הַ֭גּוֹי אֲשֶׁר־יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהָ֑יו הָעָ֓ם ׀ בָּחַ֖ר לְנַחֲלָ֣ה לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:12
Psalm 33:13Yahweh looks from heaven. He sees all the sons of men.
Psalm 33:133  מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם הִבִּ֣יט יְהוָ֑ה רָ֝אָ֗ה אֶֽת־כָּל־בְּנֵ֥י הָאָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 33:13
Psalm 33:14From the place of his habitation he looks out on all the inhabitants of the earth,
Psalm 33:143  מִֽמְּכוֹן־שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ אֶ֖ל כָּל־יֹשְׁבֵ֣י הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:14
Psalm 33:15he who fashions all of their hearts; and he considers all of their works.
Psalm 33:153  הַיֹּצֵ֣ר יַ֣חַד לִבָּ֑ם הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין אֶל־כָּל־מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 33:15
Psalm 33:16There is no king saved by the multitude of an army. A mighty man is not delivered by great strength.
Psalm 33:163  אֵֽין־הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ נוֹשָׁ֣ע בְּרָב־חָ֑יִל גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר לֹֽא־יִנָּצֵ֥ל בְּרָב־כֹּֽחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:16
Psalm 33:17A horse is a vain thing for safety, neither does he deliver any by his great power.
Psalm 33:173  שֶׁ֣קֶר הַ֭סּוּס לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה וּבְרֹ֥ב חֵ֝יל֗וֹ לֹ֣א יְמַלֵּֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 33:17
Psalm 33:18Behold, Yahweh's eye is on those who fear him, on those who hope in his loving kindness;
Psalm 33:183  הִנֵּ֤ה עֵ֣ין יְ֭הוָה אֶל־יְרֵאָ֑יו לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:18
Psalm 33:19to deliver their soul from death, to keep them alive in famine.
Psalm 33:193  לְהַצִּ֣יל מִמָּ֣וֶת נַפְשָׁ֑ם וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם בָּרָעָֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 33:19
Psalm 33:20Our soul has waited for Yahweh. He is our help and our shield.
Psalm 33:203  נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ חִכְּתָ֣ה לַֽיהוָ֑ה עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 33:20
Psalm 33:21For our heart rejoices in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
Psalm 33:213  כִּי־ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח לִבֵּ֑נוּ כִּ֤י בְשֵׁ֖ם קָדְשׁ֣וֹ בָטָֽחְנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:21
Psalm 33:22Let your loving kindness be on us, Yahweh, since we have hoped in you. By David; when he pretended to be insane before Abimelech, who drove him away, and he departed.
Psalm 33:223  יְהִֽי־חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר יִחַ֥לְנוּ לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 33:22
Psalm 34:1I will bless Yahweh at all times. His praise will always be in my mouth.
Psalm 34:14  לְדָוִ֗ד בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ אֶת־טַ֭עְמוֹ לִפְנֵ֣י אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ וֽ͏ַ֝יְגָרֲשֵׁ֗הוּ וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:1
Psalm 34:2My soul shall boast in Yahweh. The humble shall hear of it, and be glad.
Psalm 34:24  אֲבָרֲכָ֣ה אֶת־יְהוָ֣ה בְּכָל־עֵ֑ת תָּ֝מִ֗יד תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ בְּפִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 34:2
Psalm 34:3Oh magnify Yahweh with me. Let us exalt his name together.
Psalm 34:34  בַּ֭יהוָה תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל נַפְשִׁ֑י יִשְׁמְע֖וּ עֲנָוִ֣ים וְיִשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:3
Psalm 34:4I sought Yahweh, and he answered me, and delivered me from all my fears.
Psalm 34:44  גַּדְּל֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה אִתִּ֑י וּנְרוֹמְמָ֖ה שְׁמ֣וֹ יַחְדָּֽו׃ ‬
Psalm 34:4
Psalm 34:5They looked to him, and were radiant. Their faces shall never be covered with shame.
Psalm 34:54  דָּרַ֣שְׁתִּי אֶת־יְהוָ֣ה וְעָנָ֑נִי וּמִכָּל־מְ֝גוּרוֹתַ֗י הִצִּילָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 34:5
Psalm 34:6This poor man cried, and Yahweh heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
Psalm 34:64  הִבִּ֣יטוּ אֵלָ֣יו וְנָהָ֑רוּ וּ֝פְנֵיהֶ֗ם אַל־יֶחְפָּֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:6
Psalm 34:7The angel of Yahweh encamps around those who fear him, and delivers them.
Psalm 34:74  זֶ֤ה עָנִ֣י קָ֭רָא וַיהוָ֣ה שָׁמֵ֑עַ וּמִכָּל־צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:7
Psalm 34:8Oh taste and see that Yahweh is good. Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him.
Psalm 34:84  חֹנֶ֤ה מַלְאַךְ־יְהוָ֓ה סָ֘בִ֤יב לִֽירֵאָ֗יו וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 34:8
Psalm 34:9Oh fear Yahweh, you his saints, for there is no lack with those who fear him.
Psalm 34:94  טַעֲמ֣וּ וּ֭רְאוּ כִּי־ט֣וֹב יְהוָ֑ה אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י הַ֝גֶּ֗בֶר יֶחֱסֶה־בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:9
Psalm 34:10The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger, but those who seek Yahweh shall not lack any good thing.
Psalm 34:104  יְר֣אוּ אֶת־יְהוָ֣ה קְדֹשָׁ֑יו כִּי־אֵ֥ין מַ֝חְס֗וֹר לִירֵאָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 34:10
Psalm 34:11Come, you children, listen to me. I will teach you the fear of Yahweh.
Psalm 34:114  כְּ֭פִירִים רָשׁ֣וּ וְרָעֵ֑בוּ וְדֹרְשֵׁ֥י יְ֝הוָ֗ה לֹא־יַחְסְר֥וּ כָל־טֽוֹב׃ ‬
Psalm 34:11
Psalm 34:12Who is someone who desires life, and loves many days, that he may see good?
Psalm 34:124  לְֽכוּ־בָ֭נִים שִׁמְעוּ־לִ֑י יִֽרְאַ֥ת יְ֝הוָ֗ה אֲלַמֶּדְכֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 34:12
Psalm 34:13Keep your tongue from evil, and your lips from speaking lies.
Psalm 34:134  מִֽי־הָ֭אִישׁ הֶחָפֵ֣ץ חַיִּ֑ים אֹהֵ֥ב יָ֝מִ֗ים לִרְא֥וֹת טֽוֹב׃ ‬
Psalm 34:13
Psalm 34:14Depart from evil, and do good. seek peace, and pursue it.
Psalm 34:144  נְצֹ֣ר לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ מֵרָ֑ע וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ מִדַּבֵּ֥ר מִרְמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 34:14
Psalm 34:15Yahweh's eyes are toward the righteous. His ears listen to their cry.
Psalm 34:154  ס֣וּר מֵ֭רָע וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב בַּקֵּ֖שׁ שָׁל֣וֹם וְרָדְפֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:15
Psalm 34:16Yahweh's face is against those who do evil, to cut off the memory of them from the earth.
Psalm 34:164  עֵינֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה אֶל־צַדִּיקִ֑ים וְ֝אָזְנָ֗יו אֶל־שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 34:16
Psalm 34:17The righteous cry, and Yahweh hears, and delivers them out of all their troubles.
Psalm 34:174  פְּנֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי רָ֑ע לְהַכְרִ֖ית מֵאֶ֣רֶץ זִכְרָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 34:17
Psalm 34:18Yahweh is near to those who have a broken heart, and saves those who have a crushed spirit.
Psalm 34:184  צָעֲק֣וּ וַיהוָ֣ה שָׁמֵ֑עַ וּמִכָּל־צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם הִצִּילָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 34:18
Psalm 34:19Many are the afflictions of the righteous, but Yahweh delivers him out of them all.
Psalm 34:194  קָר֣וֹב יְ֭הוָה לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־לֵ֑ב וְֽאֶת־דַּכְּאֵי־ר֥וּחַ יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:19
Psalm 34:20He protects all of his bones. Not one of them is broken.
Psalm 34:204  רַ֭בּוֹת רָע֣וֹת צַדִּ֑יק וּ֝מִכֻּלָּ֗ם יַצִּילֶ֥נּוּ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 34:20
Psalm 34:21Evil shall kill the wicked. Those who hate the righteous shall be condemned.
Psalm 34:214  שֹׁמֵ֥ר כָּל־עַצְמוֹתָ֑יו אַחַ֥ת מֵ֝הֵ֗נָּה לֹ֣א נִשְׁבָּֽרָה׃ ‬
Psalm 34:21
Psalm 34:22Yahweh redeems the soul of his servants. None of those who take refuge in him shall be condemned. By David.
Psalm 34:224  תְּמוֹתֵ֣ת רָשָׁ֣ע רָעָ֑ה וְשֹׂנְאֵ֖י צַדִּ֣יק יֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:22
Psalm 34:23(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 34:234  פּוֹדֶ֣ה יְ֭הוָה נֶ֣פֶשׁ עֲבָדָ֑יו וְלֹ֥א יֶ֝אְשְׁמ֗וּ כָּֽל־הַחֹסִ֥ים בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 34:23
Psalm 35:1Contend, Yahweh, with those who contend with me. Fight against those who fight against me.
Psalm 35:15  לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ רִיבָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה אֶת־יְרִיבַ֑י לְ֝חַ֗ם אֶת־לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:1
Psalm 35:2Take hold of shield and buckler, and stand up for my help.
Psalm 35:25  הַחֲזֵ֣ק מָגֵ֣ן וְצִנָּ֑ה וְ֝ק֗וּמָה בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:2
Psalm 35:3Brandish the spear and block those who pursue me. Tell my soul, |I am your salvation.|
Psalm 35:35  וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק חֲנִ֣ית וּ֭סְגֹר לִקְרַ֣את רֹדְפָ֑י אֱמֹ֥ר לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ אָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:3
Psalm 35:4Let those who seek after my soul be disappointed and brought to dishonor. Let those who plot my ruin be turned back and confounded.
Psalm 35:45  יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ מְבַקְשֵׁ֢י נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י יִסֹּ֣גוּ אָח֣וֹר וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י רָעָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:4
Psalm 35:5Let them be as chaff before the wind, Yahweh's angel driving them on.
Psalm 35:55  יִֽהְי֗וּ כְּמֹ֥ץ לִפְנֵי־ר֑וּחַ וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ יְהוָ֣ה דּוֹחֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 35:5
Psalm 35:6Let their way be dark and slippery, Yahweh's angel pursuing them.
Psalm 35:65  יְֽהִי־דַרְכָּ֗ם חֹ֥שֶׁךְ וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ יְ֝הוָ֗ה רֹדְפָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 35:6
Psalm 35:7For without cause they have hidden their net in a pit for me. Without cause they have dug a pit for my soul.
Psalm 35:75  כִּֽי־חִנָּ֣ם טָֽמְנוּ־לִ֭י שַׁ֣חַת רִשְׁתָּ֑ם חִ֝נָּ֗ם חָפְר֥וּ לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:7
Psalm 35:8Let destruction come on him unawares. Let his net that he has hidden catch himself. Let him fall into that destruction.
Psalm 35:85  תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ שׁוֹאָה֮ לֹֽא־יֵ֫דָ֥ע וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ אֲשֶׁר־טָמַ֣ן תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה יִפָּל־בָּֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:8
Psalm 35:9My soul shall be joyful in Yahweh. It shall rejoice in his salvation.
Psalm 35:95  וְ֭נַפְשִׁי תָּגִ֣יל בַּיהוָ֑ה תָּ֝שִׂישׂ בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:9
Psalm 35:10All my bones shall say, |Yahweh, who is like you, who delivers the poor from him who is too strong for him; yes, the poor and the needy from him who robs him?|
Psalm 35:105  כָּ֥ל עַצְמוֹתַ֨י ׀ תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ יְהוָ֗ה מִ֥י כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ מַצִּ֣יל עָ֭נִי מֵחָזָ֣ק מִמֶּ֑נּוּ וְעָנִ֥י וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:10
Psalm 35:11Unrighteous witnesses rise up. They ask me about things that I don't know about.
Psalm 35:115  יְ֭קוּמוּן עֵדֵ֣י חָמָ֑ס אֲשֶׁ֥ר לֹא־יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:11
Psalm 35:12They reward me evil for good, to the bereaving of my soul.
Psalm 35:125  יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי רָ֭עָה תַּ֥חַת טוֹבָ֗ה שְׁכ֣וֹל לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:12
Psalm 35:13But as for me, when they were sick, my clothing was sackcloth. I afflicted my soul with fasting. My prayer returned into my own bosom.
Psalm 35:135  וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם לְב֬וּשִׁי שָׂ֗ק עִנֵּ֣יתִי בַצּ֣וֹם נַפְשִׁ֑י וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י עַל־חֵיקִ֥י תָשֽׁוּב׃ ‬
Psalm 35:13
Psalm 35:14I behaved myself as though it had been my friend or my brother. I bowed down mourning, as one who mourns his mother.
Psalm 35:145  כְּרֵֽעַ־כְּאָ֣ח לִ֭י הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי כַּאֲבֶל־אֵ֝֗ם קֹדֵ֥ר שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:14
Psalm 35:15But in my adversity, they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together. The attackers gathered themselves together against me, and I didn't know it. They tore at me, and didn't cease.
Psalm 35:155  וּבְצַלְעִי֮ שָׂמְח֢וּ וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ עָלַ֣י נֵ֭כִים וְלֹ֣א יָדַ֑עְתִּי קָֽרְע֥וּ וְלֹא־דָֽמּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:15
Psalm 35:16Like the profane mockers in feasts, they gnashed their teeth at me.
Psalm 35:165  בְּ֭חַנְפֵי לַעֲגֵ֣י מָע֑וֹג חָרֹ֖ק עָלַ֣י שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:16
Psalm 35:17Lord, how long will you look on? Rescue my soul from their destruction, my precious life from the lions.
Psalm 35:175  אֲדֹנָי֮ כַּמָּ֢ה תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה הָשִׁ֣יבָה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים יְחִידָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:17
Psalm 35:18I will give you thanks in the great assembly. I will praise you among many people.
Psalm 35:185  א֭וֹדְךָ בְּקָהָ֣ל רָ֑ב בְּעַ֖ם עָצ֣וּם אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:18
Psalm 35:19Don't let those who are my enemies wrongfully rejoice over me; neither let those who hate me without a cause wink their eyes.
Psalm 35:195  אַֽל־יִשְׂמְחוּ־לִ֣י אֹיְבַ֣י שֶׁ֑קֶר שֹׂנְאַ֥י חִ֝נָּ֗ם יִקְרְצוּ־עָֽיִן׃ ‬
Psalm 35:19
Psalm 35:20For they don't speak peace, but they devise deceitful words against those who are quiet in the land.
Psalm 35:205  כִּ֤י לֹ֥א שָׁל֗וֹם יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ וְעַ֥ל רִגְעֵי־אֶ֑רֶץ דִּבְרֵ֥י מִ֝רְמוֹת יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 35:20
Psalm 35:21Yes, they opened their mouth wide against me. They said, |Aha! Aha! Our eye has seen it!|
Psalm 35:215  וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ עָלַ֗י פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם אָ֭מְרוּ הֶאָ֣ח ׀ הֶאָ֑ח רָאֲתָ֥ה עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:21
Psalm 35:22You have seen it, Yahweh. Don't keep silent. Lord, don't be far from me.
Psalm 35:225  רָאִ֣יתָה יְ֭הוָה אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י אֲל־תִּרְחַ֥ק מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:22
Psalm 35:23Wake up! Rise up to defend me, my God! My Lord, contend for me!
Psalm 35:235  הָעִ֣ירָה וְ֭הָקִיצָה לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י אֱלֹהַ֖י וַֽאדֹנָ֣י לְרִיבִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:23
Psalm 35:24Vindicate me, Yahweh my God, according to your righteousness. Don't let them gloat over me.
Psalm 35:245  שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי כְ֭צִדְקְךָ יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָ֗י וְאַל־יִשְׂמְחוּ־לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:24
Psalm 35:25Don't let them say in their heart, |Aha! That's the way we want it!| Don't let them say, |We have swallowed him up!|
Psalm 35:255  אַל־יֹאמְר֣וּ בְ֭לִבָּם הֶאָ֣ח נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ אַל־יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:25
Psalm 35:26Let them be disappointed and confounded together who rejoice at my calamity. Let them be clothed with shame and dishonor who magnify themselves against me.
Psalm 35:265  יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ יַחְדָּו֮ שְׂמֵחֵ֢י רָעָ֫תִ֥י יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־בֹ֥שֶׁת וּכְלִמָּ֑ה הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים עָלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 35:26
Psalm 35:27Let them shout for joy and be glad, who favor my righteous cause. Yes, let them say continually, |Yahweh be magnified, who has pleasure in the prosperity of his servant!|
Psalm 35:275  יָרֹ֣נּוּ וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ חֲפֵצֵ֢י צִ֫דְקִ֥י וְיֹאמְר֣וּ תָ֭מִיד יִגְדַּ֣ל יְהוָ֑ה הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ שְׁל֣וֹם עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:27
Psalm 35:28My tongue shall talk about your righteousness and about your praise all day long. For the Chief Musician. By David, the servant of Yahweh.
Psalm 35:285  וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה צִדְקֶ֑ךָ כָּל־הַ֝יּוֹם תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 35:28
Psalm 36:1An oracle is within my heart about the disobedience of the wicked: |There is no fear of God before his eyes.|
Psalm 36:16  לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ לְעֶֽבֶד־יְהוָ֬ה לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 36:1
Psalm 36:2For he flatters himself in his own eyes, too much to detect and hate his sin.
Psalm 36:26  נְאֻֽם־פֶּ֣שַׁע לָ֭רָשָׁע בְּקֶ֣רֶב לִבִּ֑י אֵֽין־פַּ֥חַד אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 36:2
Psalm 36:3The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit. He has ceased to be wise and to do good.
Psalm 36:36  כִּֽי־הֶחֱלִ֣יק אֵלָ֣יו בְּעֵינָ֑יו לִמְצֹ֖א עֲוֺנ֣וֹ לִשְׂנֹֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 36:3
Psalm 36:4He plots iniquity on his bed. He sets himself in a way that is not good. He doesn't abhor evil.
Psalm 36:46  דִּבְרֵי־פִ֭יו אָ֣וֶן וּמִרְמָ֑ה חָדַ֖ל לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל לְהֵיטִֽיב׃ ‬
Psalm 36:4
Psalm 36:5Your loving kindness, Yahweh, is in the heavens. Your faithfulness reaches to the skies.
Psalm 36:56  אָ֤וֶן ׀ יַחְשֹׁ֗ב עַֽל־מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ יִ֭תְיַצֵּב עַל־דֶּ֣רֶךְ לֹא־ט֑וֹב רָ֝֗ע לֹ֣א יִמְאָֽס׃ ‬
Psalm 36:5
Psalm 36:6Your righteousness is like the mountains of God. Your judgments are like a great deep. Yahweh, you preserve man and animal.
Psalm 36:66  יְ֭הוָה בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ עַד־שְׁחָקִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 36:6
Psalm 36:7How precious is your loving kindness, God! The children of men take refuge under the shadow of your wings.
Psalm 36:76  צִדְקָֽתְךָ֨ ׀ כְּֽהַרְרֵי־אֵ֗ל מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶךָ תְּה֣וֹם רַבָּ֑ה אָ֤דָֽם־וּבְהֵמָ֖ה תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 36:7
Psalm 36:8They shall be abundantly satisfied with the abundance of your house. You will make them drink of the river of your pleasures.
Psalm 36:86  מַה־יָּקָ֥ר חַסְדְּךָ֗ אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים וּבְנֵ֥י אָדָ֑ם בְּצֵ֥ל כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 36:8
Psalm 36:9For with you is the spring of life. In your light shall we see light.
Psalm 36:96  יִ֭רְוְיֻן מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ וְנַ֖חַל עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ תַשְׁקֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 36:9
Psalm 36:10Oh continue your loving kindness to those who know you, your righteousness to the upright in heart.
Psalm 36:106  כִּֽי־עִ֭מְּךָ מְק֣וֹר חַיִּ֑ים בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ נִרְאֶה־אֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 36:10
Psalm 36:11Don't let the foot of pride come against me. Don't let the hand of the wicked drive me away.
Psalm 36:116  מְשֹׁ֣ךְ חַ֭סְדְּךָ לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ וְ֝צִדְקָֽתְךָ֗ לְיִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 36:11
Psalm 36:12There the workers of iniquity are fallen. They are thrust down, and shall not be able to rise. By David.
Psalm 36:126  אַל־תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי רֶ֣גֶל גַּאֲוָ֑ה וְיַד־רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים אַל־תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 36:12
Psalm 36:13(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 36:136  שָׁ֣ם נָ֭פְלוּ פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן דֹּ֝ח֗וּ וְלֹא־יָ֥כְלוּ קֽוּם׃ ‬
Psalm 36:13
Psalm 37:1Don't fret because of evildoers, neither be envious against those who work unrighteousness.
Psalm 37:17  לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ אַל־תִּתְחַ֥ר בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים אַל־תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א בְּעֹשֵׂ֥י עַוְלָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:1
Psalm 37:2For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither like the green herb.
Psalm 37:27  כִּ֣י כֶ֭חָצִיר מְהֵרָ֣ה יִמָּ֑לוּ וּכְיֶ֥רֶק דֶּ֝֗שֶׁא יִבּוֹלֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 37:2
Psalm 37:3Trust in Yahweh, and do good. Dwell in the land, and enjoy safe pasture.
Psalm 37:37  בְּטַ֣ח בַּֽ֭יהוָה וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב שְׁכָן־אֶ֝֗רֶץ וּרְעֵ֥ה אֱמוּנָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:3
Psalm 37:4Also delight yourself in Yahweh, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
Psalm 37:47  וְהִתְעַנַּ֥ג עַל־יְהוָ֑ה וְיִֽתֶּן־לְ֝ךָ֗ מִשְׁאֲלֹ֥ת לִבֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:4
Psalm 37:5Commit your way to Yahweh. Trust also in him, and he will do this:
Psalm 37:57  גּ֣וֹל עַל־יְהוָ֣ה דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ וּבְטַ֥ח עָ֝לָ֗יו וְה֣וּא יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:5
Psalm 37:6he will make your righteousness go forth as the light, and your justice as the noon day sun.
Psalm 37:67  וְהוֹצִ֣יא כָא֣וֹר צִדְקֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטֶ֗ךָ כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 37:6
Psalm 37:7Rest in Yahweh, and wait patiently for him. Don't fret because of him who prospers in his way, because of the man who makes wicked plots happen.
Psalm 37:77  דּ֤וֹם ׀ לַיהוָה֮ וְהִתְח֢וֹלֵ֫ל ל֥וֹ אַל־תִּ֭תְחַר בְּמַצְלִ֣יחַ דַּרְכּ֑וֹ בְּ֝אִ֗ישׁ עֹשֶׂ֥ה מְזִמּֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 37:7
Psalm 37:8Cease from anger, and forsake wrath. Don't fret, it leads only to evildoing.
Psalm 37:87  הֶ֣רֶף מֵ֭אַף וַעֲזֹ֣ב חֵמָ֑ה אַל־תִּ֝תְחַ֗ר אַךְ־לְהָרֵֽעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:8
Psalm 37:9For evildoers shall be cut off, but those who wait for Yahweh shall inherit the land.
Psalm 37:97  כִּֽי־מְ֭רֵעִים יִכָּרֵת֑וּן וְקֹוֵ֥י יְ֝הוָ֗ה הֵ֣מָּה יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:9
Psalm 37:10For yet a little while, and the wicked will be no more. Yes, though you look for his place, he isn't there.
Psalm 37:107  וְע֣וֹד מְ֭עַט וְאֵ֣ין רָשָׁ֑ע וְהִתְבּוֹנַ֖נְתָּ עַל־מְקוֹמ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:10
Psalm 37:11But the humble shall inherit the land, and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
Psalm 37:117  וַעֲנָוִ֥ים יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָ֑רֶץ וְ֝הִתְעַנְּג֗וּ עַל־רֹ֥ב שָׁלֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 37:11
Psalm 37:12The wicked plots against the just, and gnashes at him with his teeth.
Psalm 37:127  זֹמֵ֣ם רָ֭שָׁע לַצַּדִּ֑יק וְחֹרֵ֖ק עָלָ֣יו שִׁנָּֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 37:12
Psalm 37:13The Lord will laugh at him, for he sees that his day is coming.
Psalm 37:137  אֲדֹנָ֥י יִשְׂחַק־ל֑וֹ כִּֽי־רָ֝אָ֗ה כִּֽי־יָבֹ֥א יוֹמֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:13
Psalm 37:14The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, to kill those who are upright in the way.
Psalm 37:147  חֶ֤רֶב ׀ פָּֽתְח֣וּ רְשָׁעִים֮ וְדָרְכ֢וּ קַ֫שְׁתָּ֥ם לְ֭הַפִּיל עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְי֑וֹן לִ֝טְב֗וֹחַ יִשְׁרֵי־דָֽרֶךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:14
Psalm 37:15Their sword shall enter into their own heart. Their bows shall be broken.
Psalm 37:157  חַ֭רְבָּם תָּב֣וֹא בְלִבָּ֑ם וְ֝קַשְּׁתוֹתָ֗ם תִּשָּׁבַֽרְנָה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:15
Psalm 37:16Better is a little that the righteous has, than the abundance of many wicked.
Psalm 37:167  טוֹב־מְ֭עַט לַצַּדִּ֑יק מֵ֝הֲמ֗וֹן רְשָׁעִ֥ים רַבִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 37:16
Psalm 37:17For the arms of the wicked shall be broken, but Yahweh upholds the righteous.
Psalm 37:177  כִּ֤י זְרוֹע֣וֹת רְ֭שָׁעִים תִּשָּׁבַ֑רְנָה וְסוֹמֵ֖ךְ צַדִּיקִ֣ים יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:17
Psalm 37:18Yahweh knows the days of the perfect. Their inheritance shall be forever.
Psalm 37:187  יוֹדֵ֣עַ יְ֭הוָה יְמֵ֣י תְמִימִ֑ם וְ֝נַחֲלָתָ֗ם לְעוֹלָ֥ם תִּהְיֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:18
Psalm 37:19They shall not be disappointed in the time of evil. In the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
Psalm 37:197  לֹֽא־יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ בְּעֵ֣ת רָעָ֑ה וּבִימֵ֖י רְעָב֣וֹן יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:19
Psalm 37:20But the wicked shall perish. The enemies of Yahweh shall be like the beauty of the fields. They will vanish— vanish like smoke.
Psalm 37:207  כִּ֤י רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ יֹאבֵ֗דוּ וְאֹיְבֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה כִּיקַ֣ר כָּרִ֑ים כָּל֖וּ בֶעָשָׁ֣ן כָּֽלוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:20
Psalm 37:21The wicked borrow, and don't pay back, but the righteous give generously.
Psalm 37:217  לֹוֶ֣ה רָ֭שָׁע וְלֹ֣א יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק חוֹנֵ֥ן וְנוֹתֵֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 37:21
Psalm 37:22For such as are blessed by him shall inherit the land. Those who are cursed by him shall be cut off.
Psalm 37:227  כִּ֣י מְ֭בֹרָכָיו יִ֣ירְשׁוּ אָ֑רֶץ וּ֝מְקֻלָּלָ֗יו יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:22
Psalm 37:23A man's goings are established by Yahweh. He delights in his way.
Psalm 37:237  מֵ֭יְהוָה מִֽצְעֲדֵי־גֶ֥בֶר כּוֹנָ֗נוּ וְדַרְכּ֥וֹ יֶחְפָּֽץ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:23
Psalm 37:24Though he stumble, he shall not fall, for Yahweh holds him up with his hand.
Psalm 37:247  כִּֽי־יִפֹּ֥ל לֹֽא־יוּטָ֑ל כִּֽי־יְ֝הוָ֗ה סוֹמֵ֥ךְ יָדֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:24
Psalm 37:25I have been young, and now am old, yet I have not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his children begging for bread.
Psalm 37:257  נַ֤עַר ׀ הָיִ֗יתִי גַּם־זָ֫קַ֥נְתִּי וְֽלֹא־רָ֭אִיתִי צַדִּ֣יק נֶעֱזָ֑ב וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ מְבַקֶּשׁ־לָֽחֶם׃ ‬
Psalm 37:25
Psalm 37:26All day long he deals graciously, and lends. His seed is blessed.
Psalm 37:267  כָּל־הַ֭יּוֹם חוֹנֵ֣ן וּמַלְוֶ֑ה וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ לִבְרָכָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 37:26
Psalm 37:27Depart from evil, and do good. Live securely forever.
Psalm 37:277  ס֣וּר מֵ֭רָע וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֗וֹב וּשְׁכֹ֥ן לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 37:27
Psalm 37:28For Yahweh loves justice, and doesn't forsake his saints. They are preserved forever, but the children of the wicked shall be cut off.
Psalm 37:287  כִּ֤י יְהוָ֨ה ׀ אֹ֘הֵ֤ב מִשְׁפָּ֗ט וְלֹא־יַעֲזֹ֣ב אֶת־חֲ֭סִידָיו לְעוֹלָ֣ם נִשְׁמָ֑רוּ וְזֶ֖רַע רְשָׁעִ֣ים נִכְרָֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 37:28
Psalm 37:29The righteous shall inherit the land, and live in it forever.
Psalm 37:297  צַדִּיקִ֥ים יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָ֑רֶץ וְיִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ לָעַ֣ד עָלֶֽיהָ׃ ‬
Psalm 37:29
Psalm 37:30The mouth of the righteous talks of wisdom. His tongue speaks justice.
Psalm 37:307  פִּֽי־צַ֭דִּיק יֶהְגֶּ֣ה חָכְמָ֑ה וּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ תְּדַבֵּ֥ר מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 37:30
Psalm 37:31The law of his God is in his heart. None of his steps shall slide.
Psalm 37:317  תּוֹרַ֣ת אֱלֹהָ֣יו בְּלִבּ֑וֹ לֹ֖א תִמְעַ֣ד אֲשֻׁרָיו׃ ‬
Psalm 37:31
Psalm 37:32The wicked watches the righteous, and seeks to kill him.
