Psalm 80:14
Psalm 80:15the stock which your right hand planted, the branch that you made strong for yourself.
Psalm 80:150  אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָאוֹת֮ שֽׁ֫וּב־נָ֥א הַבֵּ֣ט מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם וּרְאֵ֑ה וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד גֶּ֣פֶן זֹֽאת׃ ‬
Psalm 80:15
Psalm 80:16It's burned with fire. It's cut down. They perish at your rebuke.
Psalm 80:160  וְ֭כַנָּה אֲשֶׁר־נָטְעָ֣ה יְמִינֶ֑ךָ וְעַל־בֵּ֝֗ן אִמַּ֥צְתָּה לָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 80:16
Psalm 80:17Let your hand be on the man of your right hand, on the son of man whom you made strong for yourself.
Psalm 80:170  שְׂרֻפָ֣ה בָאֵ֣שׁ כְּסוּחָ֑ה מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת פָּנֶ֣יךָ יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 80:17
Psalm 80:18So we will not turn away from you. Revive us, and we will call on your name.
Psalm 80:180  תְּֽהִי־יָ֭דְךָ עַל־אִ֣ישׁ יְמִינֶ֑ךָ עַל־בֶּן־אָ֝דָ֗ם אִמַּ֥צְתָּ לָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 80:18
Psalm 80:19Turn us again, Yahweh God of Armies. Cause your face to shine, and we will be saved. For the Chief Musician. On an instrument of Gath. By Asaph.
Psalm 80:190  וְלֹא־נָס֥וֹג מִמֶּ֑ךָּ תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ נִקְרָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 80:19
Psalm 80:20(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 80:200  יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָא֣וֹת הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ הָאֵ֥ר פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ ‬
Psalm 80:20
Psalm 81:1Sing aloud to God, our strength! Make a joyful shout to the God of Jacob!
Psalm 81:11  לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ עַֽל־הַגִּתִּ֬ית לְאָסָֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 81:1
Psalm 81:2Raise a song, and bring here the tambourine, the pleasant lyre with the harp.
Psalm 81:21  הַ֭רְנִינוּ לֵאלֹהִ֣ים עוּזֵּ֑נוּ הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ לֵאלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 81:2
Psalm 81:3Blow the trumpet at the New Moon, at the full moon, on our feast day.
Psalm 81:31  שְֽׂאוּ־זִ֭מְרָה וּתְנוּ־תֹ֑ף כִּנּ֖וֹר נָעִ֣ים עִם־נָֽבֶל׃ ‬
Psalm 81:3
Psalm 81:4For it is a statute for Israel, an ordinance of the God of Jacob.
Psalm 81:41  תִּקְע֣וּ בַחֹ֣דֶשׁ שׁוֹפָ֑ר בַּ֝כֵּ֗סֶה לְי֣וֹם חַגֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 81:4
Psalm 81:5He appointed it in Joseph for a testimony, when he went out over the land of Egypt, I heard a language that I didn't know.
Psalm 81:51  כִּ֤י חֹ֣ק לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ה֑וּא מִ֝שְׁפָּ֗ט לֵאלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 81:5
Psalm 81:6|I removed his shoulder from the burden. His hands were freed from the basket.
Psalm 81:61  עֵ֤דוּת ׀ בִּֽיה֘וֹסֵ֤ף שָׂמ֗וֹ בְּ֭צֵאתוֹ עַל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם שְׂפַ֖ת לֹא־יָדַ֣עְתִּי אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 81:6
Psalm 81:7You called in trouble, and I delivered you. I answered you in the secret place of thunder. I tested you at the waters of Meribah.| Selah.
Psalm 81:71  הֲסִיר֣וֹתִי מִסֵּ֣בֶל שִׁכְמ֑וֹ כַּ֝פָּ֗יו מִדּ֥וּד תַּעֲבֹֽרְנָה׃ ‬
Psalm 81:7
Psalm 81:8|Hear, my people, and I will testify to you, Israel, if you would listen to me!
Psalm 81:81  בַּצָּרָ֥ה קָרָ֗אתָ וָאֲחַ֫לְּצֶ֥ךָּ אֶ֭עֶנְךָ בְּסֵ֣תֶר רַ֑עַם אֶבְחָֽנְךָ֨ עַל־מֵ֖י מְרִיבָ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 81:8
Psalm 81:9There shall be no strange god in you, neither shall you worship any foreign god.
Psalm 81:91  שְׁמַ֣ע עַ֭מִּי וְאָעִ֣ידָה בָּ֑ךְ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל אִם־תִּֽשְׁמַֽע־לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 81:9
Psalm 81:10I am Yahweh, your God, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt. Open your mouth wide, and I will fill it.
Psalm 81:101  לֹֽא־יִהְיֶ֣ה בְ֭ךָ אֵ֣ל זָ֑ר וְלֹ֥א תִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה לְאֵ֣ל נֵכָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 81:10
Psalm 81:11But my people didn't listen to my voice. Israel desired none of me.
Psalm 81:111  אָנֹכִ֨י ׀ יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם הַרְחֶב־פִּ֝֗יךָ וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 81:11
Psalm 81:12So I let them go after the stubbornness of their hearts, that they might walk in their own counsels.
Psalm 81:121  וְלֹא־שָׁמַ֣ע עַמִּ֣י לְקוֹלִ֑י וְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל לֹא־אָ֥בָה לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 81:12
Psalm 81:13Oh that my people would listen to me, that Israel would walk in my ways!
Psalm 81:131  וָֽ֭אֲשַׁלְּחֵהוּ בִּשְׁרִיר֣וּת לִבָּ֑ם יֵ֝לְכ֗וּ בְּֽמוֹעֲצוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 81:13
Psalm 81:14I would soon subdue their enemies, and turn my hand against their adversaries.
Psalm 81:141  ל֗וּ עַ֭מִּי שֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ לִ֑י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל בִּדְרָכַ֥י יְהַלֵּֽכוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 81:14
Psalm 81:15The haters of Yahweh would cringe before him, and their punishment would last forever.
Psalm 81:151  כִּ֭מְעַט אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֣ם אַכְנִ֑יעַ וְעַ֥ל צָ֝רֵיהֶ֗ם אָשִׁ֥יב יָדִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 81:15
Psalm 81:16But he would have also fed them with the finest of the wheat. I will satisfy you with honey out of the rock.| A Psalm by Asaph.
Psalm 81:161  מְשַׂנְאֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה יְכַֽחֲשׁוּ־ל֑וֹ וִיהִ֖י עִתָּ֣ם לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 81:16
Psalm 81:17(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 81:171  וֽ͏ַ֭יַּאֲכִילֵהוּ מֵחֵ֣לֶב חִטָּ֑ה וּ֝מִצּ֗וּר דְּבַ֣שׁ אַשְׂבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 81:17
Psalm 82:1God presides in the great assembly. He judges among the gods.
Psalm 82:12  מִזְמ֗וֹר לְאָ֫סָ֥ף אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים נִצָּ֥ב בַּעֲדַת־אֵ֑ל בְּקֶ֖רֶב אֱלֹהִ֣ים יִשְׁפֹּֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 82:1
Psalm 82:2|How long will you judge unjustly, and show partiality to the wicked?| Selah.
Psalm 82:22  עַד־מָתַ֥י תִּשְׁפְּטוּ־עָ֑וֶל וּפְנֵ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים תִּשְׂאוּ־סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 82:2
Psalm 82:3|Defend the weak, the poor, and the fatherless. Maintain the rights of the poor and oppressed.
Psalm 82:32  שִׁפְטוּ־דַ֥ל וְיָת֑וֹם עָנִ֖י וָרָ֣שׁ הַצְדִּֽיקוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 82:3
Psalm 82:4Rescue the weak and needy. Deliver them out of the hand of the wicked.|
Psalm 82:42  פַּלְּטוּ־דַ֥ל וְאֶבְי֑וֹן מִיַּ֖ד רְשָׁעִ֣ים הַצִּֽילוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 82:4
Psalm 82:5They don't know, neither do they understand. They walk back and forth in darkness. All the foundations of the earth are shaken.
Psalm 82:52  לֹ֤א יָֽדְע֨וּ ׀ וְלֹ֥א יָבִ֗ינוּ בַּחֲשֵׁכָ֥ה יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ יִ֝מּ֗וֹטוּ כָּל־מ֥וֹסְדֵי אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 82:5
Psalm 82:6I said, |You are gods, all of you are sons of the Most High.
Psalm 82:62  אֲ‍ֽנִי־אָ֭מַרְתִּי אֱלֹהִ֣ים אַתֶּ֑ם וּבְנֵ֖י עֶלְי֣וֹן כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 82:6
Psalm 82:7Nevertheless you shall die like men, and fall like one of the rulers.|
Psalm 82:72  אָ֭כֵן כְּאָדָ֣ם תְּמוּת֑וּן וּכְאַחַ֖ד הַשָּׂרִ֣ים תִּפֹּֽלוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 82:7
Psalm 82:8Arise, God, judge the earth, for you inherit all of the nations. A song. A Psalm by Asaph.
Psalm 82:82  קוּמָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים שָׁפְטָ֣ה הָאָ֑רֶץ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֥ה תִ֝נְחַ֗ל בְּכָל־הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 82:8
Psalm 83:1God, don't keep silent. Don't keep silent, and don't be still, God.
Psalm 83:13  שִׁ֖יר מִזְמ֣וֹר לְאָסָֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 83:1
Psalm 83:2For, behold, your enemies are stirred up. Those who hate you have lifted up their heads.
Psalm 83:23  אֱלֹהִ֥ים אַל־דֳּמִי־לָ֑ךְ אַל־תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ וְאַל־תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט אֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 83:2
Psalm 83:3They conspire with cunning against your people. They plot against your cherished ones.
Psalm 83:33  כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ יֶהֱמָי֑וּן וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ נָ֣שְׂאוּ רֹֽאשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:3
Psalm 83:4|Come,| they say, |and let's destroy them as a nation, that the name of Israel may be remembered no more.|
Psalm 83:43  עַֽל־עַ֭מְּךָ יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ ס֑וֹד וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ עַל־צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:4
Psalm 83:5For they have conspired together with one mind. They form an alliance against you.
Psalm 83:53  אָמְר֗וּ לְ֭כוּ וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם מִגּ֑וֹי וְלֹֽא־יִזָּכֵ֖ר שֵֽׁם־יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עֽוֹד׃ ‬
Psalm 83:5
Psalm 83:6The tents of Edom and the Ishmaelites; Moab, and the Hagrites;
Psalm 83:63  כִּ֤י נוֹעֲצ֣וּ לֵ֣ב יַחְדָּ֑ו עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ בְּרִ֣ית יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:6
Psalm 83:7Gebal, Ammon, and Amalek; Philistia with the inhabitants of Tyre;
Psalm 83:73  אָהֳלֵ֣י אֱ֭דוֹם וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים מוֹאָ֥ב וְהַגְרֽ͏ִים׃ ‬
Psalm 83:7
Psalm 83:8Assyria also is joined with them. They have helped the children of Lot. Selah.
Psalm 83:83  גְּבָ֣ל וְ֭עַמּוֹן וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת עִם־יֹ֥שְׁבֵי צֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 83:8
Psalm 83:9Do to them as you did to Midian, as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the river Kishon;
Psalm 83:93  גַּם־אַ֭שּׁוּר נִלְוָ֣ה עִמָּ֑ם הָ֤י֥וּ זְר֖וֹעַ לִבְנֵי־ל֣וֹט סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 83:9
Psalm 83:10who perished at Endor, who became as dung for the earth.
Psalm 83:103  עֲשֵֽׂה־לָהֶ֥ם כְּמִדְיָ֑ן כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א כְ֝יָבִ֗ין בְּנַ֣חַל קִישֽׁוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 83:10
Psalm 83:11Make their nobles like Oreb and Zeeb; yes, all their princes like Zebah and Zalmunna;
Psalm 83:113  נִשְׁמְד֥וּ בְֽעֵין־דֹּ֑אר הָ֥יוּ דֹּ֝֗מֶן לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 83:11
Psalm 83:12who said, |Let us take possession of God's pasturelands.|
Psalm 83:123  שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ כְּעֹרֵ֣ב וְכִזְאֵ֑ב וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע כָּל־נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:12
Psalm 83:13My God, make them like tumbleweed; like chaff before the wind.
Psalm 83:133  אֲשֶׁ֣ר אָ֭מְרוּ נִ֣ירֲשָׁה לָּ֑נוּ אֵ֝֗ת נְא֣וֹת אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 83:13
Psalm 83:14As the fire that burns the forest, as the flame that sets the mountains on fire,
Psalm 83:143  אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ לִפְנֵי־רֽוּחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:14
Psalm 83:15so pursue them with your tempest, and terrify them with your storm.
Psalm 83:153  כְּאֵ֥שׁ תִּבְעַר־יָ֑עַר וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה תְּלַהֵ֥ט הָרִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 83:15
Psalm 83:16Fill their faces with confusion, that they may seek your name, Yahweh.
Psalm 83:163  כֵּ֭ן תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 83:16
Psalm 83:17Let them be disappointed and dismayed forever. Yes, let them be confounded and perish;
Psalm 83:173  מַלֵּ֣א פְנֵיהֶ֣ם קָל֑וֹן וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 83:17
Psalm 83:18that they may know that you alone, whose name is Yahweh, are the Most High over all the earth. For the Chief Musician. On an instrument of Gath. A Psalm by the sons of Korah.
Psalm 83:183  יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ עֲדֵי־עַ֗ד וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:18
Psalm 83:19(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 83:193  וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֬ה שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן עַל־כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 83:19
Psalm 84:1How lovely are your dwellings, Yahweh of Armies!
Psalm 84:14  לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־הַגִּתִּ֑ית לִבְנֵי־קֹ֥רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 84:1
Psalm 84:2My soul longs, and even faints for the courts of Yahweh. My heart and my flesh cry out for the living God.
Psalm 84:24  מַה־יְּדִיד֥וֹת מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ יְהוָ֥ה צְבָאֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 84:2
Psalm 84:3Yes, the sparrow has found a home, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may have her young, near your altars, Yahweh of Armies, my King, and my God.
Psalm 84:34  נִכְסְפָ֬ה וְגַם־כָּלְתָ֨ה ׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ לְחַצְר֢וֹת יְה֫וָ֥ה לִבִּ֥י וּבְשָׂרִ֑י יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ אֶ֣ל אֵֽל־חָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 84:3
Psalm 84:4Blessed are those who dwell in your house. They are always praising you. Selah.
Psalm 84:44  גַּם־צִפּ֨וֹר ׀ מָ֪צְאָה בַ֡יִת וּדְר֤וֹר ׀ קֵ֥ן לָהּ֮ אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֢תָה אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ אֶֽת־מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ יְהוָ֣ה צְבָא֑וֹת מַ֝לְכִּ֗י וֵאלֹהָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 84:4
Psalm 84:5Blessed are those whose strength is in you; who have set their hearts on a pilgrimage.
Psalm 84:54  אַ֭שְׁרֵי יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י בֵיתֶ֑ךָ ע֝֗וֹד יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ סֶּֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 84:5
Psalm 84:6Passing through the valley of Weeping, they make it a place of springs. Yes, the autumn rain covers it with blessings.
Psalm 84:64  אַשְׁרֵ֣י אָ֭דָם עֽוֹז־ל֥וֹ בָ֑ךְ מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 84:6
Psalm 84:7They go from strength to strength. Everyone of them appears before God in Zion.
Psalm 84:74  עֹבְרֵ֤י ׀ בְּעֵ֣מֶק הַ֭בָּכָא מַעְיָ֣ן יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ גַּם־בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת יַעְטֶ֥ה מוֹרֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 84:7
Psalm 84:8Yahweh, God of Armies, hear my prayer. Listen, God of Jacob. Selah.
Psalm 84:84  יֵ֭לְכוּ מֵחַ֣יִל אֶל־חָ֑יִל יֵרָאֶ֖ה אֶל־אֱלֹהִ֣ים בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 84:8
Psalm 84:9Behold, God our shield, look at the face of your anointed.
Psalm 84:94  יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְ֭בָאוֹת שִׁמְעָ֣ה תְפִלָּתִ֑י הַאֲזִ֨ינָה אֱלֹהֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 84:9
Psalm 84:10For a day in your courts is better than a thousand. I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
Psalm 84:104  מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ רְאֵ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט פְּנֵ֣י מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 84:10
Psalm 84:11For Yahweh God is a sun and a shield. Yahweh will give grace and glory. He withholds no good thing from those who walk blamelessly.
Psalm 84:114  כִּ֤י טֽוֹב־י֥וֹם בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף בָּחַ֗רְתִּי הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף בְּבֵ֣ית אֱלֹהַ֑י מִ֝דּ֗וּר בְּאָהֳלֵי־רֶֽשַׁע׃ ‬
Psalm 84:11
Psalm 84:12Yahweh of Armies, blessed is the man who trusts in you. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by the sons of Korah.
Psalm 84:124  כִּ֤י שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ ׀ וּמָגֵן֮ יְהוָ֢ה אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים חֵ֣ן וְ֭כָבוֹד יִתֵּ֣ן יְהוָ֑ה לֹ֥א יִמְנַע־ט֝֗וֹב לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים בְּתָמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 84:12
Psalm 84:13(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 84:134  יְהוָ֥ה צְבָא֑וֹת אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י אָ֝דָ֗ם בֹּטֵ֥חַ בָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 84:13
Psalm 85:1Yahweh, you have been favorable to your land. You have restored the fortunes of Jacob.
Psalm 85:15  לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ לִבְנֵי־קֹ֬רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 85:1
Psalm 85:2You have forgiven the iniquity of your people. You have covered all their sin. Selah.
Psalm 85:25  רָצִ֣יתָ יְהוָ֣ה אַרְצֶ֑ךָ שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ *שבות **שְׁבִ֣ית יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 85:2
Psalm 85:3You have taken away all your wrath. You have turned from the fierceness of your anger.
Psalm 85:35  נָ֭שָׂאתָ עֲוֺ֣ן עַמֶּ֑ךָ כִּסִּ֖יתָ כָל־חַטָּאתָ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 85:3
Psalm 85:4Turn us, God of our salvation, and cause your indignation toward us to cease.
Psalm 85:45  אָסַ֥פְתָּ כָל־עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ מֵחֲר֥וֹן אַפֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:4
Psalm 85:5Will you be angry with us forever? Will you draw out your anger to all generations?
Psalm 85:55  שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ וְהָפֵ֖ר כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ עִמָּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:5
Psalm 85:6Won't you revive us again, that your people may rejoice in you?
Psalm 85:65  הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם תֶּֽאֱנַף־בָּ֑נוּ תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ אַ֝פְּךָ֗ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 85:6
Psalm 85:7Show us your loving kindness, Yahweh. Grant us your salvation.
Psalm 85:75  הֽ͏ֲלֹא־אַ֭תָּה תָּשׁ֣וּב תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ יִשְׂמְחוּ־בָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:7
Psalm 85:8I will hear what God, Yahweh, will speak, for he will speak peace to his people, his saints; but let them not turn again to folly.
Psalm 85:85  הַרְאֵ֣נוּ יְהוָ֣ה חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ תִּתֶּן־לָֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:8
Psalm 85:9Surely his salvation is near those who fear him, that glory may dwell in our land.
Psalm 85:95  אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה מַה־יְדַבֵּר֮ הָאֵ֢ל ׀ יְה֫וָ֥ה כִּ֤י ׀ יְדַבֵּ֬ר שָׁל֗וֹם אֶל־עַמּ֥וֹ וְאֶל־חֲסִידָ֑יו וְֽאַל־יָשׁ֥וּבוּ לְכִסְלָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 85:9
Psalm 85:10Mercy and truth meet together. Righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
Psalm 85:105  אַ֤ךְ ׀ קָר֣וֹב לִירֵאָ֣יו יִשְׁע֑וֹ לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן כָּב֣וֹד בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:10
Psalm 85:11Truth springs out of the earth. Righteousness has looked down from heaven.
Psalm 85:115  חֶֽסֶד־וֶאֱמֶ֥ת נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ צֶ֖דֶק וְשָׁל֣וֹם נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:11
Psalm 85:12Yes, Yahweh will give that which is good. Our land will yield its increase.
Psalm 85:125  אֱ֭מֶת מֵאֶ֣רֶץ תִּצְמָ֑ח וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם נִשְׁקָֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 85:12
Psalm 85:13Righteousness goes before him, And prepares the way for his steps. A Prayer by David.
Psalm 85:135  גַּם־יְ֭הוָה יִתֵּ֣ן הַטּ֑וֹב וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ תִּתֵּ֥ן יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 85:13
Psalm 85:14(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 85:145  צֶ֭דֶק לְפָנָ֣יו יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ וְיָשֵׂ֖ם לְדֶ֣רֶךְ פְּעָמָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 85:14
Psalm 86:1Hear, Yahweh, and answer me, for I am poor and needy.
Psalm 86:16  תְּפִלָּ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הַטֵּֽה־יְהוָ֣ה אָזְנְךָ֣ עֲנֵ֑נִי כִּֽי־עָנִ֖י וְאֶבְי֣וֹן אָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 86:1
Psalm 86:2Preserve my soul, for I am godly. You, my God, save your servant who trusts in you.
Psalm 86:26  שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה נַפְשִׁי֮ כִּֽי־חָסִ֢יד אָ֥נִי הוֹשַׁ֣ע עַ֭בְדְּךָ אַתָּ֣ה אֱלֹהַ֑י הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:2
Psalm 86:3Be merciful to me, Lord, for I call to you all day long.
Psalm 86:36  חָנֵּ֥נִי אֲדֹנָ֑י כִּ֥י אֵלֶ֥יךָ אֶ֝קְרָ֗א כָּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 86:3
Psalm 86:4Bring joy to the soul of your servant, for to you, Lord, do I lift up my soul.
Psalm 86:46  שַׂ֭מֵּחַ נֶ֣פֶשׁ עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י אֵלֶ֥יךָ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י נַפְשִׁ֥י אֶשָּֽׂא׃ ‬
Psalm 86:4
Psalm 86:5For you, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive; abundant in loving kindness to all those who call on you.
Psalm 86:56  כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי ט֣וֹב וְסַלָּ֑ח וְרַב־חֶ֝֗סֶד לְכָל־קֹרְאֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:5
Psalm 86:6Hear, Yahweh, my prayer. Listen to the voice of my petitions.
Psalm 86:66  הַאֲזִ֣ינָה יְ֭הוָה תְּפִלָּתִ֑י וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה בְּק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 86:6
Psalm 86:7In the day of my trouble I will call on you, for you will answer me.
Psalm 86:76  בְּי֣וֹם צָ֭רָתִ֥י אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ כִּ֣י תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 86:7
Psalm 86:8There is no one like you among the gods, Lord, nor any deeds like your deeds.
Psalm 86:86  אֵין־כָּמ֖וֹךָ בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ אֲדֹנָ֗י וְאֵ֣ין כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:8
Psalm 86:9All nations you have made will come and worship before you, Lord. They shall glorify your name.
Psalm 86:96  כָּל־גּוֹיִ֤ם ׀ אֲשֶׁ֥ר עָשִׂ֗יתָ יָב֤וֹאוּ ׀ וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לְפָנֶ֣יךָ אֲדֹנָ֑י וִֽיכַבְּד֣וּ לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:9
Psalm 86:10For you are great, and do wondrous things. You are God alone.
Psalm 86:106  כִּֽי־גָד֣וֹל אַ֭תָּה וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה נִפְלָא֑וֹת אַתָּ֖ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:10
Psalm 86:11Teach me your way, Yahweh. I will walk in your truth. Make my heart undivided to fear your name.
Psalm 86:116  ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי יְהוָ֨ה ׀ דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ יַחֵ֥ד לְ֝בָבִ֗י לְיִרְאָ֥ה שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:11
Psalm 86:12I will praise you, Lord my God, with my whole heart. I will glorify your name forevermore.
Psalm 86:126  אוֹדְךָ֤ ׀ אֲדֹנָ֣י אֱ֭לֹהַי בְּכָל־לְבָבִ֑י וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 86:12
Psalm 86:13For your loving kindness is great toward me. You have delivered my soul from the lowest Sheol.
Psalm 86:136  כִּֽי־חַ֭סְדְּךָ גָּד֣וֹל עָלָ֑י וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י מִשְּׁא֥וֹל תַּחְתִּיּֽ͏ָה׃ ‬
Psalm 86:13
Psalm 86:14God, the proud have risen up against me. A company of violent men have sought after my soul, and they don't hold regard for you before them.
Psalm 86:146  אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ זֵ֘דִ֤ים קָֽמוּ־עָלַ֗י וַעֲדַ֣ת עָ֭רִיצִים בִּקְשׁ֣וּ נַפְשִׁ֑י וְלֹ֖א שָׂמ֣וּךָ לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 86:14
Psalm 86:15But you, Lord, are a merciful and gracious God, slow to anger, and abundant in loving kindness and truth.
Psalm 86:156  וְאַתָּ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי אֵל־רַח֣וּם וְחַנּ֑וּן אֶ֥רֶךְ אַ֝פַּ֗יִם וְרַב־חֶ֥סֶד וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 86:15
Psalm 86:16Turn to me, and have mercy on me! Give your strength to your servant. Save the son of your handmaid.
Psalm 86:166  פְּנֵ֥ה אֵלַ֗י וְחָ֫נֵּ֥נִי תְּנָֽה־עֻזְּךָ֥ לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה לְבֶן־אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 86:16
Psalm 86:17Show me a sign of your goodness, that those who hate me may see it, and be shamed, because you, Yahweh, have helped me, and comforted me. A Psalm by the sons of Korah; a Song.
Psalm 86:176  עֲשֵֽׂה־עִמִּ֥י א֗וֹת לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה וְיִרְא֣וּ שֹׂנְאַ֣י וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֥ה יְ֝הוָ֗ה עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 86:17
Psalm 87:1His foundation is in the holy mountains.
Psalm 87:17  לִבְנֵי־קֹ֭רַח מִזְמ֣וֹר שִׁ֑יר יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ בְּהַרְרֵי־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 87:1
Psalm 87:2Yahweh loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Psalm 87:27  אֹהֵ֣ב יְ֭הוָה שַׁעֲרֵ֣י צִיּ֑וֹן מִ֝כֹּ֗ל מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 87:2
Psalm 87:3Glorious things are spoken about you, city of God. Selah.
Psalm 87:37  נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת מְדֻבָּ֣ר בָּ֑ךְ עִ֖יר הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 87:3
Psalm 87:4I will record Rahab and Babylon among those who acknowledge me. Behold, Philistia, Tyre, and also Ethiopia: |This one was born there.|
Psalm 87:47  אַזְכִּ֤יר ׀ רַ֥הַב וּבָבֶ֗ל לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י הִנֵּ֤ה פְלֶ֣שֶׁת וְצ֣וֹר עִם־כּ֑וּשׁ זֶ֝֗ה יֻלַּד־שָֽׁם׃ ‬
Psalm 87:4
Psalm 87:5Yes, of Zion it will be said, |This one and that one was born in her;| the Most High himself will establish her.
Psalm 87:57  וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן ׀ יֵאָמַ֗ר אִ֣ישׁ וְ֭אִישׁ יֻלַּד־בָּ֑הּ וְה֖וּא יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 87:5
Psalm 87:6Yahweh will count, when he writes up the peoples, |This one was born there.| Selah.
Psalm 87:67  יְֽהוָ֗ה יִ֭סְפֹּר בִּכְת֣וֹב עַמִּ֑ים זֶ֖ה יֻלַּד־שָׁ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 87:6
Psalm 87:7Those who sing as well as those who dance say, |All my springs are in you.| A Song. A Psalm by the sons of Korah. For the Chief Musician. To the tune of |The Suffering of Affliction.| A contemplation by Heman, the Ezrahite.
Psalm 87:77  וְשָׁרִ֥ים כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים כָּֽל־מַעְיָנַ֥י בָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 87:7
Psalm 88:1Yahweh, the God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before you.
Psalm 88:18  שִׁ֥יר מִזְמ֗וֹר לִבְנֵ֫י קֹ֥רַח לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ עַל־מָחֲלַ֣ת לְעַנּ֑וֹת מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל לְהֵימָ֥ן הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 88:1
Psalm 88:2Let my prayer enter into your presence. Turn your ear to my cry.
Psalm 88:28  יְ֭הוָה אֱלֹהֵ֣י יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י יוֹם־צָעַ֖קְתִּי בַלַּ֣יְלָה נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 88:2
Psalm 88:3For my soul is full of troubles. My life draws near to Sheol.
Psalm 88:38  תָּב֣וֹא לְ֭פָנֶיךָ תְּפִלָּתִ֑י הַטֵּֽה־אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ לְרִנָּתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 88:3
Psalm 88:4I am counted among those who go down into the pit. I am like a man who has no help,
Psalm 88:48  כִּֽי־שָֽׂבְעָ֣ה בְרָע֣וֹת נַפְשִׁ֑י וְחַיַּ֗י לִשְׁא֥וֹל הִגִּֽיעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 88:4
Psalm 88:5set apart among the dead, like the slain who lie in the grave, whom you remember no more. They are cut off from your hand.
Psalm 88:58  נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי עִם־י֣וֹרְדֵי ב֑וֹר הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כְּגֶ֣בֶר אֵֽין־אֱיָֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 88:5
Psalm 88:6You have laid me in the lowest pit, in the darkest depths.
Psalm 88:68  בַּמֵּתִ֗ים חָ֫פְשִׁ֥י כְּמ֤וֹ חֲלָלִ֨ים ׀ שֹׁ֥כְבֵי קֶ֗בֶר אֲשֶׁ֤ר לֹ֣א זְכַרְתָּ֣ם ע֑וֹד וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה מִיָּדְךָ֥ נִגְזָֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 88:6
Psalm 88:7Your wrath lies heavily on me. You have afflicted me with all your waves. Selah.
Psalm 88:78  שַׁ֭תַּנִי בְּב֣וֹר תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 88:7
Psalm 88:8You have taken my friends from me. You have made me an abomination to them. I am confined, and I can't escape.
Psalm 88:88  עָ֭לַי סָמְכָ֣ה חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ וְכָל־מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ עִנִּ֥יתָ סֶּֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 88:8
Psalm 88:9My eyes are dim from grief. I have called on you daily, Yahweh. I have spread out my hands to you.
Psalm 88:98  הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ מְיֻדָּעַ֗י מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי שַׁתַּ֣נִי תוֹעֵב֣וֹת לָ֑מוֹ כָּ֝לֻ֗א וְלֹ֣א אֵצֵֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 88:9
Psalm 88:10Do you show wonders to the dead? Do the dead rise up and praise you? Selah.
Psalm 88:108  עֵינִ֥י דָאֲבָ֗ה מִנִּ֫י עֹ֥נִי קְרָאתִ֣יךָ יְהוָ֣ה בְּכָל־י֑וֹם שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי אֵלֶ֣יךָ כַפָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 88:10
Psalm 88:11Is your loving kindness declared in the grave? Or your faithfulness in Destruction?
Psalm 88:118  הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים תַּעֲשֶׂה־פֶּ֑לֶא אִם־רְ֝פָאִ֗ים יָק֤וּמוּ ׀ יוֹד֬וּךָ סֶּֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 88:11
Psalm 88:12Are your wonders made known in the dark? Or your righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
Psalm 88:128  הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר בַּקֶּ֣בֶר חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 88:12
Psalm 88:13But to you, Yahweh, I have cried. In the morning, my prayer comes before you.
Psalm 88:138  הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ נְשִׁיָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 88:13
Psalm 88:14Yahweh, why do you reject my soul? Why do you hide your face from me?
Psalm 88:148  וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְהוָ֣ה שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 88:14
Psalm 88:15I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up. While I suffer your terrors, I am distracted.
Psalm 88:158  לָמָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה תִּזְנַ֣ח נַפְשִׁ֑י תַּסְתִּ֖יר פָּנֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 88:15
Psalm 88:16Your fierce wrath has gone over me. Your terrors have cut me off.
Psalm 88:168  עָ֘נִ֤י אֲנִ֣י וְגֹוֵ֣עַ מִנֹּ֑עַר נָשָׂ֖אתִי אֵמֶ֣יךָ אָפֽוּנָה׃ ‬
Psalm 88:16
Psalm 88:17They came around me like water all day long. They completely engulfed me.
Psalm 88:178  עָ֭לַי עָבְר֣וּ חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 88:17
Psalm 88:18You have put lover and friend far from me, and my friends into darkness. A contemplation by Ethan, the Ezrahite.
Psalm 88:188  סַבּ֣וּנִי כַ֭מַּיִם כָּל־הַיּ֑וֹם הִקִּ֖יפוּ עָלַ֣י יָֽחַד׃ ‬
Psalm 88:18
Psalm 88:19(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 88:198  הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ מִ֭מֶּנִּי אֹהֵ֣ב וָרֵ֑עַ מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 88:19
Psalm 89:1I will sing of the loving kindness of Yahweh forever. With my mouth, I will make known your faithfulness to all generations.
Psalm 89:19  מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל לְאֵיתָ֥ן הָֽאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:1
Psalm 89:2I indeed declare, |Love stands firm forever. You established the heavens. Your faithfulness is in them.|
Psalm 89:29  חַֽסְדֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה עוֹלָ֣ם אָשִׁ֑ירָה לְדֹ֥ר וָדֹ֓ר ׀ אוֹדִ֖יעַ אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ בְּפִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:2
Psalm 89:3|I have made a covenant with my chosen one, I have sworn to David, my servant,
Psalm 89:39  כִּֽי־אָמַ֗רְתִּי ע֭וֹלָם חֶ֣סֶד יִבָּנֶ֑ה שָׁמַ֓יִם ׀ תָּכִ֖ן אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ בָהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:3
Psalm 89:4'I will establish your seed forever, and build up your throne to all generations.'| Selah.
Psalm 89:49  כָּרַ֣תִּֽי בְ֭רִית לִבְחִירִ֑י נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי לְדָוִ֥ד עַבְדִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:4
Psalm 89:5The heavens will praise your wonders, Yahweh; your faithfulness also in the assembly of the holy ones.
Psalm 89:59  עַד־ע֭וֹלָם אָכִ֣ין זַרְעֶ֑ךָ וּבָנִ֨יתִי לְדֹר־וָד֖וֹר כִּסְאֲךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:5
Psalm 89:6For who in the skies can be compared to Yahweh? Who among the sons of the heavenly beings is like Yahweh,
Psalm 89:69  וְי֘וֹד֤וּ שָׁמַ֣יִם פִּלְאֲךָ֣ יְהוָ֑ה אַף־אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ בִּקְהַ֥ל קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ ‬
Psalm 89:6
Psalm 89:7a very awesome God in the council of the holy ones, to be feared above all those who are around him?
Psalm 89:79  כִּ֤י מִ֣י בַ֭שַּׁחַק יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ לַיהוָ֑ה יִדְמֶ֥ה לַ֝יהוָ֗ה בִּבְנֵ֥י אֵלִים׃ ‬
Psalm 89:7
Psalm 89:8Yahweh, God of Armies, who is a mighty one, like you? Yah, your faithfulness is around you.
Psalm 89:89  אֵ֣ל נַ֭עֲרָץ בְּסוֹד־קְדֹשִׁ֣ים רַבָּ֑ה וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א עַל־כָּל־סְבִיבָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 89:8
Psalm 89:9You rule the pride of the sea. When its waves rise up, you calm them.
Psalm 89:99  יְהוָ֤ה ׀ אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י צְבָא֗וֹת מִֽי־כָֽמ֖וֹךָ חֲסִ֥ין ׀ יָ֑הּ וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:9
Psalm 89:10You have broken Rahab in pieces, like one of the slain. You have scattered your enemies with your mighty arm.
Psalm 89:109  אַתָּ֣ה מ֭וֹשֵׁל בְּגֵא֣וּת הַיָּ֑ם בְּשׂ֥וֹא גַ֝לָּ֗יו אַתָּ֥ה תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:10
Psalm 89:11The heavens are yours. The earth also is yours; the world and its fullness. You have founded them.
Psalm 89:119  אַתָּ֤ה דִכִּ֣אתָ כֶחָלָ֣ל רָ֑הַב בִּזְר֥וֹעַ עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:11
Psalm 89:12The north and the south, you have created them. Tabor and Hermon rejoice in your name.
Psalm 89:129  לְךָ֣ שָׁ֭מַיִם אַף־לְךָ֥ אָ֑רֶץ תֵּבֵ֥ל וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ אַתָּ֥ה יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:12
Psalm 89:13You have a mighty arm. Your hand is strong, and your right hand is exalted.
Psalm 89:139  צָפ֣וֹן וְ֭יָמִין אַתָּ֣ה בְרָאתָ֑ם תָּב֥וֹר וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:13
Psalm 89:14Righteousness and justice are the foundation of your throne. Loving kindness and truth go before your face.
Psalm 89:149  לְךָ֣ זְ֭רוֹעַ עִם־גְּבוּרָ֑ה תָּעֹ֥ז יָ֝דְךָ֗ תָּר֥וּם יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:14
Psalm 89:15Blessed are the people who learn to acclaim you. They walk in the light of your presence, Yahweh.
Psalm 89:159  צֶ֣דֶק וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט מְכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ חֶ֥סֶד וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ פָנֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:15
Psalm 89:16In your name they rejoice all day. In your righteousness, they are exalted.
Psalm 89:169  אַשְׁרֵ֣י הָ֭עָם יוֹדְעֵ֣י תְרוּעָ֑ה יְ֝הוָ֗ה בְּֽאוֹר־פָּנֶ֥יךָ יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 89:16
Psalm 89:17For you are the glory of their strength. In your favor, our horn will be exalted.
Psalm 89:179  בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ יְגִיל֣וּן כָּל־הַיּ֑וֹם וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ יָרֽוּמוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:17
Psalm 89:18For our shield belongs to Yahweh; our king to the Holy One of Israel.
Psalm 89:189  כִּֽי־תִפְאֶ֣רֶת עֻזָּ֣מוֹ אָ֑תָּה וּ֝בִרְצֹנְךָ֗ *תרים **תָּר֥וּם קַרְנֵֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:18
Psalm 89:19Then you spoke in vision to your saints, and said, |I have bestowed strength on the warrior. I have exalted a young man from the people.
Psalm 89:199  כִּ֣י לַֽ֭יהוָה מָֽגִנֵּ֑נוּ וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:19
Psalm 89:20I have found David, my servant. I have anointed him with my holy oil,
Psalm 89:209  אָ֤ז דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־בְחָ֡זוֹן לַֽחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר שִׁוִּ֣יתִי עֵ֭זֶר עַל־גִּבּ֑וֹר הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי בָח֣וּר מֵעָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:20
Psalm 89:21with whom my hand shall be established. My arm will also strengthen him.
Psalm 89:219  מָ֭צָאתִי דָּוִ֣ד עַבְדִּ֑י בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן קָדְשִׁ֣י מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 89:21
Psalm 89:22No enemy will tax him. No wicked man will oppress him.
Psalm 89:229  אֲשֶׁ֣ר יָ֭דִי תִּכּ֣וֹן עִמּ֑וֹ אַף־זְרוֹעִ֥י תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:22
Psalm 89:23I will beat down his adversaries before him, and strike those who hate him.
Psalm 89:239  לֹֽא־יַשִּׁ֣א אוֹיֵ֣ב בּ֑וֹ וּבֶן־עַ֝וְלָ֗ה לֹ֣א יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:23
Psalm 89:24But my faithfulness and my loving kindness will be with him. In my name, his horn will be exalted.
Psalm 89:249  וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י מִפָּנָ֣יו צָרָ֑יו וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו אֶגּֽוֹף׃ ‬
Psalm 89:24
Psalm 89:25I will set his hand also on the sea, and his right hand on the rivers.
Psalm 89:259  וֶֽאֶֽמוּנָתִ֣י וְחַסְדִּ֣י עִמּ֑וֹ וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י תָּר֥וּם קַרְנֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:25
Psalm 89:26He will call to me, 'You are my Father, my God, and the rock of my salvation!'
Psalm 89:269  וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י בַיָּ֣ם יָד֑וֹ וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת יְמִינֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:26
Psalm 89:27I will also appoint him my firstborn, the highest of the kings of the earth.
Psalm 89:279  ה֣וּא יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי אָ֣בִי אָ֑תָּה אֵ֝לִ֗י וְצ֣וּר יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:27
Psalm 89:28I will keep my loving kindness for him forevermore. My covenant will stand firm with him.
Psalm 89:289  אַף־אָ֭נִי בְּכ֣וֹר אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן לְמַלְכֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:28
Psalm 89:29I will also make his seed endure forever, and his throne as the days of heaven.
Psalm 89:299  לְ֭עוֹלָ֗ם *אשמור־**אֶשְׁמָר־ל֣וֹ חַסְדִּ֑י וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:29
Psalm 89:30If his children forsake my law, and don't walk in my ordinances;
Psalm 89:309  וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י לָעַ֣ד זַרְע֑וֹ וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ כִּימֵ֥י שָׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:30
Psalm 89:31if they break my statutes, and don't keep my commandments;
Psalm 89:319  אִם־יַֽעַזְב֣וּ בָ֭נָיו תּוֹרָתִ֑י וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י לֹ֣א יֵלֵכֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 89:31
Psalm 89:32then I will punish their sin with the rod, and their iniquity with stripes.
Psalm 89:329  אִם־חֻקֹּתַ֥י יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י לֹ֣א יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:32
Psalm 89:33But I will not completely take my loving kindness from him, nor allow my faithfulness to fail.
Psalm 89:339  וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י בְשֵׁ֣בֶט פִּשְׁעָ֑ם וּבִנְגָעִ֥ים עֲוֺנָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:33
Psalm 89:34I will not break my covenant, nor alter what my lips have uttered.
Psalm 89:349  וְ֭חַסְדִּי לֹֽא־אָפִ֣יר מֵֽעִמּ֑וֹ וְלֹֽא־אֲ֝שַׁקֵּ֗ר בֶּאֱמוּנָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:34
Psalm 89:35Once have I sworn by my holiness, I will not lie to David.
Psalm 89:359  לֹא־אֲחַלֵּ֥ל בְּרִיתִ֑י וּמוֹצָ֥א שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י לֹ֣א אֲשַׁנֶּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:35
Psalm 89:36His seed will endure forever, his throne like the sun before me.
Psalm 89:369  אַ֭חַת נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי בְקָדְשִׁ֑י אִֽם־לְדָוִ֥ד אֲכַזֵּֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 89:36
Psalm 89:37It will be established forever like the moon, the faithful witness in the sky.| Selah.
Psalm 89:379  זַ֭רְעוֹ לְעוֹלָ֣ם יִהְיֶ֑ה וְכִסְא֖וֹ כַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ נֶגְדִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 89:37
Psalm 89:38But you have rejected and spurned. You have been angry with your anointed.
Psalm 89:389  כְּ֭יָרֵחַ יִכּ֣וֹן עוֹלָ֑ם וְעֵ֥ד בַּ֝שַּׁ֗חַק נֶאֱמָ֥ן סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:38
Psalm 89:39You have renounced the covenant of your servant. You have defiled his crown in the dust.
Psalm 89:399  וְאַתָּ֣ה זָ֭נַחְתָּ וַתִּמְאָ֑ס הִ֝תְעַבַּ֗רְתָּ עִם־מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:39
Psalm 89:40You have broken down all his hedges. You have brought his strongholds to ruin.
Psalm 89:409  נֵ֭אַרְתָּה בְּרִ֣ית עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ חִלַּ֖לְתָּ לָאָ֣רֶץ נִזְרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:40
Psalm 89:41All who pass by the way rob him. He has become a reproach to his neighbors.
Psalm 89:419  פָּרַ֥צְתָּ כָל־גְּדֵרֹתָ֑יו שַׂ֖מְתָּ מִבְצָרָ֣יו מְחִתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:41
Psalm 89:42You have exalted the right hand of his adversaries. You have made all of his enemies rejoice.
Psalm 89:429  שַׁ֭סֻּהוּ כָּל־עֹ֣בְרֵי דָ֑רֶךְ הָיָ֥ה חֶ֝רְפָּ֗ה לִשְׁכֵנֽ͏ָיו׃ ‬
Psalm 89:42
Psalm 89:43Yes, you turn back the edge of his sword, and haven't supported him in battle.
Psalm 89:439  הֲ֭רִימוֹתָ יְמִ֣ין צָרָ֑יו הִ֝שְׂמַ֗חְתָּ כָּל־אוֹיְבָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 89:43
Psalm 89:44You have ended his splendor, and thrown his throne down to the ground.
Psalm 89:449  אַף־תָּ֭שִׁיב צ֣וּר חַרְבּ֑וֹ וְלֹ֥א הֲ֝קֵימֹת֗וֹ בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:44
Psalm 89:45You have shortened the days of his youth. You have covered him with shame. Selah.
Psalm 89:459  הִשְׁבַּ֥תָּ מִטְּהָר֑וֹ וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ לָאָ֥רֶץ מִגַּֽרְתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:45
Psalm 89:46How long, Yahweh? Will you hide yourself forever? Will your wrath burn like fire?
Psalm 89:469  הִ֭קְצַרְתָּ יְמֵ֣י עֲלוּמָ֑יו הֶֽעֱטִ֨יתָ עָלָ֖יו בּוּשָׁ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:46
Psalm 89:47Remember how short my time is! For what vanity have you created all the children of men!
Psalm 89:479  עַד־מָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה תִּסָּתֵ֣ר לָנֶ֑צַח תִּבְעַ֖ר כְּמוֹ־אֵ֣שׁ חֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:47
Psalm 89:48What man is he who shall live and not see death, who shall deliver his soul from the power of Sheol? Selah.
Psalm 89:489  זְכָר־אֲנִ֥י מֶה־חָ֑לֶד עַל־מַה־שָּׁ֝֗וְא בָּרָ֥אתָ כָל־בְּנֵי־אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 89:48
Psalm 89:49Lord, where are your former loving kindnesses, which you swore to David in your faithfulness?
Psalm 89:499  מִ֤י גֶ֣בֶר יִֽ֭חְיֶה וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֶה־מָּ֑וֶת יְמַלֵּ֨ט נַפְשׁ֖וֹ מִיַּד־שְׁא֣וֹל סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 89:49
Psalm 89:50Remember, Lord, the reproach of your servants, how I bear in my heart the taunts of all the mighty peoples,
Psalm 89:509  אַיֵּ֤ה ׀ חֲסָדֶ֖יךָ הָרִאשֹׁנִ֥ים ׀ אֲדֹנָ֑י נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתָּ לְ֝דָוִ֗ד בֶּאֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:50
Psalm 89:51With which your enemies have mocked, Yahweh, with which they have mocked the footsteps of your anointed one.
Psalm 89:519  זְכֹ֣ר אֲ֭דֹנָי חֶרְפַּ֣ת עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ שְׂאֵתִ֥י בְ֝חֵיקִ֗י כָּל־רַבִּ֥ים עַמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 89:51
Psalm 89:52Blessed be Yahweh forevermore. Amen, and Amen. BOOK IV A Prayer by Moses, the man of God.
Psalm 89:529  אֲשֶׁ֤ר חֵרְפ֖וּ אוֹיְבֶ֥יךָ ׀ יְהוָ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר חֵ֝רְפ֗וּ עִקְּב֥וֹת מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 89:52
Psalm 89:53(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 89:539  בָּר֖וּךְ יְהוָ֥ה לְ֝עוֹלָ֗ם אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ וְאָמֵֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 89:53
Psalm 90:1Lord, you have been our dwelling place for all generations.
Psalm 90:10  תְּפִלָּה֮ לְמֹשֶׁ֢ה אִֽישׁ־הָאֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים אֲ‍ֽדֹנָ֗י מָע֣וֹן אַ֭תָּה הָיִ֥יתָ לָּ֗נוּ בְּדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 90:1
Psalm 90:2Before the mountains were brought forth, before you had formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, you are God.
Psalm 90:20  בְּטֶ֤רֶם ׀ הָ֘רִ֤ים יֻלָּ֗דוּ וַתְּח֣וֹלֵֽל אֶ֣רֶץ וְתֵבֵ֑ל וּֽמֵעוֹלָ֥ם עַד־ע֝וֹלָ֗ם אַתָּ֥ה אֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 90:2
Psalm 90:3You turn man to destruction, saying, |Return, you children of men.|
Psalm 90:30  תָּשֵׁ֣ב אֱ֭נוֹשׁ עַד־דַּכָּ֑א וַ֝תֹּ֗אמֶר שׁ֣וּבוּ בְנֵי־אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 90:3
Psalm 90:4For a thousand years in your sight are just like yesterday when it is past, like a watch in the night.
Psalm 90:40  כִּ֤י אֶ֪לֶף שָׁנִ֡ים בְּֽעֵינֶ֗יךָ כְּי֣וֹם אֶ֭תְמוֹל כִּ֣י יַעֲבֹ֑ר וְאַשְׁמוּרָ֥ה בַלָּֽיְלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 90:4
Psalm 90:5You sweep them away as they sleep. In the morning they sprout like new grass.
Psalm 90:50  זְ֭רַמְתָּם שֵׁנָ֣ה יִהְי֑וּ בַּ֝בֹּ֗קֶר כֶּחָצִ֥יר יַחֲלֹֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 90:5
Psalm 90:6In the morning it sprouts and springs up. By evening, it is withered and dry.
Psalm 90:60  בַּ֭בֹּקֶר יָצִ֣יץ וְחָלָ֑ף לָ֝עֶ֗רֶב יְמוֹלֵ֥ל וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:6
Psalm 90:7For we are consumed in your anger. We are troubled in your wrath.
Psalm 90:70  כִּֽי־כָלִ֥ינוּ בְאַפֶּ֑ךָ וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ נִבְהָֽלְנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:7
Psalm 90:8You have set our iniquities before you, our secret sins in the light of your presence.
Psalm 90:80  *שת **שַׁתָּ֣ה עֲוֺנֹתֵ֣ינוּ לְנֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ עֲ֝לֻמֵ֗נוּ לִמְא֥וֹר פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:8
Psalm 90:9For all our days have passed away in your wrath. We bring our years to an end as a sigh.
Psalm 90:90  כִּ֣י כָל־יָ֭מֵינוּ פָּנ֣וּ בְעֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ כִּלִּ֖ינוּ שָׁנֵ֣ינוּ כְמוֹ־הֶֽגֶה׃ ‬
Psalm 90:9
Psalm 90:10The days of our years are seventy, or even by reason of strength eighty years; yet their pride is but labor and sorrow, for it passes quickly, and we fly away.
Psalm 90:100  יְמֵֽי־שְׁנוֹתֵ֨ינוּ בָהֶ֥ם שִׁבְעִ֪ים שָׁנָ֡ה וְאִ֤ם בִּגְבוּרֹ֨ת ׀ שְׁמ֘וֹנִ֤ים שָׁנָ֗ה וְ֭רָהְבָּם עָמָ֣ל וָאָ֑וֶן כִּי־גָ֥ז חִ֝֗ישׁ וַנָּעֻֽפָה׃ ‬
Psalm 90:10
Psalm 90:11Who knows the power of your anger, your wrath according to the fear that is due to you?
Psalm 90:110  מִֽי־י֭וֹדֵעַ עֹ֣ז אַפֶּ֑ךָ וּ֝כְיִרְאָתְךָ֗ עֶבְרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:11
Psalm 90:12So teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.
Psalm 90:120  לִמְנ֣וֹת יָ֭מֵינוּ כֵּ֣ן הוֹדַ֑ע וְ֝נָבִ֗א לְבַ֣ב חָכְמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 90:12
Psalm 90:13Relent, Yahweh! How long? Have compassion on your servants!
Psalm 90:130  שׁוּבָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה עַד־מָתָ֑י וְ֝הִנָּחֵ֗ם עַל־עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:13
Psalm 90:14Satisfy us in the morning with your loving kindness, that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.
Psalm 90:140  שַׂבְּעֵ֣נוּ בַבֹּ֣קֶר חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וּֽנְרַנְּנָ֥ה וְ֝נִשְׂמְחָ֗ה בְּכָל־יָמֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:14
Psalm 90:15Make us glad for as many days as you have afflicted us, for as many years as we have seen evil.
Psalm 90:150  שַׂ֭מְּחֵנוּ כִּימ֣וֹת עִנִּיתָ֑נוּ שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת רָאִ֥ינוּ רָעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 90:15
Psalm 90:16Let your work appear to your servants; your glory to their children.
Psalm 90:160  יֵרָאֶ֣ה אֶל־עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ פָעֳלֶ֑ךָ וַ֝הֲדָרְךָ֗ עַל־בְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 90:16
Psalm 90:17Let the favor of the Lord our God be on us; establish the work of our hands for us; yes, establish the work of our hands.
Psalm 90:170  וִיהִ֤י ׀ נֹ֤עַם אֲדֹנָ֥י אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ עָ֫לֵ֥ינוּ וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יָ֭דֵינוּ כּוֹנְנָ֥ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה יָ֝דֵ֗ינוּ כּוֹנְנֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 90:17
Psalm 91:1He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
Psalm 91:11  יֹ֭שֵׁב בְּסֵ֣תֶר עֶלְי֑וֹן בְּצֵ֥ל שַׁ֝דַּ֗י יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 91:1
Psalm 91:2I will say of Yahweh, |He is my refuge and my fortress; my God, in whom I trust.|
Psalm 91:21  אֹמַ֗ר לַֽ֭יהוָה מַחְסִ֣י וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אֶבְטַח־בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:2
Psalm 91:3For he will deliver you from the snare of the fowler, and from the deadly pestilence.
Psalm 91:31  כִּ֤י ה֣וּא יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ מִפַּ֥ח יָק֗וּשׁ מִדֶּ֥בֶר הַוּֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 91:3
Psalm 91:4He will cover you with his feathers. Under his wings you will take refuge. His faithfulness is your shield and rampart.
Psalm 91:41  בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ ׀ יָ֣סֶךְ לָ֭ךְ וְתַֽחַת־כְּנָפָ֣יו תֶּחְסֶ֑ה צִנָּ֖ה וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:4
Psalm 91:5You shall not be afraid of the terror by night, nor of the arrow that flies by day;
Psalm 91:51  לֹא־תִ֭ירָא מִפַּ֣חַד לָ֑יְלָה מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ יָע֥וּף יוֹמָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 91:5
Psalm 91:6nor of the pestilence that walks in darkness, nor of the destruction that wastes at noonday.
Psalm 91:61  מִ֭דֶּבֶר בָּאֹ֣פֶל יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב יָשׁ֥וּד צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 91:6
Psalm 91:7A thousand may fall at your side, and ten thousand at your right hand; but it will not come near you.
Psalm 91:71  יִפֹּ֤ל מִצִּדְּךָ֨ ׀ אֶ֗לֶף וּרְבָבָ֥ה מִימִינֶ֑ךָ אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א יִגָּֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:7
Psalm 91:8You will only look with your eyes, and see the recompense of the wicked.
Psalm 91:81  רַ֭ק בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ תַבִּ֑יט וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תִּרְאֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 91:8
Psalm 91:9Because you have made Yahweh your refuge, and the Most High your dwelling place,
Psalm 91:91  כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה יְהוָ֣ה מַחְסִ֑י עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן שַׂ֣מְתָּ מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:9
Psalm 91:10no evil shall happen to you, neither shall any plague come near your dwelling.
Psalm 91:101  לֹֽא־תְאֻנֶּ֣ה אֵלֶ֣יךָ רָעָ֑ה וְ֝נֶ֗גַע לֹא־יִקְרַ֥ב בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:10
Psalm 91:11For he will put his angels in charge of you, to guard you in all your ways.
Psalm 91:111  כִּ֣י מַ֭לְאָכָיו יְצַוֶּה־לָּ֑ךְ לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ בְּכָל־דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:11
Psalm 91:12They will bear you up in their hands, so that you won't dash your foot against a stone.
Psalm 91:121  עַל־כַּפַּ֥יִם יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ פֶּן־תִּגֹּ֖ף בָּאֶ֣בֶן רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:12
Psalm 91:13You will tread on the lion and cobra. You will trample the young lion and the serpent underfoot.
Psalm 91:131  עַל־שַׁ֣חַל וָפֶ֣תֶן תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ תִּרְמֹ֖ס כְּפִ֣יר וְתַנִּֽין׃ ‬
Psalm 91:13
Psalm 91:14|Because he has set his love on me, therefore I will deliver him. I will set him on high, because he has known my name.
Psalm 91:141  כִּ֤י בִ֣י חָ֭שַׁק וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ כִּֽי־יָדַ֥ע שְׁמִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 91:14
Psalm 91:15He will call on me, and I will answer him. I will be with him in trouble. I will deliver him, and honor him.
Psalm 91:151  יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי ׀ וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ עִמּֽוֹ־אָנֹכִ֥י בְצָרָ֑ה אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 91:15
Psalm 91:16I will satisfy him with long life, and show him my salvation.| A Psalm. A song for the Sabbath day.
Psalm 91:161  אֹ֣רֶךְ יָ֭מִים אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 91:16
Psalm 92:1It is a good thing to give thanks to Yahweh, to sing praises to your name, Most High;
Psalm 92:12  מִזְמ֥וֹר שִׁ֗יר לְי֣וֹם הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 92:1
Psalm 92:2to proclaim your loving kindness in the morning, and your faithfulness every night,
Psalm 92:22  ט֗וֹב לְהֹד֥וֹת לַיהוָ֑ה וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר לְשִׁמְךָ֣ עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 92:2
Psalm 92:3with the ten-stringed lute, with the harp, and with the melody of the lyre.
Psalm 92:32  לְהַגִּ֣יד בַּבֹּ֣קֶר חַסְֽדֶּ֑ךָ וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 92:3
Psalm 92:4For you, Yahweh, have made me glad through your work. I will triumph in the works of your hands.
Psalm 92:42  עֲ‍ֽלֵי־עָ֭שׂוֹר וַעֲלֵי־נָ֑בֶל עֲלֵ֖י הִגָּי֣וֹן בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 92:4
Psalm 92:5How great are your works, Yahweh! Your thoughts are very deep.
Psalm 92:52  כִּ֤י שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי יְהוָ֣ה בְּפָעֳלֶ֑ךָ בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י יָדֶ֣יךָ אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 92:5
Psalm 92:6A senseless man doesn't know, neither does a fool understand this:
Psalm 92:62  מַה־גָּדְל֣וּ מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ יְהוָ֑ה מְ֝אֹ֗ד עָמְק֥וּ מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 92:6
Psalm 92:7though the wicked spring up as the grass, and all the evildoers flourish, they will be destroyed forever.
Psalm 92:72  אִֽישׁ־בַּ֭עַר לֹ֣א יֵדָ֑ע וּ֝כְסִ֗יל לֹא־יָבִ֥ין אֶת־זֹֽאת׃ ‬
Psalm 92:7
Psalm 92:8But you, Yahweh, are on high forevermore.
Psalm 92:82  בִּפְרֹ֤חַ רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ כְּמ֥וֹ עֵ֗שֶׂב וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ כָּל־פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן לְהִשָּֽׁמְדָ֥ם עֲדֵי־עַֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 92:8
Psalm 92:9For, behold, your enemies, Yahweh, for, behold, your enemies shall perish. All the evildoers will be scattered.
Psalm 92:92  וְאַתָּ֥ה מָר֗וֹם לְעֹלָ֥ם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 92:9
Psalm 92:10But you have exalted my horn like that of the wild ox. I am anointed with fresh oil.
Psalm 92:102  כִּ֤י הִנֵּ֪ה אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ ׀ יְֽהוָ֗ה כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ יֹאבֵ֑דוּ יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ כָּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 92:10
Psalm 92:11My eye has also seen my enemies. My ears have heard of the wicked enemies who rise up against me.
Psalm 92:112  וַתָּ֣רֶם כִּרְאֵ֣ים קַרְנִ֑י בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן רַעֲנָֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 92:11
Psalm 92:12The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree. He will grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
Psalm 92:122  וַתַּבֵּ֥ט עֵינִ֗י בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י בַּקָּמִ֖ים עָלַ֥י מְרֵעִ֗ים תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה אָזְנָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 92:12
Psalm 92:13They are planted in Yahweh's house. They will flourish in our God's courts.
Psalm 92:132  צַ֭דִּיק כַּתָּמָ֣ר יִפְרָ֑ח כְּאֶ֖רֶז בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 92:13
Psalm 92:14They will still bring forth fruit in old age. They will be full of sap and green,
Psalm 92:142  שְׁ֭תוּלִים בְּבֵ֣ית יְהוָ֑ה בְּחַצְר֖וֹת אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 92:14
Psalm 92:15to show that Yahweh is upright. He is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.
Psalm 92:152  ע֭וֹד יְנוּב֣וּן בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים וְרַֽעֲנַנִּ֣ים יִהְיֽוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 92:15
Psalm 92:16(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 92:162  לְ֭הַגִּיד כִּֽי־יָשָׁ֣ר יְהוָ֑ה צ֝וּרִ֗י וְֽלֹא־*עלתה **עַוְלָ֥תָה בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 92:16
Psalm 93:1Yahweh reigns! He is clothed with majesty! Yahweh is armed with strength. The world also is established. It can't be moved.
Psalm 93:13  יְהוָ֣ה מָלָךְ֮ גֵּא֢וּת לָ֫בֵ֥שׁ לָבֵ֣שׁ יְ֭הוָה עֹ֣ז הִתְאַזָּ֑ר אַף־תִּכּ֥וֹן תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל בַּל־תִּמּֽוֹט׃ ‬
Psalm 93:1
Psalm 93:2Your throne is established from long ago. You are from everlasting.
Psalm 93:23  נָכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֲךָ֣ מֵאָ֑ז מֵֽעוֹלָ֣ם אָֽתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 93:2
Psalm 93:3The floods have lifted up, Yahweh, the floods have lifted up their voice. The floods lift up their waves.
Psalm 93:33  נָשְׂא֤וּ נְהָר֨וֹת ׀ יְֽהוָ֗ה נָשְׂא֣וּ נְהָר֣וֹת קוֹלָ֑ם יִשְׂא֖וּ נְהָר֣וֹת דָּכְיָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 93:3
Psalm 93:4Above the voices of many waters, the mighty breakers of the sea, Yahweh on high is mighty.
Psalm 93:43  מִקֹּל֨וֹת ׀ מַ֤יִם רַבִּ֗ים אַדִּירִ֣ים מִשְׁבְּרֵי־יָ֑ם אַדִּ֖יר בַּמָּר֣וֹם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 93:4
Psalm 93:5Your statutes stand firm. Holiness adorns your house, Yahweh, forevermore.
Psalm 93:53  עֵֽדֹתֶ֨יךָ ׀ נֶאֶמְנ֬וּ מְאֹ֗ד לְבֵיתְךָ֥ נַאֲוָה־קֹ֑דֶשׁ יְ֝הוָ֗ה לְאֹ֣רֶךְ יָמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 93:5
Psalm 94:1Yahweh, you God to whom vengeance belongs, you God to whom vengeance belongs, shine forth.
Psalm 94:14  אֵל־נְקָמ֥וֹת יְהוָ֑ה אֵ֖ל נְקָמ֣וֹת הוֹפִֽיַע׃ ‬
Psalm 94:1
Psalm 94:2Rise up, you judge of the earth. Pay back the proud what they deserve.
Psalm 94:24  הִ֭נָּשֵׂא שֹׁפֵ֣ט הָאָ֑רֶץ הָשֵׁ֥ב גְּ֝מ֗וּל עַל־גֵּאִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 94:2
Psalm 94:3Yahweh, how long will the wicked, how long will the wicked triumph?
Psalm 94:34  עַד־מָתַ֖י רְשָׁעִ֥ים ׀ יְהוָ֑ה עַד־מָ֝תַ֗י רְשָׁעִ֥ים יַעֲלֹֽזוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:3
Psalm 94:4They pour out arrogant words. All the evildoers boast.
Psalm 94:44  יַבִּ֣יעוּ יְדַבְּר֣וּ עָתָ֑ק יִֽ֝תְאַמְּר֗וּ כָּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 94:4
Psalm 94:5They break your people in pieces, Yahweh, and afflict your heritage.
Psalm 94:54  עַמְּךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה יְדַכְּא֑וּ וְֽנַחֲלָתְךָ֥ יְעַנּֽוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:5
Psalm 94:6They kill the widow and the alien, and murder the fatherless.
Psalm 94:64  אַ֭לְמָנָה וְגֵ֣ר יַהֲרֹ֑גוּ וִֽיתוֹמִ֣ים יְרַצֵּֽחוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:6
Psalm 94:7They say, |Yah will not see, neither will Jacob's God consider.|
Psalm 94:74  וַ֭יֹּ֣אמְרוּ לֹ֣א יִרְאֶה־יָּ֑הּ וְלֹא־יָ֝בִ֗ין אֱלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 94:7
Psalm 94:8Consider, you senseless among the people; you fools, when will you be wise?
Psalm 94:84  בִּ֭ינוּ בֹּעֲרִ֣ים בָּעָ֑ם וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים מָתַ֥י תַּשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:8
Psalm 94:9He who implanted the ear, won't he hear? He who formed the eye, won't he see?
Psalm 94:94  הֲנֹ֣טַֽע אֹ֭זֶן הֲלֹ֣א יִשְׁמָ֑ע אִֽם־יֹ֥צֵֽר עַ֝֗יִן הֲלֹ֣א יַבִּֽיט׃ ‬
Psalm 94:9
Psalm 94:10He who disciplines the nations, won't he punish? He who teaches man knows.
Psalm 94:104  הֲיֹסֵ֣ר גּ֭וֹיִם הֲלֹ֣א יוֹכִ֑יחַ הַֽמְלַמֵּ֖ד אָדָ֣ם דָּֽעַת׃ ‬
Psalm 94:10
Psalm 94:11Yahweh knows the thoughts of man, that they are futile.
Psalm 94:114  יְֽהוָ֗ה יֹ֭דֵעַ מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת אָדָ֑ם כִּי־הֵ֥מָּה הָֽבֶל׃ ‬
Psalm 94:11
Psalm 94:12Blessed is the man whom you discipline, Yah, and teach out of your law;
Psalm 94:124  אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ הַגֶּ֣בֶר אֲשֶׁר־תְּיַסְּרֶ֣נּוּ יָּ֑הּ וּֽמִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ תְלַמְּדֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:12
Psalm 94:13that you may give him rest from the days of adversity, until the pit is dug for the wicked.
Psalm 94:134  לְהַשְׁקִ֣יט ל֭וֹ מִ֣ימֵי רָ֑ע עַ֤ד יִכָּרֶ֖ה לָרָשָׁ֣ע שָֽׁחַת׃ ‬
Psalm 94:13
Psalm 94:14For Yahweh won't reject his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.
Psalm 94:144  כִּ֤י ׀ לֹא־יִטֹּ֣שׁ יְהוָ֣ה עַמּ֑וֹ וְ֝נַחֲלָת֗וֹ לֹ֣א יַעֲזֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 94:14
Psalm 94:15For judgment will return to righteousness. All the upright in heart shall follow it.
Psalm 94:154  כִּֽי־עַד־צֶ֭דֶק יָשׁ֣וּב מִשְׁפָּ֑ט וְ֝אַחֲרָ֗יו כָּל־יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 94:15
Psalm 94:16Who will rise up for me against the wicked? Who will stand up for me against the evildoers?
Psalm 94:164  מִֽי־יָק֣וּם לִ֭י עִם־מְרֵעִ֑ים מִֽי־יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב לִ֝י עִם־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 94:16
Psalm 94:17Unless Yahweh had been my help, my soul would have soon lived in silence.
Psalm 94:174  לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה עֶזְרָ֣תָה לִּ֑י כִּמְעַ֓ט ׀ שָֽׁכְנָ֖ה דוּמָ֣ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 94:17
Psalm 94:18When I said, |My foot is slipping!| Your loving kindness, Yahweh, held me up.
Psalm 94:184  אִם־אָ֭מַרְתִּי מָ֣טָה רַגְלִ֑י חַסְדְּךָ֥ יְ֝הוָ֗ה יִסְעָדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 94:18
Psalm 94:19In the multitude of my thoughts within me, your comforts delight my soul.
Psalm 94:194  בְּרֹ֣ב שַׂרְעַפַּ֣י בְּקִרְבִּ֑י תַּ֝נְחוּמֶ֗יךָ יְֽשַׁעַשְׁע֥וּ נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 94:19
Psalm 94:20Shall the throne of wickedness have fellowship with you, which brings about mischief by statute?
Psalm 94:204  הַֽ֭יְחָבְרְךָ כִּסֵּ֣א הַוּ֑וֹת יֹצֵ֖ר עָמָ֣ל עֲלֵי־חֹֽק׃ ‬
Psalm 94:20
Psalm 94:21They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous, and condemn the innocent blood.
Psalm 94:214  יָ֭גוֹדּוּ עַל־נֶ֣פֶשׁ צַדִּ֑יק וְדָ֖ם נָקִ֣י יַרְשִֽׁיעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:21
Psalm 94:22But Yahweh has been my high tower, my God, the rock of my refuge.
Psalm 94:224  וַיְהִ֬י יְהוָ֣ה לִ֣י לְמִשְׂגָּ֑ב וֵ֝אלֹהַ֗י לְצ֣וּר מַחְסִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 94:22
Psalm 94:23He has brought on them their own iniquity, and will cut them off in their own wickedness. Yahweh, our God, will cut them off.
Psalm 94:234  וַיָּ֤שֶׁב עֲלֵיהֶ֨ם ׀ אֶת־אוֹנָ֗ם וּבְרָעָתָ֥ם יַצְמִיתֵ֑ם יַ֝צְמִיתֵ֗ם יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 94:23
Psalm 95:1Oh come, let's sing to Yahweh. Let's shout aloud to the rock of our salvation!
Psalm 95:15  לְ֭כוּ נְרַנְּנָ֣ה לַיהוָ֑ה נָ֝רִ֗יעָה לְצ֣וּר יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:1
Psalm 95:2Let's come before his presence with thanksgiving. Let's extol him with songs!
Psalm 95:25  נְקַדְּמָ֣ה פָנָ֣יו בְּתוֹדָ֑ה בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת נָרִ֥יעַֽ לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:2
Psalm 95:3For Yahweh is a great God, a great King above all gods.
Psalm 95:35  כִּ֤י אֵ֣ל גָּד֣וֹל יְהוָ֑ה וּמֶ֥לֶךְ גָּ֝ד֗וֹל עַל־כָּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 95:3
Psalm 95:4In his hand are the deep places of the earth. The heights of the mountains are also his.
Psalm 95:45  אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּ֭יָדוֹ מֶחְקְרֵי־אָ֑רֶץ וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת הָרִ֣ים לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:4
Psalm 95:5The sea is his, and he made it. His hands formed the dry land.
Psalm 95:55  אֲשֶׁר־ל֣וֹ הַ֭יָּם וְה֣וּא עָשָׂ֑הוּ וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת יָדָ֥יו יָצָֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:5
Psalm 95:6Oh come, let's worship and bow down. Let's kneel before Yahweh, our Maker,
Psalm 95:65  בֹּ֭אוּ נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה וְנִכְרָ֑עָה נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה לִֽפְנֵי־יְהוָ֥ה עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:6
Psalm 95:7for he is our God. We are the people of his pasture, and the sheep in his care. Today, oh that you would hear his voice!
Psalm 95:75  כִּ֘י ה֤וּא אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ עַ֣ם מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ וְצֹ֣אן יָד֑וֹ הַ֝יּ֗וֹם אִֽם־בְּקֹל֥וֹ תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 95:7
Psalm 95:8Don't harden your heart, as at Meribah, as in the day of Massah in the wilderness,
Psalm 95:85  אַל־תַּקְשׁ֣וּ לְ֭בַבְכֶם כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה כְּי֥וֹם מַ֝סָּ֗ה בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 95:8
Psalm 95:9when your fathers tempted me, tested me, and saw my work.
Psalm 95:95  אֲשֶׁ֣ר נִ֭סּוּנִי אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי גַּם־רָא֥וּ פָעֳלֽ͏ִי׃ ‬
Psalm 95:9
Psalm 95:10Forty long years I was grieved with that generation, and said, |It is a people that errs in their heart. They have not known my ways.|
Psalm 95:105  אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים שָׁנָ֨ה ׀ אָ֘ק֤וּט בְּד֗וֹר וָאֹמַ֗ר עַ֤ם תֹּעֵ֣י לֵבָ֣ב הֵ֑ם וְ֝הֵ֗ם לֹא־יָדְע֥וּ דְרָכָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 95:10
Psalm 95:11Therefore I swore in my wrath, |They won't enter into my rest.|
Psalm 95:115  אֲשֶׁר־נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי בְאַפִּ֑י אִם־יְ֝בֹא֗וּן אֶל־מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 95:11
Psalm 96:1Sing to Yahweh a new song! Sing to Yahweh, all the earth.
Psalm 96:16  שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ שִׁ֥ירוּ לַ֝יהוָ֗ה כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:1
Psalm 96:2Sing to Yahweh! Bless his name! Proclaim his salvation from day to day!
Psalm 96:26  שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהוָה בָּרֲכ֣וּ שְׁמ֑וֹ בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־לְ֝י֗וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:2
Psalm 96:3Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous works among all the peoples.
Psalm 96:36  סַפְּר֣וּ בַגּוֹיִ֣ם כְּבוֹד֑וֹ בְּכָל־הָֽ֝עַמִּ֗ים נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 96:3
Psalm 96:4For great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised! He is to be feared above all gods.
Psalm 96:46  כִּ֥י גָ֘ד֤וֹל יְהוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד נוֹרָ֥א ה֝֗וּא עַל־כָּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 96:4
Psalm 96:5For all the gods of the peoples are idols, but Yahweh made the heavens.
Psalm 96:56  כִּ֤י ׀ כָּל־אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָעַמִּ֣ים אֱלִילִ֑ים וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃ ‬
Psalm 96:5
Psalm 96:6Honor and majesty are before him. Strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
Psalm 96:66  הוֹד־וְהָדָ֥ר לְפָנָ֑יו עֹ֥ז וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:6
Psalm 96:7Ascribe to Yahweh, you families of nations, ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength.
Psalm 96:76  הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהוָה מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 96:7
Psalm 96:8Ascribe to Yahweh the glory due to his name. Bring an offering, and come into his courts.
Psalm 96:86  הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ שְׂאֽוּ־מִ֝נְחָ֗ה וּבֹ֥אוּ לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 96:8
Psalm 96:9Worship Yahweh in holy array. Tremble before him, all the earth.
Psalm 96:96  הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לַ֭יהוָה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹ֑דֶשׁ חִ֥ילוּ מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:9
Psalm 96:10Say among the nations, |Yahweh reigns.| The world is also established. It can't be moved. He will judge the peoples with equity.
Psalm 96:106  אִמְר֤וּ בַגּוֹיִ֨ם ׀ יְה֘וָ֤ה מָלָ֗ךְ אַף־תִּכּ֣וֹן תֵּ֭בֵל בַּל־תִּמּ֑וֹט יָדִ֥ין עַ֝מִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 96:10
Psalm 96:11Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice. Let the sea roar, and its fullness!
Psalm 96:116  יִשְׂמְח֣וּ הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִֽרְעַ֥ם הַ֝יָּ֗ם וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:11
Psalm 96:12Let the field and all that is in it exult! Then all the trees of the woods shall sing for joy
Psalm 96:126  יַעֲלֹ֣ז שָׂ֭דַי וְכָל־אֲשֶׁר־בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ כָּל־עֲצֵי־יָֽעַר׃ ‬
Psalm 96:12
Psalm 96:13before Yahweh; for he comes, for he comes to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness, the peoples with his truth.
Psalm 96:136  לִפְנֵ֤י יְהוָ֨ה ׀ כִּ֬י בָ֗א כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 96:13
Psalm 97:1Yahweh reigns! Let the earth rejoice! Let the multitude of islands be glad!
Psalm 97:17  יְהוָ֣ה מָ֭לָךְ תָּגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ אִיִּ֥ים רַבִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 97:1
Psalm 97:2Clouds and darkness are around him. Righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.
Psalm 97:27  עָנָ֣ן וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל סְבִיבָ֑יו צֶ֥דֶק וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט מְכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 97:2
Psalm 97:3A fire goes before him, and burns up his adversaries on every side.
Psalm 97:37  אֵ֭שׁ לְפָנָ֣יו תֵּלֵ֑ךְ וּתְלַהֵ֖ט סָבִ֣יב צָרָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 97:3
Psalm 97:4His lightning lights up the world. The earth sees, and trembles.
Psalm 97:47  הֵאִ֣ירוּ בְרָקָ֣יו תֵּבֵ֑ל רָאֲתָ֖ה וַתָּחֵ֣ל הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 97:4
Psalm 97:5The mountains melt like wax at the presence of Yahweh, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
Psalm 97:57  הָרִ֗ים כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג נָ֭מַסּוּ מִלִּפְנֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י אֲד֣וֹן כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 97:5
Psalm 97:6The heavens declare his righteousness. All the peoples have seen his glory.
Psalm 97:67  הִגִּ֣ידוּ הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם צִדְק֑וֹ וְרָא֖וּ כָל־הָעַמִּ֣ים כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 97:6
Psalm 97:7Let all them be shamed who serve engraved images, who boast in their idols. Worship him, all you gods!
Psalm 97:77  יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ ׀ כָּל־עֹ֬בְדֵי פֶ֗סֶל הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ל֝וֹ כָּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 97:7
Psalm 97:8Zion heard and was glad. The daughters of Judah rejoiced, because of your judgments, Yahweh.
Psalm 97:87  שָׁמְעָ֬ה וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח ׀ צִיּ֗וֹן וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה בְּנ֣וֹת יְהוּדָ֑ה לְמַ֖עַן מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 97:8
Psalm 97:9For you, Yahweh, are most high above all the earth. You are exalted far above all gods.
Psalm 97:97  כִּֽי־אַתָּ֤ה יְהוָ֗ה עֶלְי֥וֹן עַל־כָּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ מְאֹ֥ד נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ עַל־כָּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 97:9
Psalm 97:10You who love Yahweh, hate evil. He preserves the souls of his saints. He delivers them out of the hand of the wicked.
Psalm 97:107  אֹהֲבֵ֥י יְהוָ֗ה שִׂנְא֫וּ רָ֥ע שֹׁ֭מֵר נַפְשׁ֣וֹת חֲסִידָ֑יו מִיַּ֥ד רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יַצִּילֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 97:10
Psalm 97:11Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
Psalm 97:117  א֭וֹר זָרֻ֣עַ לַצַּדִּ֑יק וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־לֵ֥ב שִׂמְחָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 97:11
Psalm 97:12Be glad in Yahweh, you righteous people! Give thanks to his holy Name. A Psalm.
Psalm 97:127  שִׂמְח֣וּ צַ֭דִּיקִים בַּֽיהוָ֑ה וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ לְזֵ֣כֶר קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 97:12
Psalm 98:1Sing to Yahweh a new song, for he has done marvelous things! His right hand, and his holy arm, have worked salvation for him.
Psalm 98:18  מִזְמ֡וֹר שִׁ֤ירוּ לַֽיהוָ֨ה ׀ שִׁ֣יר חָ֭דָשׁ כִּֽי־נִפְלָא֣וֹת עָשָׂ֑ה הוֹשִֽׁיעָה־לּ֥וֹ יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ וּזְר֥וֹעַ קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:1
Psalm 98:2Yahweh has made known his salvation. He has openly shown his righteousness in the sight of the nations.
Psalm 98:28  הוֹדִ֣יעַ יְ֭הוָה יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ לְעֵינֵ֥י הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם גִּלָּ֥ה צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:2
Psalm 98:3He has remembered his loving kindness and his faithfulness toward the house of Israel. All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Psalm 98:38  זָ֘כַ֤ר חַסְדּ֨וֹ ׀ וֶֽאֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ לְבֵ֢ית יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל רָא֥וּ כָל־אַפְסֵי־אָ֑רֶץ אֵ֝֗ת יְשׁוּעַ֥ת אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:3
Psalm 98:4Make a joyful noise to Yahweh, all the earth! Burst out and sing for joy, yes, sing praises!
Psalm 98:48  הָרִ֣יעוּ לַֽ֭יהוָה כָּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ פִּצְח֖וּ וְרַנְּנ֣וּ וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:4
Psalm 98:5Sing praises to Yahweh with the harp, with the harp and the voice of melody.
Psalm 98:58  זַמְּר֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה בְּכִנּ֑וֹר בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר וְק֣וֹל זִמְרָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 98:5
Psalm 98:6With trumpets and sound of the ram's horn, make a joyful noise before the King, Yahweh.
Psalm 98:68  בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת וְק֣וֹל שׁוֹפָ֑ר הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ לִפְנֵ֤י ׀ הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 98:6
Psalm 98:7Let the sea roar with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
Psalm 98:78  יִרְעַ֣ם הַ֭יָּם וּמְלֹא֑וֹ תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:7
Psalm 98:8Let the rivers clap their hands. Let the mountains sing for joy together.
Psalm 98:88  נְהָר֥וֹת יִמְחֲאוּ־כָ֑ף יַ֝֗חַד הָרִ֥ים יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 98:8
Psalm 98:9Let them sing before Yahweh, for he comes to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness, and the peoples with equity.
Psalm 98:98  לִֽפְֽנֵי־יְהוָ֗ה כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 98:9
Psalm 99:1Yahweh reigns! Let the peoples tremble. He sits enthroned among the cherubim. Let the earth be moved.
Psalm 99:19  יְהוָ֣ה מָ֭לָךְ יִרְגְּז֣וּ עַמִּ֑ים יֹשֵׁ֥ב כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים תָּנ֥וּט הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 99:1
Psalm 99:2Yahweh is great in Zion. He is high above all the peoples.
Psalm 99:29  יְ֭הוָה בְּצִיּ֣וֹן גָּד֑וֹל וְרָ֥ם ה֝֗וּא עַל־כָּל־הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 99:2
Psalm 99:3Let them praise your great and awesome name. He is Holy!
Psalm 99:39  יוֹד֣וּ שִׁ֭מְךָ גָּד֥וֹל וְנוֹרָ֗א קָד֥וֹשׁ הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 99:3
Psalm 99:4The King's strength also loves justice. You do establish equity. You execute justice and righteousness in Jacob.
Psalm 99:49  וְעֹ֥ז מֶלֶךְ֮ מִשְׁפָּ֢ט אָ֫הֵ֥ב אַ֭תָּה כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ מֵישָׁרִ֑ים מִשְׁפָּ֥ט וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב ׀ אַתָּ֬ה עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ ‬
Psalm 99:4
Psalm 99:5Exalt Yahweh our God. Worship at his footstool. He is Holy!
Psalm 99:59  רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ לַהֲדֹ֥ם רַגְלָ֗יו קָד֥וֹשׁ הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 99:5
Psalm 99:6Moses and Aaron were among his priests, Samuel among those who call on his name; they called on Yahweh, and he answered them.
Psalm 99:69  מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן ׀ בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י שְׁמ֑וֹ קֹרִ֥אים אֶל־יְ֝הוָ֗ה וְה֣וּא יַעֲנֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 99:6
Psalm 99:7He spoke to them in the pillar of cloud. They kept his testimonies, the statute that he gave them.
Psalm 99:79  בְּעַמּ֣וּד עָ֭נָן יְדַבֵּ֣ר אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם שָׁמְר֥וּ עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו וְחֹ֣ק נָֽתַן־לָֽמוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 99:7
Psalm 99:8You answered them, Yahweh our God. You are a God who forgave them, although you took vengeance for their doings.
Psalm 99:89  יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ אַתָּ֢ה עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם אֵ֣ל נֹ֭שֵׂא הָיִ֣יתָ לָהֶ֑ם וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם עַל־עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 99:8
Psalm 99:9Exalt Yahweh, our God. Worship at his holy hill, for Yahweh, our God, is holy! A Psalm of thanksgiving.
Psalm 99:99  רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְ֭הִֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ לְהַ֣ר קָדְשׁ֑וֹ כִּֽי־קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 99:9
Psalm 100:1Shout for joy to Yahweh, all you lands!
Psalm 100:100 מִזְמ֥וֹר לְתוֹדָ֑ה הָרִ֥יעוּ לַ֝יהוָ֗ה כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 100:1
Psalm 100:2Serve Yahweh with gladness. Come before his presence with singing.
Psalm 100:200 עִבְד֣וּ אֶת־יְהוָ֣ה בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה בֹּ֥אוּ לְ֝פָנָ֗יו בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 100:2
Psalm 100:3Know that Yahweh, he is God. It is he who has made us, and we are his. We are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Psalm 100:300 דְּע֗וּ כִּֽי־יְהוָה֮ ה֤וּא אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים הֽוּא־עָ֭שָׂנוּ *ולא **וְל֣וֹ אֲנַ֑חְנוּ עַ֝מּ֗וֹ וְצֹ֣אן מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 100:3
Psalm 100:4Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, into his courts with praise. Give thanks to him, and bless his name.
Psalm 100:400 בֹּ֤אוּ שְׁעָרָ֨יו ׀ בְּתוֹדָ֗ה חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה הֽוֹדוּ־ל֝֗וֹ בָּרֲכ֥וּ שְׁמֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 100:4
Psalm 100:5For Yahweh is good. His loving kindness endures forever, his faithfulness to all generations. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 100:500 כִּי־ט֣וֹב יְ֭הֹוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְעַד־דֹּ֥ר וָ֝דֹ֗ר אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 100:5
Psalm 101:1I will sing of loving kindness and justice. To you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.
Psalm 101:101 לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר חֶֽסֶד־וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט אָשִׁ֑ירָה לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ ‬
Psalm 101:1
Psalm 101:2I will be careful to live a blameless life. When will you come to me? I will walk within my house with a blameless heart.
Psalm 101:201 אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה ׀ בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ תָּמִ֗ים מָ֭תַי תָּב֣וֹא אֵלָ֑י אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ בְּתָם־לְ֝בָבִ֗י בְּקֶ֣רֶב בֵּיתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 101:2
Psalm 101:3I will set no vile thing before my eyes. I hate the deeds of faithless men. They will not cling to me.
Psalm 101:301 לֹֽא־אָשִׁ֨ית ׀ לְנֶ֥גֶד עֵינַ֗י דְּֽבַר־בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל עֲשֹֽׂה־סֵטִ֥ים שָׂנֵ֑אתִי לֹ֖א יִדְבַּ֣ק בִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 101:3
Psalm 101:4A perverse heart will be far from me. I will have nothing to do with evil.
Psalm 101:401 לֵבָ֣ב עִ֭קֵּשׁ יָס֣וּר מִמֶּ֑נִּי רָ֝֗ע לֹ֣א אֵדָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 101:4
Psalm 101:5I will silence whoever secretly slanders his neighbor. I won't tolerate one who is haughty and conceited.
Psalm 101:501 *מלושני **מְלָשְׁנִ֬י בַסֵּ֨תֶר ׀ רֵעֵהוּ֮ אוֹת֢וֹ אַ֫צְמִ֥ית גְּֽבַהּ־עֵ֭ינַיִם וּרְחַ֣ב לֵבָ֑ב אֹ֝ת֗וֹ לֹ֣א אוּכָֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 101:5
Psalm 101:6My eyes will be on the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me. He who walks in a perfect way, he will serve me.
Psalm 101:601 עֵינַ֤י ׀ בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־אֶרֶץ֮ לָשֶׁ֢בֶת עִמָּ֫דִ֥י הֹ֭לֵךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ תָּמִ֑ים ה֝֗וּא יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 101:6
Psalm 101:7He who practices deceit won't dwell within my house. He who speaks falsehood won't be established before my eyes.
Psalm 101:701 לֹֽא־יֵשֵׁ֨ב ׀ בְּקֶ֥רֶב בֵּיתִי֮ עֹשֵׂ֢ה רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה דֹּבֵ֥ר שְׁקָרִ֑ים לֹֽא־יִ֝כּ֗וֹן לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 101:7
Psalm 101:8Morning by morning, I will destroy all the wicked of the land; to cut off all the workers of iniquity from Yahweh's city. A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed and pours out his complaint before Yahweh.
Psalm 101:801 לַבְּקָרִ֗ים אַצְמִ֥ית כָּל־רִשְׁעֵי־אָ֑רֶץ לְהַכְרִ֥ית מֵֽעִיר־יְ֝הוָ֗ה כָּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 101:8
Psalm 102:1Hear my prayer, Yahweh! Let my cry come to you.
Psalm 102:102 תְּ֭פִלָּה לְעָנִ֣י כִֽי־יַעֲטֹ֑ף וְלִפְנֵ֥י יְ֝הוָ֗ה יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:1
Psalm 102:2Don't hide your face from me in the day of my distress. Turn your ear to me. Answer me quickly in the day when I call.
Psalm 102:202 יְ֭הוָה שִׁמְעָ֣ה תְפִלָּתִ֑י וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י אֵלֶ֥יךָ תָבֽוֹא׃ ‬
Psalm 102:2
Psalm 102:3For my days consume away like smoke. My bones are burned as a torch.
Psalm 102:302 אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֬ר פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ מִמֶּנִּי֮ בְּי֢וֹם צַ֫ר לִ֥י הַטֵּֽה־אֵלַ֥י אָזְנֶ֑ךָ בְּי֥וֹם אֶ֝קְרָ֗א מַהֵ֥ר עֲנֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:3
Psalm 102:4My heart is blighted like grass, and withered, for I forget to eat my bread.
Psalm 102:402 כִּֽי־כָל֣וּ בְעָשָׁ֣ן יָמָ֑י וְ֝עַצְמוֹתַ֗י כְּמוֹ־קֵ֥ד נִחָֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:4
Psalm 102:5By reason of the voice of my groaning, my bones stick to my skin.
Psalm 102:502 הוּכָּֽה־כָ֭עֵשֶׂב וַיִּבַ֣שׁ לִבִּ֑י כִּֽי־שָׁ֝כַ֗חְתִּי מֵאֲכֹ֥ל לַחְמִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:5
Psalm 102:6I am like a pelican of the wilderness. I have become as an owl of the waste places.
Psalm 102:602 מִקּ֥וֹל אַנְחָתִ֑י דָּבְקָ֥ה עַ֝צְמִ֗י לִבְשָׂרִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:6
Psalm 102:7I watch, and have become like a sparrow that is alone on the housetop.
Psalm 102:702 דָּ֭מִיתִי לִקְאַ֣ת מִדְבָּ֑ר הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כְּכ֣וֹס חֳרָבֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 102:7
Psalm 102:8My enemies reproach me all day. Those who are mad at me use my name as a curse.
Psalm 102:802 שָׁקַ֥דְתִּי וָאֶֽהְיֶ֑ה כְּ֝צִפּ֗וֹר בּוֹדֵ֥ד עַל־גָּֽג׃ ‬
Psalm 102:8
Psalm 102:9For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mixed my drink with tears,
Psalm 102:902 כָּל־הַ֭יּוֹם חֵרְפ֣וּנִי אוֹיְבָ֑י מְ֝הוֹלָלַ֗י בִּ֣י נִשְׁבָּֽעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:9
Psalm 102:10Because of your indignation and your wrath, for you have taken me up, and thrown me away.
Psalm 102:1002 כִּי־אֵ֭פֶר כַּלֶּ֣חֶם אָכָ֑לְתִּי וְ֝שִׁקֻּוַ֗י בִּבְכִ֥י מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:10
Psalm 102:11My days are like a long shadow. I have withered like grass.
Psalm 102:1102 מִפְּנֵֽי־זַֽעַמְךָ֥ וְקִצְפֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י נְ֝שָׂאתַ֗נִי וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:11
Psalm 102:12But you, Yahweh, will remain forever; your renown endures to all generations.
Psalm 102:1202 יָ֭מַי כְּצֵ֣ל נָט֑וּי וַ֝אֲנִ֗י כָּעֵ֥שֶׂב אִיבָֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:12
Psalm 102:13You will arise and have mercy on Zion; for it is time to have pity on her. Yes, the set time has come.
Psalm 102:1302 וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם תֵּשֵׁ֑ב וְ֝זִכְרְךָ֗ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 102:13
Psalm 102:14For your servants take pleasure in her stones, and have pity on her dust.
Psalm 102:1402 אַתָּ֣ה תָ֭קוּם תְּרַחֵ֣ם צִיּ֑וֹן כִּי־עֵ֥ת לְ֝חֶֽנְנָ֗הּ כִּי־בָ֥א מוֹעֵֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 102:14
Psalm 102:15So the nations will fear the name of Yahweh; all the kings of the earth your glory.
Psalm 102:1502 כִּֽי־רָצ֣וּ עֲ֭בָדֶיךָ אֶת־אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ וְֽאֶת־עֲפָרָ֥הּ יְחֹנֵֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:15
Psalm 102:16For Yahweh has built up Zion. He has appeared in his glory.
Psalm 102:1602 וְיִֽירְא֣וּ ג֭וֹיִם אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה וְֽכָל־מַלְכֵ֥י הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ אֶת־כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:16
Psalm 102:17He has responded to the prayer of the destitute, and has not despised their prayer.
Psalm 102:1702 כִּֽי־בָנָ֣ה יְהוָ֣ה צִיּ֑וֹן נִ֝רְאָ֗ה בִּכְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:17
Psalm 102:18This will be written for the generation to come. A people which will be created will praise Yah.
Psalm 102:1802 פָּ֭נָה אֶל־תְּפִלַּ֣ת הָעַרְעָ֑ר וְלֹֽא־בָ֝זָ֗ה אֶת־תְּפִלָּתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 102:18
Psalm 102:19For he has looked down from the height of his sanctuary. From heaven, Yahweh saw the earth;
Psalm 102:1902 תִּכָּ֣תֶב זֹ֭את לְד֣וֹר אַחֲר֑וֹן וְעַ֥ם נִ֝בְרָ֗א יְהַלֶּל־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:19
Psalm 102:20to hear the groans of the prisoner; to free those who are condemned to death;
Psalm 102:2002 כִּֽי־הִ֭שְׁקִיף מִמְּר֣וֹם קָדְשׁ֑וֹ יְ֝הוָ֗ה מִשָּׁמַ֤יִם ׀ אֶל־אֶ֬רֶץ הִבִּֽיט׃ ‬
Psalm 102:20
Psalm 102:21that men may declare the name of Yahweh in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;
Psalm 102:2102 לִ֭שְׁמֹעַ אֶנְקַ֣ת אָסִ֑יר לְ֝פַתֵּ֗חַ בְּנֵ֣י תְמוּתָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 102:21
Psalm 102:22when the peoples are gathered together, the kingdoms, to serve Yahweh.
Psalm 102:2202 לְסַפֵּ֣ר בְּ֭צִיּוֹן שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה וּ֝תְהִלָּת֗וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלָֽ͏ִם׃ ‬
Psalm 102:22
Psalm 102:23He weakened my strength along the course. He shortened my days.
Psalm 102:2302 בְּהִקָּבֵ֣ץ עַמִּ֣ים יַחְדָּ֑ו וּ֝מַמְלָכ֗וֹת לַעֲבֹ֥ד אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 102:23
Psalm 102:24I said, |My God, don't take me away in the midst of my days. Your years are throughout all generations.
Psalm 102:2402 עִנָּ֖ה בַדֶּ֥רֶךְ *כחו **כֹּחִ֗י קִצַּ֥ר יָמָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 102:24
Psalm 102:25Of old, you laid the foundation of the earth. The heavens are the work of your hands.
Psalm 102:2502 אֹמַ֗ר אֵלִ֗י אַֽל־תַּ֭עֲלֵנִי בַּחֲצִ֣י יָמָ֑י בְּד֖וֹר דּוֹרִ֣ים שְׁנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:25
Psalm 102:26They will perish, but you will endure. Yes, all of them will wear out like a garment. You will change them like a cloak, and they will be changed.
Psalm 102:2602 לְ֭פָנִים הָאָ֣רֶץ יָסַ֑דְתָּ וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה יָדֶ֣יךָ שָׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 102:26
Psalm 102:27But you are the same. Your years will have no end.
Psalm 102:2702 הֵ֤מָּה ׀ יֹאבֵדוּ֮ וְאַתָּ֢ה תַ֫עֲמֹ֥ד וְ֭כֻלָּם כַּבֶּ֣גֶד יִבְל֑וּ כַּלְּב֖וּשׁ תַּחֲלִיפֵ֣ם וְֽיַחֲלֹֽפוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:27
Psalm 102:28The children of your servants will continue. Their seed will be established before you.| By David.
Psalm 102:2802 וְאַתָּה־ה֑וּא וּ֝שְׁנוֹתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א יִתָּֽמּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 102:28
Psalm 102:29(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 102:2902 בְּנֵֽי־עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ יִשְׁכּ֑וֹנוּ וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם לְפָנֶ֥יךָ יִכּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 102:29
Psalm 103:1Praise Yahweh, my soul! All that is within me, praise his holy name!
Psalm 103:103 לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ בָּרֲכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה וְכָל־קְ֝רָבַ֗י אֶת־שֵׁ֥ם קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:1
Psalm 103:2Praise Yahweh, my soul, and don't forget all his benefits;
Psalm 103:203 בָּרֲכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה וְאַל־תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י כָּל־גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 103:2
Psalm 103:3who forgives all your sins; who heals all your diseases;
Psalm 103:303 הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ לְכָל־עֲוֺנֵ֑כִי הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א לְכָל־תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ ‬
Psalm 103:3
Psalm 103:4who redeems your life from destruction; who crowns you with loving kindness and tender mercies;
Psalm 103:403 הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל מִשַּׁ֣חַת חַיָּ֑יְכִי הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי חֶ֣סֶד וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 103:4
Psalm 103:5who satisfies your desire with good things, so that your youth is renewed like the eagle's.
Psalm 103:503 הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע בַּטּ֣וֹב עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ ‬
Psalm 103:5
Psalm 103:6Yahweh executes righteous acts, and justice for all who are oppressed.
Psalm 103:603 עֹשֵׂ֣ה צְדָק֣וֹת יְהוָ֑ה וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים לְכָל־עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 103:6
Psalm 103:7He made known his ways to Moses, his deeds to the children of Israel.
Psalm 103:703 יוֹדִ֣יעַ דְּרָכָ֣יו לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה לִבְנֵ֥י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ ‬
Psalm 103:7
Psalm 103:8Yahweh is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and abundant in loving kindness.
Psalm 103:803 רַח֣וּם וְחַנּ֣וּן יְהוָ֑ה אֶ֖רֶךְ אַפַּ֣יִם וְרַב־חָֽסֶד׃ ‬
Psalm 103:8
Psalm 103:9He will not always accuse; neither will he stay angry forever.
Psalm 103:903 לֹֽא־לָנֶ֥צַח יָרִ֑יב וְלֹ֖א לְעוֹלָ֣ם יִטּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 103:9
Psalm 103:10He has not dealt with us according to our sins, nor repaid us for our iniquities.
Psalm 103:1003 לֹ֣א כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ עָ֣שָׂה לָ֑נוּ וְלֹ֥א כַ֝עֲוֺנֹתֵ֗ינוּ גָּמַ֥ל עָלֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:10
Psalm 103:11For as the heavens are high above the earth, so great is his loving kindness toward those who fear him.
Psalm 103:1103 כִּ֤י כִגְבֹ֣הַּ שָׁ֭מַיִם עַל־הָאָ֑רֶץ גָּבַ֥ר חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ עַל־יְרֵאָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 103:11
Psalm 103:12As far as the east is from the west, so far has he removed our transgressions from us.
Psalm 103:1203 כִּרְחֹ֣ק מִ֭זְרָח מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב הִֽרְחִ֥יק מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ אֶת־פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:12
Psalm 103:13Like a father has compassion on his children, so Yahweh has compassion on those who fear him.
Psalm 103:1303 כְּרַחֵ֣ם אָ֭ב עַל־בָּנִ֑ים רִחַ֥ם יְ֝הוָ֗ה עַל־יְרֵאָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 103:13
Psalm 103:14For he knows how we are made. He remembers that we are dust.
Psalm 103:1403 כִּי־ה֖וּא יָדַ֣ע יִצְרֵ֑נוּ זָ֝כ֗וּר כִּי־עָפָ֥ר אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:14
Psalm 103:15As for man, his days are like grass. As a flower of the field, so he flourishes.
Psalm 103:1503 אֱ֭נוֹשׁ כֶּחָצִ֣יר יָמָ֑יו כְּצִ֥יץ הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה כֵּ֣ן יָצִֽיץ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:15
Psalm 103:16For the wind passes over it, and it is gone. Its place remembers it no more.
Psalm 103:1603 כִּ֤י ר֣וּחַ עָֽבְרָה־בּ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ וְלֹא־יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ ע֣וֹד מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:16
Psalm 103:17But Yahweh's loving kindness is from everlasting to everlasting with those who fear him, his righteousness to children's children;
Psalm 103:1703 וְחֶ֤סֶד יְהוָ֨ה ׀ מֵעוֹלָ֣ם וְעַד־ע֭וֹלָם עַל־יְרֵאָ֑יו וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ לִבְנֵ֥י בָנִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 103:17
Psalm 103:18to those who keep his covenant, to those who remember to obey his precepts.
Psalm 103:1803 לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י בְרִית֑וֹ וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 103:18
Psalm 103:19Yahweh has established his throne in the heavens. His kingdom rules over all.
Psalm 103:1903 יְֽהוָ֗ה בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם הֵכִ֣ין כִּסְא֑וֹ וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ בַּכֹּ֥ל מָשָֽׁלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 103:19
Psalm 103:20Praise Yahweh, you angels of his, who are mighty in strength, who fulfill his word, obeying the voice of his word.
Psalm 103:2003 בָּרֲכ֥וּ יְהוָ֗ה מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו גִּבֹּ֣רֵי כֹ֭חַ עֹשֵׂ֣י דְבָר֑וֹ לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ בְּק֣וֹל דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:20
Psalm 103:21Praise Yahweh, all you armies of his, you servants of his, who do his pleasure.
Psalm 103:2103 בָּרֲכ֣וּ יְ֭הוָה כָּל־צְבָאָ֑יו מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו עֹשֵׂ֥י רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 103:21
Psalm 103:22Praise Yahweh, all you works of his, in all places of his dominion. Praise Yahweh, my soul!
Psalm 103:2203 בָּרֲכ֤וּ יְהוָ֨ה ׀ כָּֽל־מַעֲשָׂ֗יו בְּכָל־מְקֹמ֥וֹת מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ בָּרֲכִ֥י נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 103:22
Psalm 104:1Bless Yahweh, my soul. Yahweh, my God, you are very great. You are clothed with honor and majesty.
Psalm 104:104 בָּרֲכִ֥י נַפְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְה֫וָ֥ה יְהוָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהַי גָּדַ֣לְתָּ מְּאֹ֑ד ה֭וֹד וְהָדָ֣ר לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:1
Psalm 104:2He covers himself with light as with a garment. He stretches out the heavens like a curtain.
Psalm 104:204 עֹֽטֶה־א֭וֹר כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה נוֹטֶ֥ה שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 104:2
Psalm 104:3He lays the beams of his rooms in the waters. He makes the clouds his chariot. He walks on the wings of the wind.
Psalm 104:304 הַ֥מְקָרֶֽה בַמַּ֗יִם עֲ‍ֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו הַשָּׂם־עָבִ֥ים רְכוּב֑וֹ הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ עַל־כַּנְפֵי־רֽוּחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:3
Psalm 104:4He makes his messengers winds; his servants flames of fire.
Psalm 104:404 עֹשֶׂ֣ה מַלְאָכָ֣יו רוּח֑וֹת מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו אֵ֣שׁ לֹהֵֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 104:4
Psalm 104:5He laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be moved forever.
Psalm 104:504 יָֽסַד־אֶ֭רֶץ עַל־מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ בַּל־תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט עוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 104:5
Psalm 104:6You covered it with the deep as with a cloak. The waters stood above the mountains.
Psalm 104:604 תְּ֭הוֹם כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ כִּסִּית֑וֹ עַל־הָ֝רִ֗ים יַֽעַמְדוּ־מָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 104:6
Psalm 104:7At your rebuke they fled. At the voice of your thunder they hurried away.
Psalm 104:704 מִן־גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ יְנוּס֑וּן מִן־ק֥וֹל רַֽ֝עַמְךָ֗ יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 104:7
Psalm 104:8The mountains rose, the valleys sank down, to the place which you had assigned to them.
Psalm 104:804 יַעֲל֣וּ הָ֭רִים יֵרְד֣וּ בְקָע֑וֹת אֶל־מְ֝ק֗וֹם זֶ֤ה ׀ יָסַ֬דְתָּ לָהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 104:8
Psalm 104:9You have set a boundary that they may not pass over; that they don't turn again to cover the earth.
Psalm 104:904 גְּֽבוּל־שַׂ֭מְתָּ בַּל־יֽ͏ַעֲבֹר֑וּן בַּל־יְ֝שׁוּב֗וּן לְכַסּ֥וֹת הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:9
Psalm 104:10He sends forth springs into the valleys. They run among the mountains.
Psalm 104:1004 הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ מַ֭עְיָנִים בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים בֵּ֥ין הָ֝רִ֗ים יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 104:10
Psalm 104:11They give drink to every animal of the field. The wild donkeys quench their thirst.
Psalm 104:1104 יַ֭שְׁקוּ כָּל־חַיְת֣וֹ שָׂדָ֑י יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ פְרָאִ֣ים צְמָאָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 104:11
Psalm 104:12The birds of the sky nest by them. They sing among the branches.
Psalm 104:1204 עֲ֭לֵיהֶם עוֹף־הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן מִבֵּ֥ין עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם יִתְּנוּ־קֽוֹל׃ ‬
Psalm 104:12
Psalm 104:13He waters the mountains from his rooms. The earth is filled with the fruit of your works.
Psalm 104:1304 מַשְׁקֶ֣ה הָ֭רִים מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו מִפְּרִ֥י מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:13
Psalm 104:14He causes the grass to grow for the livestock, and plants for man to cultivate, that he may bring forth food out of the earth:
Psalm 104:1404 מַצְמִ֤יחַ חָצִ֨יר ׀ לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה וְ֭עֵשֶׂב לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת הָאָדָ֑ם לְה֥וֹצִיא לֶ֝֗חֶם מִן־הָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:14
Psalm 104:15wine that makes glad the heart of man, oil to make his face to shine, and bread that strengthens man's heart.
Psalm 104:1504 וְיַ֤יִן ׀ יְשַׂמַּ֬ח לְֽבַב־אֱנ֗וֹשׁ לְהַצְהִ֣יל פָּנִ֣ים מִשָּׁ֑מֶן וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם לְֽבַב־אֱנ֥וֹשׁ יִסְעָֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 104:15
Psalm 104:16Yahweh's trees are well watered, the cedars of Lebanon, which he has planted;
Psalm 104:1604 יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ עֲצֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה אַֽרְזֵ֥י לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן אֲשֶׁ֣ר נָטָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 104:16
Psalm 104:17where the birds make their nests. The stork makes its home in the fir trees.
Psalm 104:1704 אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֭ם צִפֳּרִ֣ים יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:17
Psalm 104:18The high mountains are for the wild goats. The rocks are a refuge for the rock badgers.
Psalm 104:1804 הָרִ֣ים הַ֭גְּבֹהִים לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים סְ֝לָעִ֗ים מַחְסֶ֥ה לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 104:18
Psalm 104:19He appointed the moon for seasons. The sun knows when to set.
Psalm 104:1904 עָשָׂ֣ה יָ֭רֵחַ לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ יָדַ֥ע מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:19
Psalm 104:20You make darkness, and it is night, in which all the animals of the forest prowl.
Psalm 104:2004 תָּֽשֶׁת־חֹ֭שֶׁךְ וִ֣יהִי לָ֑יְלָה בּֽוֹ־תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ כָּל־חַיְתוֹ־יָֽעַר׃ ‬
Psalm 104:20
Psalm 104:21The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their food from God.
Psalm 104:2104 הַ֭כְּפִירִים שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים לַטָּ֑רֶף וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ מֵאֵ֣ל אָכְלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 104:21
Psalm 104:22The sun rises, and they steal away, and lay down in their dens.
Psalm 104:2204 תִּזְרַ֣ח הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן וְאֶל־מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 104:22
Psalm 104:23Man goes forth to his work, to his labor until the evening.
Psalm 104:2304 יֵצֵ֣א אָדָ֣ם לְפָעֳל֑וֹ וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ עֲדֵי־עָֽרֶב׃ ‬
Psalm 104:23
Psalm 104:24Yahweh, how many are your works! In wisdom have you made them all. The earth is full of your riches.
Psalm 104:2404 מָֽה־רַבּ֬וּ מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ ׀ יְֽהוָ֗ה כֻּ֭לָּם בְּחָכְמָ֣ה עָשִׂ֑יתָ מָלְאָ֥ה הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:24
Psalm 104:25There is the sea, great and wide, in which are innumerable living things, both small and large animals.
Psalm 104:2504 זֶ֤ה ׀ הַיָּ֥ם גָּדוֹל֮ וּרְחַ֢ב יָ֫דָ֥יִם שָֽׁם־רֶ֭מֶשׂ וְאֵ֣ין מִסְפָּ֑ר חַיּ֥וֹת קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת עִם־גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 104:25
Psalm 104:26There the ships go, and leviathan, whom you formed to play there.
Psalm 104:2604 שָׁ֭ם אֳנִיּ֣וֹת יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן זֶֽה־יָצַ֥רְתָּ לְשַֽׂחֶק־בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:26
Psalm 104:27These all wait for you, that you may give them their food in due season.
Psalm 104:2704 כֻּ֭לָּם אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן לָתֵ֖ת אָכְלָ֣ם בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:27
Psalm 104:28You give to them; they gather. You open your hand; they are satisfied with good.
Psalm 104:2804 תִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם יִלְקֹט֑וּן תִּפְתַּ֥ח יָֽ֝דְךָ֗ יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן טֽוֹב׃ ‬
Psalm 104:28
Psalm 104:29You hide your face: they are troubled; you take away their breath: they die, and return to the dust.
Psalm 104:2904 תַּסְתִּ֥יר פָּנֶיךָ֮ יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן תֹּסֵ֣ף ר֭וּחָם יִגְוָע֑וּן וְֽאֶל־עֲפָרָ֥ם יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 104:29
Psalm 104:30You send forth your Spirit: they are created. You renew the face of the ground.
Psalm 104:3004 תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח ר֭וּחֲךָ יִבָּרֵא֑וּן וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ פְּנֵ֣י אֲדָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 104:30
Psalm 104:31Let the glory of Yahweh endure forever. Let Yahweh rejoice in his works.
Psalm 104:3104 יְהִ֤י כְב֣וֹד יְהוָ֣ה לְעוֹלָ֑ם יִשְׂמַ֖ח יְהוָ֣ה בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ ‬
Psalm 104:31
Psalm 104:32He looks at the earth, and it trembles. He touches the mountains, and they smoke.
Psalm 104:3204 הַמַּבִּ֣יט לָ֭אָרֶץ וַתִּרְעָ֑ד יִגַּ֖ע בֶּהָרִ֣ים וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:32
Psalm 104:33I will sing to Yahweh as long as I live. I will sing praise to my God while I have any being.
Psalm 104:3304 אָשִׁ֣ירָה לַיהוָ֣ה בְּחַיָּ֑י אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה לֵאלֹהַ֣י בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 104:33
Psalm 104:34Let your meditation be sweet to him. I will rejoice in Yahweh.
Psalm 104:3404 יֶעֱרַ֣ב עָלָ֣יו שִׂיחִ֑י אָ֝נֹכִ֗י אֶשְׂמַ֥ח בַּיהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 104:34
Psalm 104:35Let sinners be consumed out of the earth. Let the wicked be no more. Bless Yahweh, my soul. Praise Yah!
Psalm 104:3504 יִתַּ֤מּוּ חַטָּאִ֨ים ׀ מִן־הָאָ֡רֶץ וּרְשָׁעִ֤ים ׀ ע֤וֹד אֵינָ֗ם בָּרֲכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהוָ֗ה הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 104:35
Psalm 105:1Give thanks to Yahweh! Call on his name! Make his doings known among the peoples.
Psalm 105:105 הוֹד֣וּ לַ֭יהוָה קִרְא֣וּ בִּשְׁמ֑וֹ הוֹדִ֥יעוּ בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:1
