Psalm 105:2Sing to him, sing praises to him! Tell of all his marvelous works.
Psalm 105:205 שִֽׁירוּ־ל֭וֹ זַמְּרוּ־ל֑וֹ שִׂ֝֗יחוּ בְּכָל־נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:2
Psalm 105:3Glory in his holy name. Let the heart of those who seek Yahweh rejoice.
Psalm 105:305 הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ בְּשֵׁ֣ם קָדְשׁ֑וֹ יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח לֵ֤ב ׀ מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 105:3
Psalm 105:4Seek Yahweh and his strength. Seek his face forever more.
Psalm 105:405 דִּרְשׁ֣וּ יְהוָ֣ה וְעֻזּ֑וֹ בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ פָנָ֣יו תָּמִֽיד׃ ‬
Psalm 105:4
Psalm 105:5Remember his marvelous works that he has done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth,
Psalm 105:505 זִכְר֗וּ נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו אֲשֶׁר־עָשָׂ֑ה מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:5
Psalm 105:6you seed of Abraham, his servant, you children of Jacob, his chosen ones.
Psalm 105:605 זֶ֭רַע אַבְרָהָ֣ם עַבְדּ֑וֹ בְּנֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב בְּחִירָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:6
Psalm 105:7He is Yahweh, our God. His judgments are in all the earth.
Psalm 105:705 ה֭וּא יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ בְּכָל־הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:7
Psalm 105:8He has remembered his covenant forever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations,
Psalm 105:805 זָכַ֣ר לְעוֹלָ֣ם בְּרִית֑וֹ דָּבָ֥ר צִ֝וָּ֗ה לְאֶ֣לֶף דּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 105:8
Psalm 105:9the covenant which he made with Abraham, his oath to Isaac,
Psalm 105:905 אֲשֶׁ֣ר כָּ֭רַת אֶת־אַבְרָהָ֑ם וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃ ‬
Psalm 105:9
Psalm 105:10and confirmed the same to Jacob for a statute; to Israel for an everlasting covenant,
Psalm 105:1005 וַיַּֽעֲמִידֶ֣הָ לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב לְחֹ֑ק לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל בְּרִ֣ית עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:10
Psalm 105:11saying, |To you I will give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;|
Psalm 105:1105 לֵאמֹ֗ר לְךָ֗ אֶתֵּ֥ן אֶת־אֶֽרֶץ־כְּנָ֑עַן חֶ֝֗בֶל נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:11
Psalm 105:12when they were but a few men in number, yes, very few, and foreigners in it.
Psalm 105:1205 בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם מְתֵ֣י מִסְפָּ֑ר כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט וְגָרִ֥ים בָּֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:12
Psalm 105:13They went about from nation to nation, from one kingdom to another people.
Psalm 105:1305 וַֽ֭יִּתְהַלְּכוּ מִגּ֣וֹי אֶל־גּ֑וֹי מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה אֶל־עַ֥ם אַחֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 105:13
Psalm 105:14He allowed no one to do them wrong. Yes, he reproved kings for their sakes,
Psalm 105:1405 לֹֽא־הִנִּ֣יחַ אָדָ֣ם לְעָשְׁקָ֑ם וַיּ֖וֹכַח עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם מְלָכִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 105:14
Psalm 105:15|Don't touch my anointed ones! Do my prophets no harm!|
Psalm 105:1505 אַֽל־תִּגְּע֥וּ בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י וְ֝לִנְבִיאַי אַל־תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:15
Psalm 105:16He called for a famine on the land. He destroyed the food supplies.
Psalm 105:1605 וַיִּקְרָ֣א רָ֭עָב עַל־הָאָ֑רֶץ כָּֽל־מַטֵּה־לֶ֥חֶם שָׁבָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 105:16
Psalm 105:17He sent a man before them. Joseph was sold for a slave.
Psalm 105:1705 שָׁלַ֣ח לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם אִ֑ישׁ לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד נִמְכַּ֥ר יוֹסֵֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 105:17
Psalm 105:18They bruised his feet with shackles. His neck was locked in irons,
Psalm 105:1805 עִנּ֣וּ בַכֶּ֣בֶל *רגליו **רַגְל֑וֹ בַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל בָּ֣אָה נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:18
Psalm 105:19until the time that his word happened, and Yahweh's word proved him true.
Psalm 105:1905 עַד־עֵ֥ת בֹּֽא־דְבָר֑וֹ אִמְרַ֖ת יְהוָ֣ה צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:19
Psalm 105:20The king sent and freed him; even the ruler of peoples, and let him go free.
Psalm 105:2005 שָׁ֣לַח מֶ֭לֶךְ וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ מֹשֵׁ֥ל עַ֝מִּ֗ים וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:20
Psalm 105:21He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all of his possessions;
Psalm 105:2105 שָׂמ֣וֹ אָד֣וֹן לְבֵית֑וֹ וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל בְּכָל־קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:21
Psalm 105:22to discipline his princes at his pleasure, and to teach his elders wisdom.
Psalm 105:2205 לֶאְסֹ֣ר שָׂרָ֣יו בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ וּזְקֵנָ֥יו יְחַכֵּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:22
Psalm 105:23Israel also came into Egypt. Jacob lived in the land of Ham.
Psalm 105:2305 וַיָּבֹ֣א יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל מִצְרָ֑יִם וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב גָּ֣ר בְּאֶֽרֶץ־חָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:23
Psalm 105:24He increased his people greatly, and made them stronger than their adversaries.
Psalm 105:2405 וַיֶּ֣פֶר אֶת־עַמּ֣וֹ מְאֹ֑ד וַ֝יַּֽעֲצִמֵהוּ מִצָּרָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:24
Psalm 105:25He turned their heart to hate his people, to conspire against his servants.
Psalm 105:2505 הָפַ֣ךְ לִ֭בָּם לִשְׂנֹ֣א עַמּ֑וֹ לְ֝הִתְנַכֵּ֗ל בַּעֲבָדָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:25
Psalm 105:26He sent Moses, his servant, and Aaron, whom he had chosen.
Psalm 105:2605 שָׁ֭לַח מֹשֶׁ֣ה עַבְדּ֑וֹ אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן אֲשֶׁ֣ר בָּֽחַר־בּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:26
Psalm 105:27They performed miracles among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
Psalm 105:2705 שָֽׂמוּ־בָ֭ם דִּבְרֵ֣י אֹתוֹתָ֑יו וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:27
Psalm 105:28He sent darkness, and made it dark. They didn't rebel against his words.
Psalm 105:2805 שָׁ֣לַֽח חֹ֭שֶׁךְ וַיַּחְשִׁ֑ךְ וְלֹֽא־מָ֝ר֗וּ אֶת־*דברוו **דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:28
Psalm 105:29He turned their waters into blood, and killed their fish.
Psalm 105:2905 הָפַ֣ךְ אֶת־מֵימֵיהֶ֣ם לְדָ֑ם וַ֝יָּ֗מֶת אֶת־דְּגָתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:29
Psalm 105:30Their land swarmed with frogs, even in the rooms of their kings.
Psalm 105:3005 שָׁרַ֣ץ אַרְצָ֣ם צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:30
Psalm 105:31He spoke, and swarms of flies came, and lice in all their borders.
Psalm 105:3105 אָ֭מַר וַיָּבֹ֣א עָרֹ֑ב כִּ֝נִּ֗ים בְּכָל־גְּבוּלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:31
Psalm 105:32He gave them hail for rain, with lightning in their land.
Psalm 105:3205 נָתַ֣ן גִּשְׁמֵיהֶ֣ם בָּרָ֑ד אֵ֖שׁ לֶהָב֣וֹת בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:32
Psalm 105:33He struck their vines and also their fig trees, and shattered the trees of their country.
Psalm 105:3305 וַיַּ֣ךְ גַּ֭פְנָם וּתְאֵנָתָ֑ם וַ֝יְשַׁבֵּ֗ר עֵ֣ץ גְּבוּלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:33
Psalm 105:34He spoke, and the locusts came, and the grasshoppers, without number,
Psalm 105:3405 אָ֭מַר וַיָּבֹ֣א אַרְבֶּ֑ה וְ֝יֶ֗לֶק וְאֵ֣ין מִסְפָּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 105:34
Psalm 105:35ate up every plant in their land; and ate up the fruit of their ground.
Psalm 105:3505 וַיֹּ֣אכַל כָּל־עֵ֣שֶׂב בְּאַרְצָ֑ם וַ֝יֹּ֗אכַל פְּרִ֣י אַדְמָתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:35
Psalm 105:36He struck also all the firstborn in their land, the first fruits of all their manhood.
Psalm 105:3605 וַיַּ֣ךְ כָּל־בְּכ֣וֹר בְּאַרְצָ֑ם רֵ֝אשִׁ֗ית לְכָל־אוֹנָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:36
Psalm 105:37He brought them forth with silver and gold. There was not one feeble person among his tribes.
Psalm 105:3705 וַֽ֭יּוֹצִיאֵם בְּכֶ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב וְאֵ֖ין בִּשְׁבָטָ֣יו כּוֹשֵֽׁל׃ ‬
Psalm 105:37
Psalm 105:38Egypt was glad when they departed, for the fear of them had fallen on them.
Psalm 105:3805 שָׂמַ֣ח מִצְרַ֣יִם בְּצֵאתָ֑ם כִּֽי־נָפַ֖ל פַּחְדָּ֣ם עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:38
Psalm 105:39He spread a cloud for a covering, fire to give light in the night.
Psalm 105:3905 פָּרַ֣שׂ עָנָ֣ן לְמָסָ֑ךְ וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ לְהָאִ֥יר לָֽיְלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 105:39
Psalm 105:40They asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of the sky.
Psalm 105:4005 שָׁאַ֣ל וַיָּבֵ֣א שְׂלָ֑ו וְלֶ֥חֶם שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 105:40
Psalm 105:41He opened the rock, and waters gushed out. They ran as a river in the dry places.
Psalm 105:4105 פָּ֣תַח צ֭וּר וַיָּז֣וּבוּ מָ֑יִם הָ֝לְכ֗וּ בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת נָהָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 105:41
Psalm 105:42For he remembered his holy word, and Abraham, his servant.
Psalm 105:4205 כִּֽי־זָ֭כַר אֶת־דְּבַ֣ר קָדְשׁ֑וֹ אֶֽת־אַבְרָהָ֥ם עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:42
Psalm 105:43He brought forth his people with joy, his chosen with singing.
Psalm 105:4305 וַיּוֹצִ֣א עַמּ֣וֹ בְשָׂשׂ֑וֹן בְּ֝רִנָּ֗ה אֶת־בְּחִירָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 105:43
Psalm 105:44He gave them the lands of the nations. They took the labor of the peoples in possession,
Psalm 105:4405 וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם אַרְצ֣וֹת גּוֹיִ֑ם וַעֲמַ֖ל לְאֻמִּ֣ים יִירָֽשׁוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:44
Psalm 105:45that they might keep his statutes, and observe his laws. Praise Yah!
Psalm 105:4505 בַּעֲב֤וּר ׀ יִשְׁמְר֣וּ חֻ֭קָּיו וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו יִנְצֹ֗רוּ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 105:45
Psalm 106:1Praise Yahweh! Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 106:106 הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ ׀ הוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:1
Psalm 106:2Who can utter the mighty acts of Yahweh, or fully declare all his praise?
Psalm 106:206 מִ֗י יְ֭מַלֵּל גְּבוּר֣וֹת יְהוָ֑ה יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ כָּל־תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:2
Psalm 106:3Blessed are those who keep justice. Blessed is one who does what is right at all times.
Psalm 106:306 אַ֭שְׁרֵי שֹׁמְרֵ֣י מִשְׁפָּ֑ט עֹשֵׂ֖ה צְדָקָ֣ה בְכָל־עֵֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 106:3
Psalm 106:4Remember me, Yahweh, with the favor that you show to your people. Visit me with your salvation,
Psalm 106:406 זָכְרֵ֣נִי יְ֭הוָה בִּרְצ֣וֹן עַמֶּ֑ךָ פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:4
Psalm 106:5that I may see the prosperity of your chosen, that I may rejoice in the gladness of your nation, that I may glory with your inheritance.
Psalm 106:506 לִרְא֤וֹת ׀ בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל עִם־נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:5
Psalm 106:6We have sinned with our fathers. We have committed iniquity. We have done wickedly.
Psalm 106:606 חָטָ֥אנוּ עִם־אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:6
Psalm 106:7Our fathers didn't understand your wonders in Egypt. They didn't remember the multitude of your loving kindnesses, but were rebellious at the sea, even at the Red Sea.
Psalm 106:706 אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ בְמִצְרַ֨יִם ׀ לֹא־הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א זָ֭כְרוּ אֶת־רֹ֣ב חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ וַיַּמְר֖וּ עַל־יָ֣ם בְּיַם־סֽוּף׃ ‬
Psalm 106:7
Psalm 106:8Nevertheless he saved them for his name's sake, that he might make his mighty power known.
Psalm 106:806 וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמ֑וֹ לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ אֶת־גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:8
Psalm 106:9He rebuked the Red Sea also, and it was dried up; so he led them through the depths, as through a desert.
Psalm 106:906 וַיִּגְעַ֣ר בְּיַם־ס֭וּף וֽ͏ַיֶּחֱרָ֑ב וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 106:9
Psalm 106:10He saved them from the hand of him who hated them, and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.
Psalm 106:1006 וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם מִיַּ֣ד שׂוֹנֵ֑א וַ֝יִּגְאָלֵ֗ם מִיַּ֥ד אוֹיֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 106:10
Psalm 106:11The waters covered their adversaries. There was not one of them left.
Psalm 106:1106 וַיְכַסּוּ־מַ֥יִם צָרֵיהֶ֑ם אֶחָ֥ד מֵ֝הֶ֗ם לֹ֣א נוֹתָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 106:11
Psalm 106:12Then they believed his words. They sang his praise.
Psalm 106:1206 וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ בִדְבָרָ֑יו יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:12
Psalm 106:13They soon forgot his works. They didn't wait for his counsel,
Psalm 106:1306 מִֽ֭הֲרוּ שָׁכְח֣וּ מַעֲשָׂ֑יו לֹֽא־חִ֝כּ֗וּ לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:13
Psalm 106:14but gave in to craving in the desert, and tested God in the wasteland.
Psalm 106:1406 וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ תַ֭אֲוָה בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר וַיְנַסּוּ־אֵ֝֗ל בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 106:14
Psalm 106:15He gave them their request, but sent leanness into their soul.
Psalm 106:1506 וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח רָז֣וֹן בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:15
Psalm 106:16They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron, Yahweh's saint.
Psalm 106:1606 וַיְקַנְא֣וּ לְ֭מֹשֶׁה בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה לְ֝אַהֲרֹ֗ן קְד֣וֹשׁ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 106:16
Psalm 106:17The earth opened and swallowed up Dathan, and covered the company of Abiram.
Psalm 106:1706 תִּפְתַּח־אֶ֭רֶץ וַתִּבְלַ֣ע דָּתָ֑ן וַ֝תְּכַ֗ס עַל־עֲדַ֥ת אֲבִירָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:17
Psalm 106:18A fire was kindled in their company. The flame burned up the wicked.
Psalm 106:1806 וַתִּבְעַר־אֵ֥שׁ בַּעֲדָתָ֑ם לֶ֝הָבָ֗ה תְּלַהֵ֥ט רְשָׁעִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 106:18
Psalm 106:19They made a calf in Horeb, and worshiped a molten image.
Psalm 106:1906 יַעֲשׂוּ־עֵ֥גֶל בְּחֹרֵ֑ב וַ֝יִּשְׁתַּחֲו֗וּ לְמַסֵּכָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 106:19
Psalm 106:20Thus they exchanged their glory for an image of a bull that eats grass.
Psalm 106:2006 וַיָּמִ֥ירוּ אֶת־כְּבוֹדָ֑ם בְּתַבְנִ֥ית שׁ֝֗וֹר אֹכֵ֥ל עֵֽשֶׂב׃ ‬
Psalm 106:20
Psalm 106:21They forgot God, their Savior, who had done great things in Egypt,
Psalm 106:2106 שָׁ֭כְחוּ אֵ֣ל מוֹשִׁיעָ֑ם עֹשֶׂ֖ה גְדֹל֣וֹת בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:21
Psalm 106:22Wondrous works in the land of Ham, and awesome things by the Red Sea.
Psalm 106:2206 נִ֭פְלָאוֹת בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חָ֑ם נ֝וֹרָא֗וֹת עַל־יַם־סֽוּף׃ ‬
Psalm 106:22
Psalm 106:23Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had Moses, his chosen, not stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, so that he wouldn't destroy them.
Psalm 106:2306 וַיֹּ֗אמֶר לְֽהַשְׁמִ֫ידָ֥ם לוּלֵ֡י מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה בְחִיר֗וֹ עָמַ֣ד בַּפֶּ֣רֶץ לְפָנָ֑יו לְהָשִׁ֥יב חֲ֝מָת֗וֹ מֵֽהַשְׁחִֽית׃ ‬
Psalm 106:23
Psalm 106:24Yes, they despised the pleasant land. They didn't believe his word,
Psalm 106:2406 וַֽ֭יִּמְאֲסוּ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חֶמְדָּ֑ה לֹֽא־הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ לִדְבָרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:24
Psalm 106:25but murmured in their tents, and didn't listen to Yahweh's voice.
Psalm 106:2506 וַיֵּרָגְנ֥וּ בְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם לֹ֥א שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ בְּק֣וֹל יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 106:25
Psalm 106:26Therefore he swore to them that he would overthrow them in the wilderness,
Psalm 106:2606 וַיִּשָּׂ֣א יָד֣וֹ לָהֶ֑ם לְהַפִּ֥יל א֝וֹתָ֗ם בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 106:26
Psalm 106:27that he would overthrow their seed among the nations, and scatter them in the lands.
Psalm 106:2706 וּלְהַפִּ֣יל זַ֭רְעָם בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם וּ֝לְזָרוֹתָ֗ם בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 106:27
Psalm 106:28They joined themselves also to Baal Peor, and ate the sacrifices of the dead.
Psalm 106:2806 וַ֭יִּצָּ֣מְדוּ לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר וַ֝יֹּאכְל֗וּ זִבְחֵ֥י מֵתִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 106:28
Psalm 106:29Thus they provoked him to anger with their deeds. The plague broke in on them.
Psalm 106:2906 וַ֭יַּכְעִיסוּ בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֑ם וַתִּפְרָץ־בָּ֝֗ם מַגֵּפָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 106:29
Psalm 106:30Then Phinehas stood up, and executed judgment, so the plague was stopped.
Psalm 106:3006 וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד פִּֽ֭ינְחָס וַיְפַלֵּ֑ל וַ֝תֵּעָצַ֗ר הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 106:30
Psalm 106:31That was credited to him for righteousness, for all generations to come.
Psalm 106:3106 וַתֵּחָ֣שֶׁב ל֭וֹ לִצְדָקָ֑ה לְדֹ֥ר וָ֝דֹ֗ר עַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:31
Psalm 106:32They angered him also at the waters of Meribah, so that Moses was troubled for their sakes;
Psalm 106:3206 וַ֭יַּקְצִיפוּ עַל־מֵ֥י מְרִיבָ֑ה וַיֵּ֥רַע לְ֝מֹשֶׁ֗ה בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:32
Psalm 106:33because they were rebellious against his spirit, he spoke rashly with his lips.
Psalm 106:3306 כִּֽי־הִמְר֥וּ אֶת־רוּח֑וֹ וַ֝יְבַטֵּ֗א בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 106:33
Psalm 106:34They didn't destroy the peoples, as Yahweh commanded them,
Psalm 106:3406 לֹֽא־הִ֭שְׁמִידוּ אֶת־הָֽעַמִּ֑ים אֲשֶׁ֤ר אָמַ֖ר יְהוָ֣ה לָהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:34
Psalm 106:35but mixed themselves with the nations, and learned their works.
Psalm 106:3506 וַיִּתְעָרְב֥וּ בַגּוֹיִ֑ם וַֽ֝יִּלְמְד֗וּ מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:35
Psalm 106:36They served their idols, which became a snare to them.
Psalm 106:3606 וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ אֶת־עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם וַיִּהְי֖וּ לָהֶ֣ם לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:36
Psalm 106:37Yes, they sacrificed their sons and their daughters to demons.
Psalm 106:3706 וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ אֶת־בְּ֭נֵיהֶם וְאֶת־בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם לַשֵּֽׁדִים׃ ‬
Psalm 106:37
Psalm 106:38They shed innocent blood, even the blood of their sons and of their daughters, whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan. The land was polluted with blood.
Psalm 106:3806 וַיִּֽשְׁפְּכ֨וּ דָ֪ם נָקִ֡י דַּם־בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם אֲשֶׁ֣ר זִ֭בְּחוּ לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י כְנָ֑עַן וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ בַּדָּמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 106:38
Psalm 106:39Thus were they defiled with their works, and prostituted themselves in their deeds.
Psalm 106:3906 וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם וַ֝יִּזְנוּ֗ בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:39
Psalm 106:40Therefore Yahweh burned with anger against his people. He abhorred his inheritance.
Psalm 106:4006 וַיִּֽחַר־אַ֣ף יְהוָ֣ה בְּעַמּ֑וֹ וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב אֶת־נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:40
Psalm 106:41He gave them into the hand of the nations. Those who hated them ruled over them.
Psalm 106:4106 וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם בְּיַד־גּוֹיִ֑ם וַֽיִּמְשְׁל֥וּ בָ֝הֶ֗ם שֹׂנְאֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:41
Psalm 106:42Their enemies also oppressed them. They were brought into subjection under their hand.
Psalm 106:4206 וַיִּלְחָצ֥וּם אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם וַ֝יִּכָּנְע֗וּ תַּ֣חַת יָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:42
Psalm 106:43Many times he delivered them, but they were rebellious in their counsel, and were brought low in their iniquity.
Psalm 106:4306 פְּעָמִ֥ים רַבּ֗וֹת יַצִּ֫ילֵ֥ם וְ֭הֵמָּה יַמְר֣וּ בַעֲצָתָ֑ם וַ֝יָּמֹ֗כּוּ בַּעֲוֺנָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:43
Psalm 106:44Nevertheless he regarded their distress, when he heard their cry.
Psalm 106:4406 וַ֭יַּרְא בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שָׁמְע֗וֹ אֶת־רִנָּתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:44
Psalm 106:45He remembered for them his covenant, and repented according to the multitude of his loving kindnesses.
Psalm 106:4506 וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר לָהֶ֣ם בְּרִית֑וֹ וַ֝יִּנָּחֵ֗ם כְּרֹ֣ב *חסדו **חֲסָדָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 106:45
Psalm 106:46He made them also to be pitied by all those who carried them captive.
Psalm 106:4606 וַיִּתֵּ֣ן אוֹתָ֣ם לְרַחֲמִ֑ים לִ֝פְנֵ֗י כָּל־שׁוֹבֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 106:46
Psalm 106:47Save us, Yahweh, our God, gather us from among the nations, to give thanks to your holy name, to triumph in your praise!
Psalm 106:4706 הוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ ׀ יְה֘וָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ מִֽן־הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם לְ֭הֹדוֹת לְשֵׁ֣ם קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:47
Psalm 106:48Blessed be Yahweh, the God of Israel, from everlasting even to everlasting! Let all the people say, |Amen.| Praise Yah! BOOK V
Psalm 106:4806 בָּר֤וּךְ־יְהוָ֨ה אֱלֹהֵ֪י יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל מִן־הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם ׀ וְעַ֬ד הָעוֹלָ֗ם וְאָמַ֖ר כָּל־הָעָ֥ם אָמֵ֗ן הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 106:48
Psalm 107:1Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 107:107 הֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:1
Psalm 107:2Let the redeemed by Yahweh say so, whom he has redeemed from the hand of the adversary,
Psalm 107:207 יֹ֭אמְרוּ גְּאוּלֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר גְּ֝אָלָ֗ם מִיַּד־צָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 107:2
Psalm 107:3And gathered out of the lands, from the east and from the west, from the north and from the south.
Psalm 107:307 וּֽמֵאֲרָצ֗וֹת קִ֫בְּצָ֥ם מִמִּזְרָ֥ח וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב מִצָּפ֥וֹן וּמִיָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:3
Psalm 107:4They wandered in the wilderness in a desert way. They found no city to live in.
Psalm 107:407 תָּע֣וּ בַ֭מִּדְבָּר בִּישִׁימ֣וֹן דָּ֑רֶךְ עִ֥יר מ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב לֹ֣א מָצָֽאוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:4
Psalm 107:5Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
Psalm 107:507 רְעֵבִ֥ים גַּם־צְמֵאִ֑ים נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם בָּהֶ֥ם תִּתְעַטָּֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 107:5
Psalm 107:6Then they cried to Yahweh in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses,
Psalm 107:607 וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יַצִּילֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:6
Psalm 107:7he led them also by a straight way, that they might go to a city to live in.
Psalm 107:707 וַ֭יּֽ͏ַדְרִיכֵם בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ יְשָׁרָ֑ה לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת אֶל־עִ֥יר מוֹשָֽׁב׃ ‬
Psalm 107:7
Psalm 107:8Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Psalm 107:807 יוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:8
Psalm 107:9For he satisfies the longing soul. He fills the hungry soul with good.
Psalm 107:907 כִּי־הִ֭שְׂבִּיעַ נֶ֣פֶשׁ שֹׁקֵקָ֑ה וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ רְ֝עֵבָה מִלֵּא־טֽוֹב׃ ‬
Psalm 107:9
Psalm 107:10Some sat in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron,
Psalm 107:1007 יֹ֭שְׁבֵי חֹ֣שֶׁךְ וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת אֲסִירֵ֖י עֳנִ֣י וּבַרְזֶֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 107:10
Psalm 107:11because they rebelled against the words of God, and condemned the counsel of the Most High.
Psalm 107:1107 כִּֽי־הִמְר֥וּ אִמְרֵי־אֵ֑ל וַעֲצַ֖ת עֶלְי֣וֹן נָאָֽצוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:11
Psalm 107:12Therefore he brought down their heart with labor. They fell down, and there was none to help.
Psalm 107:1207 וַיַּכְנַ֣ע בֶּעָמָ֣ל לִבָּ֑ם כָּ֝שְׁל֗וּ וְאֵ֣ין עֹזֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 107:12
Psalm 107:13Then they cried to Yahweh in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.
Psalm 107:1307 וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:13
Psalm 107:14He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and broke their bonds in sunder.
Psalm 107:1407 יֽ֭וֹצִיאֵם מֵחֹ֣שֶׁךְ וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת וּמוֹסְר֖וֹתֵיהֶ֣ם יְנַתֵּֽק׃ ‬
Psalm 107:14
Psalm 107:15Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Psalm 107:1507 יוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:15
Psalm 107:16For he has broken the gates of brass, and cut through bars of iron.
Psalm 107:1607 כִּֽי־שִׁ֭בַּר דַּלְת֣וֹת נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וּבְרִיחֵ֖י בַרְזֶ֣ל גִּדֵּֽעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:16
Psalm 107:17Fools are afflicted because of their disobedience, and because of their iniquities.
Psalm 107:1707 אֱ֭וִלִים מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ פִּשְׁעָ֑ם וּֽ֝מֵעֲוֺֽנֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יִתְעַנּֽוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:17
Psalm 107:18Their soul abhors all kinds of food. They draw near to the gates of death.
Psalm 107:1807 כָּל־אֹ֭כֶל תְּתַעֵ֣ב נַפְשָׁ֑ם וַ֝יַּגִּ֗יעוּ עַד־שַׁ֥עֲרֵי מָֽוֶת׃ ‬
Psalm 107:18
Psalm 107:19Then they cry to Yahweh in their trouble, he saves them out of their distresses.
Psalm 107:1907 וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:19
Psalm 107:20He sends his word, and heals them, and delivers them from their graves.
Psalm 107:2007 יִשְׁלַ֣ח דְּ֭בָרוֹ וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑ם וִֽ֝ימַלֵּ֗ט מִשְּׁחִיתוֹתָֽם׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:20
Psalm 107:21Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Psalm 107:2107 יוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:21
Psalm 107:22Let them offer the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with singing.
Psalm 107:2207 וְ֭יִזְבְּחוּ זִבְחֵ֣י תוֹדָ֑ה וִֽיסַפְּר֖וּ מַעֲשָׂ֣יו בְּרִנָּֽה׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:22
Psalm 107:23Those who go down to the sea in ships, who do business in great waters;
Psalm 107:2307 יוֹרְדֵ֣י הַ֭יָּם בָּאֳנִיּ֑וֹת עֹשֵׂ֥י מְ֝לָאכָ֗ה בְּמַ֣יִם רַבִּֽים׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:23
Psalm 107:24These see Yahweh's works, and his wonders in the deep.
Psalm 107:2407 הֵ֣מָּה רָ֭אוּ מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יְהוָ֑ה וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו בִּמְצוּלָֽה׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:24
Psalm 107:25For he commands, and raises the stormy wind, which lifts up its waves.
Psalm 107:2507 וַיֹּ֗אמֶר וַֽ֭יַּעֲמֵד ר֣וּחַ סְעָרָ֑ה וַתְּרוֹמֵ֥ם גַּלָּֽיו׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:25
Psalm 107:26They mount up to the sky; they go down again to the depths. Their soul melts away because of trouble.
Psalm 107:2607 יַעֲל֣וּ שָׁ֭מַיִם יֵרְד֣וּ תְהוֹמ֑וֹת נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם בְּרָעָ֥ה תִתְמוֹגָֽג׃ ‬
Psalm 107:26
Psalm 107:27They reel back and forth, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits' end.
Psalm 107:2707 יָח֣וֹגּוּ וְ֭יָנוּעוּ כַּשִּׁכּ֑וֹר וְכָל־חָ֝כְמָתָ֗ם תִּתְבַּלָּֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 107:27
Psalm 107:28Then they cry to Yahweh in their trouble, and he brings them out of their distress.
Psalm 107:2807 וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם וּֽ֝מִמְּצֽוּקֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹצִיאֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:28
Psalm 107:29He makes the storm a calm, so that its waves are still.
Psalm 107:2907 יָקֵ֣ם סְ֭עָרָה לִדְמָמָ֑ה וַ֝יֶּחֱשׁ֗וּ גַּלֵּיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:29
Psalm 107:30Then they are glad because it is calm, so he brings them to their desired haven.
Psalm 107:3007 וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ כִֽי־יִשְׁתֹּ֑קוּ וַ֝יַּנְחֵ֗ם אֶל־מְח֥וֹז חֶפְצָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:30
Psalm 107:31Let them praise Yahweh for his loving kindness, for his wonderful works for the children of men!
Psalm 107:3107 יוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:31
Psalm 107:32Let them exalt him also in the assembly of the people, and praise him in the seat of the elders.
Psalm 107:3207 וִֽ֭ירֹמְמוּהוּ בִּקְהַל־עָ֑ם וּבְמוֹשַׁ֖ב זְקֵנִ֣ים יְהַלְלֽוּהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:32
Psalm 107:33He turns rivers into a desert, water springs into a thirsty ground,
Psalm 107:3307 יָשֵׂ֣ם נְהָר֣וֹת לְמִדְבָּ֑ר וּמֹצָ֥אֵי מַ֝֗יִם לְצִמָּאֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 107:33
Psalm 107:34and a fruitful land into a salt waste, for the wickedness of those who dwell in it.
Psalm 107:3407 אֶ֣רֶץ פְּ֭רִי לִמְלֵחָ֑ה מֵ֝רָעַ֗ת יֹ֣שְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:34
Psalm 107:35He turns a desert into a pool of water, and a dry land into water springs.
Psalm 107:3507 יָשֵׂ֣ם מִ֭דְבָּר לַֽאֲגַם־מַ֑יִם וְאֶ֥רֶץ צִ֝יָּ֗ה לְמֹצָ֥אֵי מָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 107:35
Psalm 107:36There he makes the hungry live, that they may prepare a city to live in,
Psalm 107:3607 וַיּ֣וֹשֶׁב שָׁ֣ם רְעֵבִ֑ים וַ֝יְכוֹנְנ֗וּ עִ֣יר מוֹשָֽׁב׃ ‬
Psalm 107:36
Psalm 107:37sow fields, plant vineyards, and reap the fruits of increase.
Psalm 107:3707 וַיִּזְרְע֣וּ שָׂ֭דוֹת וַיִּטְּע֣וּ כְרָמִ֑ים וַ֝יַּעֲשׂ֗וּ פְּרִ֣י תְבֽוּאָה׃ ‬
Psalm 107:37
Psalm 107:38He blesses them also, so that they are multiplied greatly. He doesn't allow their livestock to decrease.
Psalm 107:3807 וַיְבָרֲכֵ֣ם וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ מְאֹ֑ד וּ֝בְהֶמְתָּ֗ם לֹ֣א יַמְעִֽיט׃ ‬
Psalm 107:38
Psalm 107:39Again, they are diminished and bowed down through oppression, trouble, and sorrow.
Psalm 107:3907 וַיִּמְעֲט֥וּ וַיָּשֹׁ֑חוּ מֵעֹ֖צֶר רָעָ֣ה וְיָגֽוֹן׃ ‪[8]‬׆‬
Psalm 107:39
Psalm 107:40He pours contempt on princes, and causes them to wander in a trackless waste.
Psalm 107:4007 שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ בּ֭וּז עַל־נְדִיבִ֑ים וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם בְּתֹ֣הוּ לֹא־דָֽרֶךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:40
Psalm 107:41Yet he lifts the needy out of their affliction, and increases their families like a flock.
Psalm 107:4107 וַיְשַׂגֵּ֣ב אֶבְי֣וֹן מֵע֑וֹנִי וַיָּ֥שֶׂם כַּ֝צֹּ֗אן מִשְׁפָּחֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 107:41
Psalm 107:42The upright will see it, and be glad. All the wicked will shut their mouths.
Psalm 107:4207 יִרְא֣וּ יְשָׁרִ֣ים וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ וְכָל־עַ֝וְלָ֗ה קָ֣פְצָה פִּֽיהָ׃ ‬
Psalm 107:42
Psalm 107:43Whoever is wise will pay attention to these things. They will consider the loving kindnesses of Yahweh. A Song. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 107:4307 מִי־חָכָ֥ם וְיִשְׁמָר־אֵ֑לֶּה וְ֝יִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֗וּ חַֽסְדֵ֥י יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 107:43
Psalm 108:1My heart is steadfast, God. I will sing and I will make music with my soul.
Psalm 108:108 שִׁ֖יר מִזְמ֣וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 108:1
Psalm 108:2Wake up, harp and lyre! I will wake up the dawn.
Psalm 108:208 נָכ֣וֹן לִבִּ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים אָשִׁ֥ירָה וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה אַף־כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 108:2
Psalm 108:3I will give thanks to you, Yahweh, among the nations. I will sing praises to you among the peoples.
Psalm 108:308 ע֭וּרָֽה הַנֵּ֥בֶל וְכִנּ֗וֹר אָעִ֥ירָה שָּֽׁחַר׃ ‬
Psalm 108:3
Psalm 108:4For your loving kindness is great above the heavens. Your faithfulness reaches to the skies.
Psalm 108:408 אוֹדְךָ֖ בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ יְהוָ֑ה וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ בַּל־אֻמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 108:4
Psalm 108:5Be exalted, God, above the heavens! Let your glory be over all the earth.
Psalm 108:508 כִּֽי־גָד֣וֹל מֵֽעַל־שָׁמַ֣יִם חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וְֽעַד־שְׁחָקִ֥ים אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 108:5
Psalm 108:6That your beloved may be delivered, save with your right hand, and answer us.
Psalm 108:608 ר֣וּמָה עַל־שָׁמַ֣יִם אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְעַ֖ל כָּל־הָאָ֣רֶץ כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 108:6
Psalm 108:7God has spoken from his sanctuary: |In triumph, I will divide Shechem, and measure out the valley of Succoth.
Psalm 108:708 לְ֭מַעַן יֵחָלְצ֣וּן יְדִידֶ֑יךָ הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה יְמִֽינְךָ֣ וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 108:7
Psalm 108:8Gilead is mine. Manasseh is mine. Ephraim also is my helmet. Judah is my scepter.
Psalm 108:808 אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ דִּבֶּ֥ר בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ אֶעְלֹ֥זָה אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה שְׁכֶ֑ם וְעֵ֖מֶק סֻכּ֣וֹת אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 108:8
Psalm 108:9Moab is my wash pot. I will toss my sandal on Edom. I will shout over Philistia.|
Psalm 108:908 לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד ׀ לִ֤י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם מָע֣וֹז רֹאשִׁ֑י יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה מְחֹקְקִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 108:9
Psalm 108:10Who will bring me into the fortified city? Who has led me to Edom?
Psalm 108:1008 מוֹאָ֤ב ׀ סִ֬יר רַחְצִ֗י עַל־אֱ֭דוֹם אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ נַעֲלִ֑י עֲלֵֽי־פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 108:10
Psalm 108:11Haven't you rejected us, God? You don't go forth, God, with our armies.
Psalm 108:1108 מִ֣י יֹ֭בִלֵנִי עִ֣יר מִבְצָ֑ר מִ֖י נָחַ֣נִי עַד־אֱדֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 108:11
Psalm 108:12Give us help against the enemy, for the help of man is vain.
Psalm 108:1208 הֲלֹֽא־אֱלֹהִ֥ים זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ וְֽלֹא־תֵצֵ֥א אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 108:12
Psalm 108:13Through God, we will do valiantly. For it is he who will tread down our enemies. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 108:1308 הָֽבָה־לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת מִצָּ֑ר וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 108:13
Psalm 108:14(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 108:1408 בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים נַעֲשֶׂה־חָ֑יִל וְ֝ה֗וּא יָב֥וּס צָרֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 108:14
Psalm 109:1God of my praise, don't remain silent,
Psalm 109:109 לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ לְדָוִ֣ד מִזְמ֑וֹר אֱלֹהֵ֥י תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:1
Psalm 109:2for they have opened the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of deceit against me. They have spoken to me with a lying tongue.
Psalm 109:209 כִּ֤י פִ֪י רָשָׁ֡ע וּֽפִי־מִ֭רְמָה עָלַ֣י פָּתָ֑חוּ דִּבְּר֥וּ אִ֝תִּ֗י לְשׁ֣וֹן שָֽׁקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 109:2
Psalm 109:3They have also surrounded me with words of hatred, and fought against me without a cause.
Psalm 109:309 וְדִבְרֵ֣י שִׂנְאָ֣ה סְבָב֑וּנִי וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי חִנָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:3
Psalm 109:4In return for my love, they are my adversaries; but I am in prayer.
Psalm 109:409 תַּֽחַת־אַהֲבָתִ֥י יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי וַאֲנִ֥י תְפִלָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 109:4
Psalm 109:5They have rewarded me evil for good, and hatred for my love.
Psalm 109:509 וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ עָלַ֣י רָ֭עָה תַּ֣חַת טוֹבָ֑ה וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה תַּ֣חַת אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 109:5
Psalm 109:6Set a wicked man over him. Let an adversary stand at his right hand.
Psalm 109:609 הַפְקֵ֣ד עָלָ֣יו רָשָׁ֑ע וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן יַעֲמֹ֥ד עַל־יְמִינֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:6
Psalm 109:7When he is judged, let him come forth guilty. Let his prayer be turned into sin.
Psalm 109:709 בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ יֵצֵ֣א רָשָׁ֑ע וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ תִּהְיֶ֥ה לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 109:7
Psalm 109:8Let his days be few. Let another take his office.
Psalm 109:809 יִֽהְיֽוּ־יָמָ֥יו מְעַטִּ֑ים פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ יִקַּ֥ח אַחֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 109:8
Psalm 109:9Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.
Psalm 109:909 יִֽהְיוּ־בָנָ֥יו יְתוֹמִ֑ים וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ אַלְמָנָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 109:9
Psalm 109:10Let his children be wandering beggars. Let them be sought from their ruins.
Psalm 109:1009 וְנ֤וֹעַ יָנ֣וּעוּ בָנָ֣יו וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:10
Psalm 109:11Let the creditor seize all that he has. Let strangers plunder the fruit of his labor.
Psalm 109:1109 יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ נ֭וֹשֶׁה לְכָל־אֲשֶׁר־ל֑וֹ וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ זָרִ֣ים יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:11
Psalm 109:12Let there be none to extend kindness to him, neither let there be any to have pity on his fatherless children.
Psalm 109:1209 אַל־יְהִי־ל֭וֹ מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ חָ֑סֶד וְֽאַל־יְהִ֥י ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 109:12
Psalm 109:13Let his posterity be cut off. In the generation following let their name be blotted out.
Psalm 109:1309 יְהִֽי־אַחֲרִית֥וֹ לְהַכְרִ֑ית בְּד֥וֹר אַ֝חֵ֗ר יִמַּ֥ח שְׁמָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:13
Psalm 109:14Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered by Yahweh. Don't let the sin of his mother be blotted out.
Psalm 109:1409 יִזָּכֵ֤ר ׀ עֲוֺ֣ן אֲ֭בֹתָיו אֶל־יְהוָ֑ה וְחַטַּ֥את אִ֝מּ֗וֹ אַל־תִּמָּֽח׃ ‬
Psalm 109:14
Psalm 109:15Let them be before Yahweh continually, that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth;
Psalm 109:1509 יִהְי֣וּ נֶֽגֶד־יְהוָ֣ה תָּמִ֑יד וְיַכְרֵ֖ת מֵאֶ֣רֶץ זִכְרָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:15
Psalm 109:16because he didn't remember to show kindness, but persecuted the poor and needy man, the broken in heart, to kill them.
Psalm 109:1609 יַ֗עַן אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ לֹ֥א זָכַר֮ עֲשׂ֢וֹת חָ֥סֶד וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף אִישׁ־עָנִ֣י וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן וְנִכְאֵ֨ה לֵבָ֬ב לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 109:16
Psalm 109:17Yes, he loved cursing, and it came to him. He didn't delight in blessing, and it was far from him.
Psalm 109:1709 וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב קְ֭לָלָה וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ וְֽלֹא־חָפֵ֥ץ בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה וַתִּרְחַ֥ק מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:17
Psalm 109:18He clothed himself also with cursing as with his garment. It came into his inward parts like water, like oil into his bones.
Psalm 109:1809 וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ קְלָלָ֗ה כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ וַתָּבֹ֣א כַמַּ֣יִם בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 109:18
Psalm 109:19Let it be to him as the clothing with which he covers himself, for the belt that is always around him.
Psalm 109:1909 תְּהִי־ל֭וֹ כְּבֶ֣גֶד יַעְטֶ֑ה וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח תָּמִ֥יד יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:19
Psalm 109:20This is the reward of my adversaries from Yahweh, of those who speak evil against my soul.
Psalm 109:2009 זֹ֤את פְּעֻלַּ֣ת שֹׂ֭טְנַי מֵאֵ֣ת יְהוָ֑ה וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים רָ֝֗ע עַל־נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 109:20
Psalm 109:21But deal with me, Yahweh the Lord, for your name's sake, because your loving kindness is good, deliver me;
Psalm 109:2109 וְאַתָּ֤ה ׀ יְה֘וִ֤ה אֲדֹנָ֗י עֲ‍ֽשֵׂה־אִ֭תִּי לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמֶ֑ךָ כִּי־ט֥וֹב חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 109:21
Psalm 109:22for I am poor and needy. My heart is wounded within me.
Psalm 109:2209 כִּֽי־עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְי֣וֹן אָנֹ֑כִי וְ֝לִבִּ֗י חָלַ֥ל בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 109:22
Psalm 109:23I fade away like an evening shadow. I am shaken off like a locust.
Psalm 109:2309 כְּצֵל־כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 109:23
Psalm 109:24My knees are weak through fasting. My body is thin and lacks fat.
Psalm 109:2409 בִּ֭רְכַּי כָּשְׁל֣וּ מִצּ֑וֹם וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י כָּחַ֥שׁ מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 109:24
Psalm 109:25I have also become a reproach to them. When they see me, they shake their head.
Psalm 109:2509 וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ הָיִ֣יתִי חֶרְפָּ֣ה לָהֶ֑ם יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי יְנִיע֥וּן רֹאשָֽׁם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:25
Psalm 109:26Help me, Yahweh, my God. Save me according to your loving kindness;
Psalm 109:2609 עָ֭זְרֵנִי יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהָ֑י ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:26
Psalm 109:27that they may know that this is your hand; that you, Yahweh, have done it.
Psalm 109:2709 וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ כִּי־יָ֣דְךָ זֹּ֑את אַתָּ֖ה יְהוָ֣ה עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:27
Psalm 109:28They may curse, but you bless. When they arise, they will be shamed, but your servant shall rejoice.
Psalm 109:2809 יְקַֽלְלוּ־הֵמָּה֮ וְאַתָּ֢ה תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ קָ֤מוּ ׀ וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ יִשְׂמָֽח׃ ‬
Psalm 109:28
Psalm 109:29Let my adversaries be clothed with dishonor. Let them cover themselves with their own shame as with a robe.
Psalm 109:2909 יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ שׂוֹטְנַ֣י כְּלִמָּ֑ה וְיַעֲט֖וּ כַמְעִ֣יל בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 109:29
Psalm 109:30I will give great thanks to Yahweh with my mouth. Yes, I will praise him among the multitude.
Psalm 109:3009 א֘וֹדֶ֤ה יְהוָ֣ה מְאֹ֣ד בְּפִ֑י וּבְת֖וֹךְ רַבִּ֣ים אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:30
Psalm 109:31For he will stand at the right hand of the needy, to save him from those who judge his soul. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 109:3109 כִּֽי־יַ֭עֲמֹד לִימִ֣ין אֶבְי֑וֹן לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 109:31
Psalm 110:1Yahweh says to my Lord, |Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies your footstool for your feet.|
Psalm 110:110 לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר נְאֻ֤ם יְהוָ֨ה ׀ לַֽאדֹנִ֗י שֵׁ֥ב לִֽימִינִ֑י עַד־אָשִׁ֥ית אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ הֲדֹ֣ם לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 110:1
Psalm 110:2Yahweh will send forth the rod of your strength out of Zion. Rule in the midst of your enemies.
Psalm 110:210 מַטֵּֽה־עֻזְּךָ֗ יִשְׁלַ֣ח יְ֭הוָה מִצִּיּ֑וֹן רְ֝דֵ֗ה בְּקֶ֣רֶב אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 110:2
Psalm 110:3Your people offer themselves willingly in the day of your power, in holy array. Out of the womb of the morning, you have the dew of your youth.
Psalm 110:310 עַמְּךָ֣ נְדָבֹת֮ בְּי֢וֹם חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ בְּֽהַדְרֵי־קֹ֭דֶשׁ מֵרֶ֣חֶם מִשְׁחָ֑ר לְ֝ךָ֗ טַ֣ל יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 110:3
Psalm 110:4Yahweh has sworn, and will not change his mind: |You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek.|
Psalm 110:410 נִשְׁבַּ֤ע יְהוָ֨ה ׀ וְלֹ֥א יִנָּחֵ֗ם אַתָּֽה־כֹהֵ֥ן לְעוֹלָ֑ם עַל־דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י מַלְכִּי־צֶֽדֶק׃ ‬
Psalm 110:4
Psalm 110:5The Lord is at your right hand. He will crush kings in the day of his wrath.
Psalm 110:510 אֲדֹנָ֥י עַל־יְמִֽינְךָ֑ מָחַ֖ץ בְּיוֹם־אַפּ֣וֹ מְלָכִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 110:5
Psalm 110:6He will judge among the nations. He will heap up dead bodies. He will crush the ruler of the whole earth.
Psalm 110:610 יָדִ֣ין בַּ֭גּוֹיִם מָלֵ֣א גְוִיּ֑וֹת מָ֥חַץ רֹ֝֗אשׁ עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ רַבָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 110:6
Psalm 110:7He will drink of the brook in the way; therefore he will lift up his head.
Psalm 110:710 מִ֭נַּחַל בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן יָרִ֥ים רֹֽאשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 110:7
Psalm 111:1Praise Yah! I will give thanks to Yahweh with my whole heart, in the council of the upright, and in the congregation.
Psalm 111:111 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ אוֹדֶ֣ה יְ֭הוָה בְּכָל־לֵבָ֑ב בְּס֖וֹד יְשָׁרִ֣ים וְעֵדָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 111:1
Psalm 111:2Yahweh's works are great, pondered by all those who delight in them.
Psalm 111:211 גְּ֭דֹלִים מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יְהוָ֑ה דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים לְכָל־חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 111:2
Psalm 111:3His work is honor and majesty. His righteousness endures forever.
Psalm 111:311 הוֹד־וְהָדָ֥ר פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 111:3
Psalm 111:4He has caused his wonderful works to be remembered. Yahweh is gracious and merciful.
Psalm 111:411 זֵ֣כֶר עָ֭שָׂה לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו חַנּ֖וּן וְרַח֣וּם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 111:4
Psalm 111:5He has given food to those who fear him. He always remembers his covenant.
Psalm 111:511 טֶ֭רֶף נָתַ֣ן לִֽירֵאָ֑יו יִזְכֹּ֖ר לְעוֹלָ֣ם בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 111:5
Psalm 111:6He has shown his people the power of his works, in giving them the heritage of the nations.
Psalm 111:611 כֹּ֣חַ מַ֭עֲשָׂיו הִגִּ֣יד לְעַמּ֑וֹ לָתֵ֥ת לָ֝הֶ֗ם נַחֲלַ֥ת גּוֹיִֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 111:6
Psalm 111:7The works of his hands are truth and justice. All his precepts are sure.
Psalm 111:711 מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יָ֭דָיו אֱמֶ֣ת וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים כָּל־פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 111:7
Psalm 111:8They are established forever and ever. They are done in truth and uprightness.
Psalm 111:811 סְמוּכִ֣ים לָעַ֣ד לְעוֹלָ֑ם עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת וְיָשָֽׁר׃ ‬
Psalm 111:8
Psalm 111:9He has sent redemption to his people. He has ordained his covenant forever. His name is holy and awesome!
Psalm 111:911 פְּד֤וּת ׀ שָׁ֘לַ֤ח לְעַמּ֗וֹ צִוָּֽה־לְעוֹלָ֥ם בְּרִית֑וֹ קָד֖וֹשׁ וְנוֹרָ֣א שְׁמֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 111:9
Psalm 111:10The fear of Yahweh is the beginning of wisdom. All those who do his work have a good understanding. His praise endures forever!
Psalm 111:1011 רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית חָכְמָ֨ה ׀ יִרְאַ֬ת יְהוָ֗ה שֵׂ֣כֶל ט֭וֹב לְכָל־עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 111:10
Psalm 112:1Praise Yah! Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh, who delights greatly in his commandments.
Psalm 112:112 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ אַשְׁרֵי־אִ֭ישׁ יָרֵ֣א אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה בְּ֝מִצְוֺתָ֗יו חָפֵ֥ץ מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 112:1
Psalm 112:2His seed will be mighty in the land. The generation of the upright will be blessed.
Psalm 112:212 גִּבּ֣וֹר בָּ֭אָרֶץ יִהְיֶ֣ה זַרְע֑וֹ דּ֭וֹר יְשָׁרִ֣ים יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 112:2
Psalm 112:3Wealth and riches are in his house. His righteousness endures forever.
Psalm 112:312 הוֹן־וָעֹ֥שֶׁר בְּבֵית֑וֹ וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 112:3
Psalm 112:4Light dawns in the darkness for the upright, gracious, merciful, and righteous.
Psalm 112:412 זָ֘רַ֤ח בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ א֭וֹר לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים חַנּ֖וּן וְרַח֣וּם וְצַדִּֽיק׃ ‬
Psalm 112:4
Psalm 112:5It is well with the man who deals graciously and lends. He will maintain his cause in judgment.
Psalm 112:512 טֽוֹב־אִ֭ישׁ חוֹנֵ֣ן וּמַלְוֶ֑ה יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל דְּבָרָ֣יו בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 112:5
Psalm 112:6For he will never be shaken. The righteous will be remembered forever.
Psalm 112:612 כִּֽי־לְעוֹלָ֥ם לֹא־יִמּ֑וֹט לְזֵ֥כֶר ע֝וֹלָ֗ם יִהְיֶ֥ה צַדִּֽיק׃ ‬
Psalm 112:6
Psalm 112:7He will not be afraid of evil news. His heart is steadfast, trusting in Yahweh.
Psalm 112:712 מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה רָ֭עָה לֹ֣א יִירָ֑א נָכ֥וֹן לִ֝בּ֗וֹ בָּטֻ֥חַ בַּיהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 112:7
Psalm 112:8His heart is established. He will not be afraid in the end when he sees his adversaries.
Psalm 112:812 סָמ֣וּךְ לִ֭בּוֹ לֹ֣א יִירָ֑א עַ֖ד אֲשֶׁר־יִרְאֶ֣ה בְצָרָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 112:8
Psalm 112:9He has dispersed, he has given to the poor. His righteousness endures forever. His horn will be exalted with honor.
Psalm 112:912 פִּזַּ֤ר ׀ נָ֘תַ֤ן לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים צִ֭דְקָתוֹ עֹמֶ֣דֶת לָעַ֑ד קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ תָּר֥וּם בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ ‬
Psalm 112:9
Psalm 112:10The wicked will see it, and be grieved. He shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away. The desire of the wicked will perish.
Psalm 112:1012 רָ֘שָׁ֤ע יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ וְכָעָ֗ס שִׁנָּ֣יו יַחֲרֹ֣ק וְנָמָ֑ס תַּאֲוַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תֹּאבֵֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 112:10
Psalm 113:1Praise Yah! Praise, you servants of Yahweh, praise the name of Yahweh.
Psalm 113:113 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ הַ֭לְלוּ עַבְדֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה הֽ͏ַ֝לְלוּ אֶת־שֵׁ֥ם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 113:1
Psalm 113:2Blessed be the name of Yahweh, from this time forth and forevermore.
Psalm 113:213 יְהִ֤י שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֣ה מְבֹרָ֑ךְ מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 113:2
Psalm 113:3From the rising of the sun to the going down of the same, Yahweh's name is to be praised.
Psalm 113:313 מִמִּזְרַח־שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ עַד־מְבוֹא֑וֹ מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 113:3
Psalm 113:4Yahweh is high above all nations, his glory above the heavens.
Psalm 113:413 רָ֖ם עַל־כָּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ יְהוָ֑ה עַ֖ל הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 113:4
Psalm 113:5Who is like Yahweh, our God, who has his seat on high,
Psalm 113:513 מִ֭י כַּיהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ ‬
Psalm 113:5
Psalm 113:6Who stoops down to see in heaven and in the earth?
Psalm 113:613 הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י לִרְא֑וֹת בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 113:6
Psalm 113:7He raises up the poor out of the dust. Lifts up the needy from the ash heap;
Psalm 113:713 מְקִֽימִ֣י מֵעָפָ֣ר דָּ֑ל מֵֽ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת יָרִ֥ים אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 113:7
Psalm 113:8that he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.
Psalm 113:813 לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י עִם־נְדִיבִ֑ים עִ֝֗ם נְדִיבֵ֥י עַמּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 113:8
Psalm 113:9He settles the barren woman in her home, as a joyful mother of children. Praise Yah!
Psalm 113:913 מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י ׀ עֲקֶ֬רֶת הַבַּ֗יִת אֵֽם־הַבָּנִ֥ים שְׂמֵחָ֗ה הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 113:9
Psalm 114:1When Israel went forth out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of foreign language;
Psalm 114:114 בְּצֵ֣את יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם בֵּ֥ית יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב מֵעַ֥ם לֹעֵֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 114:1
Psalm 114:2Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his dominion.
Psalm 114:214 הָיְתָ֣ה יְהוּדָ֣ה לְקָדְשׁ֑וֹ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 114:2
Psalm 114:3The sea saw it, and fled. The Jordan was driven back.
Psalm 114:314 הַיָּ֣ם רָ֭אָה וַיָּנֹ֑ס הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן יִסֹּ֥ב לְאָחֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 114:3
Psalm 114:4The mountains skipped like rams, the little hills like lambs.
Psalm 114:414 הֶֽ֭הָרִים רָקְד֣וּ כְאֵילִ֑ים גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת כִּבְנֵי־צֹֽאן׃ ‬
Psalm 114:4
Psalm 114:5What was it, you sea, that you fled? You Jordan, that you turned back?
Psalm 114:514 מַה־לְּךָ֣ הַ֭יָּם כִּ֣י תָנ֑וּס הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן תִּסֹּ֥ב לְאָחֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 114:5
Psalm 114:6You mountains, that you skipped like rams; you little hills, like lambs?
Psalm 114:614 הֶֽ֭הָרִים תִּרְקְד֣וּ כְאֵילִ֑ים גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת כִּבְנֵי־צֹֽאן׃ ‬
Psalm 114:6
Psalm 114:7Tremble, you earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob,
Psalm 114:714 מִלִּפְנֵ֣י אָ֭דוֹן ח֣וּלִי אָ֑רֶץ מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י אֱל֣וֹהַּ יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 114:7
Psalm 114:8who turned the rock into a pool of water, the flint into a spring of waters.
Psalm 114:814 הַהֹפְכִ֣י הַצּ֣וּר אֲגַם־מָ֑יִם חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ לְמַעְיְנוֹ־מָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 114:8
Psalm 115:1Not to us, Yahweh, not to us, but to your name give glory, for your loving kindness, and for your truth's sake.
Psalm 115:115 לֹ֤א לָ֥נוּ יְהוָ֗ה לֹ֫א לָ֥נוּ כִּֽי־לְ֭שִׁמְךָ תֵּ֣ן כָּב֑וֹד עַל־חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ עַל־אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 115:1
Psalm 115:2Why should the nations say, |Where is their God, now?|
Psalm 115:215 לָ֭מָּה יֹאמְר֣וּ הַגּוֹיִ֑ם אַיֵּה־נָ֝֗א אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:2
Psalm 115:3But our God is in the heavens. He does whatever he pleases.
Psalm 115:315 וֵֽאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם כֹּ֭ל אֲשֶׁר־חָפֵ֣ץ עָשָֽׂה׃ ‬
Psalm 115:3
Psalm 115:4Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
Psalm 115:415 עֲ‍ֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם כֶּ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה יְדֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:4
Psalm 115:5They have mouths, but they don't speak. They have eyes, but they don't see.
Psalm 115:515 פֶּֽה־לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ עֵינַ֥יִם לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֽוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 115:5
Psalm 115:6They have ears, but they don't hear. They have noses, but they don't smell.
Psalm 115:615 אָזְנַ֣יִם לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ אַ֥ף לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יְרִיחֽוּן׃ ‬
Psalm 115:6
Psalm 115:7They have hands, but they don't feel. They have feet, but they don't walk, neither do they speak through their throat.
Psalm 115:715 יְדֵיהֶ֤ם ׀ וְלֹ֬א יְמִישׁ֗וּן רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם וְלֹ֣א יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ לֹֽא־יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:7
Psalm 115:8Those who make them will be like them; yes, everyone who trusts in them.
Psalm 115:815 כְּ֭מוֹהֶם יִהְי֣וּ עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם כֹּ֭ל אֲשֶׁר־בֹּטֵ֣חַ בָּהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:8
Psalm 115:9Israel, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.
Psalm 115:915 יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל בְּטַ֣ח בַּיהוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 115:9
Psalm 115:10House of Aaron, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.
Psalm 115:1015 בֵּ֣ית אַ֭הֲרֹן בִּטְח֣וּ בַיהוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 115:10
Psalm 115:11You who fear Yahweh, trust in Yahweh! He is their help and their shield.
Psalm 115:1115 יִרְאֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה בִּטְח֣וּ בַיהוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃ ‬
Psalm 115:11
Psalm 115:12Yahweh remembers us. He will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel. He will bless the house of Aaron.
Psalm 115:1215 יְהוָה֮ זְכָרָ֢נוּ יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ יְ֭בָרֵךְ אֶת־בֵּ֣ית יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ אֶת־בֵּ֥ית אַהֲרֹֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 115:12
Psalm 115:13He will bless those who fear Yahweh, both small and great.
Psalm 115:1315 יְ֭בָרֵךְ יִרְאֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים עִם־הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 115:13
Psalm 115:14May Yahweh increase you more and more, you and your children.
Psalm 115:1415 יֹסֵ֣ף יְהוָ֣ה עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם וְעַל־בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:14
Psalm 115:15Blessed are you by Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.
Psalm 115:1515 בְּרוּכִ֣ים אַ֭תֶּם לַיהוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 115:15
Psalm 115:16The heavens are the heavens of Yahweh; but the earth has he given to the children of men.
Psalm 115:1615 הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם שָׁ֭מַיִם לַיהוָ֑ה וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ נָתַ֥ן לִבְנֵי־אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 115:16
Psalm 115:17The dead don't praise Yah, neither any who go down into silence;
Psalm 115:1715 לֹ֣א הַ֭מֵּתִים יְהַֽלְלוּ־יָ֑הּ וְ֝לֹ֗א כָּל־יֹרְדֵ֥י דוּמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 115:17
Psalm 115:18But we will bless Yah, from this time forth and forevermore. Praise Yah!
Psalm 115:1815 וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ ׀ נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ יָ֗הּ מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה וְעַד־עוֹלָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 115:18
Psalm 116:1I love Yahweh, because he listens to my voice, and my cries for mercy.
Psalm 116:116 אָ֭הַבְתִּי כִּֽי־יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ יְהוָ֑ה אֶת־ק֝וֹלִ֗י תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:1
Psalm 116:2Because he has turned his ear to me, therefore I will call on him as long as I live.
Psalm 116:216 כִּֽי־הִטָּ֣ה אָזְנ֣וֹ לִ֑י וּבְיָמַ֥י אֶקְרָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 116:2
Psalm 116:3The cords of death surrounded me, the pains of Sheol got a hold of me. I found trouble and sorrow.
Psalm 116:316 אֲפָפ֤וּנִי ׀ חֶבְלֵי־מָ֗וֶת וּמְצָרֵ֣י שְׁא֣וֹל מְצָא֑וּנִי צָרָ֖ה וְיָג֣וֹן אֶמְצָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 116:3
Psalm 116:4Then I called on the name of Yahweh: |Yahweh, I beg you, deliver my soul.|
Psalm 116:416 וּבְשֵֽׁם־יְהוָ֥ה אֶקְרָ֑א אָנָּ֥ה יְ֝הוָ֗ה מַלְּטָ֥ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:4
Psalm 116:5Yahweh is Gracious and righteous. Yes, our God is merciful.
Psalm 116:516 חַנּ֣וּן יְהֹוָ֣ה וְצַדִּ֑יק וֵ֖אלֹהֵ֣ינוּ מְרַחֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 116:5
Psalm 116:6Yahweh preserves the simple. I was brought low, and he saved me.
Psalm 116:616 שֹׁמֵ֣ר פְּתָאיִ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה דַּ֝לּוֹתִ֗י וְלִ֣י יְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ ‬
Psalm 116:6
Psalm 116:7Return to your rest, my soul, for Yahweh has dealt bountifully with you.
Psalm 116:716 שׁוּבִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי לִמְנוּחָ֑יְכִי כִּֽי־יְ֝הוָ֗ה גָּמַ֥ל עָלָֽיְכִי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:7
Psalm 116:8For you have delivered my soul from death, my eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
Psalm 116:816 כִּ֤י חִלַּ֥צְתָּ נַפְשִׁ֗י מִ֫מָּ֥וֶת אֶת־עֵינִ֥י מִן־דִּמְעָ֑ה אֶת־רַגְלִ֥י מִדֶּֽחִי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:8
Psalm 116:9I will walk before Yahweh in the land of the living.
Psalm 116:916 אֶ֭תְהַלֵּךְ לִפְנֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה בְּ֝אַרְצ֗וֹת הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 116:9
Psalm 116:10I believed, therefore I said, |I was greatly afflicted.|
Psalm 116:1016 הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי כִּ֣י אֲדַבֵּ֑ר אֲ֝נִ֗י עָנִ֥יתִי מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 116:10
Psalm 116:11I said in my haste, |All men are liars.|
Psalm 116:1116 אֲ֭נִי אָמַ֣רְתִּי בְחָפְזִ֑י כָּֽל־הָאָדָ֥ם כֹּזֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 116:11
Psalm 116:12What will I give to Yahweh for all his benefits toward me?
Psalm 116:1216 מָֽה־אָשִׁ֥יב לַיהוָ֑ה כָּֽל־תַּגְמוּל֥וֹהִי עָלָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:12
Psalm 116:13I will take the cup of salvation, and call on the name of Yahweh.
Psalm 116:1316 כּוֹס־יְשׁוּע֥וֹת אֶשָּׂ֑א וּבְשֵׁ֖ם יְהוָ֣ה אֶקְרָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 116:13
Psalm 116:14I will pay my vows to Yahweh, yes, in the presence of all his people.
Psalm 116:1416 נְ֭דָרַי לַיהוָ֣ה אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם נֶגְדָה־נָּ֝֗א לְכָל־עַמּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 116:14
Psalm 116:15Precious in the sight of Yahweh is the death of his saints.
Psalm 116:1516 יָ֭קָר בְּעֵינֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה הַ֝מָּ֗וְתָה לַחֲסִידָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 116:15
Psalm 116:16Yahweh, truly I am your servant. I am your servant, the son of your handmaid. You have freed me from my chains.
Psalm 116:1616 אֽ͏ָנָּ֣ה יְהוָה֮ כִּֽי־אֲנִ֢י עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ אֲ‍ֽנִי־עַ֭בְדְּךָ בֶּן־אֲמָתֶ֑ךָ פִּ֝תַּ֗חְתָּ לְמוֹסֵרָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 116:16
Psalm 116:17I will offer to you the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call on the name of Yahweh.
Psalm 116:1716 לְֽךָ־אֶ֭זְבַּח זֶ֣בַח תּוֹדָ֑ה וּבְשֵׁ֖ם יְהוָ֣ה אֶקְרָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 116:17
Psalm 116:18I will pay my vows to Yahweh, yes, in the presence of all his people,
Psalm 116:1816 נְ֭דָרַי לַיהוָ֣ה אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם נֶגְדָה־נָּ֝֗א לְכָל־עַמּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 116:18
Psalm 116:19in the courts of Yahweh's house, in the midst of you, Jerusalem. Praise Yah!
Psalm 116:1916 בְּחַצְר֤וֹת ׀ בֵּ֤ית יְהוָ֗ה בְּֽת֘וֹכֵ֤כִי יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 116:19
Psalm 117:1Praise Yahweh, all you nations! Extol him, all you peoples!
Psalm 117:117 הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הוָה כָּל־גּוֹיִ֑ם שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ כָּל־הָאֻמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 117:1
Psalm 117:2For his loving kindness is great toward us. Yahweh's faithfulness endures forever. Praise Yah!
Psalm 117:217 כִּ֥י גָ֘בַ֤ר עָלֵ֨ינוּ ׀ חַסְדּ֗וֹ וֶֽאֱמֶת־יְהוָ֥ה לְעוֹלָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 117:2
Psalm 118:1Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 118:118 הוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:1
Psalm 118:2Let Israel now say that his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 118:218 יֹֽאמַר־נָ֥א יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:2
Psalm 118:3Let the house of Aaron now say that his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 118:318 יֹֽאמְרוּ־נָ֥א בֵֽית־אַהֲרֹ֑ן כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:3
Psalm 118:4Now let those who fear Yahweh say that his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 118:418 יֹֽאמְרוּ־נָ֭א יִרְאֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:4
Psalm 118:5Out of my distress, I called on Yah. Yah answered me with freedom.
Psalm 118:518 מִֽן־הַ֭מֵּצַ֥ר קָרָ֣אתִי יָּ֑הּ עָנָ֖נִי בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:5
Psalm 118:6Yahweh is on my side. I will not be afraid. What can man do to me?
Psalm 118:618 יְהוָ֣ה לִ֭י לֹ֣א אִירָ֑א מַה־יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה לִ֣י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 118:6
Psalm 118:7Yahweh is on my side among those who help me. Therefore I will look in triumph at those who hate me.
Psalm 118:718 יְהוָ֣ה לִ֭י בְּעֹזְרָ֑י וַ֝אֲנִ֗י אֶרְאֶ֥ה בְשֹׂנְאָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 118:7
Psalm 118:8It is better to take refuge in Yahweh, than to put confidence in man.
Psalm 118:818 ט֗וֹב לַחֲס֥וֹת בַּיהוָ֑ה מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ בָּאָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 118:8
Psalm 118:9It is better to take refuge in Yahweh, than to put confidence in princes.
Psalm 118:918 ט֗וֹב לַחֲס֥וֹת בַּיהוָ֑ה מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ בִּנְדִיבִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 118:9
Psalm 118:10All the nations surrounded me, but in the name of Yahweh, I cut them off.
Psalm 118:1018 כָּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם סְבָב֑וּנִי בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 118:10
Psalm 118:11They surrounded me, yes, they surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I indeed cut them off.
Psalm 118:1118 סַבּ֥וּנִי גַם־סְבָב֑וּנִי בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 118:11
Psalm 118:12They surrounded me like bees. They are quenched like the burning thorns. In the name of Yahweh I cut them off.
Psalm 118:1218 סַבּ֤וּנִי כִדְבוֹרִ֗ים דֹּ֭עֲכוּ כְּאֵ֣שׁ קוֹצִ֑ים בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 118:12
Psalm 118:13You pushed me back hard, to make me fall, but Yahweh helped me.
Psalm 118:1318 דַּחֹ֣ה דְחִיתַ֣נִי לִנְפֹּ֑ל וַ֖יהוָ֣ה עֲזָרָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 118:13
Psalm 118:14Yah is my strength and song. He has become my salvation.
Psalm 118:1418 עָזִּ֣י וְזִמְרָ֣ת יָ֑הּ וַֽיְהִי־לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 118:14
Psalm 118:15The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tents of the righteous. |The right hand of Yahweh does valiantly.
Psalm 118:1518 ק֤וֹל ׀ רִנָּ֬ה וִֽישׁוּעָ֗ה בְּאָהֳלֵ֥י צַדִּיקִ֑ים יְמִ֥ין יְ֝הוָה עֹ֣שָׂה חָֽיִל׃ ‬
Psalm 118:15
Psalm 118:16The right hand of Yahweh is exalted! The right hand of Yahweh does valiantly!|
Psalm 118:1618 יְמִ֣ין יְ֭הוָה רוֹמֵמָ֑ה יְמִ֥ין יְ֝הוָה עֹ֣שָׂה חָֽיִל׃ ‬
Psalm 118:16
Psalm 118:17I will not die, but live, and declare Yah's works.
Psalm 118:1718 לֹֽא אָמ֥וּת כִּי־אֶֽחְיֶ֑ה וַ֝אֲסַפֵּ֗ר מַֽעֲשֵׂ֥י יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:17
Psalm 118:18Yah has punished me severely, but he has not given me over to death.
Psalm 118:1818 יַסֹּ֣ר יִסְּרַ֣נִּי יָּ֑הּ וְ֝לַמָּ֗וֶת לֹ֣א נְתָנָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 118:18
Psalm 118:19Open to me the gates of righteousness. I will enter into them. I will give thanks to Yah.
Psalm 118:1918 פִּתְחוּ־לִ֥י שַׁעֲרֵי־צֶ֑דֶק אָֽבֹא־בָ֝ם אוֹדֶ֥ה יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:19
Psalm 118:20This is the gate of Yahweh; the righteous will enter into it.
Psalm 118:2018 זֶֽה־הַשַּׁ֥עַר לַיהוָ֑ה צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים יָבֹ֥אוּ בֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:20
Psalm 118:21I will give thanks to you, for you have answered me, and have become my salvation.
Psalm 118:2118 א֭וֹדְךָ כִּ֣י עֲנִיתָ֑נִי וַתְּהִי־לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 118:21
Psalm 118:22The stone which the builders rejected has become the head of the corner.
Psalm 118:2218 אֶ֭בֶן מָאֲס֣וּ הַבּוֹנִ֑ים הָ֝יְתָ֗ה לְרֹ֣אשׁ פִּנָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 118:22
Psalm 118:23This is Yahweh's doing. It is marvelous in our eyes.
Psalm 118:2318 מֵאֵ֣ת יְ֭הוָה הָ֣יְתָה זֹּ֑את הִ֖יא נִפְלָ֣את בְּעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:23
Psalm 118:24This is the day that Yahweh has made. We will rejoice and be glad in it!
Psalm 118:2418 זֶה־הַ֭יּוֹם עָשָׂ֣ה יְהוָ֑ה נָגִ֖ילָה וְנִשְׂמְחָ֣ה בֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:24
Psalm 118:25Save us now, we beg you, Yahweh! Yahweh, we beg you, send prosperity now.
Psalm 118:2518 אָנָּ֣א יְ֭הוָה הוֹשִׁ֘יעָ֥ה נָּ֑א אָֽנָּ֥א יְ֝הוָ֗ה הַצְלִ֘יחָ֥ה נָּֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 118:25
Psalm 118:26Blessed is he who comes in the name of Yahweh! We have blessed you out of the house of Yahweh.
Psalm 118:2618 בָּר֣וּךְ הַ֭בָּא בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה בֵּ֝רַֽכְנוּכֶ֗ם מִבֵּ֥ית יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 118:26
Psalm 118:27Yahweh is God, and he has given us light. Bind the sacrifice with cords, even to the horns of the altar.
Psalm 118:2718 אֵ֤ל ׀ יְהוָה֮ וַיָּ֢אֶר לָ֥נוּ אִסְרוּ־חַ֥ג בַּעֲבֹתִ֑ים עַד־קַ֝רְנ֗וֹת הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:27
Psalm 118:28You are my God, and I will give thanks to you. You are my God, I will exalt you.
Psalm 118:2818 אֵלִ֣י אַתָּ֣ה וְאוֹדֶ֑ךָּ אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אֲרוֹמְמֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:28
Psalm 118:29Oh give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loving kindness endures forever. ALEPH
Psalm 118:2918 הוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 118:29
Psalm 119:1Blessed are those whose ways are blameless, who walk according to Yahweh's law.
Psalm 119:119 אַשְׁרֵ֥י תְמִֽימֵי־דָ֑רֶךְ הַֽ֝הֹלְכִ֗ים בְּתוֹרַ֥ת יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 119:1
Psalm 119:2Blessed are those who keep his statutes, who seek him with their whole heart.
Psalm 119:219 אַ֭שְׁרֵי נֹצְרֵ֥י עֵדֹתָ֗יו בְּכָל־לֵ֥ב יִדְרְשֽׁוּהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:2
Psalm 119:3Yes, they do nothing wrong. They walk in his ways.
Psalm 119:319 אַ֭ף לֹֽא־פָעֲל֣וּ עַוְלָ֑ה בִּדְרָכָ֥יו הָלָֽכוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:3
Psalm 119:4You have commanded your precepts, that we should fully obey them.
Psalm 119:419 אַ֭תָּה צִוִּ֥יתָה פִקֻּדֶ֗יךָ לִשְׁמֹ֥ר מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:4
Psalm 119:5Oh that my ways were steadfast to obey your statutes!
Psalm 119:519 אַ֭חֲלַי יִכֹּ֥נוּ דְרָכָ֗י לִשְׁמֹ֥ר חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:5
Psalm 119:6Then I wouldn't be disappointed, when I consider all of your commandments.
Psalm 119:619 אָ֥ז לֹא־אֵב֑וֹשׁ בְּ֝הַבִּיטִ֗י אֶל־כָּל־מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:6
Psalm 119:7I will give thanks to you with uprightness of heart, when I learn your righteous judgments.
Psalm 119:719 א֭וֹדְךָ בְּיֹ֣שֶׁר לֵבָ֑ב בְּ֝לָמְדִ֗י מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:7
Psalm 119:8I will observe your statutes. Don't utterly forsake me. BET
Psalm 119:819 אֶת־חֻקֶּ֥יךָ אֶשְׁמֹ֑ר אַֽל־תַּעַזְבֵ֥נִי עַד־מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:8
Psalm 119:9How can a young man keep his way pure? By living according to your word.
Psalm 119:919 בַּמֶּ֣ה יְזַכֶּה־נַּ֭עַר אֶת־אָרְח֑וֹ לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:9
Psalm 119:10With my whole heart, I have sought you. Don't let me wander from your commandments.
Psalm 119:1019 בְּכָל־לִבִּ֥י דְרַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ אַל־תַּ֝שְׁגֵּ֗נִי מִמִּצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:10
Psalm 119:11I have hidden your word in my heart, that I might not sin against you.
Psalm 119:1119 בְּ֭לִבִּי צָפַ֣נְתִּי אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ לְ֝מַ֗עַן לֹ֣א אֶֽחֱטָא־לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:11
Psalm 119:12Blessed are you, Yahweh. Teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:1219 בָּר֖וּךְ אַתָּ֥ה יְהוָ֗ה לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:12
Psalm 119:13With my lips, I have declared all the ordinances of your mouth.
Psalm 119:1319 בִּשְׂפָתַ֥י סִפַּ֑רְתִּי כֹּ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:13
Psalm 119:14I have rejoiced in the way of your testimonies, as much as in all riches.
Psalm 119:1419 בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ עֵדְוֺתֶ֥יךָ שַׂ֗שְׂתִּי כְּעַ֣ל כָּל־הֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 119:14
Psalm 119:15I will meditate on your precepts, and consider your ways.
Psalm 119:1519 בְּפִקֻּדֶ֥יךָ אָשִׂ֑יחָה וְ֝אַבִּ֗יטָה אֹרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:15
Psalm 119:16I will delight myself in your statutes. I will not forget your word. GIMEL
Psalm 119:1619 בְּחֻקֹּתֶ֥יךָ אֶֽשְׁתַּעֲשָׁ֑ע לֹ֭א אֶשְׁכַּ֣ח דְּבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:16
Psalm 119:17Do good to your servant. I will live and I will obey your word.
Psalm 119:1719 גְּמֹ֖ל עַֽל־עַבְדְּךָ֥ אֶֽחְיֶ֗ה וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה דְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:17
Psalm 119:18Open my eyes, that I may see wondrous things out of your law.
Psalm 119:1819 גַּל־עֵינַ֥י וְאַבִּ֑יטָה נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת מִתּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:18
Psalm 119:19I am a stranger on the earth. Don't hide your commandments from me.
Psalm 119:1919 גֵּ֣ר אָנֹכִ֣י בָאָ֑רֶץ אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֥ר מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:19
Psalm 119:20My soul is consumed with longing for your ordinances at all times.
Psalm 119:2019 גָּרְסָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֣י לְתַאֲבָ֑ה אֶֽל־מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ בְכָל־עֵֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 119:20
Psalm 119:21You have rebuked the proud who are cursed, who wander from your commandments.
Psalm 119:2119 גָּ֭עַרְתָּ זֵדִ֣ים אֲרוּרִ֑ים הַ֝שֹּׁגִים מִמִּצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:21
Psalm 119:22Take reproach and contempt away from me, for I have kept your statutes.
Psalm 119:2219 גַּ֣ל מֵֽ֭עָלַי חֶרְפָּ֣ה וָב֑וּז כִּ֖י עֵדֹתֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:22
Psalm 119:23Though princes sit and slander me, your servant will meditate on your statutes.
Psalm 119:2319 גַּ֤ם יָֽשְׁב֣וּ שָׂ֭רִים בִּ֣י נִדְבָּ֑רוּ עַ֝בְדְּךָ֗ יָשִׂ֥יחַ בְּחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:23
Psalm 119:24Indeed your statutes are my delight, and my counselors. DALED
Psalm 119:2419 גַּֽם־עֵ֭דֹתֶיךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֗י אַנְשֵׁ֥י עֲצָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:24
Psalm 119:25My soul is laid low in the dust. Revive me according to your word!
Psalm 119:2519 דָּֽבְקָ֣ה לֶעָפָ֣ר נַפְשִׁ֑י חַ֝יֵּ֗נִי כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:25
Psalm 119:26I declared my ways, and you answered me. Teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:2619 דְּרָכַ֣י סִ֭פַּרְתִּי וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֗נִי לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:26
Psalm 119:27Let me understand the teaching of your precepts! Then I will meditate on your wondrous works.
Psalm 119:2719 דֶּֽרֶךְ־פִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ הֲבִינֵ֑נִי וְ֝אָשִׂ֗יחָה בְּנִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:27
Psalm 119:28My soul is weary with sorrow: strengthen me according to your word.
Psalm 119:2819 דָּלְפָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִתּוּגָ֑ה קַ֝יְּמֵ֗נִי כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:28
Psalm 119:29Keep me from the way of deceit. Grant me your law graciously!
Psalm 119:2919 דֶּֽרֶךְ־שֶׁ֭קֶר הָסֵ֣ר מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ חָנֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:29
Psalm 119:30I have chosen the way of truth. I have set your ordinances before me.
Psalm 119:3019 דֶּֽרֶךְ־אֱמוּנָ֥ה בָחָ֑רְתִּי מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ שִׁוִּֽיתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:30
Psalm 119:31I cling to your statutes, Yahweh. Don't let me be disappointed.
Psalm 119:3119 דָּבַ֥קְתִּי בְעֵֽדְוֺתֶ֑יךָ יְ֝הוָ֗ה אַל־תְּבִישֵֽׁנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:31
Psalm 119:32I run in the path of your commandments, for you have set my heart free. HEY
Psalm 119:3219 דֶּֽרֶךְ־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אָר֑וּץ כִּ֖י תַרְחִ֣יב לִבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:32
Psalm 119:33Teach me, Yahweh, the way of your statutes. I will keep them to the end.
Psalm 119:3319 הוֹרֵ֣נִי יְ֭הוָה דֶּ֥רֶךְ חֻקֶּ֗יךָ וְאֶצְּרֶ֥נָּה עֵֽקֶב׃ ‬
Psalm 119:33
Psalm 119:34Give me understanding, and I will keep your law. Yes, I will obey it with my whole heart.
Psalm 119:3419 הֲ֭בִינֵנִי וְאֶצְּרָ֥ה תֽוֹרָתֶ֗ךָ וְאֶשְׁמְרֶ֥נָּה בְכָל־לֵֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 119:34
Psalm 119:35Direct me in the path of your commandments, for I delight in them.
Psalm 119:3519 הַ֭דְרִיכֵנִי בִּנְתִ֣יב מִצְוֺתֶ֑יךָ כִּי־ב֥וֹ חָפָֽצְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:35
Psalm 119:36Turn my heart toward your statutes, not toward selfish gain.
Psalm 119:3619 הַט־לִ֭בִּי אֶל־עֵדְוֺתֶ֗יךָ וְאַ֣ל אֶל־בָּֽצַע׃ ‬
Psalm 119:36
Psalm 119:37Turn my eyes away from looking at worthless things. Revive me in your ways.
Psalm 119:3719 הַעֲבֵ֣ר עֵ֭ינַי מֵרְא֣וֹת שָׁ֑וְא בִּדְרָכֶ֥ךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:37
Psalm 119:38Fulfill your promise to your servant, that you may be feared.
Psalm 119:3819 הָקֵ֣ם לְ֭עַבְדְּךָ אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר לְיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:38
Psalm 119:39Take away my disgrace that I dread, for your ordinances are good.
Psalm 119:3919 הַעֲבֵ֣ר חֶ֭רְפָּתִי אֲשֶׁ֣ר יָגֹ֑רְתִּי כִּ֖י מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ טוֹבִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 119:39
Psalm 119:40Behold, I long for your precepts! Revive me in your righteousness. WAW
Psalm 119:4019 הִ֭נֵּה תָּאַ֣בְתִּי לְפִקֻּדֶ֑יךָ בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:40
Psalm 119:41Let your loving kindness also come to me, Yahweh, your salvation, according to your word.
Psalm 119:4119 וִֽיבֹאֻ֣נִי חֲסָדֶ֣ךָ יְהוָ֑ה תְּ֝שֽׁוּעָתְךָ֗ כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:41
Psalm 119:42So I will have an answer for him who reproaches me, for I trust in your word.
Psalm 119:4219 וְאֶֽעֱנֶ֣ה חֹרְפִ֣י דָבָ֑ר כִּֽי־בָ֝טַחְתִּי בִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:42
Psalm 119:43Don't snatch the word of truth out of my mouth, for I put my hope in your ordinances.
Psalm 119:4319 וְֽאַל־תַּצֵּ֬ל מִפִּ֣י דְבַר־אֱמֶ֣ת עַד־מְאֹ֑ד כִּ֖י לְמִשְׁפָּטֶ֣ךָ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:43
Psalm 119:44So I will obey your law continually, forever and ever.
Psalm 119:4419 וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֖ה תוֹרָתְךָ֥ תָמִ֗יד לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:44
Psalm 119:45I will walk in liberty, for I have sought your precepts.
Psalm 119:4519 וְאֶתְהַלְּכָ֥ה בָרְחָבָ֑ה כִּ֖י פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:45
Psalm 119:46I will also speak of your statutes before kings, and will not be disappointed.
Psalm 119:4619 וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה בְ֭עֵדֹתֶיךָ נֶ֥גֶד מְלָכִ֗ים וְלֹ֣א אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:46
Psalm 119:47I will delight myself in your commandments, because I love them.
Psalm 119:4719 וְאֶשְׁתַּֽעֲשַׁ֥ע בְּמִצְוֺתֶ֗יךָ אֲשֶׁ֣ר אָהָֽבְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:47
Psalm 119:48I reach out my hands for your commandments, which I love. I will meditate on your statutes. ZAYIN
Psalm 119:4819 וְאֶשָּֽׂא־כַפַּ֗י אֶֽל־מִ֭צְוֺתֶיךָ אֲשֶׁ֥ר אָהָ֗בְתִּי וְאָשִׂ֥יחָה בְחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:48
Psalm 119:49Remember your word to your servant, because you gave me hope.
Psalm 119:4919 זְכֹר־דָּבָ֥ר לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ עַ֝֗ל אֲשֶׁ֣ר יִֽחַלְתָּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:49
Psalm 119:50This is my comfort in my affliction, for your word has revived me.
Psalm 119:5019 זֹ֣את נֶחָמָתִ֣י בְעָנְיִ֑י כִּ֖י אִמְרָתְךָ֣ חִיָּֽתְנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:50
Psalm 119:51The arrogant mock me excessively, but I don't swerve from your law.
Psalm 119:5119 זֵ֭דִים הֱלִיצֻ֣נִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד מִ֝תּֽוֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א נָטִֽיתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:51
Psalm 119:52I remember your ordinances of old, Yahweh, and have comforted myself.
Psalm 119:5219 זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי מִשְׁפָּטֶ֖יךָ מֵעוֹלָ֥ם ׀ יְהוָ֗ה וָֽאֶתְנֶחָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 119:52
Psalm 119:53Indignation has taken hold on me, because of the wicked who forsake your law.
Psalm 119:5319 זַלְעָפָ֣ה אֲ֭חָזַתְנִי מֵרְשָׁעִ֑ים עֹ֝זְבֵ֗י תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:53
Psalm 119:54Your statutes have been my songs, in the house where I live.
Psalm 119:5419 זְ֭מִרוֹת הָֽיוּ־לִ֥י חֻקֶּ֗יךָ בְּבֵ֣ית מְגוּרָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:54
Psalm 119:55I have remembered your name, Yahweh, in the night, and I obey your law.
Psalm 119:5519 זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי בַלַּ֣יְלָה שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהוָ֑ה וָֽ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:55
Psalm 119:56This is my way, that I keep your precepts. CHET
Psalm 119:5619 זֹ֥את הָֽיְתָה־לִּ֑י כִּ֖י פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:56
Psalm 119:57Yahweh is my portion. I promised to obey your words.
Psalm 119:5719 חֶלְקִ֖י יְהוָ֥ה אָמַ֗רְתִּי לִשְׁמֹ֥ר דְּבָרֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:57
Psalm 119:58I sought your favor with my whole heart. Be merciful to me according to your word.
Psalm 119:5819 חִלִּ֣יתִי פָנֶ֣יךָ בְכָל־לֵ֑ב חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:58
Psalm 119:59I considered my ways, and turned my steps to your statutes.
Psalm 119:5919 חִשַּׁ֥בְתִּי דְרָכָ֑י וָאָשִׁ֥יבָה רַ֝גְלַ֗י אֶל־עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:59
Psalm 119:60I will hurry, and not delay, to obey your commandments.
Psalm 119:6019 חַ֭שְׁתִּי וְלֹ֣א הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְתִּי לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:60
Psalm 119:61The ropes of the wicked bind me, but I won't forget your law.
Psalm 119:6119 חֶבְלֵ֣י רְשָׁעִ֣ים עִוְּדֻ֑נִי תּֽ֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:61
Psalm 119:62At midnight I will rise to give thanks to you, because of your righteous ordinances.
Psalm 119:6219 חֲצֽוֹת־לַ֗יְלָה אָ֭קוּם לְהוֹד֣וֹת לָ֑ךְ עַ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:62
Psalm 119:63I am a friend of all those who fear you, of those who observe your precepts.
Psalm 119:6319 חָבֵ֣ר אָ֭נִי לְכָל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר יְרֵא֑וּךָ וּ֝לְשֹׁמְרֵ֗י פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:63
Psalm 119:64The earth is full of your loving kindness, Yahweh. Teach me your statutes. TET
Psalm 119:6419 חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְ֭הוָה מָלְאָ֥ה הָאָ֗רֶץ חֻקֶּ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:64
Psalm 119:65Do good to your servant, according to your word, Yahweh.
Psalm 119:6519 ט֭וֹב עָשִׂ֣יתָ עִֽם־עַבְדְּךָ֑ יְ֝הוָ֗ה כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:65
Psalm 119:66Teach me good judgment and knowledge, for I believe in your commandments.
Psalm 119:6619 ט֤וּב טַ֣עַם וָדַ֣עַת לַמְּדֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י בְמִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ הֶאֱמָֽנְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:66
Psalm 119:67Before I was afflicted, I went astray; but now I observe your word.
Psalm 119:6719 טֶ֣רֶם אֶ֭עֱנֶה אֲנִ֣י שֹׁגֵ֑ג וְ֝עַתָּ֗ה אִמְרָתְךָ֥ שָׁמָֽרְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:67
Psalm 119:68You are good, and do good. Teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:6819 טוֹב־אַתָּ֥ה וּמֵטִ֗יב לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:68
Psalm 119:69The proud have smeared a lie upon me. With my whole heart, I will keep your precepts.
Psalm 119:6919 טָפְל֬וּ עָלַ֣י שֶׁ֣קֶר זֵדִ֑ים אֲ֝נִ֗י בְּכָל־לֵ֤ב ׀ אֱצֹּ֬ר פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:69
Psalm 119:70Their heart is as callous as the fat, but I delight in your law.
Psalm 119:7019 טָפַ֣שׁ כַּחֵ֣לֶב לִבָּ֑ם אֲ֝נִ֗י תּוֹרָתְךָ֥ שִֽׁעֲשָֽׁעְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:70
Psalm 119:71It is good for me that I have been afflicted, that I may learn your statutes.
Psalm 119:7119 טֽוֹב־לִ֥י כִֽי־עֻנֵּ֑יתִי לְ֝מַ֗עַן אֶלְמַ֥ד חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:71
Psalm 119:72The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of pieces of gold and silver. YUD
Psalm 119:7219 טֽוֹב־לִ֥י תֽוֹרַת־פִּ֑יךָ מֵ֝אַלְפֵ֗י זָהָ֥ב וָכָֽסֶף׃ ‬
Psalm 119:72
Psalm 119:73Your hands have made me and formed me. Give me understanding, that I may learn your commandments.
Psalm 119:7319 יָדֶ֣יךָ עָ֭שׂוּנִי וַֽיְכוֹנְנ֑וּנִי הֲ֝בִינֵ֗נִי וְאֶלְמְדָ֥ה מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:73
Psalm 119:74Those who fear you will see me and be glad, because I have put my hope in your word.
Psalm 119:7419 יְ֭רֵאֶיךָ יִרְא֣וּנִי וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ כִּ֖י לִדְבָרְךָ֣ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:74
Psalm 119:75Yahweh, I know that your judgments are righteous, that in faithfulness you have afflicted me.
Psalm 119:7519 יָדַ֣עְתִּי יְ֭הוָה כִּי־צֶ֣דֶק מִשְׁפָּטֶ֑יךָ וֶ֝אֱמוּנָ֗ה עִנִּיתָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:75
Psalm 119:76Please let your loving kindness be for my comfort, according to your word to your servant.
Psalm 119:7619 יְהִי־נָ֣א חַסְדְּךָ֣ לְנַחֲמֵ֑נִי כְּאִמְרָתְךָ֥ לְעַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:76
Psalm 119:77Let your tender mercies come to me, that I may live; for your law is my delight.
Psalm 119:7719 יְבֹא֣וּנִי רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ וְאֶֽחְיֶ֑ה כִּי־תֽ֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ שַֽׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:77
Psalm 119:78Let the proud be disappointed, for they have overthrown me wrongfully. I will meditate on your precepts.
Psalm 119:7819 יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ זֵ֭דִים כִּי־שֶׁ֣קֶר עִוְּת֑וּנִי אֲ֝נִ֗י אָשִׂ֥יחַ בְּפִקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:78
Psalm 119:79Let those who fear you turn to me. They will know your statutes.
Psalm 119:7919 יָשׁ֣וּבוּ לִ֣י יְרֵאֶ֑יךָ *וידעו **וְ֝יֹדְעֵ֗י עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:79
Psalm 119:80Let my heart be blameless toward your decrees, that I may not be disappointed. KAF
Psalm 119:8019 יְהִֽי־לִבִּ֣י תָמִ֣ים בְּחֻקֶּ֑יךָ לְ֝מַ֗עַן לֹ֣א אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:80
Psalm 119:81My soul faints for your salvation. I hope in your word.
Psalm 119:8119 כָּלְתָ֣ה לִתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ נַפְשִׁ֑י לִדְבָרְךָ֥ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:81
Psalm 119:82My eyes fail for your word. I say, |When will you comfort me?|
Psalm 119:8219 כָּל֣וּ עֵ֭ינַי לְאִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ לֵ֝אמֹ֗ר מָתַ֥י תְּֽנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:82
Psalm 119:83For I have become like a wineskin in the smoke. I don't forget your statutes.
Psalm 119:8319 כִּֽי־הָ֭יִיתִי כְּנֹ֣אד בְּקִיט֑וֹר חֻ֝קֶּ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:83
Psalm 119:84How many are the days of your servant? When will you execute judgment on those who persecute me?
Psalm 119:8419 כַּמָּ֥ה יְמֵֽי־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ מָתַ֬י תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה בְרֹדְפַ֣י מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 119:84
Psalm 119:85The proud have dug pits for me, contrary to your law.
Psalm 119:8519 כָּֽרוּ־לִ֣י זֵדִ֣ים שִׁיח֑וֹת אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר לֹ֣א כְתוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:85
Psalm 119:86All of your commandments are faithful. They persecute me wrongfully. Help me!
Psalm 119:8619 כָּל־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אֱמוּנָ֑ה שֶׁ֖קֶר רְדָפ֣וּנִי עָזְרֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:86
Psalm 119:87They had almost wiped me from the earth, but I didn't forsake your precepts.
Psalm 119:8719 כִּ֭מְעַט כִּלּ֣וּנִי בָאָ֑רֶץ וַ֝אֲנִ֗י לֹא־עָזַ֥בְתִּי פִקֻּודֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:87
Psalm 119:88Preserve my life according to your loving kindness, so I will obey the statutes of your mouth. LAMED
Psalm 119:8819 כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ חַיֵּ֑נִי וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה עֵד֥וּת פִּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:88
Psalm 119:89Yahweh, your word is settled in heaven forever.
Psalm 119:8919 לְעוֹלָ֥ם יְהוָ֑ה דְּ֝בָרְךָ֗ נִצָּ֥ב בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 119:89
Psalm 119:90Your faithfulness is to all generations. You have established the earth, and it remains.
Psalm 119:9019 לְדֹ֣ר וָ֭דֹר אֱמֽוּנָתֶ֑ךָ כּוֹנַ֥נְתָּ אֶ֝֗רֶץ וַֽתַּעֲמֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:90
Psalm 119:91Your laws remain to this day, for all things serve you.
Psalm 119:9119 לְֽ֭מִשְׁפָּטֶיךָ עָמְד֣וּ הַיּ֑וֹם כִּ֖י הַכֹּ֣ל עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:91
Psalm 119:92Unless your law had been my delight, I would have perished in my affliction.
Psalm 119:9219 לוּלֵ֣י ת֭וֹרָתְךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֑י אָ֝֗ז אָבַ֥דְתִּי בְעָנְיִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:92
Psalm 119:93I will never forget your precepts, for with them, you have revived me.
Psalm 119:9319 לְ֭עוֹלָם לֹא־אֶשְׁכַּ֣ח פִּקּוּדֶ֑יךָ כִּ֥י בָ֝֗ם חִיִּיתָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:93
Psalm 119:94I am yours. Save me, for I have sought your precepts.
Psalm 119:9419 לְֽךָ־אֲ֭נִי הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:94
Psalm 119:95The wicked have waited for me, to destroy me. I will consider your statutes.
Psalm 119:9519 לִ֤י קִוּ֣וּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים לְאַבְּדֵ֑נִי עֵ֝דֹתֶ֗יךָ אֶתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 119:95
Psalm 119:96I have seen a limit to all perfection, but your commands are boundless. MEM
Psalm 119:9619 לְֽכָל תִּ֭כְלָה רָאִ֣יתִי קֵ֑ץ רְחָבָ֖ה מִצְוָתְךָ֣ מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:96
Psalm 119:97How I love your law! It is my meditation all day.
Psalm 119:9719 מָֽה־אָהַ֥בְתִּי תוֹרָתֶ֑ךָ כָּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם הִ֣יא שִׂיחָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:97
Psalm 119:98Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies, for your commandments are always with me.
Psalm 119:9819 מֵ֭אֹ֣יְבַי תְּחַכְּמֵ֣נִי מִצְוֺתֶ֑ךָ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם הִיא־לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:98
Psalm 119:99I have more understanding than all my teachers, for your testimonies are my meditation.
Psalm 119:9919 מִכָּל־מְלַמְּדַ֥י הִשְׂכַּ֑לְתִּי כִּ֥י עֵ֝דְוֺתֶ֗יךָ שִׂ֣יחָה לִֽֿי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:99
Psalm 119:100I understand more than the aged, because I have kept your precepts.
Psalm 119:10019 מִזְּקֵנִ֥ים אֶתְבּוֹנָ֑ן כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:100
Psalm 119:101I have kept my feet from every evil way, that I might observe your word.
Psalm 119:10119 מִכָּל־אֹ֣רַח רָ֭ע כָּלִ֣אתִי רַגְלָ֑י לְ֝מַ֗עַן אֶשְׁמֹ֥ר דְּבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:101
Psalm 119:102I have not turned aside from your ordinances, for you have taught me.
Psalm 119:10219 מִמִּשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ לֹא־סָ֑רְתִּי כִּֽי־אַ֝תָּ֗ה הוֹרֵתָֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:102
Psalm 119:103How sweet are your promises to my taste, more than honey to my mouth!
Psalm 119:10319 מַה־נִּמְלְצ֣וּ לְ֭חִכִּי אִמְרָתֶ֗ךָ מִדְּבַ֥שׁ לְפִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:103
Psalm 119:104Through your precepts, I get understanding; therefore I hate every false way. NUN
Psalm 119:10419 מִפִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ אֶתְבּוֹנָ֑ן עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן שָׂנֵ֤אתִי ׀ כָּל־אֹ֬רַח שָֽׁקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 119:104
Psalm 119:105Your word is a lamp to my feet, and a light for my path.
Psalm 119:10519 נֵר־לְרַגְלִ֥י דְבָרֶ֑ךָ וְ֝א֗וֹר לִנְתִיבָתִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:105
Psalm 119:106I have sworn, and have confirmed it, that I will obey your righteous ordinances.
Psalm 119:10619 נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי וָאֲקַיֵּ֑מָה לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:106
Psalm 119:107I am afflicted very much. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your word.
Psalm 119:10719 נַעֲנֵ֥יתִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד יְ֝הוָ֗ה חַיֵּ֥נִי כִדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:107
Psalm 119:108Accept, I beg you, the willing offerings of my mouth. Yahweh, teach me your ordinances.
Psalm 119:10819 נִדְב֣וֹת פִּ֭י רְצֵה־נָ֣א יְהוָ֑ה וּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:108
Psalm 119:109My soul is continually in my hand, yet I won't forget your law.
Psalm 119:10919 נַפְשִׁ֣י בְכַפִּ֣י תָמִ֑יד וְ֝תֽוֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:109
Psalm 119:110The wicked have laid a snare for me, yet I haven't gone astray from your precepts.
Psalm 119:11019 נָתְנ֬וּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים פַּ֣ח לִ֑י וּ֝מִפִּקּוּדֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א תָעִֽיתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:110
Psalm 119:111I have taken your testimonies as a heritage forever, for they are the joy of my heart.
Psalm 119:11119 נָחַ֣לְתִּי עֵדְוֺתֶ֣יךָ לְעוֹלָ֑ם כִּֽי־שְׂשׂ֖וֹן לִבִּ֣י הֵֽמָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 119:111
Psalm 119:112I have set my heart to perform your statutes forever, even to the end. SAMEKH
Psalm 119:11219 נָטִ֣יתִי לִ֭בִּי לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת חֻקֶּ֗יךָ לְעוֹלָ֥ם עֵֽקֶב׃ ‬
Psalm 119:112
Psalm 119:113I hate double-minded men, but I love your law.
Psalm 119:11319 סֵעֲפִ֥ים שָׂנֵ֑אתִי וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ אָהָֽבְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:113
Psalm 119:114You are my hiding place and my shield. I hope in your word.
Psalm 119:11419 סִתְרִ֣י וּמָגִנִּ֣י אָ֑תָּה לִדְבָרְךָ֥ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:114
Psalm 119:115Depart from me, you evildoers, that I may keep the commandments of my God.
Psalm 119:11519 סֽוּרוּ־מִמֶּ֥נִּי מְרֵעִ֑ים וְ֝אֶצְּרָ֗ה מִצְוֺ֥ת אֱלֹהָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:115
Psalm 119:116Uphold me according to your word, that I may live. Let me not be ashamed of my hope.
Psalm 119:11619 סָמְכֵ֣נִי כְאִמְרָתְךָ֣ וְאֶֽחְיֶ֑ה וְאַל־תְּ֝בִישֵׁ֗נִי מִשִּׂבְרִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:116
Psalm 119:117Hold me up, and I will be safe, and will have respect for your statutes continually.
Psalm 119:11719 סְעָדֵ֥נִי וְאִוָּשֵׁ֑עָה וְאֶשְׁעָ֖ה בְחֻקֶּ֣יךָ תָמִֽיד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:117
Psalm 119:118You reject all those who stray from your statutes, for their deceit is in vain.
Psalm 119:11819 סָ֭לִיתָ כָּל־שׁוֹגִ֣ים מֵחֻקֶּ֑יךָ כִּי־שֶׁ֝֗קֶר תַּרְמִיתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 119:118
Psalm 119:119You put away all the wicked of the earth like dross. Therefore I love your testimonies.
Psalm 119:11919 סִגִ֗ים הִשְׁבַּ֥תָּ כָל־רִשְׁעֵי־אָ֑רֶץ לָ֝כֵ֗ן אָהַ֥בְתִּי עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:119
Psalm 119:120My flesh trembles for fear of you. I am afraid of your judgments. AYIN
Psalm 119:12019 סָמַ֣ר מִפַּחְדְּךָ֣ בְשָׂרִ֑י וּֽמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ יָרֵֽאתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:120
Psalm 119:121I have done what is just and righteous. Don't leave me to my oppressors.
Psalm 119:12119 עָ֭שִׂיתִי מִשְׁפָּ֣ט וָצֶ֑דֶק בַּל־תַּ֝נִּיחֵ֗נִי לְעֹֽשְׁקָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:121
Psalm 119:122Ensure your servant's well-being. Don't let the proud oppress me.
Psalm 119:12219 עֲרֹ֣ב עַבְדְּךָ֣ לְט֑וֹב אַֽל־יַעַשְׁקֻ֥נִי זֵדִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 119:122
Psalm 119:123My eyes fail looking for your salvation, for your righteous word.
Psalm 119:12319 עֵ֭ינַי כָּל֣וּ לִֽישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ וּלְאִמְרַ֥ת צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:123
Psalm 119:124Deal with your servant according to your loving kindness. Teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:12419 עֲשֵׂ֖ה עִם־עַבְדְּךָ֥ כְחַסְדֶּ֗ךָ וְחֻקֶּ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:124
Psalm 119:125I am your servant. Give me understanding, that I may know your testimonies.
Psalm 119:12519 עַבְדְּךָ־אָ֥נִי הֲבִינֵ֑נִי וְ֝אֵדְעָ֗ה עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:125
Psalm 119:126It is time to act, Yahweh, for they break your law.
Psalm 119:12619 עֵ֭ת לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת לַיהוָ֑ה הֵ֝פֵ֗רוּ תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:126
Psalm 119:127Therefore I love your commandments more than gold, yes, more than pure gold.
Psalm 119:12719 עַל־כֵּ֭ן אָהַ֣בְתִּי מִצְוֺתֶ֑יךָ מִזָּהָ֥ב וּמִפָּֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 119:127
Psalm 119:128Therefore I consider all of your precepts to be right. I hate every false way. PEY
Psalm 119:12819 עַל־כֵּ֤ן ׀ כָּל־פִּקּ֣וּדֵי כֹ֣ל יִשָּׁ֑רְתִּי כָּל־אֹ֖רַח שֶׁ֣קֶר שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:128
Psalm 119:129Your testimonies are wonderful, therefore my soul keeps them.
Psalm 119:12919 פְּלָא֥וֹת עֵדְוֺתֶ֑יךָ עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן נְצָרָ֥תַם נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:129
Psalm 119:130The entrance of your words gives light. It gives understanding to the simple.
Psalm 119:13019 פֵּ֖תַח דְּבָרֶ֥יךָ יָאִ֗יר מֵבִ֥ין פְּתָיִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 119:130
Psalm 119:131I opened my mouth wide and panted, for I longed for your commandments.
Psalm 119:13119 פִּֽי־פָ֭עַרְתִּי וָאֶשְׁאָ֑פָה כִּ֖י לְמִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ יָאָֽבְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:131
Psalm 119:132Turn to me, and have mercy on me, as you always do to those who love your name.
Psalm 119:13219 פְּנֵה־אֵלַ֥י וְחָנֵּ֑נִי כְּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט לְאֹהֲבֵ֥י שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:132
Psalm 119:133Establish my footsteps in your word. Don't let any iniquity have dominion over me.
Psalm 119:13319 פְּ֭עָמַי הָכֵ֣ן בְּאִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ וְֽאַל־תַּשְׁלֶט־בִּ֥י כָל־אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 119:133
Psalm 119:134Redeem me from the oppression of man, so I will observe your precepts.
Psalm 119:13419 פְּ֭דֵנִי מֵעֹ֣שֶׁק אָדָ֑ם וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:134
Psalm 119:135Make your face shine on your servant. Teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:13519 פָּ֭נֶיךָ הָאֵ֣ר בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝לַמְּדֵ֗נִי אֶת־חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:135
Psalm 119:136Streams of tears run down my eyes, because they don't observe your law. TZADI
Psalm 119:13619 פַּלְגֵי־מַ֭יִם יָרְד֣וּ עֵינָ֑י עַ֝֗ל לֹא־שָׁמְר֥וּ תוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:136
Psalm 119:137You are righteous, Yahweh. Your judgments are upright.
Psalm 119:13719 צַדִּ֣יק אַתָּ֣ה יְהוָ֑ה וְ֝יָשָׁ֗ר מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:137
Psalm 119:138You have commanded your statutes in righteousness. They are fully trustworthy.
Psalm 119:13819 צִ֭וִּיתָ צֶ֣דֶק עֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ וֶֽאֱמוּנָ֥ה מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:138
Psalm 119:139My zeal wears me out, because my enemies ignore your words.
Psalm 119:13919 צִמְּתַ֥תְנִי קִנְאָתִ֑י כִּֽי־שָׁכְח֖וּ דְבָרֶ֣יךָ צָרָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:139
Psalm 119:140Your promises have been thoroughly tested, and your servant loves them.
Psalm 119:14019 צְרוּפָ֖ה אִמְרָתְךָ֥ מְאֹ֗ד וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ אֲהֵבָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:140
Psalm 119:141I am small and despised. I don't forget your precepts.
Psalm 119:14119 צָעִ֣יר אָנֹכִ֣י וְנִבְזֶ֑ה פִּ֝קֻּדֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:141
Psalm 119:142Your righteousness is an everlasting righteousness. Your law is truth.
Psalm 119:14219 צִדְקָתְךָ֣ צֶ֣דֶק לְעוֹלָ֑ם וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ אֱמֶֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 119:142
