Psalm 119:143Trouble and anguish have taken hold of me. Your commandments are my delight.
Psalm 119:14319 צַר־וּמָצ֥וֹק מְצָא֑וּנִי מִ֝צְוֺתֶ֗יךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:143
Psalm 119:144Your testimonies are righteous forever. Give me understanding, that I may live. KUF
Psalm 119:14419 צֶ֖דֶק עֵדְוֺתֶ֥יךָ לְעוֹלָ֗ם הֲבִינֵ֥נִי וְאֶחְיֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 119:144
Psalm 119:145I have called with my whole heart. Answer me, Yahweh! I will keep your statutes.
Psalm 119:14519 קָרָ֣אתִי בְכָל־לֵ֭ב עֲנֵ֥נִי יְהוָ֗ה חֻקֶּ֥יךָ אֶצֹּֽרָה׃ ‬
Psalm 119:145
Psalm 119:146I have called to you. Save me! I will obey your statutes.
Psalm 119:14619 קְרָאתִ֥יךָ הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:146
Psalm 119:147I rise before dawn and cry for help. I put my hope in your words.
Psalm 119:14719 קִדַּ֣מְתִּי בַ֭נֶּשֶׁף וָאֲשַׁוֵּ֑עָה *לדבריך **לִדְבָרְךָ֥ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:147
Psalm 119:148My eyes stay open through the night watches, that I might meditate on your word.
Psalm 119:14819 קִדְּמ֣וּ עֵ֭ינַי אַשְׁמֻר֑וֹת לָ֝שִׂ֗יחַ בְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:148
Psalm 119:149Hear my voice according to your loving kindness. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your ordinances.
Psalm 119:14919 ק֭וֹלִי שִׁמְעָ֣ה כְחַסְדֶּ֑ךָ יְ֝הוָ֗ה כְּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥ךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:149
Psalm 119:150They draw near who follow after wickedness. They are far from your law.
Psalm 119:15019 קָ֭רְבוּ רֹדְפֵ֣י זִמָּ֑ה מִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ רָחָֽקוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:150
Psalm 119:151You are near, Yahweh. All your commandments are truth.
Psalm 119:15119 קָר֣וֹב אַתָּ֣ה יְהוָ֑ה וְֽכָל־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אֱמֶֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 119:151
Psalm 119:152Of old I have known from your testimonies, that you have founded them forever. RESH
Psalm 119:15219 קֶ֣דֶם יָ֭דַעְתִּי מֵעֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 119:152
Psalm 119:153Consider my affliction, and deliver me, for I don't forget your law.
Psalm 119:15319 רְאֵֽה־עָנְיִ֥י וְחַלְּצֵ֑נִי כִּי־תֽ֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:153
Psalm 119:154Plead my cause, and redeem me! Revive me according to your promise.
Psalm 119:15419 רִיבָ֣ה רִ֭יבִי וּגְאָלֵ֑נִי לְאִמְרָתְךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:154
Psalm 119:155Salvation is far from the wicked, for they don't seek your statutes.
Psalm 119:15519 רָח֣וֹק מֵרְשָׁעִ֣ים יְשׁוּעָ֑ה כִּֽי־חֻ֝קֶּיךָ לֹ֣א דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:155
Psalm 119:156Great are your tender mercies, Yahweh. Revive me according to your ordinances.
Psalm 119:15619 רַחֲמֶ֖יךָ רַבִּ֥ים ׀ יְהוָ֑ה כְּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:156
Psalm 119:157Many are my persecutors and my adversaries. I haven't swerved from your testimonies.
Psalm 119:15719 רַ֭בִּים רֹדְפַ֣י וְצָרָ֑י מֵ֝עֵדְוֺתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א נָטִֽיתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:157
Psalm 119:158I look at the faithless with loathing, because they don't observe your word.
Psalm 119:15819 רָאִ֣יתִי בֹ֭גְדִים וָֽאֶתְקוֹטָ֑טָה אֲשֶׁ֥ר אִ֝מְרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁמָֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:158
Psalm 119:159Consider how I love your precepts. Revive me, Yahweh, according to your loving kindness.
Psalm 119:15919 רְ֭אֵה כִּי־פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ אָהָ֑בְתִּי יְ֝הוָ֗ה כְּֽחַסְדְּךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:159
Psalm 119:160All of your words are truth. Every one of your righteous ordinances endures forever. SIN AND SHIN
Psalm 119:16019 רֹאשׁ־דְּבָרְךָ֥ אֱמֶ֑ת וּ֝לְעוֹלָ֗ם כָּל־מִשְׁפַּ֥ט צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:160
Psalm 119:161Princes have persecuted me without a cause, but my heart stands in awe of your words.
Psalm 119:16119 שָׂ֭רִים רְדָפ֣וּנִי חִנָּ֑ם *ומדבריך **וּ֝מִדְּבָרְךָ֗ פָּחַ֥ד לִבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:161
Psalm 119:162I rejoice at your word, as one who finds great spoil.
Psalm 119:16219 שָׂ֣שׂ אָ֭נֹכִֽי עַל־אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ כְּ֝מוֹצֵ֗א שָׁלָ֥ל רָֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 119:162
Psalm 119:163I hate and abhor falsehood. I love your law.
Psalm 119:16319 שֶׁ֣קֶר שָׂ֭נֵאתִי וַאֲתַעֵ֑בָה תּוֹרָתְךָ֥ אָהָֽבְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:163
Psalm 119:164Seven times a day, I praise you, because of your righteous ordinances.
Psalm 119:16419 שֶׁ֣בַע בַּ֭יּוֹם הִלַּלְתִּ֑יךָ עַ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:164
Psalm 119:165Those who love your law have great peace. Nothing causes them to stumble.
Psalm 119:16519 שָׁל֣וֹם רָ֭ב לְאֹהֲבֵ֣י תוֹרָתֶ֑ךָ וְאֵֽין־לָ֥מוֹ מִכְשֽׁוֹל׃ ‬
Psalm 119:165
Psalm 119:166I have hoped for your salvation, Yahweh. I have done your commandments.
Psalm 119:16619 שִׂבַּ֣רְתִּי לִֽישׁוּעָתְךָ֣ יְהוָ֑ה וּֽמִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:166
Psalm 119:167My soul has observed your testimonies. I love them exceedingly.
Psalm 119:16719 שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי עֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ וָאֹהֲבֵ֥ם מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 119:167
Psalm 119:168I have obeyed your precepts and your testimonies, for all my ways are before you. TAV
Psalm 119:16819 שָׁמַ֣רְתִּי פִ֭קּוּדֶיךָ וְעֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י כָל־דְּרָכַ֣י נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:168
Psalm 119:169Let my cry come before you, Yahweh. Give me understanding according to your word.
Psalm 119:16919 תִּקְרַ֤ב רִנָּתִ֣י לְפָנֶ֣יךָ יְהוָ֑ה כִּדְבָרְךָ֥ הֲבִינֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:169
Psalm 119:170Let my supplication come before you. Deliver me according to your word.
Psalm 119:17019 תָּב֣וֹא תְּחִנָּתִ֣י לְפָנֶ֑יךָ כְּ֝אִמְרָתְךָ֗ הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:170
Psalm 119:171Let my lips utter praise, for you teach me your statutes.
Psalm 119:17119 תַּבַּ֣עְנָה שְׂפָתַ֣י תְּהִלָּ֑ה כִּ֖י תְלַמְּדֵ֣נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 119:171
Psalm 119:172Let my tongue sing of your word, for all your commandments are righteousness.
Psalm 119:17219 תַּ֣עַן לְ֭שׁוֹנִי אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ כִּ֖י כָל־מִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ צֶּֽדֶק׃ ‬
Psalm 119:172
Psalm 119:173Let your hand be ready to help me, for I have chosen your precepts.
Psalm 119:17319 תְּהִֽי־יָדְךָ֥ לְעָזְרֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ בָחָֽרְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:173
Psalm 119:174I have longed for your salvation, Yahweh. Your law is my delight.
Psalm 119:17419 תָּאַ֣בְתִּי לִֽישׁוּעָתְךָ֣ יְהוָ֑ה וְ֝תֽוֹרָתְךָ֗ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:174
Psalm 119:175Let my soul live, that I may praise you. Let your ordinances help me.
Psalm 119:17519 תְּֽחִי־נַ֭פְשִׁי וּֽתְהַֽלְלֶ֑ךָּ וּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥ךָ יַעֲזְרֻֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:175
Psalm 119:176I have gone astray like a lost sheep. Seek your servant, for I don't forget your commandments. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 119:17619 תָּעִ֗יתִי כְּשֶׂ֣ה אֹ֭בֵד בַּקֵּ֣שׁ עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י מִ֝צְוֺתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 119:176
Psalm 120:1In my distress, I cried to Yahweh. He answered me.
Psalm 120:120 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֶל־יְ֭הוָה בַּצָּרָ֣תָה לִּ֑י קָ֝רָ֗אתִי וֽ͏ַיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 120:1
Psalm 120:2Deliver my soul, Yahweh, from lying lips, from a deceitful tongue.
Psalm 120:220 יְֽהוָ֗ה הַצִּ֣ילָה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִשְּׂפַת־שֶׁ֑קֶר מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן רְמִיָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 120:2
Psalm 120:3What will be given to you, and what will be done more to you, you deceitful tongue?
Psalm 120:320 מַה־יִּתֵּ֣ן לְ֭ךָ וּמַה־יֹּסִ֥יף לָ֗ךְ לָשׁ֥וֹן רְמִיָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 120:3
Psalm 120:4Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.
Psalm 120:420 חִצֵּ֣י גִבּ֣וֹר שְׁנוּנִ֑ים עִ֝֗ם גַּחֲלֵ֥י רְתָמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 120:4
Psalm 120:5Woe is me, that I live in Meshech, that I dwell among the tents of Kedar!
Psalm 120:520 אֽוֹיָה־לִ֭י כִּי־גַ֣רְתִּי מֶ֑שֶׁךְ שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי עִֽם־אָהֳלֵ֥י קֵדָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 120:5
Psalm 120:6My soul has had her dwelling too long with him who hates peace.
Psalm 120:620 רַ֭בַּת שָֽׁכְנָה־לָּ֣הּ נַפְשִׁ֑י עִ֝֗ם שׂוֹנֵ֥א שָׁלֽוֹם׃ ‬
Psalm 120:6
Psalm 120:7I am for peace, but when I speak, they are for war. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 120:720 אֲ‍ֽנִי־שָׁ֭לוֹם וְכִ֣י אֲדַבֵּ֑ר הֵ֝֗מָּה לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 120:7
Psalm 121:1I will lift up my eyes to the hills. Where does my help come from?
Psalm 121:121 שִׁ֗יר לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֶשָּׂ֣א עֵ֭ינַי אֶל־הֶהָרִ֑ים מֵ֝אַ֗יִן יָבֹ֥א עֶזְרִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 121:1
Psalm 121:2My help comes from Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.
Psalm 121:221 עֶ֭זְרִי מֵעִ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 121:2
Psalm 121:3He will not allow your foot to be moved. He who keeps you will not slumber.
Psalm 121:321 אַל־יִתֵּ֣ן לַמּ֣וֹט רַגְלֶ֑ךָ אַל־יָ֝נ֗וּם שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 121:3
Psalm 121:4Behold, he who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
Psalm 121:421 הִנֵּ֣ה לֹֽא־יָ֭נוּם וְלֹ֣א יִישָׁ֑ן שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 121:4
Psalm 121:5Yahweh is your keeper. Yahweh is your shade on your right hand.
Psalm 121:521 יְהוָ֥ה שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ יְהוָ֥ה צִ֝לְּךָ֗ עַל־יַ֥ד יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 121:5
Psalm 121:6The sun will not harm you by day, nor the moon by night.
Psalm 121:621 יוֹמָ֗ם הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ לֹֽא־יַכֶּ֗כָּה וְיָרֵ֥חַ בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 121:6
Psalm 121:7Yahweh will keep you from all evil. He will keep your soul.
Psalm 121:721 יְֽהוָ֗ה יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ מִכָּל־רָ֑ע יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר אֶת־נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 121:7
Psalm 121:8Yahweh will keep your going out and your coming in, from this time forth, and forevermore. A Song of Ascents. By David.
Psalm 121:821 יְֽהוָ֗ה יִשְׁמָר־צֵאתְךָ֥ וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 121:8
Psalm 122:1I was glad when they said to me, |Let's go to Yahweh's house!|
Psalm 122:122 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד שָׂ֭מַחְתִּי בְּאֹמְרִ֣ים לִ֑י בֵּ֖ית יְהוָ֣ה נֵלֵֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 122:1
Psalm 122:2Our feet are standing within your gates, Jerusalem;
Psalm 122:222 עֹ֭מְדוֹת הָי֣וּ רַגְלֵ֑ינוּ בִּ֝שְׁעָרַ֗יִךְ יְרוּשָׁלָֽ͏ִם׃ ‬
Psalm 122:2
Psalm 122:3Jerusalem, that is built as a city that is compact together;
Psalm 122:322 יְרוּשָׁלַ֥͏ִם הַבְּנוּיָ֑ה כְּ֝עִ֗יר שֶׁחֻבְּרָה־לָּ֥הּ יַחְדָּֽו׃ ‬
Psalm 122:3
Psalm 122:4where the tribes go up, even Yah's tribes, according to an ordinance for Israel, to give thanks to the name of Yahweh.
Psalm 122:422 שֶׁשָּׁ֨ם עָל֪וּ שְׁבָטִ֡ים שִׁבְטֵי־יָ֭הּ עֵד֣וּת לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל לְ֝הֹד֗וֹת לְשֵׁ֣ם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 122:4
Psalm 122:5For there are set thrones for judgment, the thrones of David's house.
Psalm 122:522 כִּ֤י שָׁ֨מָּה ׀ יָשְׁב֣וּ כִסְא֣וֹת לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט כִּ֝סְא֗וֹת לְבֵ֣ית דָּוִֽיד׃ ‬
Psalm 122:5
Psalm 122:6Pray for the peace of Jerusalem. Those who love you will prosper.
Psalm 122:622 שַׁ֭אֲלוּ שְׁל֣וֹם יְרוּשָׁלָ֑͏ִם יִ֝שְׁלָ֗יוּ אֹהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 122:6
Psalm 122:7Peace be within your walls, and prosperity within your palaces.
Psalm 122:722 יְהִֽי־שָׁל֥וֹם בְּחֵילֵ֑ךְ שַׁ֝לְוָ֗ה בְּאַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 122:7
Psalm 122:8For my brothers' and companions' sakes, I will now say, |Peace be within you.|
Psalm 122:822 לְ֭מַעַן אַחַ֣י וְרֵעָ֑י אֲדַבְּרָה־נָּ֖א שָׁל֣וֹם בָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 122:8
Psalm 122:9For the sake of the house of Yahweh our God, I will seek your good. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 122:922 לְ֭מַעַן בֵּית־יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ אֲבַקְשָׁ֖ה ט֣וֹב לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 122:9
Psalm 123:1To you I do lift up my eyes, you who sit in the heavens.
Psalm 123:123 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֵ֭לֶיךָ נָשָׂ֣אתִי אֶת־עֵינַ֑י הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 123:1
Psalm 123:2Behold, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress; so our eyes look to Yahweh, our God, until he has mercy on us.
Psalm 123:223 הִנֵּ֨ה כְעֵינֵ֪י עֲבָדִ֡ים אֶל־יַ֤ד אֲ‍ֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם כְּעֵינֵ֣י שִׁפְחָה֮ אֶל־יַ֢ד גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ כֵּ֣ן עֵ֭ינֵינוּ אֶל־יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ עַ֝֗ד שֶׁיְּחָנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 123:2
Psalm 123:3Have mercy on us, Yahweh, have mercy on us, for we have endured much contempt.
Psalm 123:323 חָנֵּ֣נוּ יְהוָ֣ה חָנֵּ֑נוּ כִּֽי־רַ֝֗ב שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ בֽוּז׃ ‬
Psalm 123:3
Psalm 123:4Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scoffing of those who are at ease, with the contempt of the proud. A Song of Ascents. By David.
Psalm 123:423 רַבַּת֮ שָֽׂבְעָה־לָּ֢הּ נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ הַלַּ֥עַג הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים הַ֝בּ֗וּז לִגְאֵ֥יוֹנִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 123:4
Psalm 124:1If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, let Israel now say,
Psalm 124:124 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה שֶׁהָ֣יָה לָ֑נוּ יֹֽאמַר־נָ֝א יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 124:1
Psalm 124:2if it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, when men rose up against us;
Psalm 124:224 לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הוָה שֶׁהָ֣יָה לָ֑נוּ בְּק֖וּם עָלֵ֣ינוּ אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 124:2
Psalm 124:3then they would have swallowed us up alive, when their wrath was kindled against us;
Psalm 124:324 אֲ֭זַי חַיִּ֣ים בְּלָע֑וּנוּ בַּחֲר֖וֹת אַפָּ֣ם בָּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 124:3
Psalm 124:4then the waters would have overwhelmed us, the stream would have gone over our soul;
Psalm 124:424 אֲ֭זַי הַמַּ֣יִם שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ נַ֗֜חְלָה עָבַ֥ר עַל־נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 124:4
Psalm 124:5then the proud waters would have gone over our soul.
Psalm 124:524 אֲ֭זַי עָבַ֣ר עַל־נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ הַ֝מַּ֗יִם הַזֵּֽידוֹנִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 124:5
Psalm 124:6Blessed be Yahweh, who has not given us as a prey to their teeth.
Psalm 124:624 בָּר֥וּךְ יְהוָ֑ה שֶׁלֹּ֥א נְתָנָ֥נוּ טֶ֝֗רֶף לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 124:6
Psalm 124:7Our soul has escaped like a bird out of the fowler's snare. The snare is broken, and we have escaped.
Psalm 124:724 נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ כְּצִפּ֥וֹר נִמְלְטָה֮ מִפַּ֢ח י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים הַפַּ֥ח נִשְׁבָּ֗ר וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 124:7
Psalm 124:8Our help is in the name of Yahweh, who made heaven and earth. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 124:824 עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 124:8
Psalm 125:1Those who trust in Yahweh are as Mount Zion, which can't be moved, but remains forever.
Psalm 125:125 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים בַּיהוָ֑ה כְּֽהַר־צִיּ֥וֹן לֹא־יִ֝מּ֗וֹט לְעוֹלָ֥ם יֵשֵֽׁב׃ ‬
Psalm 125:1
Psalm 125:2As the mountains surround Jerusalem, so Yahweh surrounds his people from this time forth and forevermore.
Psalm 125:225 יְֽרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם הָרִים֮ סָבִ֢יב לָ֥הּ וַ֭יהוָה סָבִ֣יב לְעַמּ֑וֹ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 125:2
Psalm 125:3For the scepter of wickedness won't remain over the allotment of the righteous; so that the righteous won't use their hands to do evil.
Psalm 125:325 כִּ֤י לֹ֪א יָנ֡וּחַ שֵׁ֤בֶט הָרֶ֗שַׁע עַל֮ גּוֹרַ֢ל הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים לְמַ֡עַן לֹא־יִשְׁלְח֖וּ הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 125:3
Psalm 125:4Do good, Yahweh, to those who are good, to those who are upright in their hearts.
Psalm 125:425 הֵיטִ֣יבָה יְ֭הוָה לַטּוֹבִ֑ים וְ֝לִֽישָׁרִ֗ים בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 125:4
Psalm 125:5But as for those who turn aside to their crooked ways, Yahweh will lead them away with the workers of iniquity. Peace be on Israel. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 125:525 וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים עַֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם יְ֭הוָה אֶת־פֹּעֲלֵ֣י הָאָ֑וֶן שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 125:5
Psalm 126:1When Yahweh brought back those who returned to Zion, we were like those who dream.
Psalm 126:126 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת בְּשׁ֣וּב יְ֭הוָה אֶת־שִׁיבַ֣ת צִיּ֑וֹן הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 126:1
Psalm 126:2Then our mouth was filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing. Then they said among the nations, |Yahweh has done great things for them.|
Psalm 126:226 אָ֤ז יִמָּלֵ֪א שְׂח֡וֹק פִּינוּ֮ וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֢נוּ רִ֫נָּ֥ה אָ֭ז יֹאמְר֣וּ בַגּוֹיִ֑ם הִגְדִּ֥יל יְ֝הוָ֗ה לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת עִם־אֵֽלֶּה׃ ‬
Psalm 126:2
Psalm 126:3Yahweh has done great things for us, and we are glad.
Psalm 126:326 הִגְדִּ֣יל יְ֭הוָה לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת עִמָּ֗נוּ הָיִ֥ינוּ שְׂמֵחִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 126:3
Psalm 126:4Restore our fortunes again, Yahweh, like the streams in the Negev.
Psalm 126:426 שׁוּבָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה אֶת־*שבותנו **שְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ כַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃ ‬
Psalm 126:4
Psalm 126:5Those who sow in tears will reap in joy.
Psalm 126:526 הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים בְּדִמְעָ֗ה בְּרִנָּ֥ה יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 126:5
Psalm 126:6He who goes out weeping, carrying seed for sowing, will certainly come again with joy, carrying his sheaves. A Song of Ascents. By Solomon.
Psalm 126:626 הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ יֵלֵ֨ךְ ׀ וּבָכֹה֮ נֹשֵׂ֢א מֶֽשֶׁךְ־הַ֫זָּ֥רַע בֹּֽ֬א־יָב֥וֹא בְרִנָּ֑ה נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 126:6
Psalm 127:1Unless Yahweh builds the house, they labor in vain who build it. Unless Yahweh watches over the city, the watchman guards it in vain.
Psalm 127:127 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה אִם־יְהוָ֤ה ׀ לֹא־יִבְנֶ֬ה בַ֗יִת שָׁ֤וְא ׀ עָמְל֣וּ בוֹנָ֣יו בּ֑וֹ אִם־יְהוָ֥ה לֹֽא־יִשְׁמָר־עִ֝֗יר שָׁ֤וְא ׀ שָׁקַ֬ד שׁוֹמֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 127:1
Psalm 127:2It is vain for you to rise up early, to stay up late, eating the bread of toil; for he gives sleep to his loved ones.
Psalm 127:227 שָׁ֤וְא לָכֶ֨ם ׀ מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵי ק֡וּם מְאַֽחֲרֵי־שֶׁ֗בֶת אֹ֭כְלֵי לֶ֣חֶם הָעֲצָבִ֑ים כֵּ֤ן יִתֵּ֖ן לִֽידִיד֣וֹ שֵׁנָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 127:2
Psalm 127:3Behold, children are a heritage of Yahweh. The fruit of the womb is his reward.
Psalm 127:327 הִנֵּ֤ה נַחֲלַ֣ת יְהוָ֣ה בָּנִ֑ים שָׂ֝כָ֗ר פְּרִ֣י הַבָּֽטֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 127:3
Psalm 127:4As arrows in the hand of a mighty man, so are the children of youth.
Psalm 127:427 כְּחִצִּ֥ים בְּיַד־גִּבּ֑וֹר כֵּ֝֗ן בְּנֵ֣י הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 127:4
Psalm 127:5Happy is the man who has his quiver full of them. They won't be disappointed when they speak with their enemies in the gate. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 127:527 אַשְׁרֵ֤י הַגֶּ֗בֶר אֲשֶׁ֤ר מִלֵּ֥א אֶת־אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ מֵ֫הֶ֥ם לֹֽא־יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ כִּֽי־יְדַבְּר֖וּ אֶת־אוֹיְבִ֣ים בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ ‬
Psalm 127:5
Psalm 128:1Blessed is everyone who fears Yahweh, who walks in his ways.
Psalm 128:128 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אַ֭שְׁרֵי כָּל־יְרֵ֣א יְהוָ֑ה הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 128:1
Psalm 128:2For you will eat the labor of your hands. You will be happy, and it will be well with you.
Psalm 128:228 יְגִ֣יעַ כַּ֭פֶּיךָ כִּ֣י תֹאכֵ֑ל אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ וְט֣וֹב לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 128:2
Psalm 128:3Your wife will be as a fruitful vine, in the innermost parts of your house; your children like olive plants, around your table.
Psalm 128:328 אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤ ׀ כְּגֶ֥פֶן פֹּרִיָּה֮ בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֢י בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ בָּ֭נֶיךָ כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י זֵיתִ֑ים סָ֝בִ֗יב לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 128:3
Psalm 128:4Behold, thus is the man blessed who fears Yahweh.
Psalm 128:428 הִנֵּ֣ה כִי־כֵ֭ן יְבֹ֥רַךְ גָּ֗בֶר יְרֵ֣א יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 128:4
Psalm 128:5May Yahweh bless you out of Zion, and may you see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life.
Psalm 128:528 יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ יְהוָ֗ה מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן וּ֭רְאֵה בְּט֣וּב יְרוּשָׁלָ֑͏ִם כֹּ֝֗ל יְמֵ֣י חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 128:5
Psalm 128:6Yes, may you see your children's children. Peace be upon Israel. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 128:628 וּרְאֵֽה־בָנִ֥ים לְבָנֶ֑יךָ שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 128:6
Psalm 129:1Many times they have afflicted me from my youth up. Let Israel now say,
Psalm 129:129 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת רַ֭בַּת צְרָר֣וּנִי מִנְּעוּרַ֑י יֹֽאמַר־נָ֝א יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 129:1
Psalm 129:2many times they have afflicted me from my youth up, yet they have not prevailed against me.
Psalm 129:229 רַ֭בַּת צְרָר֣וּנִי מִנְּעוּרָ֑י גַּ֝ם לֹא־יָ֥כְלוּ לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 129:2
Psalm 129:3The plowers plowed on my back. They made their furrows long.
Psalm 129:329 עַל־גַּ֭בִּי חָרְשׁ֣וּ חֹרְשִׁ֑ים הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ *למענותם **לְמַעֲנִיתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 129:3
Psalm 129:4Yahweh is righteous. He has cut apart the cords of the wicked.
Psalm 129:429 יְהוָ֥ה צַדִּ֑יק קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ עֲב֣וֹת רְשָׁעִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 129:4
Psalm 129:5Let them be disappointed and turned backward, all those who hate Zion.
Psalm 129:529 יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ אָח֑וֹר כֹּ֝֗ל שֹׂנְאֵ֥י צִיּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 129:5
Psalm 129:6Let them be as the grass on the housetops, which withers before it grows up;
Psalm 129:629 יִ֭הְיוּ כַּחֲצִ֣יר גַּגּ֑וֹת שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת שָׁלַ֣ף יָבֵֽשׁ׃ ‬
Psalm 129:6
Psalm 129:7with which the reaper doesn't fill his hand, nor he who binds sheaves, his bosom.
Psalm 129:729 שֶׁלֹּ֤א מִלֵּ֖א כַפּ֥וֹ קוֹצֵ֗ר וְחִצְנ֥וֹ מְעַמֵּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 129:7
Psalm 129:8Neither do those who go by say, |The blessing of Yahweh be on you. We bless you in the name of Yahweh.| A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 129:829 וְלֹ֤א אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ הָעֹבְרִ֗ים בִּרְכַּֽת־יְהוָ֥ה אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 129:8
Psalm 130:1Out of the depths I have cried to you, Yahweh.
Psalm 130:130 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים קְרָאתִ֣יךָ יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 130:1
Psalm 130:2Lord, hear my voice. Let your ears be attentive to the voice of my petitions.
Psalm 130:230 אֲדֹנָי֮ שִׁמְעָ֢ה בְק֫וֹלִ֥י תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה אָ֭זְנֶיךָ קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת לְ֝ק֗וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 130:2
Psalm 130:3If you, Yah, kept a record of sins, Lord, who could stand?
Psalm 130:330 אִם־עֲוֺנ֥וֹת תִּשְׁמָר־יָ֑הּ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י מִ֣י יַעֲמֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 130:3
Psalm 130:4But there is forgiveness with you, therefore you are feared.
Psalm 130:430 כִּֽי־עִמְּךָ֥ הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה לְ֝מַ֗עַן תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 130:4
Psalm 130:5I wait for Yahweh. My soul waits. I hope in his word.
Psalm 130:530 קִוִּ֣יתִי יְ֭הוָה קִוְּתָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֑י וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 130:5
Psalm 130:6My soul longs for the Lord more than watchmen long for the morning; more than watchmen for the morning.
Psalm 130:630 נַפְשִׁ֥י לַֽאדֹנָ֑י מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר שֹׁמְרִ֥ים לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 130:6
Psalm 130:7Israel, hope in Yahweh, for with Yahweh there is loving kindness. With him is abundant redemption.
Psalm 130:730 יַחֵ֥ל יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל אֶל־יְה֫וָה כִּֽי־עִם־יְהוָ֥ה הַחֶ֑סֶד וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה עִמּ֣וֹ פְדֽוּת׃ ‬
Psalm 130:7
Psalm 130:8He will redeem Israel from all their sins. A Song of Ascents. By David.
Psalm 130:830 וְ֭הוּא יִפְדֶּ֣ה אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל מִ֝כֹּ֗ל עֲוֺנֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 130:8
Psalm 131:1Yahweh, my heart isn't haughty, nor my eyes lofty; nor do I concern myself with great matters, or things too wonderful for me.
Psalm 131:131 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהוָ֤ה ׀ לֹא־גָבַ֣הּ לִ֭בִּי וְלֹא־רָמ֣וּ עֵינַ֑י וְלֹֽא־הִלַּ֓כְתִּי ׀ בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 131:1
Psalm 131:2Surely I have stilled and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with his mother, like a weaned child is my soul within me.
Psalm 131:231 אִם־לֹ֤א שִׁוִּ֨יתִי ׀ וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י כְּ֭גָמֻל עֲלֵ֣י אִמּ֑וֹ כַּגָּמֻ֖ל עָלַ֣י נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 131:2
Psalm 131:3Israel, hope in Yahweh, from this time forth and forevermore. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 131:331 יַחֵ֣ל יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל אֶל־יְהוָ֑ה מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 131:3
Psalm 132:1Yahweh, remember David and all his affliction,
Psalm 132:132 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת זְכוֹר־יְהוָ֥ה לְדָוִ֑ד אֵ֝ת כָּל־עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:1
Psalm 132:2how he swore to Yahweh, and vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:
Psalm 132:232 אֲשֶׁ֣ר נִ֭שְׁבַּע לַיהוָ֑ה נָ֝דַ֗ר לַאֲבִ֥יר יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 132:2
Psalm 132:3|Surely I will not come into the structure of my house, nor go up into my bed;
Psalm 132:332 אִם־אָ֭בֹא בְּאֹ֣הֶל בֵּיתִ֑י אִם־אֶ֝עֱלֶ֗ה עַל־עֶ֥רֶשׂ יְצוּעָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 132:3
Psalm 132:4I will not give sleep to my eyes, or slumber to my eyelids;
Psalm 132:432 אִם־אֶתֵּ֣ן שְׁנַ֣ת לְעֵינָ֑י לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י תְּנוּמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 132:4
Psalm 132:5until I find out a place for Yahweh, a dwelling for the Mighty One of Jacob.|
Psalm 132:532 עַד־אֶמְצָ֣א מָ֭קוֹם לַיהוָ֑ה מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת לַאֲבִ֥יר יַעֲקֹֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 132:5
Psalm 132:6Behold, we heard of it in Ephrathah. We found it in the field of Jaar:
Psalm 132:632 הִנֵּֽה־שְׁמַֽעֲנ֥וּהָ בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ בִּשְׂדֵי־יָֽעַר׃ ‬
Psalm 132:6
Psalm 132:7|We will go into his dwelling place. We will worship at his footstool.
Psalm 132:732 נָב֥וֹאָה לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה לַהֲדֹ֥ם רַגְלָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 132:7
Psalm 132:8Arise, Yahweh, into your resting place; you, and the ark of your strength.
Psalm 132:832 קוּמָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ אַ֝תָּ֗ה וַאֲר֥וֹן עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:8
Psalm 132:9Let your priest be clothed with righteousness. Let your saints shout for joy!|
Psalm 132:932 כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ יִלְבְּשׁוּ־צֶ֑דֶק וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:9
Psalm 132:10For your servant David's sake, don't turn away the face of your anointed one.
Psalm 132:1032 בַּ֭עֲבוּר דָּוִ֣ד עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ אַל־תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב פְּנֵ֣י מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:10
Psalm 132:11Yahweh has sworn to David in truth. He will not turn from it: |I will set the fruit of your body on your throne.
Psalm 132:1132 נִשְׁבַּֽע־יְהוָ֨ה ׀ לְדָוִ֡ד אֱמֶת֮ לֹֽא־יָשׁ֢וּב מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה מִפְּרִ֥י בִטְנְךָ֑ אָ֝שִׁ֗ית לְכִסֵּא־לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:11
Psalm 132:12If your children will keep my covenant, my testimony that I will teach them, their children also will sit on your throne forevermore.|
Psalm 132:1232 אִֽם־יִשְׁמְר֬וּ בָנֶ֨יךָ ׀ בְּרִיתִי֮ וְעֵדֹתִ֥י ז֗וֹ אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם גַּם־בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם עֲדֵי־עַ֑ד יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ לְכִסֵּא־לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:12
Psalm 132:13For Yahweh has chosen Zion. He has desired it for his habitation.
Psalm 132:1332 כִּֽי־בָחַ֣ר יְהוָ֣ה בְּצִיּ֑וֹן אִ֝וָּ֗הּ לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:13
Psalm 132:14|This is my resting place forever. Here I will live, for I have desired it.
Psalm 132:1432 זֹאת־מְנוּחָתִ֥י עֲדֵי־עַ֑ד פֹּֽה־אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב כִּ֣י אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:14
Psalm 132:15I will abundantly bless her provision. I will satisfy her poor with bread.
Psalm 132:1532 צֵ֭ידָהּ בָּרֵ֣ךְ אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ לָֽחֶם׃ ‬
Psalm 132:15
Psalm 132:16Her priests I will also clothe with salvation. Her saints will shout aloud for joy.
Psalm 132:1632 וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ יֶ֑שַׁע וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ רַנֵּ֥ן יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:16
Psalm 132:17There I will make the horn of David to bud. I have ordained a lamp for my anointed.
Psalm 132:1732 שָׁ֤ם אַצְמִ֣יחַ קֶ֣רֶן לְדָוִ֑ד עָרַ֥כְתִּי נֵ֝֗ר לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 132:17
Psalm 132:18I will clothe his enemies with shame, but on himself, his crown will be resplendent.| A Song of Ascents. By David.
Psalm 132:1832 א֭וֹיְבָיו אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ בֹּ֑שֶׁת וְ֝עָלָ֗יו יָצִ֥יץ נִזְרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 132:18
Psalm 133:1See how good and how pleasant it is for brothers to live together in unity!
Psalm 133:133 שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הִנֵּ֣ה מַה־טּ֭וֹב וּמַה־נָּעִ֑ים שֶׁ֖בֶת אַחִ֣ים גַּם־יָֽחַד׃ ‬
Psalm 133:1
Psalm 133:2It is like the precious oil on the head, that ran down on the beard, even Aaron's beard; that came down on the edge of his robes;
Psalm 133:233 כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן הַטּ֨וֹב ׀ עַל־הָרֹ֗אשׁ יֹרֵ֗ד עַֽל־הַזָּקָ֥ן זְקַֽן־אַהֲרֹ֑ן שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד עַל־פִּ֥י מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 133:2
Psalm 133:3like the dew of Hermon, that comes down on the hills of Zion: for there Yahweh gives the blessing, even life forevermore. A Song of Ascents.
Psalm 133:333 כְּטַל־חֶרְמ֗וֹן שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ עַל־הַרְרֵ֢י צִ֫יּ֥וֹן כִּ֤י שָׁ֨ם ׀ צִוָּ֣ה יְ֭הוָה אֶת־הַבְּרָכָ֑ה חַ֝יִּ֗ים עַד־הָעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 133:3
Psalm 134:1Look! Praise Yahweh, all you servants of Yahweh, who stand by night in Yahweh's house!
Psalm 134:134 שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת הִנֵּ֤ה ׀ בָּרֲכ֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הוָה כָּל־עַבְדֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה הָעֹמְדִ֥ים בְּבֵית־יְ֝הוָ֗ה בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 134:1
Psalm 134:2Lift up your hands in the sanctuary. Praise Yahweh!
Psalm 134:234 שְׂאֽוּ־יְדֵכֶ֥ם קֹ֑דֶשׁ וּ֝בָרֲכוּ אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 134:2
Psalm 134:3May Yahweh bless you from Zion; even he who made heaven and earth.
Psalm 134:334 יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ יְ֭הוָה מִצִּיּ֑וֹן עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 134:3
Psalm 135:1Praise Yah! Praise the name of Yahweh! Praise him, you servants of Yahweh,
Psalm 135:135 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ הַֽ֭לְלוּ אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה הֽ͏ַ֝לְלוּ עַבְדֵ֥י יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 135:1
Psalm 135:2you who stand in the house of Yahweh, in the courts of our God's house.
Psalm 135:235 שֶׁ֣֭עֹֽמְדִים בְּבֵ֣ית יְהוָ֑ה בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת בֵּ֣ית אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 135:2
Psalm 135:3Praise Yah, for Yahweh is good. Sing praises to his name, for that is pleasant.
Psalm 135:335 הַֽ֭לְלוּ־יָהּ כִּי־ט֣וֹב יְהוָ֑ה זַמְּר֥וּ לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ כִּ֣י נָעִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 135:3
Psalm 135:4For Yah has chosen Jacob for himself; Israel for his own possession.
Psalm 135:435 כִּֽי־יַעֲקֹ֗ב בָּחַ֣ר ל֣וֹ יָ֑הּ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 135:4
Psalm 135:5For I know that Yahweh is great, that our Lord is above all gods.
Psalm 135:535 כִּ֤י אֲנִ֣י יָ֭דַעְתִּי כִּי־גָד֣וֹל יְהוָ֑ה וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ מִכָּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 135:5
Psalm 135:6Whatever Yahweh pleased, that he has done, in heaven and in earth, in the seas and in all deeps;
Psalm 135:635 כֹּ֤ל אֲשֶׁר־חָפֵ֥ץ יְהוָ֗ה עָ֫שָׂ֥ה בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם וּבָאָ֑רֶץ בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים וְכָל־תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 135:6
Psalm 135:7who causes the clouds to rise from the ends of the earth; who makes lightnings with the rain; who brings forth the wind out of his treasuries;
Psalm 135:735 מַֽעֲלֶ֣ה נְשִׂאִים֮ מִקְצֵ֢ה הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ בְּרָקִ֣ים לַמָּטָ֣ר עָשָׂ֑ה מֽוֹצֵא־ר֝וּחַ מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 135:7
Psalm 135:8Who struck the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and animal;
Psalm 135:835 שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה בְּכוֹרֵ֣י מִצְרָ֑יִם מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם עַד־בְּהֵמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 135:8
Psalm 135:9Who sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, Egypt, on Pharaoh, and on all his servants;
Psalm 135:935 שָׁלַ֤ח ׀ אֹת֣וֹת וּ֭מֹפְתִים בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי מִצְרָ֑יִם בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה וּבְכָל־עֲבָדָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 135:9
Psalm 135:10who struck many nations, and killed mighty kings,
Psalm 135:1035 שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה גּוֹיִ֣ם רַבִּ֑ים וְ֝הָרַ֗ג מְלָכִ֥ים עֲצוּמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 135:10
Psalm 135:11Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan,
Psalm 135:1135 לְסִיח֤וֹן ׀ מֶ֤לֶךְ הָאֱמֹרִ֗י וּ֭לְעוֹג מֶ֣לֶךְ הַבָּשָׁ֑ן וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל מַמְלְכ֥וֹת כְּנָֽעַן׃ ‬
Psalm 135:11
Psalm 135:12and gave their land for a heritage, a heritage to Israel, his people.
Psalm 135:1235 וְנָתַ֣ן אַרְצָ֣ם נַחֲלָ֑ה נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל עַמּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 135:12
Psalm 135:13Your name, Yahweh, endures forever; your renown, Yahweh, throughout all generations.
Psalm 135:1335 יְ֭הוָה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְעוֹלָ֑ם יְ֝הוָ֗ה זִכְרְךָ֥ לְדֹר־וָדֹֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 135:13
Psalm 135:14For Yahweh will judge his people, and have compassion on his servants.
Psalm 135:1435 כִּֽי־יָדִ֣ין יְהוָ֣ה עַמּ֑וֹ וְעַל־עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו יִתְנֶחָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 135:14
Psalm 135:15The idols of the nations are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
Psalm 135:1535 עֲצַבֵּ֣י הַ֭גּוֹיִם כֶּ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה יְדֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 135:15
Psalm 135:16They have mouths, but they can't speak. They have eyes, but they can't see.
Psalm 135:1635 פֶּֽה־לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ עֵינַ֥יִם לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֽוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 135:16
Psalm 135:17They have ears, but they can't hear; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
Psalm 135:1735 אָזְנַ֣יִם לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ אַ֝֗ף אֵין־יֶשׁ־ר֥וּחַ בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 135:17
Psalm 135:18Those who make them will be like them; yes, everyone who trusts in them.
Psalm 135:1835 כְּ֭מוֹהֶם יִהְי֣וּ עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם כֹּ֭ל אֲשֶׁר־בֹּטֵ֣חַ בָּהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 135:18
Psalm 135:19House of Israel, praise Yahweh! House of Aaron, praise Yahweh!
Psalm 135:1935 בֵּ֣ית יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל בָּרֲכ֣וּ אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה בֵּ֥ית אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן בָּרֲכ֥וּ אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 135:19
Psalm 135:20House of Levi, praise Yahweh! You who fear Yahweh, praise Yahweh!
Psalm 135:2035 בֵּ֣ית הַ֭לֵּוִי בָּרֲכ֣וּ אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה יִֽרְאֵ֥י יְ֝הוָ֗ה בָּרֲכ֥וּ אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 135:20
Psalm 135:21Blessed be Yahweh from Zion, Who dwells at Jerusalem. Praise Yah!
Psalm 135:2135 בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ יְהוָ֨ה ׀ מִצִּיּ֗וֹן שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 135:21
Psalm 136:1Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good; for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 136:136 הוֹד֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:1
Psalm 136:2Give thanks to the God of gods; for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 136:236 ה֭וֹדוּ לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:2
Psalm 136:3Give thanks to the Lord of lords; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:336 ה֭וֹדוּ לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:3
Psalm 136:4To him who alone does great wonders; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:436 לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה נִפְלָא֣וֹת גְּדֹל֣וֹת לְבַדּ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:4
Psalm 136:5To him who by understanding made the heavens; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:536 לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:5
Psalm 136:6To him who spread out the earth above the waters; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:636 לְרֹקַ֣ע הָ֭אָרֶץ עַל־הַמָּ֑יִם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:6
Psalm 136:7To him who made the great lights; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:736 לְ֭עֹשֵׂה אוֹרִ֣ים גְּדֹלִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:7
Psalm 136:8The sun to rule by day; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:836 אֶת־הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת בַּיּ֑וֹם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:8
Psalm 136:9The moon and stars to rule by night; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:936 אֶת־הַיָּרֵ֣חַ וְ֭כוֹכָבִים לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת בַּלָּ֑יְלָה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:9
Psalm 136:10To him who struck down the Egyptian firstborn; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1036 לְמַכֵּ֣ה מִ֭צְרַיִם בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:10
Psalm 136:11And brought out Israel from among them; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1136 וַיּוֹצֵ֣א יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל מִתּוֹכָ֑ם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:11
Psalm 136:12With a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:1236 בְּיָ֣ד חֲ֭זָקָה וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ נְטוּיָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:12
Psalm 136:13To him who divided the Red Sea apart; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1336 לְגֹזֵ֣ר יַם־ס֭וּף לִגְזָרִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:13
Psalm 136:14And made Israel to pass through its midst; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1436 וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:14
Psalm 136:15But overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:1536 וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר פַּרְעֹ֣ה וְחֵיל֣וֹ בְיַם־ס֑וּף כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:15
Psalm 136:16To him who led his people through the wilderness; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:1636 לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ עַ֭מּוֹ בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:16
Psalm 136:17To him who struck great kings; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1736 לְ֭מַכֵּה מְלָכִ֣ים גְּדֹלִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:17
Psalm 136:18And killed mighty kings; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:1836 וֽ͏ַ֭יַּהֲרֹג מְלָכִ֣ים אַדִּירִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:18
Psalm 136:19Sihon king of the Amorites; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:1936 לְ֭סִיחוֹן מֶ֣לֶךְ הָאֱמֹרִ֑י כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:19
Psalm 136:20Og king of Bashan; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:2036 וּ֭לְעוֹג מֶ֣לֶךְ הַבָּשָׁ֑ן כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:20
Psalm 136:21And gave their land as an inheritance; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:2136 וְנָתַ֣ן אַרְצָ֣ם לְנַחֲלָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:21
Psalm 136:22Even a heritage to Israel his servant; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:2236 נַ֭חֲלָה לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עַבְדּ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:22
Psalm 136:23Who remembered us in our low estate; for his loving kindness endures forever;
Psalm 136:2336 שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ זָ֣כַר לָ֑נוּ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:23
Psalm 136:24And has delivered us from our adversaries; for his loving kindness endures forever:
Psalm 136:2436 וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:24
Psalm 136:25Who gives food to every creature; for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 136:2536 נֹתֵ֣ן לֶ֭חֶם לְכָל־בָּשָׂ֑ר כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:25
Psalm 136:26Oh give thanks to the God of heaven; for his loving kindness endures forever.
Psalm 136:2636 ה֭וֹדוּ לְאֵ֣ל הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 136:26
Psalm 137:1By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down. Yes, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
Psalm 137:137 עַ֥ל נַהֲר֨וֹת ׀ בָּבֶ֗ל שָׁ֣ם יָ֭שַׁבְנוּ גַּם־בָּכִ֑ינוּ בְּ֝זָכְרֵ֗נוּ אֶת־צִיּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 137:1
Psalm 137:2On the willows in its midst, we hung up our harps.
Psalm 137:237 עַֽל־עֲרָבִ֥ים בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ תָּ֝לִ֗ינוּ כִּנֹּרוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 137:2
Psalm 137:3For there, those who led us captive asked us for songs. Those who tormented us demanded songs of joy: |Sing us one of the songs of Zion!|
Psalm 137:337 כִּ֤י שָׁ֨ם שְֽׁאֵל֪וּנוּ שׁוֹבֵ֡ינוּ דִּבְרֵי־שִׁ֭יר וְתוֹלָלֵ֣ינוּ שִׂמְחָ֑ה שִׁ֥ירוּ לָ֝֗נוּ מִשִּׁ֥יר צִיּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 137:3
Psalm 137:4How can we sing Yahweh's song in a foreign land?
Psalm 137:437 אֵ֗יךְ נָשִׁ֥יר אֶת־שִׁיר־יְהוָ֑ה עַ֝֗ל אַדְמַ֥ת נֵכָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 137:4
Psalm 137:5If I forget you, Jerusalem, let my right hand forget its skill.
Psalm 137:537 אִֽם־אֶשְׁכָּחֵ֥ךְ יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח יְמִינֽ͏ִי׃ ‬
Psalm 137:5
Psalm 137:6Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth if I don't remember you; if I don't prefer Jerusalem above my chief joy.
Psalm 137:637 תִּדְבַּ֥ק־לְשׁוֹנִ֨י ׀ לְחִכִּי֮ אִם־לֹ֢א אֶ֫זְכְּרֵ֥כִי אִם־לֹ֣א אַ֭עֲלֶה אֶת־יְרוּשָׁלַ֑͏ִם עַ֝֗ל רֹ֣אשׁ שִׂמְחָתֽ͏ִי׃ ‬
Psalm 137:6
Psalm 137:7Remember, Yahweh, against the children of Edom, the day of Jerusalem; who said, |Raze it! Raze it even to its foundation!|
Psalm 137:737 זְכֹ֤ר יְהוָ֨ה ׀ לִבְנֵ֬י אֱד֗וֹם אֵת֮ י֤וֹם יְֽרוּשָׁ֫לָ֥͏ִם הָ֭אֹ֣מְרִים עָ֤רוּ ׀ עָ֑רוּ עַ֝֗ד הַיְס֥וֹד בָּֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 137:7
Psalm 137:8Daughter of Babylon, doomed to destruction, he will be happy who rewards you, as you have served us.
Psalm 137:837 בַּת־בָּבֶ֗ל הַשְּׁד֫וּדָ֥ה אַשְׁרֵ֥י שֶׁיְשַׁלֶּם־לָ֑ךְ אֶת־גְּ֝מוּלֵ֗ךְ שֶׁגָּמַ֥לְתְּ לָֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 137:8
Psalm 137:9Happy shall he be, who takes and dashes your little ones against the rock. By David.
Psalm 137:937 אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ שֶׁיֹּאחֵ֓ז וְנִפֵּ֬ץ אֶֽת־עֹ֝לָלַ֗יִךְ אֶל־הַסָּֽלַע׃ ‬
Psalm 137:9
Psalm 138:1I will give you thanks with my whole heart. Before the gods, I will sing praises to you.
Psalm 138:138 לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ אוֹדְךָ֥ בְכָל־לִבִּ֑י נֶ֖גֶד אֱלֹהִ֣ים אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 138:1
Psalm 138:2I will bow down toward your holy temple, and give thanks to your Name for your loving kindness and for your truth; for you have exalted your Name and your Word above all.
Psalm 138:238 אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה אֶל־הֵיכַ֪ל קָדְשְׁךָ֡ וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה אֶת־שְׁמֶ֗ךָ עַל־חַסְדְּךָ֥ וְעַל־אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ כִּֽי־הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ עַל־כָּל־שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 138:2
Psalm 138:3In the day that I called, you answered me. You encouraged me with strength in my soul.
Psalm 138:338 בְּי֣וֹם קָ֭רָֽאתִי וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי בְנַפְשִׁ֣י עֹֽז׃ ‬
Psalm 138:3
Psalm 138:4All the kings of the earth will give you thanks, Yahweh, for they have heard the words of your mouth.
Psalm 138:438 יוֹד֣וּךָ יְ֭הוָה כָּל־מַלְכֵי־אָ֑רֶץ כִּ֥י שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ אִמְרֵי־פִֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 138:4
Psalm 138:5Yes, they will sing of the ways of Yahweh; for great is Yahweh's glory.
Psalm 138:538 וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ בְּדַרְכֵ֣י יְהוָ֑ה כִּ֥י גָ֝ד֗וֹל כְּב֣וֹד יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 138:5
Psalm 138:6For though Yahweh is high, yet he looks after the lowly; but the proud, he knows from afar.
Psalm 138:638 כִּי־רָ֣ם יְ֭הוָה וְשָׁפָ֣ל יִרְאֶ֑ה וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק יְיֵדָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 138:6
Psalm 138:7Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you will revive me. You will stretch forth your hand against the wrath of my enemies. Your right hand will save me.
Psalm 138:738 אִם־אֵלֵ֤ךְ ׀ בְּקֶ֥רֶב צָרָ֗ה תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי עַ֤ל אַ֣ף אֹ֭יְבַי תִּשְׁלַ֣ח יָדֶ֑ךָ וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 138:7
Psalm 138:8Yahweh will fulfill that which concerns me; your loving kindness, Yahweh, endures forever. Don't forsake the works of your own hands. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 138:838 יְהוָה֮ יִגְמֹ֢ר בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י יְ֭הוָה חַסְדְּךָ֣ לְעוֹלָ֑ם מַעֲשֵׂ֖י יָדֶ֣יךָ אַל־תֶּֽרֶף׃ ‬
Psalm 138:8
Psalm 139:1Yahweh, you have searched me, and you know me.
Psalm 139:139 לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ לְדָוִ֣ד מִזְמ֑וֹר יְהוָ֥ה חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי וַתֵּדָֽע׃ ‬
Psalm 139:1
Psalm 139:2You know my sitting down and my rising up. You perceive my thoughts from afar.
Psalm 139:239 אַתָּ֣ה יָ֭דַעְתָּ שִׁבְתִּ֣י וְקוּמִ֑י בַּ֥נְתָּה לְ֝רֵעִ֗י מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ ‬
Psalm 139:2
Psalm 139:3You search out my path and my lying down, and are acquainted with all my ways.
Psalm 139:339 אָרְחִ֣י וְרִבְעִ֣י זֵרִ֑יתָ וְֽכָל־דְּרָכַ֥י הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 139:3
Psalm 139:4For there is not a word on my tongue, but, behold, Yahweh, you know it altogether.
Psalm 139:439 כִּ֤י אֵ֣ין מִ֭לָּה בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י הֵ֥ן יְ֝הוָ֗ה יָדַ֥עְתָּ כֻלָּֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:4
Psalm 139:5You hem me in behind and before. You laid your hand on me.
Psalm 139:539 אָח֣וֹר וָקֶ֣דֶם צַרְתָּ֑נִי וַתָּ֖שֶׁת עָלַ֣י כַּפֶּֽכָה׃ ‬
Psalm 139:5
Psalm 139:6This knowledge is beyond me. It's lofty. I can't attain it.
Psalm 139:639 *פלאיה **פְּלִ֣יאָֽה דַ֣עַת מִמֶּ֑נִּי נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה לֹא־א֥וּכַֽל לָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:6
Psalm 139:7Where could I go from your Spirit? Or where could I flee from your presence?
Psalm 139:739 אָ֭נָ֥ה אֵלֵ֣ךְ מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ וְ֝אָ֗נָה מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ אֶבְרָֽח׃ ‬
Psalm 139:7
Psalm 139:8If I ascend up into heaven, you are there. If I make my bed in Sheol, behold, you are there!
Psalm 139:839 אִם־אֶסַּ֣ק שָׁ֭מַיִם שָׁ֣ם אָ֑תָּה וְאַצִּ֖יעָה שְּׁא֣וֹל הִנֶּֽךָּ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:8
Psalm 139:9If I take the wings of the dawn, and settle in the uttermost parts of the sea;
Psalm 139:939 אֶשָּׂ֥א כַנְפֵי־שָׁ֑חַר אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית יָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 139:9
Psalm 139:10Even there your hand will lead me, and your right hand will hold me.
Psalm 139:1039 גַּם־שָׁ֭ם יָדְךָ֣ תַנְחֵ֑נִי וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:10
Psalm 139:11If I say, |Surely the darkness will overwhelm me; the light around me will be night;|
Psalm 139:1139 וָ֭אֹמַר אַךְ־חֹ֣שֶׁךְ יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה א֣וֹר בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 139:11
Psalm 139:12even the darkness doesn't hide from you, but the night shines as the day. The darkness is like light to you.
Psalm 139:1239 גַּם־חֹשֶׁךְ֮ לֹֽא־יַחְשִׁ֢יךְ מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָ וְ֭לַיְלָה כַּיּ֣וֹם יָאִ֑יר כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה כָּאוֹרָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 139:12
Psalm 139:13For you formed my inmost being. You knit me together in my mother's womb.
Psalm 139:1339 כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה קָנִ֣יתָ כִלְיֹתָ֑י תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי בְּבֶ֣טֶן אִמִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 139:13
Psalm 139:14I will give thanks to you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Your works are wonderful. My soul knows that very well.
Psalm 139:1439 אֽוֹדְךָ֗ עַ֤ל כִּ֥י נוֹרָא֗וֹת נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי נִפְלָאִ֥ים מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י יֹדַ֥עַת מְאֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 139:14
Psalm 139:15My frame wasn't hidden from you, when I was made in secret, woven together in the depths of the earth.
Psalm 139:1539 לֹא־נִכְחַ֥ד עָצְמִ֗י מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ אֲשֶׁר־עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי בַסֵּ֑תֶר רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:15
Psalm 139:16Your eyes saw my body. In your book they were all written, the days that were ordained for me, when as yet there were none of them.
Psalm 139:1639 גָּלְמִ֤י ׀ רָ֘א֤וּ עֵינֶ֗יךָ וְעַֽל־סִפְרְךָ֮ כֻּלָּ֢ם יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ יָמִ֥ים יֻצָּ֑רוּ *ולא **וְל֖וֹ אֶחָ֣ד בָּהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 139:16
Psalm 139:17How precious to me are your thoughts, God! How vast is the sum of them!
Psalm 139:1739 וְלִ֗י מַה־יָּקְר֣וּ רֵעֶ֣יךָ אֵ֑ל מֶ֥ה עָ֝צְמוּ רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 139:17
Psalm 139:18If I would count them, they are more in number than the sand. When I wake up, I am still with you.
Psalm 139:1839 אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם מֵח֣וֹל יִרְבּ֑וּן הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי וְעוֹדִ֥י עִמָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:18
Psalm 139:19If only you, God, would kill the wicked. Get away from me, you bloodthirsty men!
Psalm 139:1939 אִם־תִּקְטֹ֖ל אֱל֥וֹהַּ ׀ רָשָׁ֑ע וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י דָ֝מִ֗ים ס֣וּרוּ מֶֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 139:19
Psalm 139:20For they speak against you wickedly. Your enemies take your name in vain.
Psalm 139:2039 אֲשֶׁ֣ר יֹ֭אמְרֻךָ לִמְזִמָּ֑ה נָשֻׂ֖א לַשָּׁ֣וְא עָרֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 139:20
Psalm 139:21Yahweh, don't I hate those who hate you? Am I not grieved with those who rise up against you?
Psalm 139:2139 הֲלֽוֹא־מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ יְהוָ֥ה ׀ אֶשְׂנָ֑א וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃ ‬
Psalm 139:21
Psalm 139:22I hate them with perfect hatred. They have become my enemies.
Psalm 139:2239 תַּכְלִ֣ית שִׂנְאָ֣ה שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים הָ֣יוּ לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 139:22
Psalm 139:23Search me, God, and know my heart. Try me, and know my thoughts.
Psalm 139:2339 חָקְרֵ֣נִי אֵ֭ל וְדַ֣ע לְבָבִ֑י בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי וְדַ֣ע שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 139:23
Psalm 139:24See if there is any wicked way in me, and lead me in the everlasting way. For the Chief Musician. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 139:2439 וּרְאֵ֗ה אִם־דֶּֽרֶךְ־עֹ֥צֶב בִּ֑י וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 139:24
Psalm 140:1Deliver me, Yahweh, from the evil man. Preserve me from the violent man;
Psalm 140:140 לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 140:1
Psalm 140:2those who devise mischief in their hearts. They continually gather themselves together for war.
Psalm 140:240 חַלְּצֵ֣נִי יְ֭הוָה מֵאָדָ֣ם רָ֑ע מֵאִ֖ישׁ חֲמָסִ֣ים תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃ ‬
Psalm 140:2
Psalm 140:3They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent. Viper's poison is under their lips. Selah.
Psalm 140:340 אֲשֶׁ֤ר חָשְׁב֣וּ רָע֣וֹת בְּלֵ֑ב כָּל־י֝֗וֹם יָג֥וּרוּ מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 140:3
Psalm 140:4Yahweh, keep me from the hands of the wicked. Preserve me from the violent men who have determined to trip my feet.
Psalm 140:440 שָֽׁנֲנ֣וּ לְשׁוֹנָם֮ כְּֽמוֹ־נָ֫חָ֥שׁ חֲמַ֥ת עַכְשׁ֑וּב תַּ֖חַת שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 140:4
Psalm 140:5The proud have hidden a snare for me, they have spread the cords of a net by the path. They have set traps for me. Selah.
Psalm 140:540 שָׁמְרֵ֤נִי יְהוָ֨ה ׀ מִ֘ידֵ֤י רָשָׁ֗ע מֵאִ֣ישׁ חֲמָסִ֣ים תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי אֲשֶׁ֥ר חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ לִדְח֥וֹת פְּעָמָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 140:5
Psalm 140:6I said to Yahweh, |You are my God.| Listen to the cry of my petitions, Yahweh.
Psalm 140:640 טָֽמְנֽוּ־גֵאִ֨ים ׀ פַּ֡ח לִ֗י וַחֲבָלִ֗ים פָּ֣רְשׂוּ רֶ֭שֶׁת לְיַד־מַעְגָּ֑ל מֹקְשִׁ֖ים שָֽׁתוּ־לִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 140:6
Psalm 140:7Yahweh, the Lord, the strength of my salvation, you have covered my head in the day of battle.
Psalm 140:740 אָמַ֣רְתִּי לַ֭יהוָה אֵ֣לִי אָ֑תָּה הַאֲזִ֥ינָה יְ֝הוָ֗ה ק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 140:7
Psalm 140:8Yahweh, don't grant the desires of the wicked. Don't let their evil plans succeed, or they will become proud. Selah.
Psalm 140:840 יְהֹוִ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי עֹ֣ז יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י סַכֹּ֥תָה לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י בְּי֣וֹם נָֽשֶׁק׃ ‬
Psalm 140:8
Psalm 140:9As for the head of those who surround me, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
Psalm 140:940 אַל־תִּתֵּ֣ן יְ֭הוָה מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י רָשָׁ֑ע זְמָמ֥וֹ אַל־תָּ֝פֵ֗ק יָר֥וּמוּ סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 140:9
Psalm 140:10Let burning coals fall on them. Let them be thrown into the fire, into miry pits, from where they never rise.
Psalm 140:1040 רֹ֥אשׁ מְסִבָּ֑י עֲמַ֖ל שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ *יכסומו **יְכַסֵּֽמוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 140:10
Psalm 140:11An evil speaker won't be established in the earth. Evil will hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
Psalm 140:1140 *ימיטו **יִמּ֥וֹטוּ עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם גֶּֽחָ֫לִ֥ים בָּאֵ֥שׁ יַפִּלֵ֑ם בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת בַּֽל־יָקֽוּמוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 140:11
Psalm 140:12I know that Yahweh will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and justice for the needy.
Psalm 140:1240 אִ֥ישׁ לָשׁוֹן֮ בַּל־יִכּ֢וֹן בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ אִישׁ־חָמָ֥ס רָ֑ע יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 140:12
Psalm 140:13Surely the righteous will give thanks to your name. The upright will dwell in your presence. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 140:1340 *ידעת **יָדַ֗עְתִּי כִּֽי־יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה יְ֭הוָה דִּ֣ין עָנִ֑י מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 140:13
Psalm 140:14(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 140:1440 אַ֣ךְ צַ֭דִּיקִים יוֹד֣וּ לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ יֵשְׁב֥וּ יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים אֶת־פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 140:14
Psalm 141:1Yahweh, I have called on you. Come to me quickly! Listen to my voice when I call to you.
Psalm 141:141 מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהוָ֣ה קְ֭רָאתִיךָ ח֣וּשָׁה לִּ֑י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה ק֝וֹלִ֗י בְּקָרְאִי־לָֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 141:1
Psalm 141:2Let my prayer be set before you like incense; the lifting up of my hands like the evening sacrifice.
Psalm 141:241 תִּכּ֤וֹן תְּפִלָּתִ֣י קְטֹ֣רֶת לְפָנֶ֑יךָ מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת כַּ֝פַּ֗י מִנְחַת־עָֽרֶב׃ ‬
Psalm 141:2
Psalm 141:3Set a watch, Yahweh, before my mouth. Keep the door of my lips.
Psalm 141:341 שִׁיתָ֣ה יְ֭הוָה שָׁמְרָ֣ה לְפִ֑י נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה עַל־דַּ֥ל שְׂפָתָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 141:3
Psalm 141:4Don't incline my heart to any evil thing, to practice deeds of wickedness with men who work iniquity. Don't let me eat of their delicacies.
Psalm 141:441 אַל־תַּט־לִבִּ֨י לְדָבָ֪ר ׀ רָ֡ע לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל עֲלִל֨וֹת ׀ בְּרֶ֗שַׁע אֶת־אִישִׁ֥ים פֹּֽעֲלֵי־אָ֑וֶן וּבַל־אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 141:4
Psalm 141:5Let the righteous strike me, it is kindness; let him reprove me, it is like oil on the head; don't let my head refuse it; Yet my prayer is always against evil deeds.
Psalm 141:541 יֶֽהֶלְמֵֽנִי־צַדִּ֨יק ׀ חֶ֡סֶד וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי שֶׁ֣מֶן רֹ֭אשׁ אַל־יָנִ֣י רֹאשִׁ֑י כִּי־ע֥וֹד וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 141:5
Psalm 141:6Their judges are thrown down by the sides of the rock. They will hear my words, for they are well spoken.
Psalm 141:641 נִשְׁמְט֣וּ בִֽידֵי־סֶ֭לַע שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם וְשָׁמְע֥וּ אֲ֝מָרַ֗י כִּ֣י נָעֵֽמוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 141:6
Psalm 141:7|As when one plows and breaks up the earth, our bones are scattered at the mouth of Sheol.|
Psalm 141:741 כְּמ֤וֹ פֹלֵ֣חַ וּבֹקֵ֣עַ בָּאָ֑רֶץ נִפְזְר֥וּ עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ לְפִ֣י שְׁאֽוֹל׃ ‬
Psalm 141:7
Psalm 141:8For my eyes are on you, Yahweh, the Lord. In you, I take refuge. Don't leave my soul destitute.
Psalm 141:841 כִּ֤י אֵלֶ֨יךָ ׀ יְהֹוִ֣ה אֲדֹנָ֣י עֵינָ֑י בְּכָ֥ה חָ֝סִ֗יתִי אַל־תְּעַ֥ר נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 141:8
Psalm 141:9Keep me from the snare which they have laid for me, from the traps of the workers of iniquity.
Psalm 141:941 שָׁמְרֵ֗נִי מִ֣ידֵי פַ֭ח יָ֣קְשׁוּ לִ֑י וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃ ‬
Psalm 141:9
Psalm 141:10Let the wicked fall together into their own nets, while I pass by. A contemplation by David, when he was in the cave. A Prayer.
Psalm 141:1041 יִפְּל֣וּ בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו רְשָׁעִ֑ים יַ֥חַד אָ֝נֹכִ֗י עַֽד־אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 141:10
Psalm 142:1I cry with my voice to Yahweh. With my voice, I ask Yahweh for mercy.
Psalm 142:142 מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִ֑ד בִּהְיוֹת֖וֹ בַמְּעָרָ֣ה תְפִלָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 142:1
Psalm 142:2I pour out my complaint before him. I tell him my troubles.
Psalm 142:242 ק֭וֹלִי אֶל־יְהוָ֣ה אֶזְעָ֑ק ק֝וֹלִ֗י אֶל־יְהוָ֥ה אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ ‬
Psalm 142:2
Psalm 142:3When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, you knew my path. In the way in which I walk, they have hidden a snare for me.
Psalm 142:342 אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ לְפָנָ֣יו שִׂיחִ֑י צָ֝רָתִ֗י לְפָנָ֥יו אַגִּֽיד׃ ‬
Psalm 142:3
Psalm 142:4Look on my right, and see; for there is no one who is concerned for me. Refuge has fled from me. No one cares for my soul.
Psalm 142:442 בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף עָלַ֨י ׀ רוּחִ֗י וְאַתָּה֮ יָדַ֢עְתָּ נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י בְּאֹֽרַח־ז֥וּ אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ טָמְנ֖וּ פַ֣ח לִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 142:4
Psalm 142:5I cried to you, Yahweh. I said, |You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living.|
Psalm 142:542 הַבֵּ֤יט יָמִ֨ין ׀ וּרְאֵה֮ וְאֵֽין־לִ֢י מַ֫כִּ֥יר אָבַ֣ד מָנ֣וֹס מִמֶּ֑נִּי אֵ֖ין דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 142:5
Psalm 142:6Listen to my cry, for I am in desperate need. deliver me from my persecutors, For they are stronger than me.
Psalm 142:642 זָעַ֥קְתִּי אֵלֶ֗יךָ יְה֫וָ֥ה אָ֭מַרְתִּי אַתָּ֣ה מַחְסִ֑י חֶ֝לְקִ֗י בְּאֶ֣רֶץ הַֽחַיִּים׃ ‬
Psalm 142:6
Psalm 142:7Bring my soul out of prison, that I may give thanks to your name. The righteous will surround me, for you will be good to me. A Psalm by David.
Psalm 142:742 הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ אֶֽל־רִנָּתִי֮ כִּֽי־דַלּ֢וֹתִ֫י מְאֹ֥ד הַצִּילֵ֥נִי מֵרֹדְפַ֑י כִּ֖י אָמְצ֣וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ ‬
Psalm 142:7
Psalm 142:8(Verse absent in World English Bible)
Psalm 142:842 ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר ׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ לְהוֹד֢וֹת אֶת־שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ בִּ֭י יַכְתִּ֣רוּ צַדִּיקִ֑ים כִּ֖י תִגְמֹ֣ל עָלֽ͏ָי׃ ‬
Psalm 142:8
Psalm 143:1Hear my prayer, Yahweh. Listen to my petitions. In your faithfulness and righteousness, relieve me.
Psalm 143:143 מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהוָ֤ה ׀ שְׁמַ֬ע תְּפִלָּתִ֗י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה אֶל־תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 143:1
Psalm 143:2Don't enter into judgment with your servant, for in your sight no man living is righteous.
Psalm 143:243 וְאַל־תָּב֣וֹא בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט אֶת־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֤י לֹֽא־יִצְדַּ֖ק לְפָנֶ֣יךָ כָל־חָֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 143:2
Psalm 143:3For the enemy pursues my soul. He has struck my life down to the ground. He has made me live in dark places, as those who have been long dead.
Psalm 143:343 כִּ֥י רָ֘דַ֤ף אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י דִּכָּ֣א לָ֭אָרֶץ חַיָּתִ֑י הוֹשִׁיבַ֥נִי בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים כְּמֵתֵ֥י עוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 143:3
Psalm 143:4Therefore my spirit is overwhelmed within me. My heart within me is desolate.
Psalm 143:443 וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף עָלַ֣י רוּחִ֑י בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם לִבִּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 143:4
Psalm 143:5I remember the days of old. I meditate on all your doings. I contemplate the work of your hands.
Psalm 143:543 זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי יָמִ֨ים ׀ מִקֶּ֗דֶם הָגִ֥יתִי בְכָל־פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה יָדֶ֣יךָ אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃ ‬
Psalm 143:5
Psalm 143:6I spread forth my hands to you. My soul thirsts for you, like a parched land. Selah.
Psalm 143:643 פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי יָדַ֣י אֵלֶ֑יךָ נַפְשִׁ֓י ׀ כְּאֶֽרֶץ־עֲיֵפָ֖ה לְךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃ ‬
Psalm 143:6
Psalm 143:7Hurry to answer me, Yahweh. My spirit fails. Don't hide your face from me, so that I don't become like those who go down into the pit.
Psalm 143:743 מַ֘הֵ֤ר עֲנֵ֨נִי ׀ יְהוָה֮ כָּלְתָ֢ה ר֫וּחִ֥י אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֣ר פָּנֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי עִם־יֹ֥רְדֵי בֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 143:7
Psalm 143:8Cause me to hear your loving kindness in the morning, for I trust in you. Cause me to know the way in which I should walk, for I lift up my soul to you.
Psalm 143:843 הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי בַבֹּ֨קֶר ׀ חַסְדֶּךָ֮ כִּֽי־בְךָ֢ בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי דֶּֽרֶךְ־ז֥וּ אֵלֵ֑ךְ כִּֽי־אֵ֝לֶיךָ נָשָׂ֥אתִי נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 143:8
Psalm 143:9Deliver me, Yahweh, from my enemies. I flee to you to hide me.
Psalm 143:943 הַצִּילֵ֖נִי מֵאֹיְבַ֥י ׀ יְהוָ֗ה אֵלֶ֥יךָ כִסִּֽתִי׃ ‬
Psalm 143:9
Psalm 143:10Teach me to do your will, for you are my God. Your Spirit is good. Lead me in the land of uprightness.
Psalm 143:1043 לַמְּדֵ֤נִי ׀ לַֽעֲשׂ֣וֹת רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֢ה אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י רוּחֲךָ֥ טוֹבָ֑ה תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִישֽׁוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 143:10
Psalm 143:11Revive me, Yahweh, for your name's sake. In your righteousness, bring my soul out of trouble.
Psalm 143:1143 לְמַֽעַן־שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓ ׀ תוֹצִ֖יא מִצָּרָ֣ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃ ‬
Psalm 143:11
Psalm 143:12In your loving kindness, cut off my enemies, and destroy all those who afflict my soul, For I am your servant. By David.
Psalm 143:1243 וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ תַּצְמִ֢ית אֹ֫יְבָ֥י וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ כָּל־צֹרֲרֵ֣י נַפְשִׁ֑י כִּ֝֗י אֲנִ֣י עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Psalm 143:12
Psalm 144:1Blessed be Yahweh, my rock, who teaches my hands to war, and my fingers to battle:
Psalm 144:144 לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ יְהוָ֨ה ׀ צוּרִ֗י הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד יָדַ֣י לַקְרָ֑ב אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 144:1
Psalm 144:2my loving kindness, my fortress, my high tower, my deliverer, my shield, and he in whom I take refuge; who subdues my people under me.
Psalm 144:244 חַסְדִּ֥י וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ מִשְׂגַּבִּ֢י וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י לִ֥י מָ֭גִנִּי וּב֣וֹ חָסִ֑יתִי הָרוֹדֵ֖ד עַמִּ֣י תַחְתָּֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 144:2
Psalm 144:3Yahweh, what is man, that you care for him? Or the son of man, that you think of him?
Psalm 144:344 יְֽהוָ֗ה מָה־אָ֭דָם וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ בֶּן־אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 144:3
Psalm 144:4Man is like a breath. His days are like a shadow that passes away.
Psalm 144:444 אָ֭דָם לַהֶ֣בֶל דָּמָ֑ה יָ֝מָ֗יו כְּצֵ֣ל עוֹבֵֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 144:4
Psalm 144:5Part your heavens, Yahweh, and come down. Touch the mountains, and they will smoke.
Psalm 144:544 יְ֭הוָה הַט־שָׁמֶ֣יךָ וְתֵרֵ֑ד גַּ֖ע בֶּהָרִ֣ים וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 144:5
Psalm 144:6Throw out lightning, and scatter them. Send out your arrows, and rout them.
Psalm 144:644 בְּר֣וֹק בָּ֭רָק וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם שְׁלַ֥ח חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 144:6
Psalm 144:7Stretch out your hand from above, rescue me, and deliver me out of great waters, out of the hands of foreigners;
Psalm 144:744 שְׁלַ֥ח יָדֶ֗יךָ מִמָּ֫ר֥וֹם פְּצֵ֣נִי וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי מִמַּ֣יִם רַבִּ֑ים מִ֝יַּ֗ד בְּנֵ֣י נֵכָֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 144:7
Psalm 144:8whose mouths speak deceit, Whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
Psalm 144:844 אֲשֶׁ֣ר פִּ֭יהֶם דִּבֶּר־שָׁ֑וְא וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם יְמִ֣ין שָֽׁקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 144:8
Psalm 144:9I will sing a new song to you, God. On a ten-stringed lyre, I will sing praises to you.
Psalm 144:944 אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים שִׁ֣יר חָ֭דָשׁ אָשִׁ֣ירָה לָּ֑ךְ בְּנֵ֥בֶל עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר אֲזַמְּרָה־לָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 144:9
Psalm 144:10You are he who gives salvation to kings, who rescues David, his servant, from the deadly sword.
Psalm 144:1044 הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים הַ֭פּוֹצֶה אֶת־דָּוִ֥ד עַבְדּ֗וֹ מֵחֶ֥רֶב רָעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 144:10
Psalm 144:11Rescue me, and deliver me out of the hands of foreigners, whose mouths speak deceit, whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
Psalm 144:1144 פְּצֵ֥נִי וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ מִיַּ֢ד בְּֽנֵי־נֵ֫כָ֥ר אֲשֶׁ֣ר פִּ֭יהֶם דִּבֶּר־שָׁ֑וְא וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם יְמִ֣ין שָֽׁקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 144:11
Psalm 144:12Then our sons will be like well-nurtured plants, our daughters like pillars carved to adorn a palace.
Psalm 144:1244 אֲשֶׁ֤ר בָּנֵ֨ינוּ ׀ כִּנְטִעִים֮ מְגֻדָּלִ֢ים בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת תַּבְנִ֥ית הֵיכָֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 144:12
Psalm 144:13Our barns are full, filled with all kinds of provision. Our sheep bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our fields.
Psalm 144:1344 מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ מְלֵאִים֮ מְפִיקִ֥ים מִזַּ֗ן אֶ֫ל־זַ֥ן צֹאונֵ֣נוּ מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 144:13
Psalm 144:14Our oxen will pull heavy loads. There is no breaking in, and no going away, and no outcry in our streets.
Psalm 144:1444 אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים אֵֽין־פֶּ֭רֶץ וְאֵ֣ין יוֹצֵ֑את וְאֵ֥ין צְ֝וָחָ֗ה בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 144:14
Psalm 144:15Happy are the people who are in such a situation. Happy are the people whose God is Yahweh. A praise psalm by David.
Psalm 144:1544 אַשְׁרֵ֣י הָ֭עָם שֶׁכָּ֣כָה לּ֑וֹ אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י הָ֝עָ֗ם שֶׁיֲהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 144:15
Psalm 145:1I will exalt you, my God, the King. I will praise your name forever and ever.
Psalm 145:145 תְּהִלָּ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ אֱלוֹהַ֣י הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ וַאֲבָרֲכָ֥ה שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 145:1
Psalm 145:2Every day I will praise you. I will extol your name forever and ever.
Psalm 145:245 בְּכָל־י֥וֹם אֲבָרֲכֶ֑ךָּ וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 145:2
Psalm 145:3Great is Yahweh, and greatly to be praised! His greatness is unsearchable.
Psalm 145:345 גָּ֘ד֤וֹל יְהוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ אֵ֣ין חֵֽקֶר׃ ‬
Psalm 145:3
Psalm 145:4One generation will commend your works to another, and will declare your mighty acts.
Psalm 145:445 דּ֣וֹר לְ֭דוֹר יְשַׁבַּ֣ח מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ יַגִּֽידוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 145:4
Psalm 145:5Of the glorious majesty of your honor, of your wondrous works, I will meditate.
Psalm 145:545 הֲ֭דַר כְּב֣וֹד הוֹדֶ֑ךָ וְדִבְרֵ֖י נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֣יךָ אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ ‬
Psalm 145:5
Psalm 145:6Men will speak of the might of your awesome acts. I will declare your greatness.
Psalm 145:645 וֶעֱז֣וּז נוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ יֹאמֵ֑רוּ *וגדולתיך **וּגְדוּלָּתְךָ֥ אֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ ‬
Psalm 145:6
Psalm 145:7They will utter the memory of your great goodness, and will sing of your righteousness.
Psalm 145:745 זֵ֣כֶר רַב־טוּבְךָ֣ יַבִּ֑יעוּ וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 145:7
Psalm 145:8Yahweh is gracious, merciful, slow to anger, and of great loving kindness.
Psalm 145:845 חַנּ֣וּן וְרַח֣וּם יְהוָ֑ה אֶ֥רֶךְ אַ֝פַּ֗יִם וּגְדָל־חָֽסֶד׃ ‬
Psalm 145:8
Psalm 145:9Yahweh is good to all. His tender mercies are over all his works.
Psalm 145:945 טוֹב־יְהוָ֥ה לַכֹּ֑ל וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו עַל־כָּל־מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ ‬
Psalm 145:9
Psalm 145:10All your works will give thanks to you, Yahweh. Your saints will extol you.
Psalm 145:1045 יוֹד֣וּךָ יְ֭הוָה כָּל־מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ יְבָרֲכֽוּכָה׃ ‬
Psalm 145:10
Psalm 145:11They will speak of the glory of your kingdom, and talk about your power;
Psalm 145:1145 כְּב֣וֹד מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ יֹאמֵ֑רוּ וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 145:11
Psalm 145:12to make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, the glory of the majesty of his kingdom.
Psalm 145:1245 לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ ׀ לִבְנֵ֣י הָ֭אָדָם גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו וּ֝כְב֗וֹד הֲדַ֣ר מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 145:12
Psalm 145:13Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom. Your dominion endures throughout all generations. Yahweh is faithful in all his words, and loving in all his deeds.
Psalm 145:1345 מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ מַלְכ֥וּת כָּל־עֹֽלָמִ֑ים וּ֝מֶֽמְשֶׁלְתְּךָ֗ בְּכָל־דּ֥וֹר וָדֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 145:13
Psalm 145:14Yahweh upholds all who fall, and raises up all those who are bowed down.
Psalm 145:1445 סוֹמֵ֣ךְ יְ֭הוָה לְכָל־הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף לְכָל־הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 145:14
Psalm 145:15The eyes of all wait for you. You give them their food in due season.
Psalm 145:1545 עֵֽינֵי־כֹ֭ל אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ וְאַתָּ֤ה נֽוֹתֵן־לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־אָכְלָ֣ם בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 145:15
Psalm 145:16You open your hand, and satisfy the desire of every living thing.
Psalm 145:1645 פּוֹתֵ֥חַ אֶת־יָדֶ֑ךָ וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ לְכָל־חַ֣י רָצֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 145:16
Psalm 145:17Yahweh is righteous in all his ways, and gracious in all his works.
Psalm 145:1745 צַדִּ֣יק יְ֭הוָה בְּכָל־דְּרָכָ֑יו וְ֝חָסִ֗יד בְּכָל־מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ ‬
Psalm 145:17
Psalm 145:18Yahweh is near to all those who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.
Psalm 145:1845 קָר֣וֹב יְ֭הוָה לְכָל־קֹרְאָ֑יו לְכֹ֤ל אֲשֶׁ֖ר יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ בֶאֱמֶֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 145:18
Psalm 145:19He will fulfill the desire of those who fear him. He also will hear their cry, and will save them.
Psalm 145:1945 רְצוֹן־יְרֵאָ֥יו יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה וְֽאֶת־שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 145:19
Psalm 145:20Yahweh preserves all those who love him, but all the wicked he will destroy.
Psalm 145:2045 שׁוֹמֵ֣ר יְ֭הוָה אֶת־כָּל־אֹהֲבָ֑יו וְאֵ֖ת כָּל־הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים יַשְׁמִֽיד׃ ‬
Psalm 145:20
Psalm 145:21My mouth will speak the praise of Yahweh. Let all flesh bless his holy name forever and ever.
Psalm 145:2145 תְּהִלַּ֥ת יְהוָ֗ה יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־פִּ֥י וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ כָּל־בָּ֭שָׂר שֵׁ֥ם קָדְשׁ֗וֹ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 145:21
Psalm 146:1Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh, my soul.
Psalm 146:146 הַֽלְלוּ־יָ֡הּ הַלְלִ֥י נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְהוָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 146:1
Psalm 146:2While I live, I will praise Yahweh. I will sing praises to my God as long as I exist.
Psalm 146:246 אֲהַלְלָ֣ה יְהוָ֣ה בְּחַיָּ֑י אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה לֵֽאלֹהַ֣י בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ ‬
Psalm 146:2
Psalm 146:3Don't put your trust in princes, each a son of man in whom there is no help.
Psalm 146:346 אַל־תִּבְטְח֥וּ בִנְדִיבִ֑ים בְּבֶן־אָדָ֓ם ׀ שֶׁ֤אֵֽין ל֥וֹ תְשׁוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 146:3
Psalm 146:4His spirit departs, and he returns to the earth. In that very day, his thoughts perish.
Psalm 146:446 תֵּצֵ֣א ר֭וּחוֹ יָשֻׁ֣ב לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ בַּיּ֥וֹם הַ֝ה֗וּא אָבְד֥וּ עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 146:4
Psalm 146:5Happy is he who has the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in Yahweh, his God:
Psalm 146:546 אַשְׁרֵ֗י שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל יַעֲקֹ֣ב בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ עַל־יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 146:5
Psalm 146:6who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that is in them; who keeps truth forever;
Psalm 146:646 עֹשֶׂ֤ה ׀ שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם וָאָ֗רֶץ אֶת־הַיָּ֥ם וְאֶת־כָּל־אֲשֶׁר־בָּ֑ם הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר אֱמֶ֣ת לְעוֹלָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 146:6
Psalm 146:7who executes justice for the oppressed; who gives food to the hungry. Yahweh frees the prisoners.
Psalm 146:746 עֹשֶׂ֤ה מִשְׁפָּ֨ט ׀ לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים נֹתֵ֣ן לֶ֭חֶם לָרְעֵבִ֑ים יְ֝הוָ֗ה מַתִּ֥יר אֲסוּרִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 146:7
Psalm 146:8Yahweh opens the eyes of the blind. Yahweh raises up those who are bowed down. Yahweh loves the righteous.
Psalm 146:846 יְהוָ֤ה ׀ פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ עִוְרִ֗ים יְ֭הוָה זֹקֵ֣ף כְּפוּפִ֑ים יְ֝הוָ֗ה אֹהֵ֥ב צַדִּיקִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 146:8
Psalm 146:9Yahweh preserves the foreigners. He upholds the fatherless and widow, but the way of the wicked he turns upside down.
Psalm 146:946 יְהוָ֤ה ׀ שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר אֶת־גֵּרִ֗ים יָת֣וֹם וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה יְעוֹדֵ֑ד וְדֶ֖רֶךְ רְשָׁעִ֣ים יְעַוֵּֽת׃ ‬
Psalm 146:9
Psalm 146:10Yahweh will reign forever; your God, O Zion, to all generations. Praise Yah!
Psalm 146:1046 יִמְלֹ֤ךְ יְהוָ֨ה ׀ לְעוֹלָ֗ם אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ צִ֭יּוֹן לְדֹ֥ר וָדֹ֗ר הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 146:10
Psalm 147:1Praise Yah, for it is good to sing praises to our God; for it is pleasant and fitting to praise him.
Psalm 147:147 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ כִּי־ט֭וֹב זַמְּרָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ כִּֽי־נָ֝עִים נָאוָ֥ה תְהִלָּֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 147:1
Psalm 147:2Yahweh builds up Jerusalem. He gathers together the outcasts of Israel.
Psalm 147:247 בּוֹנֵ֣ה יְרוּשָׁלַ֣͏ִם יְהוָ֑ה נִדְחֵ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל יְכַנֵּֽס׃ ‬
Psalm 147:2
Psalm 147:3He heals the broken in heart, and binds up their wounds.
Psalm 147:347 הָ֭רֹפֵא לִשְׁב֣וּרֵי לֵ֑ב וּ֝מְחַבֵּ֗שׁ לְעַצְּבוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 147:3
Psalm 147:4He counts the number of the stars. He calls them all by their names.
Psalm 147:447 מוֹנֶ֣ה מִ֭סְפָּר לַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים לְ֝כֻלָּ֗ם שֵׁמ֥וֹת יִקְרָֽא׃ ‬
Psalm 147:4
Psalm 147:5Great is our Lord, and mighty in power. His understanding is infinite.
Psalm 147:547 גָּד֣וֹל אֲדוֹנֵ֣ינוּ וְרַב־כֹּ֑חַ לִ֝תְבוּנָת֗וֹ אֵ֣ין מִסְפָּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 147:5
Psalm 147:6Yahweh upholds the humble. He brings the wicked down to the ground.
Psalm 147:647 מְעוֹדֵ֣ד עֲנָוִ֣ים יְהוָ֑ה מַשְׁפִּ֖יל רְשָׁעִ֣ים עֲדֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:6
Psalm 147:7Sing to Yahweh with thanksgiving. Sing praises on the harp to our God,
Psalm 147:747 עֱנ֣וּ לַיהוָ֣ה בְּתוֹדָ֑ה זַמְּר֖וּ לֵאלֹהֵ֣ינוּ בְכִנּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 147:7
Psalm 147:8who covers the sky with clouds, who prepares rain for the earth, who makes grass grow on the mountains.
Psalm 147:847 הַֽמְכַסֶּ֬ה שָׁמַ֨יִם ׀ בְּעָבִ֗ים הַמֵּכִ֣ין לָאָ֣רֶץ מָטָ֑ר הַמַּצְמִ֖יחַ הָרִ֣ים חָצִֽיר׃ ‬
Psalm 147:8
Psalm 147:9He provides food for the livestock, and for the young ravens when they call.
Psalm 147:947 נוֹתֵ֣ן לִבְהֵמָ֣ה לַחְמָ֑הּ לִבְנֵ֥י עֹ֝רֵ֗ב אֲשֶׁ֣ר יִקְרָֽאוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:9
Psalm 147:10He doesn't delight in the strength of the horse. He takes no pleasure in the legs of a man.
Psalm 147:1047 לֹ֤א בִגְבוּרַ֣ת הַסּ֣וּס יֶחְפָּ֑ץ לֹֽא־בְשׁוֹקֵ֖י הָאִ֣ישׁ יִרְצֶֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 147:10
Psalm 147:11Yahweh takes pleasure in those who fear him, in those who hope in his loving kindness.
Psalm 147:1147 רוֹצֶ֣ה יְ֭הוָה אֶת־יְרֵאָ֑יו אֶת־הַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:11
Psalm 147:12Praise Yahweh, Jerusalem! Praise your God, Zion!
Psalm 147:1247 שַׁבְּחִ֣י יְ֭רוּשָׁלִַם אֶת־יְהוָ֑ה הַֽלְלִ֖י אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ צִיּֽוֹן׃ ‬
Psalm 147:12
Psalm 147:13For he has strengthened the bars of your gates. He has blessed your children within you.
Psalm 147:1347 כִּֽי־חִ֭זַּק בְּרִיחֵ֣י שְׁעָרָ֑יִךְ בֵּרַ֖ךְ בָּנַ֣יִךְ בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:13
Psalm 147:14He makes peace in your borders. He fills you with the finest of the wheat.
Psalm 147:1447 הַשָּׂם־גְּבוּלֵ֥ךְ שָׁל֑וֹם חֵ֥לֶב חִ֝טִּ֗ים יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽךְ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:14
Psalm 147:15He sends out his commandment to the earth. His word runs very swiftly.
Psalm 147:1547 הַשֹּׁלֵ֣חַ אִמְרָת֣וֹ אָ֑רֶץ עַד־מְ֝הֵרָ֗ה יָר֥וּץ דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:15
Psalm 147:16He gives snow like wool, and scatters frost like ashes.
Psalm 147:1647 הַנֹּתֵ֣ן שֶׁ֣לֶג כַּצָּ֑מֶר כְּ֝פ֗וֹר כָּאֵ֥פֶר יְפַזֵּֽר׃ ‬
Psalm 147:16
Psalm 147:17He hurls down his hail like pebbles. Who can stand before his cold?
Psalm 147:1747 מַשְׁלִ֣יךְ קַֽרְח֣וֹ כְפִתִּ֑ים לִפְנֵ֥י קָ֝רָת֗וֹ מִ֣י יַעֲמֹֽד׃ ‬
Psalm 147:17
Psalm 147:18He sends out his word, and melts them. He causes his wind to blow, and the waters flow.
Psalm 147:1847 יִשְׁלַ֣ח דְּבָר֣וֹ וְיַמְסֵ֑ם יַשֵּׁ֥ב ר֝וּח֗וֹ יִזְּלוּ־מָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 147:18
Psalm 147:19He shows his word to Jacob; his statutes and his ordinances to Israel.
Psalm 147:1947 מַגִּ֣יד *דברו **דְּבָרָ֣יו לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב חֻקָּ֥יו וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטָ֗יו לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 147:19
Psalm 147:20He has not done this for just any nation. They don't know his ordinances. Praise Yah!
Psalm 147:2047 לֹ֘א עָ֤שָׂה כֵ֨ן ׀ לְכָל־גּ֗וֹי וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֥ים בַּל־יְדָע֗וּם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 147:20
Psalm 148:1Praise Yah! Praise Yahweh from the heavens! Praise him in the heights!
Psalm 148:148 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הוָה מִן־הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם הֽ͏ַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 148:1
Psalm 148:2Praise him, all his angels! Praise him, all his army!
Psalm 148:248 הֽ͏ַלְל֥וּהוּ כָל־מַלְאָכָ֑יו הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כָּל־*צבאו **צְבָאָֽיו׃ ‬
Psalm 148:2
Psalm 148:3Praise him, sun and moon! Praise him, all you shining stars!
Psalm 148:348 הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ וְיָרֵ֑חַ הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כָּל־כּ֥וֹכְבֵי אֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 148:3
Psalm 148:4Praise him, you heavens of heavens, You waters that are above the heavens.
Psalm 148:448 הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ שְׁמֵ֣י הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ מֵעַ֬ל הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 148:4
Psalm 148:5Let them praise the name of Yahweh, For he commanded, and they were created.
Psalm 148:548 יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה כִּ֤י ה֭וּא צִוָּ֣ה וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ ‬
Psalm 148:5
Psalm 148:6He has also established them forever and ever. He has made a decree which will not pass away.
Psalm 148:648 וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם לָעַ֣ד לְעוֹלָ֑ם חָק־נָ֝תַ֗ן וְלֹ֣א יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 148:6
Psalm 148:7Praise Yahweh from the earth, you great sea creatures, and all depths!
Psalm 148:748 הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הוָה מִן־הָאָ֑רֶץ תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים וְכָל־תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃ ‬
Psalm 148:7
Psalm 148:8Lightning and hail, snow and clouds; stormy wind, fulfilling his word;
Psalm 148:848 אֵ֣שׁ וּ֭בָרָד שֶׁ֣לֶג וְקִיט֑וֹר ר֥וּחַ סְ֝עָרָ֗ה עֹשָׂ֥ה דְבָרֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 148:8
Psalm 148:9mountains and all hills; fruit trees and all cedars;
Psalm 148:948 הֶהָרִ֥ים וְכָל־גְּבָע֑וֹת עֵ֥ץ פְּ֝רִ֗י וְכָל־אֲרָזִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 148:9
Psalm 148:10wild animals and all livestock; small creatures and flying birds;
Psalm 148:1048 הַֽחַיָּ֥ה וְכָל־בְּהֵמָ֑ה רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ וְצִפּ֥וֹר כָּנָֽף׃ ‬
Psalm 148:10
Psalm 148:11kings of the earth and all peoples; princes and all judges of the earth;
Psalm 148:1148 מַלְכֵי־אֶ֭רֶץ וְכָל־לְאֻמִּ֑ים שָׂ֝רִ֗ים וְכָל־שֹׁ֥פְטֵי אָֽרֶץ׃ ‬
Psalm 148:11
Psalm 148:12both young men and maidens; old men and children:
Psalm 148:1248 בַּחוּרִ֥ים וְגַם־בְּתוּל֑וֹת זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים עִם־נְעָרֽ͏ִים׃ ‬
Psalm 148:12
Psalm 148:13let them praise the name of Yahweh, for his name alone is exalted. His glory is above the earth and the heavens.
Psalm 148:1348 יְהַלְל֤וּ ׀ אֶת־שֵׁ֬ם יְהוָ֗ה כִּֽי־נִשְׂגָּ֣ב שְׁמ֣וֹ לְבַדּ֑וֹ ה֝וֹד֗וֹ עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ ‬
Psalm 148:13
Psalm 148:14He has lifted up the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near to him. Praise Yah!
Psalm 148:1448 וַיָּ֤רֶם קֶ֨רֶן ׀ לְעַמּ֡וֹ תְּהִלָּ֤ה לְֽכָל־חֲסִידָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֣י יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל עַֽם־קְרֹב֗וֹ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 148:14
Psalm 149:1Praise Yahweh! Sing to Yahweh a new song, his praise in the assembly of the saints.
Psalm 149:149 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ שִׁ֣ירוּ לַֽ֭יהוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ בִּקְהַ֥ל חֲסִידִֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 149:1
Psalm 149:2Let Israel rejoice in him who made them. Let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
Psalm 149:249 יִשְׂמַ֣ח יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו בְּנֵֽי־צִ֝יּ֗וֹן יָגִ֥ילוּ בְמַלְכָּֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 149:2
Psalm 149:3Let them praise his name in the dance! Let them sing praises to him with tambourine and harp!
Psalm 149:349 יְהַֽלְל֣וּ שְׁמ֣וֹ בְמָח֑וֹל בְּתֹ֥ף וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר יְזַמְּרוּ־לֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 149:3
Psalm 149:4For Yahweh takes pleasure in his people. He crowns the humble with salvation.
Psalm 149:449 כִּֽי־רוֹצֶ֣ה יְהוָ֣ה בְּעַמּ֑וֹ יְפָאֵ֥ר עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 149:4
Psalm 149:5Let the saints rejoice in honor. Let them sing for joy on their beds.
Psalm 149:549 יַעְלְז֣וּ חֲסִידִ֣ים בְּכָב֑וֹד יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ עַל־מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 149:5
Psalm 149:6May the high praises of God be in their mouths, and a two-edged sword in their hand;
Psalm 149:649 רוֹמְמ֣וֹת אֵ֭ל בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם וְחֶ֖רֶב פִּֽיפִיּ֣וֹת בְּיָדָֽם׃ ‬
Psalm 149:6
Psalm 149:7To execute vengeance on the nations, and punishments on the peoples;
Psalm 149:749 לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת נְ֭קָמָה בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם תּֽ֝וֹכֵחֹ֗ת בַּל־אֻמִּֽים׃ ‬
Psalm 149:7
Psalm 149:8To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
Psalm 149:849 לֶאְסֹ֣ר מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם בְּזִקִּ֑ים וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם בְּכַבְלֵ֥י בַרְזֶֽל׃ ‬
Psalm 149:8
Psalm 149:9to execute on them the written judgment. All his saints have this honor. Praise Yah!
Psalm 149:949 לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת בָּהֶ֨ם ׀ מִשְׁפָּ֬ט כָּת֗וּב הָדָ֣ר ה֭וּא לְכָל־חֲסִידָ֗יו הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 149:9
Psalm 150:1Praise Yah! Praise God in his sanctuary! Praise him in his heavens for his acts of power!
Psalm 150:150 הַ֥לְלוּ יָ֨הּ ׀ הַֽלְלוּ־אֵ֥ל בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ הֽ͏ַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בִּרְקִ֥יעַ עֻזּֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 150:1
Psalm 150:2Praise him for his mighty acts! Praise him according to his excellent greatness!
Psalm 150:250 הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו הֽ͏ַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כְּרֹ֣ב גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ ‬
Psalm 150:2
Psalm 150:3Praise him with the sounding of the trumpet! Praise him with harp and lyre!
Psalm 150:350 הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ בְּתֵ֣קַע שׁוֹפָ֑ר הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּנֵ֣בֶל וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ ‬
Psalm 150:3
Psalm 150:4Praise him with tambourine and dancing! Praise him with stringed instruments and flute!
Psalm 150:450 הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ בְתֹ֣ף וּמָח֑וֹל הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּמִנִּ֥ים וְעוּגָֽב׃ ‬
Psalm 150:4
Psalm 150:5Praise him with loud cymbals! Praise him with resounding cymbals!
Psalm 150:550 הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ בְצִלְצְלֵי־שָׁ֑מַע הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י תְרוּעָֽה׃ ‬
Psalm 150:5
Psalm 150:6Let everything that has breath praise Yah! Praise Yah!
Psalm 150:650 כֹּ֣ל הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה תְּהַלֵּ֥ל יָ֗הּ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃ ‬
Psalm 150:6
Proverbs 1:1The proverbs of Solomon, the son of David, king of Israel:
Proverbs 1:1   מִ֭שְׁלֵי שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה בֶן־דָּוִ֑ד מֶ֝֗לֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:1
Proverbs 1:2to know wisdom and instruction; to discern the words of understanding;
Proverbs 1:2   לָדַ֣עַת חָכְמָ֣ה וּמוּסָ֑ר לְ֝הָבִ֗ין אִמְרֵ֥י בִינָֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:2
Proverbs 1:3to receive instruction in wise dealing, in righteousness, justice, and equity;
Proverbs 1:3   לָ֭קַחַת מוּסַ֣ר הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל צֶ֥דֶק וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט וּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:3
Proverbs 1:4to give prudence to the simple, knowledge and discretion to the young man:
Proverbs 1:4   לָתֵ֣ת לִפְתָאיִ֣ם עָרְמָ֑ה לְ֝נַ֗עַר דַּ֣עַת וּמְזִמָּֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:4
Proverbs 1:5that the wise man may hear, and increase in learning; that the man of understanding may attain to sound counsel:
Proverbs 1:5   יִשְׁמַ֣ע חָ֭כָם וְי֣וֹסֶף לֶ֑קַח וְ֝נָב֗וֹן תַּחְבֻּל֥וֹת יִקְנֶֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:5
Proverbs 1:6to understand a proverb, and parables, the words and riddles of the wise.
Proverbs 1:6   לְהָבִ֣ין מָ֭שָׁל וּמְלִיצָ֑ה דִּבְרֵ֥י חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים וְחִידֹתָֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:6
Proverbs 1:7The fear of Yahweh is the beginning of knowledge; but the foolish despise wisdom and instruction.
Proverbs 1:7   יִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הוָה רֵאשִׁ֣ית דָּ֑עַת חָכְמָ֥ה וּ֝מוּסָ֗ר אֱוִילִ֥ים בָּֽזוּ׃ פ ‬
Proverbs 1:7
Proverbs 1:8My son, listen to your father's instruction, and don't forsake your mother's teaching:
Proverbs 1:8   שְׁמַ֣ע בְּ֭נִי מוּסַ֣ר אָבִ֑יךָ וְאַל־תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ תּוֹרַ֥ת אִמֶּֽךָ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:8
Proverbs 1:9for they will be a garland to grace your head, and chains around your neck.
Proverbs 1:9   כִּ֤י ׀ לִוְיַ֤ת חֵ֓ן הֵ֬ם לְרֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ וַ֝עֲנָקִ֗ים לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:9
Proverbs 1:10My son, if sinners entice you, don't consent.
Proverbs 1:10   בְּנִ֡י אִם־יְפַתּ֥וּךָ חַ֝טָּאִ֗ים אַל־תֹּבֵֽא׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:10
Proverbs 1:11If they say, |Come with us, Let's lay in wait for blood; let's lurk secretly for the innocent without cause;
Proverbs 1:11   אִם־יֹאמְרוּ֮ לְכָ֢ה אִ֫תָּ֥נוּ נֶאֶרְבָ֥ה לְדָ֑ם נִצְפְּנָ֖ה לְנָקִ֣י חִנָּֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:11
Proverbs 1:12let's swallow them up alive like Sheol, and whole, like those who go down into the pit.
Proverbs 1:12   נִ֭בְלָעֵם כִּשְׁא֣וֹל חַיִּ֑ים וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים כְּי֣וֹרְדֵי בֽוֹר׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:12
Proverbs 1:13We'll find all valuable wealth. We'll fill our houses with spoil.
Proverbs 1:13   כָּל־ה֣וֹן יָקָ֣ר נִמְצָ֑א נְמַלֵּ֖א בָתֵּ֣ינוּ שָׁלָֽל׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:13
Proverbs 1:14You shall cast your lot among us. We'll all have one purse.|
Proverbs 1:14   גּ֭וֹרָ֣לְךָ תַּפִּ֣יל בְּתוֹכֵ֑נוּ כִּ֥יס אֶ֝חָ֗ד יִהְיֶ֥ה לְכֻלָּֽנוּ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:14
Proverbs 1:15My son, don't walk in the way with them. Keep your foot from their path,
Proverbs 1:15   בְּנִ֗י אַל־תֵּלֵ֣ךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ אִתָּ֑ם מְנַ֥ע רַ֝גְלְךָ֗ מִנְּתִיבָתָֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:15
Proverbs 1:16for their feet run to evil. They hurry to shed blood.
Proverbs 1:16   כִּ֣י רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם לָרַ֣ע יָר֑וּצוּ וִֽ֝ימַהֲר֗וּ לִשְׁפָּךְ־דָּֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:16
Proverbs 1:17For in vain is the net spread in the sight of any bird:
Proverbs 1:17   כִּֽי־חִ֭נָּם מְזֹרָ֣ה הָרָ֑שֶׁת בְּ֝עֵינֵ֗י כָל־בַּ֥עַל כָּנָֽף׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:17
Proverbs 1:18but these lay wait for their own blood. They lurk secretly for their own lives.
Proverbs 1:18   וְ֭הֵם לְדָמָ֣ם יֶאֱרֹ֑בוּ יִ֝צְפְּנ֗וּ לְנַפְשֹׁתָֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:18
Proverbs 1:19So are the ways of everyone who is greedy for gain. It takes away the life of its owners.
Proverbs 1:19   כֵּ֗ן אָ֭רְחוֹת כָּל־בֹּ֣צֵֽעַ בָּ֑צַע אֶת־נֶ֖פֶשׁ בְּעָלָ֣יו יִקָּֽח׃ פ ‬
Proverbs 1:19
Proverbs 1:20Wisdom calls aloud in the street. She utters her voice in the public squares.
Proverbs 1:20   חָ֭כְמוֹת בַּח֣וּץ תָּרֹ֑נָּה בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת תִּתֵּ֥ן קוֹלָֽהּ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:20
Proverbs 1:21She calls at the head of noisy places. At the entrance of the city gates, she utters her words:
Proverbs 1:21   בְּרֹ֥אשׁ הֹמִיּ֗וֹת תִּ֫קְרָ֥א בְּפִתְחֵ֖י שְׁעָרִ֥ים בָּעִ֗יר אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ תֹאמֵֽר׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:21
Proverbs 1:22|How long, you simple ones, will you love simplicity? How long will mockers delight themselves in mockery, and fools hate knowledge?
Proverbs 1:22   עַד־מָתַ֣י ׀ פְּתָיִם֮ תְּֽאֵהֲב֫וּ פֶ֥תִי וְלֵצִ֗ים לָ֭צוֹן חָמְד֣וּ לָהֶ֑ם וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים יִשְׂנְאוּ־דָֽעַת׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:22
Proverbs 1:23Turn at my reproof. Behold, I will pour out my spirit on you. I will make known my words to you.
Proverbs 1:23   תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ לְֽת֫וֹכַחְתִּ֥י הִנֵּ֤ה אַבִּ֣יעָה לָכֶ֣ם רוּחִ֑י אוֹדִ֖יעָה דְבָרַ֣י אֶתְכֶֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:23
Proverbs 1:24Because I have called, and you have refused; I have stretched out my hand, and no one has paid attention;
Proverbs 1:24   יַ֣עַן קָ֭רָאתִי וַתְּמָאֵ֑נוּ נָטִ֥יתִי יָ֝דִ֗י וְאֵ֣ין מַקְשִֽׁיב׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:24
Proverbs 1:25but you have ignored all my counsel, and wanted none of my reproof;
Proverbs 1:25   וַתִּפְרְע֥וּ כָל־עֲצָתִ֑י וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י לֹ֣א אֲבִיתֶֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:25
Proverbs 1:26I also will laugh at your disaster. I will mock when calamity overtakes you;
Proverbs 1:26   גַּם־אֲ֭נִי בְּאֵידְכֶ֣ם אֶשְׂחָ֑ק אֶ֝לְעַ֗ג בְּבֹ֣א פַחְדְּכֶֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:26
Proverbs 1:27when calamity overtakes you like a storm, when your disaster comes on like a whirlwind; when distress and anguish come on you.
Proverbs 1:27   בְּבֹ֤א *כשאוה **כְשׁוֹאָ֨ה ׀ פַּחְדְּכֶ֗ם וְֽ֭אֵידְכֶם כְּסוּפָ֣ה יֶאֱתֶ֑ה בְּבֹ֥א עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם צָרָ֥ה וְצוּקָֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:27
Proverbs 1:28Then will they call on me, but I will not answer. They will seek me diligently, but they will not find me;
Proverbs 1:28   אָ֣ז יִ֭קְרָאֻנְנִי וְלֹ֣א אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה יְ֝שַׁחֲרֻ֗נְנִי וְלֹ֣א יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:28
Proverbs 1:29because they hated knowledge, and didn't choose the fear of Yahweh.
Proverbs 1:29   תַּ֭חַת כִּי־שָׂ֣נְאוּ דָ֑עַת וְיִרְאַ֥ת יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לֹ֣א בָחָֽרוּ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:29
Proverbs 1:30They wanted none of my counsel. They despised all my reproof.
Proverbs 1:30   לֹא־אָב֥וּ לַעֲצָתִ֑י נָ֝אֲצ֗וּ כָּל־תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:30
Proverbs 1:31Therefore they will eat of the fruit of their own way, and be filled with their own schemes.
Proverbs 1:31   וְֽ֭יֹאכְלוּ מִפְּרִ֣י דַרְכָּ֑ם וּֽמִמֹּעֲצֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:31
Proverbs 1:32For the backsliding of the simple will kill them. The careless ease of fools will destroy them.
Proverbs 1:32   כִּ֤י מְשׁוּבַ֣ת פְּתָיִ֣ם תַּֽהַרְגֵ֑ם וְשַׁלְוַ֖ת כְּסִילִ֣ים תְּאַבְּדֵֽם׃ ‬
Proverbs 1:32
Proverbs 1:33But whoever listens to me will dwell securely, and will be at ease, without fear of harm.|
Proverbs 1:33   וְשֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ לִ֭י יִשְׁכָּן־בֶּ֑טַח וְ֝שַׁאֲנַ֗ן מִפַּ֥חַד רָעָֽה׃ פ ‬
Proverbs 1:33
Proverbs 2:1My son, if you will receive my words, and store up my commandments within you;
Proverbs 2:1   בְּ֭נִי אִם־תִּקַּ֣ח אֲמָרָ֑י וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י תִּצְפֹּ֥ן אִתָּֽךְ׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:1
Proverbs 2:2So as to turn your ear to wisdom, and apply your heart to understanding;
Proverbs 2:2   לְהַקְשִׁ֣יב לַֽחָכְמָ֣ה אָזְנֶ֑ךָ תַּטֶּ֥ה לִ֝בְּךָ֗ לַתְּבוּנָֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:2
Proverbs 2:3Yes, if you call out for discernment, and lift up your voice for understanding;
Proverbs 2:3   כִּ֤י אִ֣ם לַבִּינָ֣ה תִקְרָ֑א לַ֝תְּבוּנָ֗ה תִּתֵּ֥ן קוֹלֶֽךָ׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:3
Proverbs 2:4If you seek her as silver, and search for her as for hidden treasures:
Proverbs 2:4   אִם־תְּבַקְשֶׁ֥נָּה כַכָּ֑סֶף וְֽכַמַּטְמוֹנִ֥ים תַּחְפְּשֶֽׂנָּה׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:4
Proverbs 2:5then you will understand the fear of Yahweh, and find the knowledge of God.
Proverbs 2:5   אָ֗ז תָּ֭בִין יִרְאַ֣ת יְהוָ֑ה וְדַ֖עַת אֱלֹהִ֣ים תִּמְצָֽא׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:5
Proverbs 2:6For Yahweh gives wisdom. Out of his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.
Proverbs 2:6   כִּֽי־יְ֭הוָה יִתֵּ֣ן חָכְמָ֑ה מִ֝פִּ֗יו דַּ֣עַת וּתְבוּנָֽה׃ ‬
Proverbs 2:6
Proverbs 2:7He lays up sound wisdom for the upright. He is a shield to those who walk in integrity;
